[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/gzungs 'dus woM bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D946}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi khar kU Ta gA ra d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/_sangs 
[\[1b.2\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa 
[\[1b.3\]]brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/_rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/_rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar 
[\[1b.4\]]byas pa/_sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/_rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/_'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i 
[\[1b.5\]]khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/_chos bstan pa dang cho 'phrul can/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_chos thams cad 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[2a.2\]]byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_mthu chen po thob pa/_rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par 'phrul pa/_cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa/_sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[2a.3\]]sems dang /_spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang /_spobs pa dang /_cho 'phrul dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[2a.4\]]thar pa'i sgo dang /_gzungs dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa dang ma 'dres pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang sa bcu dang /_pha rol du phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po dang /_byams pa dang 
[\[2a.5\]]snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang /_byams pa'i stobs dang dben pa dang /_yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang /_rdo rje mig dang rdo rje'i lus 
[\[2a.6\]]dang /_rdo rje'i blo gros dang lag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje 'dus pa dang rdo rjes thu bo che dang /_rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rdo rje brtsegs pa dang rdo rje'i phung po dang /_rdo rje'i nga ro dang rdo rje bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]bya ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang /_nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas 
[\[2b.2\]]sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/_lta ba chags pa med pa/_thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis bon nges par sreg pa sha 
[\[2b.3\]]stag la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang /_tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[2b.4\]]pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med gzhal du med pa dag 
[\[2b.5\]]dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[2b.6\]]dbang byed dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang /_stobs can dang /_rab sim dang /_sgra gcan dang rnam par snang byed dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/_grangs med 
[\[2b.7\]]dpag tu med pa rnams dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_ma dros pa dang /_'jog po dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_dung skyong dang /_stobs kyi rgyu dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po dang /_mtha' yas dang /_de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dag dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du 
[\[3a.2\]]ma can dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang /_
[\[3a.3\]]'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang /_'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang /_sring mo bdun dang /_drang srong chen po bdun dang /_bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang /_gza'i lha thams cad dang /_phyogs kyi lha rnams dang /_phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang /_sa'i lha dang dbyangs 
[\[3a.4\]]can dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_bgegs rnams dang /_log 'dren rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /_ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang /_'phags 
[\[3a.5\]]skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_lag na be con dang /_bden bral dang /_me'i lha dang /_rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /_dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang /_srid med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang /_byin pa 
[\[3a.6\]]po dang /_phreng ba can dang /_lcags can dang /_tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang /_sprin ta la la dang /_log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang /_shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang /_sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang /_ma bdun dang rdo rje lcags 
[\[3a.7\]]kyu can dang /_rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang /_rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_rdo rje'i sde dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_gtsug gis 'gro dang /_rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_smyo byed dang /_brjed byed dang /_sgrub pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin bcas dang gnon po tshad med 
[\[3b.2\]]dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang /_lha'i bu nyi ma dang /_lha'i bu zla ba dang /_dus tshigs kyi lha dang /_nub ka'i lha dang /_dus kyi lha thams cad dang /_gnam sa'i lha rnams dang yang thabs cig go/_/de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor sangs 
[\[3b.3\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_byang chub chen po dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sa brnyes pas ni shin tu yongs su bzung skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum cu 
[\[3b.4\]]rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku brgyan/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni yan lag dang /_nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/_spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong /_bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/_de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud/_
[\[3b.5\]]spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/_bdud dang phas kyis rgol ba dang /_ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/_brjod pa'i sgra dang /_
[\[3b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/_khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/_ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[3b.7\]]shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_stobs dang /_smon lam dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/_gdan rin po che dang /_rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang /_rin po che dang /_mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/_rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brtan pa/_
[\[4a.2\]]rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/_rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang /_ke ke ru chen po dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_mtho nag chen po dang /_dun las 
[\[4a.3\]]du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas kun du mdzes pa/_rin po che dang /_rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/_dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/_
[\[4a.4\]]gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor bas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur pa/_zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag 
[\[4a.5\]]par rgyas par chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba yang dag par ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu 
[\[4a.6\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/_'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[4a.7\]]kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to/_/nyan thos chen 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci 
[\[4b.2\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/_/de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje lhun po chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo /_/skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad 
[\[4b.3\]]kyis tshim par gyur to/_/'on pa rnams ni sgra thos so/_/long ba rnams ni mig thob po/_/smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do/_/nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to/_/sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas so/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med 
[\[4b.4\]]par gyur to/_/yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming yang mi grags par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang /_mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[4b.5\]]gsal bar snang bar gyur to/_/der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang /_sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/_/de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste/_bde ba mchog 
[\[4b.6\]]gis tshim par gyur nas kun du bltas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/_de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo /_/
[\[4b.7\]]skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so/_/snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur bar kun du snang ngo /_/
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas byer ro/_/bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rngul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/_grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 
[\[5a.2\]]'bar/_rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang /_dge sbyong gau ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos ston pa 'di la ltos/_des bdag cag phung ngo /_/tho btsams so/_/phyogs gang du gnas gtol med do/_/longs la dge sbyong 
[\[5a.3\]]gau ta ma de'i gan du song ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/_rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/_lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can go cha sna 
[\[5a.4\]]tshogs bgos pa/_cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs can mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba mig dang bzhin dang skra kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can 
[\[5a.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang /_bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 
[\[5a.6\]]'gyur ba deng nyid du phye mar brlag go/_/rnam par gzhom mo/_/de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste/_shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang bdud kyi sde 
[\[5a.7\]]chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir khyab par byas te dung dang rnga dang /_rdza rnga dang /_'khar rnga dang /_rgyud gcig pa dang /_lcags kyi sil dkrol dang /_rnga bo che brdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang /_pi tsi zhes bya ba dang /_zung shig zung shig_/sod cig 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang /_gtun shing dang /_gtun rked nyag dang /_phur bu dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mdung thung dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na 
[\[5b.2\]]thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par snang ngo /_/
[\[5b.3\]]bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_yang dag par bgro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go/_/bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcings bas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud kyi ris kyi 
[\[5b.4\]]lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo /_/bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/_de bzhin 
[\[5b.5\]]gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[5b.6\]]pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la zhog ste/_rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 
[\[5b.7\]]'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba gang gis/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang /_bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong ba dang /_gzhan yang gang dag sdang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ba bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_brjed byed dang /_'byung po dang /_gdon dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_sgrub pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin bcas dang /_gnon po dang /_zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[6a.2\]]rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa/_de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[6a.3\]]des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ma nyan nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[6a.4\]]pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa/_/gzhig pa'i 
[\[6a.5\]]slad du 'dren pa byung /_/khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal/_/'jig rten rtsa lag gcig bu khyod/_/thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/_/ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus/_/yang dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis/_/brlan pa'i thugs kyis bstan pa mdzad/_/
[\[6a.6\]]khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang /_/bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang /_/shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis/_/bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud/_/khyod kyis chos rnams skye med par/_/bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang /_/'bras bur 
[\[6a.7\]]dogs pa ma mchis pa/_/kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad/_/'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa/_/khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/_/mu stegs can dang bdud btul te/_/chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad/_/nyon mongs brag chen rnam kun du/_/ye shes rdo rjes 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]rab bcom nas/_/sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i/_/byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/_/gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi/_/byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba/_/khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pu/_/dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags/_/khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha/_/
[\[6b.2\]]khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags/_/thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid/_/mya ngan 'das gnas gcig pu khyod/_/khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams/_/sems can dmyal las rnam par grol/_/rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas/_/khyod kyis srog chags 
[\[6b.3\]]rnams kyang bsrungs/_/lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i/_/ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas/_/grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang 'grol/_/kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang /_/mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi/_/dra bas 'jig rten khams rnams khyab/_/mya ngan 'das las 
[\[6b.4\]]lhag pa bde/_/lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad/_/khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas/_/gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang /_/gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang /_/nor bu lha mer ma gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[6b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/_yang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/_rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[6b.6\]]cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de'i 
[\[6b.7\]]tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos te/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/_dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' bar gyur to/_/phyogs thams cad dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[7a.2\]]po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun du 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun du snang ngo rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med 
[\[7a.3\]]dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su 
[\[7a.4\]]rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_yang dag par ston pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag kun du snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[7a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na/_rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen po kun du gda' ba 'di su'i lags/_de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 
[\[7a.6\]]so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston te/_bcom ldan 'das nges bdud 
[\[7a.7\]]sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel ba gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/_gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rjes rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul ba chen po'i byin gyis brlabs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal te/_de bzhin 
[\[7b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/_rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[7b.3\]]po'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin 
[\[7b.4\]]dang /_gdugs kyi sprin dang /_rgyan phreng gi sprin dang /_dbu rgyan gyi sprin dang /_me tog gi sprin dang /_na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas/_nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_pus mo 
[\[7b.5\]]g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la logs su blta zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/_rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to/_/de'i 
[\[7b.6\]]tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/_'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse 
[\[7b.7\]]mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid la brtsams te chos kyang ston to/_/rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus pa/_
[\[8a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten 
[\[8a.3\]]gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lte 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i 
[\[8a.4\]]sprin chen pos dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'di su yi lags/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 
[\[8a.5\]]snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen 
[\[8a.6\]]po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste/_'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun 
[\[8a.7\]]du khros nas lha'i bu thams cad dang /_gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtso ba'i phyir lhags pa dang /_de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]lnga'i bcing bas bcings pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/_de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas/_gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 
[\[8b.2\]]des rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/_'di ni rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs 
[\[8b.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/_byang 
[\[8b.4\]]chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang so sor zhus so rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[8b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa yang mthong ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 
[\[8b.6\]]'joms pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag 
[\[8b.7\]]bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[9a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[9a.3\]]phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na/_bsod nams kyi 
[\[9a.4\]]tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang sngon dang /_ljang ser dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_gser dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_
[\[9a.5\]]rdo'i snying po dang /_ke ke ru dang /_ke ke ru chen po dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_dun las dang /_go mu ta ra ka dang /_mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/_de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba 
[\[9a.6\]]byas te steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/_'jam pa 
[\[9a.7\]]mnyen pa/_rab tu gzhon pa sha rgyas pa/_snum pa/_long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/_pad+ma gsar du kha bye ba lta bu dang /_dung dang nya dang /_rdo rje dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lcags kyu dang /_pad+ma dang /_chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du ma bskor ba 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]byas nas nub par gyur to/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/_gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_dngul dang /_byi ru dang /_shel dang /_ke 
[\[9b.2\]]ke ru dang /_dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thon te/_de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/_/snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru 
[\[9b.3\]]ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/_/snying po ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/
[\[9b.4\]]dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/_/snying po ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams 
[\[9b.5\]]kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/_/snying po ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni ke ke 
[\[9b.6\]]ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/_/snying po ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung 
[\[9b.7\]]ba dag go/_/snying po ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung bdag go/_/snying po 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]ni an+da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/chu ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/_/ze 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma dag go/_/rin po che'i pad+ma re re la yang 
[\[10a.2\]]sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum 'byung ngo /_/'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang 
[\[10a.3\]]rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang /_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/_shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par 
[\[10a.4\]]rgyal ba'i ba dan dpyangs pas nam mkha' kun du khebs pas pad+ma rA ga dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_ma rgad dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_rdo'i snying bo dang /_spug dang /_ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing sa la gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod 
[\[10a.5\]]pas rnam par spras te/_mdzes par byas pa dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mthar mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang /_bya bang dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs 
[\[10a.6\]]dang /_rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/_khyams dang 'dun khang chen po'i nyen 'khor stegs bur bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa las byas pa'i sgo khang can shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa bkra shis kyi gser gyi 
[\[10a.7\]]bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa/_rdzing chen po'i 'gram gyi ne'u gsing margad kyi rgyu las byung ba/_ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ngur pa dang /_ka lan da ka'i 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]khyu gnas pa gser gyi bye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyi phreng bas brgyan pa/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/_grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo /_rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye 
[\[10b.2\]]ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo /_/rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra phyung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su spyod do/_/sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs kyi 
[\[10b.3\]]sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing /_/de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan pa/_/bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gis kun 'byor pa/_/ye shes sgron ma de la 
[\[10b.4\]]skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan/_/thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyis dag_/rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcur ldan pa yi/_/thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis/_/
[\[10b.5\]]'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du/_/gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa/_/'chi dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi/_/rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la lta phyir dang /_/gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhig gis/_/skye dgu 
[\[10b.6\]]rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing /_/sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba/_/shAkya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/_/de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[10b.7\]]phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun du snang ste/_kha cig tu ni rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun du snang ngo /_/kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/_kha cig tu ni go shir Sha'i tsan+dan dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma'i sprin gyi char/_kha cig tu ni 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]gos kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/_kha cig tu ni ka shi ka'i ras dang /_du gu la'i ras dang /_za 'og gi sprin gyi char/_kha cig tu ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/_kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang /_ut+pal dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar 
[\[11a.2\]]po dang /_dri mchog dang /_a ti mug ta ka dang /_ka tsa lin da dang /_ma hA ka tsa lin da dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab po/_/me 
[\[11a.3\]]tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab po/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de 
[\[11a.4\]]dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te/_sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston brgyad 
[\[11a.5\]]ring po nas mthong ngo /_/de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal lo/_skyes bu dam pa de la phyag btsal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_dad pa thob nas skad 
[\[11a.6\]]cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod de/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[11a.7\]]po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob ba dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra 
[\[11b.2\]]'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi/_/ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang /_/bsod nams mi ldan sems can 
[\[11b.3\]]rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog_/byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung /_/bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi/_/sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs pa/_/de dag thub pa'i bya [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de ring glo bur du/_/skad cig 
[\[11b.4\]]tu ni ji ltar rnam par zhig par gyur/_/ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang /_/ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang /_/bser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thor ji bzhin du/_/de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom/_/
[\[11b.5\]]bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na/_/lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrogs pa/_/'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros ba gzhig pa yi/_/thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'/_/mig dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag tshil rnams 
[\[11b.6\]]dang /_/srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtswa ltar bor nas ni/_/mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa/_/'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang /_/de bzhin skye bo'i nor 'dod 
[\[11b.7\]]snying dang ldan pa la/_/thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchi/_/gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas/_/mchog tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur/_/rang bde mi 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]gzigs sems can don brtson thugs ldan pa/_/'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol/_/stong ba gsung yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing /_/ye shes me yis rnyog pa 
[\[12a.2\]]bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan/_/spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje'i snying po bde gshegs sras/_/mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i/_/dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim/_/skad cig gis 
[\[12a.3\]]ni dmyal bas sum cu'i lha dbang gyur/_/bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang /_/de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la/_/gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa/_/de myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob par shog_/de ltar 
[\[12a.4\]]tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[12a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying bos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_de 
[\[12a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas 
[\[12a.7\]]mu med par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la da lta'o/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/dran pa'i gzhus 'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis/_/ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mjed cing /_/'jig rten nyon mongs nyen 
[\[12b.2\]]pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas/_/bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lhang nge'o/_/dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa dra ba yis/_/'dul ba'i pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas/_/ye shes nam mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs/_/nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i 
[\[12b.3\]]bdud sde gdungs/_/mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing /_/'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad/_/dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa/_/dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug ltar bsgrag tu gsol/_/mgon po mu 
[\[12b.4\]]stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing /_/bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyes nas/_/ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyis mthu mnga' ba/_/skye ba'i 'jigs las rab grol seng ge ji bzhin sgrogs/_/spyod pa zab cing brtan la rtag tu mi dpogs pa/_/
[\[12b.5\]]sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram/_/dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bos rnam 'dzin pa/_/ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gtso ba/_/tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel/_/byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 
[\[12b.6\]]'khrungs pas mdzes/_/byang chub yan lag lam gyi 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten/_/bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan/_/dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing /_/sa 
[\[12b.7\]]dang dbang dang dam mchog phur pa brtan btab pa/_/lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro bar mdzes/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la chal dang 'dra 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 
[\[13a.2\]]'khod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'byung ba nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[13a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i 
[\[13a.4\]]pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_
[\[13a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing /_rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[13a.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po 
[\[13b.2\]]dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas/_
[\[13b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying 
[\[13b.4\]]po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i 
[\[13b.5\]]tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tshom dang bral ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 
[\[13b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du lho nub kyi 
[\[13b.7\]]phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che blo 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[14a.2\]]chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[14a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[14a.4\]]du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod 
[\[14a.5\]]pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[14a.6\]]dpa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug 
[\[14a.7\]]cing /_rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba du ma bstan 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]pas gzhal med khang dang /_me tog gi sprin dang /_rin po che'i sprin dang /_bye ma'i sprin dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang /_rin po che spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_an+da 
[\[14b.2\]]rnyil dang /_byi ru dang /_margad dang /_mu tig dmar po dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang /_rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 
[\[14b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtogs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo chen po'i 
[\[14b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun du snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag thams cad 
[\[14b.5\]]de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/_'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing pad+ma dang yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lcags kyu dang /_bum pa dang /_nya dang sgo khang 
[\[14b.6\]]dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_dung dang /_rdo rje dang /_pad+ma dang /_dpal pe'u dang /_'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu mthun pas mngon par grub pa'i 
[\[14b.7\]]dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa/_sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdangs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis mkhrig ma mdzes par gyur pa sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang yang dag par mthun pa'i phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /_yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo la byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces/_kye rigs kyi bu gang gi 
[\[15a.2\]]phyir bdud sdig can dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar gcad pa dang /_rnam 
[\[15a.3\]]par gzhig pa dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /_rab tu dga' bar bya ba nas khams gsum par 
[\[15a.4\]]gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyir khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis 
[\[15a.5\]]mi khyab par bsags pa yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos spras pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_dbang dang /_gzungs dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthus grub pa/_sems can 
[\[15a.6\]]thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i bdud kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don par lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[15a.7\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]kun du bskyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod do/_/rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskum ste/_rang rang gi byang 
[\[15b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzud pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzed 'dir bgye'o/_/de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[15b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi 
[\[15b.4\]]skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[15b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la ji nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[15b.6\]]ba dang /_chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan yang gang dag lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_
[\[15b.7\]]mi ma yin pa gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ji nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms 
[\[16a.2\]]par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/_de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[16a.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te 'gul rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul to/_/chem che ma rab tu chem chem/_kun du rab tu chem chem mo/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/_'bar rab tu 
[\[16a.4\]]'bar/_kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/_'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba rnon po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa gtsigs te/_mche ba mnan nas me lce chen po ltar sma ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/_mi bzad pa rna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 
[\[16a.5\]]'thor ba dang /_ba lang rna lta bu dang /_gzar bu lta bu dang /_sbrul chen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phreng bas bzhin du me 'bar ba/_lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang zhags pa dang /_gtun shing dang /_
[\[16a.6\]]gtun shing rked nyag dang /_ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_lcags sgrog la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshon cha'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_yi 
[\[16a.7\]]dgas dang /_sha za dang /_ma mo dang /_'byung bo'i gdon dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren la sogs pa sdang pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems can skrag par byed pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi dbang po'i pags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thabs su bgos pa/_sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]gram du dam du bcings pa/_'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/_'chi bdag kyang skrag par byed pa/_khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas lus kyi tshigs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_kha dog 
[\[16b.2\]]sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_nag po ste/_thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khro gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i rdul gyi thigs pa rtsub po 'dzag pa las dug 'chang rnam 
[\[16b.3\]]pa sna tshogs kun du byung bas yan lag dang nying lag kun du dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rje drag shul can du snang ste/_mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha ha zhes gad mo rta gad 'byung zhing /_'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char pa dang bcas pa'i sprin 
[\[16b.4\]]dkrugs pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa 'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang /_rta rgod ma'i kha nas me 'byung ba lta bu'i hU~M zhes bya ba zab cing brtan pas rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste 'byer zhing 'thor nas dngangs te skyabs su 
[\[16b.5\]]dong zhing 'dud pas nyi ma stong bas 'bar ba'i lus rnams mthong ba na/_sna sgar sgur can zhom pa lta bu'i bu ga zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par mdzes pa/_glog stong 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mig gi 'bras 
[\[16b.6\]]bu'i 'od zer gyis skra'i tshogs rtsub cing bshor la gyen du 'greng ba'i rtse mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/_sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang /_ska rags dang /_dpung rgyan dang /_gdu bu dang /_rna chas lus brgyan pa/_
[\[16b.7\]]rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing drag shul can mi bzad pa lag na thogs pa mdzub mo rnams las hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun du bsdigs pa dag 'thon te/_gang de dag gi mig dang kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/_des sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams 
[\[17a.2\]]tshig par byed/_rmongs par byed 'tshog par byed de/_mi bzad pa drag pa rtsub pa sdug bsngal ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do/_/de dag tshor bas nyen pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ngo /_/de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang log 'dren de dag 
[\[17a.3\]]tshor ba chen pos nyen te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ba mthong nas 'jigs dngangs skrag ste skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i shing bzhin du 'dar rab tu 'dar te/_ngu bar 'dod na yang ngu ma nus nas ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to/_/
[\[17a.4\]]de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can 'dul bar byed de/_sdang ba dang /_gdon dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i 
[\[17a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa drag shul gyi gzugs can/_seng ge'i sgra chen po hU~M zhes bya ba 'di gnyis phyung ste/_de gnyis skar mda' bzhin du nam mkha'i 
[\[17a.6\]]dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur te/_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i shugs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag 
[\[17a.7\]]na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig_/de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/_yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs can mche ba mi bzad pa drag pas 'jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]te/_mchu ma rungs par bsgyur ba'i kha nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i tshe rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i sprin nag po'i tshogs rab tu sgrogs pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra drag po lta bu'i hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras gang ba/_bgegs dang 
[\[17b.2\]]log 'dren thams cad 'jigs nas 'bros shing sgyid lug nas phyogs bslad par byed pa/_lag pa dang rkang pa dang /_sen mo dang /_mig dang /_ag tshom dang skra thams cad rdo rje 'bar bar snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[17b.3\]]pa/_/gzi brjid thams cad kyi gzi brjid rnams rang gi gzi brjid kyis zil du rlag par byed cing rgyang ring du byed pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang skar ma dang /_nor bu rnams kyi 'od lham mer ma yin/_lhan ner ma yin/_lhang nger ma yin par byed 
[\[17b.4\]]pa/_gang nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa/_mthu che ba yang lham mer ma yin/_lhan ner ma yin/_lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu la rab tu gnas pa 
[\[17b.5\]]rnams kyi 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por byed pa gzhan phyung ngo /_/de nas rdo rje khro bo des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par 
[\[17b.6\]]bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye 
[\[17b.7\]]skyes bu dam pa dag deng la bdud sdig can dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin du chug shig_/'di dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig_/gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba gdon dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]ldan pa/_sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang /_mi rtogs pa dang yid mi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 
[\[18a.2\]]gyis shig dang /_des sems can thams cad kyi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i tshig mnyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang bzung ste/_
[\[18a.3\]]dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu seng ge'i sgra chen po hU~M zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 
[\[18a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 
[\[18a.5\]]chen po rdo rje'i lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i gnam lcags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje be con la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje yan lag dmar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs po che la phyag 
[\[18a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro lding ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i khro bo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M tra Ta tra Ta/_tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+phu Ta la/_s+phu Ta ya/_
[\[18a.7\]]spo Ta ya/_s+pha Ta ya/_mo Ta mo Ta/_mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/_g+hUr+N+Nag+hUr+N+Na/_g+hUr+NA ba ya g+hUr+N+NA pa ya/_sarba sa twA ni/_tra sa tra sa/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_sa~M b+h+rAm ya sa~M b+h+rAm ya/_sarbab+hU tA ni/_ku Ta ya ku Ta ya/_saM ku Ta ya saM ku Ta ya/_sarba shatrUM NaM/_g+taT g+haT/_saM g+haT ya/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]saM g+ha Ta ya/_sarba byi d+yA badzra badzra/_s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/_ka Ta badzra badzra/_ma Ta badzra badzra/_uts+tshA Ta ya badzra badzra/_ha na badzra badzra/_da ha badzra badzra/_pa tsa badzra badzra/_mA tha badzra badzra/_ut+sA da ya ma hA badzra badzra/_t+hA ra badzra pA Ni bri ya/_ka ha ka ha/_ha sa ha sa/_ma hA TaT+Ta ha sa/_/kha cig tu rgya 
[\[18b.2\]]mtsho'i rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zab cing 'jigs su rung ba'i hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras sdang ba rab tu sdang ba bgegs dang log 'dren kun du skrag par byed pa dang /_sdang ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/_'joms su stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_badzra par pra da s+pho Ta/_
[\[18b.3\]]bsgrub par bya ba lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_ma mo dang /_'byung po dang /_gdon gyi tshogs mthar 'byin pa/_'byer bar mdzad pa/_hU~M hU~M phaT he he phaT/_a mo g+ha phaT/_rgyal chen bzhi'i 
[\[18b.4\]]ris kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang /_rtsa 
[\[18b.5\]]lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_'byer par bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M 
[\[18b.6\]]phaT/_'thab bral gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_dga' ldan gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar 
[\[18b.7\]]bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_'phrul dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]dang /_rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_de bzhin du 'od gsal dang /_tshangs ris nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/_bu dang chung ma dang /_phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo 
[\[19a.2\]]bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/_rigs sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad du gsol/_rmugs par mdzad du gsol/_rmongs par mdzad du gsol/_gcu bar gsol gcad du gsol/_gzhig tu gsol rnam 
[\[19a.3\]]par gzhig tu gsol/_mnan du gsol/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_o~M khro bo khro bo chen po rnam par bkra ba/_ser skya po nag po/_dmar po ser po/_mi pham pa/_rtag tu 'bar ba'i khro bo/_/su ru su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru mu ru/_tu ru tu ru tu ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru/_
[\[19a.4\]]tha ra tha ra tha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_ma ra ma ra/_ku hu ku hu/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi li/_lu Tu lu Tu/_sarba TA lA ma ma hU~M/_pu lu pu lu len tam/_lo ha si len ta ma/_mu lu lang khA se/_tsu lu tsu len tam/_ma lu khu bu len tam/_ma lu ru bi/_kurbi burba/_
[\[19a.5\]]le N+yuspu ra g+ha N+yu spu bi ri tsu/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_su mu su mu ru a ka Te bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_ka Ta bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_ka Tang ka Te/_dza ye pi dza ye/_dza yan ti/_bi dza yan ti/_ti ming gi si/_ma hA ti ming gi si/_g+hu tang ga me/_g+hu ta ba rA ya Ne/_sdang ba rnams la rjes 
[\[19a.6\]]su 'doms pa/_ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/_drag shul can rnams 'byer bar mdzad pa/_dpa' bo rnams kyi nang na dpa' ba/_des pa rnams kyi nang na des pa/_ma grub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/_grub pa rnams chud mi za bar mdzad pa/_sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[19a.7\]]pa mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnas bsgags pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/_rdo rje'i rigs kyi rigs sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/_rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du dam tshig gang bcas pa de rjes su bskyang du gsol/_rjes su bskyang du 
[\[19b.2\]]gsol/_gshegs su gsol/_myur du gshegs su gsol/_bdag gi las rnams myur ba myur bar bsgrub tu gsol/_skrag par byed pa/_rdo rje 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/hu ru hu ru/_grub pa drag po lag na rdo rje bka' stsol cig swA hA/_shin tu grub 
[\[19b.3\]]par byed pa la swA hA/_rdo rje chen po la swA hA/_rdo rje phur ba la swA hA/_rdo rje 'joms pa la swA hA/_rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/_rdo rje kI li kI la la swA hA/_drag po kI li kI la la swA hA/_dmar po kI li kI la la swA hA/_byis pa kI li kI la la swA hA/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[19b.4\]]cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/_bdag gi gnod pa dang /_nang 'go ba thams cad dang /_rims thams cad med par mdzod cig swA hA/_de nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos 'di skad smras pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos 
[\[19b.5\]]te/_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad dang de bzhin du bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab par snang ngo /_/gnam grum pa'i sgra chen po yang grag go/_/kun nas sa chen po 'di grum par kun du snang ngo /_/sa chen po'i ser ka de dag nas yan lag 
[\[19b.6\]]brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung ngo /_/chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin dus chen po thams cad kun du gang bar snang ngo /_/gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu chen po dang /_lha chen po dang lha ma yin chen po de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 
[\[19b.7\]]'og nas 'thon cing ri rab kyi drung du 'thon te gyen du byung nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo /_/de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]kyang kun du 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing /_kun du rab tu 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun du rnam par 'joms par shes te/_de dag sdug bsngal ni bzad cing drag la rtsub pas nyen nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i ngu skad 'thon te tshig 'di 
[\[20a.2\]]skad ces kyang smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan 
[\[20a.3\]]thams cad na gnas pa dang /_ri dang /_chu bo dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing dang /_dur khrod dang /_shing dang /_thibs po dang /_khron pa rnying ba dang /_btung chu dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dang /_gtsug lag khang zhigs pa dang /_gnas dang /_lha khang na 
[\[20a.4\]]gnas pa dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa chen por lhung pa 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos/_rab tu g.yos 
[\[20a.5\]]kun tu rab tu g.yos te/_mog mog por gyur cing 'od med par kun du snang ngo /_/bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun du 'bar/_rab tu 'bar zhing /_kun du rab tu mching cing 'bar te/_me lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo /_/gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 
[\[20a.6\]]thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos dngangs skrag ste rang rang gi mgo rdo rje rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 
[\[20a.7\]]la skyabs su dong ngo /_/bdud sdig can yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyam thag cing skrag la zhum ste gnod pas dngangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos la skyabs su song /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo /_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]phyag 'tshal te/_khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag yongs su skyobs shig_/yongs su skyobs shig_/bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o/_/chos la skyabs su 'gro'o/_/dge 
[\[20b.2\]]'dun la skyabs su 'gro'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir pa lta bu dang /_ma lta bu dang /_spun lta bu dang /_gnyen lta bu dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bdag deng phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi pha 
[\[20b.3\]]dang /_ma dang /_spun dang /_gnyen dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las cung zad gang ci byed pa de sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/bdag dbugs phyung nas 
[\[20b.4\]]gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ngo /_/bdag grol nas gzhan yang dgrol lo/_/bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las bzla'o/_/rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_khrag dang /_sha dang /_nyams mthu dang /_srog gis kyang sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o/_/
[\[20b.5\]]mchod par bya'o/_/rjed par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i gnas thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/bsti stang bya'o/_/rim gror bya'o/_/mchod par 
[\[20b.6\]]bya'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung ste/_byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/_dga' ba thob nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang 
[\[20b.7\]]gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis/_/sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/_/bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa/_/bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar/_/rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/_/sems can shin tu sdug bsngal kun/_/mya ngan las 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]ni bzla bar gyis/_/rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji bzhin du/_/skye dgu thams cad gdul bar byos/_/stobs po che dang ldan pa yi/_/bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus 
[\[21a.2\]]rang rang gi lag gi snyim pa na me tog gi phur ma thogs par shes te/_me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_khro bo chen 
[\[21a.3\]]po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal med khang chen 
[\[21a.4\]]por gyur to/_/bdud sdig can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag bsam 
[\[21a.5\]]gyi shing du mas mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris brgyad du bres pa/_rin po che dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_margad dang /_baiDUr+ya dang /_an+da rnyil dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_ke ke ru dang /_ke ke ru chen po dang /_rdo rje dang /_rdo rje chen po dang /_
[\[21a.6\]]dun las dang /_dun las chen po dang /_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan pa/_me tog gi phreng bas bklubs pa/_pog snod du ma nas 
[\[21a.7\]]bdug pa dri zhim po'i ngad kyi dri zhim par byas pa/_phye ma'i dri zhim po'i bsgo bas bsgos pas/_lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang glu len cing gar byed pa/_rdzing bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu can 'bum phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po che sna 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]tshogs kyi pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_ut+pal dang /_dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa byung nas/_de mchog tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid bde ba skyes te gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang /_bdud 
[\[21b.2\]]kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /_bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyis ka spyi bo la blangs te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir phul te/_tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod 
[\[21b.3\]]do/_/'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor gyur pa/_/stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su/_/byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems/_/sems can bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob/_/bdag mig gti mug mun pas 
[\[21b.4\]]dri can dri med gyur/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral/_/mya ngan las 'das drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan/_/sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/_/sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabs su ma song ba/_/kye ma dman pa 
[\[21b.5\]]yun ring ji lta bslus shig gu/_/de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang /_/dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur/_/sa mdog gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog_/gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya/_/srid pa gzhan na kun du 
[\[21b.6\]]rgyu rtse bdag gi yid/_/rang phan 'jug dang dge bshes bral bar ma gyur cig_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i 
[\[21b.7\]]bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang /_gdon dang bgegs dang /_log 'dren de dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad las rnam par rtsom pa la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /_bgegs mi 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]byed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chug shig_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yang byin cig dang /_de sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba dang /_
