[\[22a.2\]]mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so/_/zhes te tshig la mngon par dga' nas yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[22a.3\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang /_sdang ba bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_ma mo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po dang /_gdon dang /_brjed byed dang /_srul po 
[\[22a.4\]]dang /_lus srul po dang /_ro langs dang /_mkha' 'gro dang /_sgrub pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang /_gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po mang po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen po zab mo klong 'khyil pa/_'ur 'ur 
[\[22a.5\]]sgra 'byung ba lta bur drag cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdang ba 'byung po dang /_gdon dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sdang ba 
[\[22a.6\]]can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon cig_/khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang /_de la sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/_klog pa de dag la bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'tsho bar mi 
[\[22a.7\]]bya ste/_sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun par stobs sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_rig sngags 'grub pa 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_tshigs ma dang /_sgog pa dang /_ki'u dang /_gtor ma dang /_'byung po dang /_mi bgrungs pa rnams kyi sha dang zas zos kyang skyon du mi bzung zhing nyes par mi brtsi'o/_/de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren la sogs pa 
[\[22b.2\]]thams cad ces bya ba nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung ci stsal ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/deng slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/sems 
[\[22b.3\]]can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag dang /_sdang ba bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_'byung po dang /_gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad la legs so 
[\[22b.4\]]zhes bya ba byin te/_rig sngags kyi las dang dam tshig dang /_phyag rgya thams cad 'dzin du bcug go/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsang ba pa'i bdag po 
[\[22b.5\]]lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang /_bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang /_'byung po dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad 
[\[22b.6\]]kyang dam tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya de skad ces smras pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ming dang yi ge dang 
[\[22b.7\]]sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang ming ngam gzugs sam/_dbyibs sam/_gnas sam/_mnyam par bzhag pa'am/_g.yengs pa yang rung ste/_ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do/_/gang la ming med pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]med pa dang /_dbyibs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa med pa dang /_g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ming ci zhig bya zhes de la ji snyam du sems/_yang btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di ni bdag 
[\[23a.2\]]la gsal bar byed pa ma yin gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/_gnyis ka la yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no/_/'on kyang gsal bar byed par btags pa yod do/_/de la gsal bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong pa dag ni bdag gis stong /_
[\[23a.3\]]gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong /_gnyis ka yang gnyis ka'i bdag nyid kyis stong ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du brtags pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig de yang tshig gi bdag nyid kyis stong ste yi ge yang yi ge ma yin no/_/de ltar na 
[\[23a.4\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no/_/don de brjod pa na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro mod kyi gzhan gyi dbang la rten pa'i phyir yi ger btags pa yang yod do/_/yongs su btags pa yin pa'i phyir brtags pa yang stong ba'o/_/
[\[23a.5\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong ba'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa'o/_/glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba yang 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 
[\[23a.6\]]ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do/_/ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin 
[\[23a.7\]]nyid do/_/gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin to/_/ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o/_/rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo /_/lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so/_/zhi gnas gang yin pa 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]de rnam par thar pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no/_/dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/_mtha' gnyis med/_gzung ba med/_'dzin pa po med/_'dzin pa med/_chad pa med/_rtag pa med/_skye ba med/_'gag pa med/_
[\[23b.2\]]rtog pa med/_rnam par rtog pa med/_rang dbang med/_gzhan gyi dbang med/_'gro ba med/_'ong ba med/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med/_rnam par byang ba med/_'du ba med/_'bral ba med de/_de ni lhag mthong yin no/_/lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams med/_
[\[23b.3\]]khams rnams med/_dbang po rnams med/_skye mched rnams med/_yul rnams med/_yul du gdags pa med/_las med las kyi 'bras bu med do/_/gang la las med cing las kyi 'bras bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/bla na med pa yang 
[\[23b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so/_/chos gang yin pa de mi skye mi 'chi'o/_/mi skye mi 'chi ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang 
[\[23b.5\]]mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni shin tu zab ste/_'di la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba yang med na/_'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang /_
[\[23b.6\]]phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /_mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/_gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[23b.7\]]spyan ni dmigs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin 
[\[24a.2\]]na/_de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par blta/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa 
[\[24a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go/_/brgyan ces bya ba de ni spros pa'i yi ge dang 
[\[24a.4\]]sgra'o/_/dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/_/sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/btsun 
[\[24a.5\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/_de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/_'di 
[\[24a.6\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las dang sku'i gsang ba'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do/_/kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o/_/rten cing 
[\[24a.7\]]'brel bar 'byung ba chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa/_bsam gtan goms par bya bar shes par bya ba ste/_dmigs pa med pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bas 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]stong ba/_lus kyi yul ma yin pa/_ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/_yid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa ni de ltar 
[\[24b.2\]]blta bar bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/_/chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam du blta'o/_/dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'chi ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[24b.3\]]pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos kyi sku 'di ni gnas pa nyid do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba de ni pha rol du phyin pa dag gi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o/_/de la pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de yang bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa nyid 
[\[24b.4\]]du blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su gtang bar bya ba'o/_/de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi tshig go/_/nang zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i tshig go/_/de la phyi zhes 
[\[24b.5\]]bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang /_skom 'dod pa rnams dang /_de bzhin du bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_sa dang /_mgo dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig 
[\[24b.6\]]dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/_de yang thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang /_gya nom pa dang /_rgya che ba dang /_rang gi bsti stang du byas te rnam pa 
[\[24b.7\]]thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 'di ni phyi'i 'o/_/nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o/_/de yang rnam pa gnyis te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_bzod pa'i gtam 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_stobs dang /_smon lam dang /_ye shes kyi gtam dang /_snying rjes yongs su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba'o/_/gzhan yang nang gi sbyin pa ni gang 'di 
[\[25a.2\]]mthar 'dzin pa dang /_skye ba dang 'gag par yongs su rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_shes pa dang shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba ste/_'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o/_/gang 'di nyid la lus dang ngag 
[\[25a.3\]]dang /_yid rgod pa med pa dang /_khengs pa med pa dang /_lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /_ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /_yid rnam par g.yeng ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa/_gcig tu nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa 
[\[25a.4\]]btang snyoms kyis yongs su zin pa/_thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang /_srog la mi lta bar bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_chos dang /_chos ma 
[\[25a.5\]]yin pa dang /_bden pa dang /_bden pa ma yin pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam par spong zhing byams pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/gang sbyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[25a.6\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing rtsom pa dang /_yongs su mi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang /_de dmigs pa med pa dang /_byams pas yongs su zin pa ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir 
[\[25a.7\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha rol du phyin pa bzhi 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]po 'di dag nyid rtogs pa ste/_pha rol du phyin pa rnams 'byed pa dang /_'brel pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang /_de la gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_stong pa dang /_gso ba dang /_gso ba dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_dngos po thams cad dngos po med 
[\[25b.2\]]par yang dag par ston to/_/mdor bsdu na 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston te/_dmigs pa dang bral ba 'di ni 'dir 
[\[25b.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni 
[\[25b.4\]]ye shes kyi tshogs so/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang /_tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang shes pa dang /_shes bya mtha' dag dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ste/_btsun pa 
[\[25b.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/_/rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te bstan cing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[25b.6\]]gsung gi gsang ba yang de bzhin no/_/thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa dang /_so so'i rnam pa dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs dang /_ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang /_bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang bstan par mi 
[\[25b.7\]]spyod mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis rig pa ni thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig par bya ste/_bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa dang /_blo gros dang /_blo dang /_rtogs 
[\[26a.2\]]pa dang /_mngon par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang /_sems kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang /_skye gnas sna tshogs dang /_lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang /_mi shes pa dang ma rig pa'i mun pa dang /_mi snang ba 
[\[26a.3\]]dang /_mun nag dang /_'gro ba lnga dang /_'gro ba drug dang /_khams gsum pa thog ma dang /_dbus dang /_'jig par gnas pa sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad par gnas par dus gsum dang /_phyogs la mgo rmongs pa/_skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa 
[\[26a.4\]]na ba dang /_nad dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa la sogs pas nyin gcig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs 
[\[26a.5\]]ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzud pa dang /_gnas pa thams cad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa shin du bde ba/_don dam pa/_
[\[26a.6\]]zhi ba 'khrug pa med pa/_dge ba nad med pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sbyar ba dang /_
[\[26a.7\]]yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dang ba dang /_mgu ba'i sa la yang dag par gzung pa dang /_chos rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po ltar 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus dang /_tshod las mi 'da' bar bya ba dang /_de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig 
[\[26b.2\]]nas gcig tu brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang /_gcig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang /_bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /_ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun mi gcad pa dang /_skal ba yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs 
[\[26b.3\]]su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad par bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas gsang ba 
[\[26b.4\]]pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/gang gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas 
[\[26b.5\]]pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod yang legs so/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[26b.6\]]chen po zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/_phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen la shin du gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/_ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched 
[\[26b.7\]]du bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de dkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i 
[\[27a.2\]]bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag bzhag ste/_ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa yang dkon na rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos/_
[\[27a.3\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu gang gA'i klung tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das bsnyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/dge slong dang /_
[\[27a.4\]]dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[27a.5\]]thob par gyur to/_/de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan 
[\[27a.6\]]dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang chos kyi dga' pa dang /_mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung ngo /_/byang chub 
[\[27a.7\]]sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang ba brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do/_/spos dang /_byug pa dang /_bdug pa dang /_phyi ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang /_rin po che dang /_mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang /_me tog pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_ut+pal dang /_dri mchog dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_pa ri Sha ka dang /_pa ri Sha ka chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung 
[\[27b.2\]]chen po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu Sha ka dang /_many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_kun nas skyes dang /_kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab po/_/spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab po/_/de nas tshangs pa dang /_
[\[27b.3\]]khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang /_'byung po dang /_brjed byed dang /_skem byed dang /_sgrub pa dang /_
[\[27b.4\]]sbrul 'dzin bcas dang /_gnon po dang /_ma mo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_bram ze'i srin po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang /_mkhar dang ri dang /_sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams 
[\[27b.5\]]cad dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[27b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang thams cad dngos grub stsol ba dang /_dam tshig thams cad du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol/_de nas 
[\[27b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]shig dang /_ngas khyed rang gi snying po bsnyan par bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i sgra 
[\[28a.2\]]bas lhag pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab pa thog ma dang /_bar dang tha mar dge ba/_sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/_gsal ba/_'jebs pa dag pa/_mnyen pa snyan pa/_brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[28a.3\]]pa'i seng ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya ba ha/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi li/_lu Tu 
[\[28a.4\]]lu Tu/_dza ye bi dza ye/_dza yan+ti/_bi dza yan+ti/_a dzi te/_a pa rA dzi te/_tad+ya te/_sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta sta ma b+ha ni/_dzam b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_shwe te ka rA le/_ke yU re/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ban+d+ha rA bA si ni/_par+Na sha ba ri/_shri ye ma hA shri ye sarba ad+d+hU ta ya shri te/_
[\[28a.5\]]pad+ma ba he/_pad+ma mA li ni/_badzra a~M ku shi/_badzra mA te/_badzra pA tA li/_shU li ni/_badzra d+ha re/_hi hi hi hi/_badzra pA Ni/_he he he he/_badzra pA Ni/_badzra shU li Ni/_tsakra d+ha re/_hi hi badzra pA Ni/_he he badzra pA Ni/_hi hi hi hi/_he he he he/_badzra pA Ni/_ka la ka la/_
[\[28a.6\]]ba la ba la/_ra la ra la/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ra sa ra/_hA hA hA hA hA/_tsi li me le/_tshi le/_di le/_di di la/_di mi le/_dz+wa le/_ma hA dz+wa le/_dz+wa li ti/_pra dz+wa li ti/_tha ra thag ge tha re/_mu ku ti/_k+Sha me/_k+Sha ma me/_grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/_lha thams 
[\[28a.7\]]cad kyi snying kun du 'jug par byed ma/_sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/_sdang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong ma/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug ma tshur 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]shog_/dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig_/sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khod cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/_'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/_tra Ta tra Ta/_s+pho Ta ya swA hA/_gyen du lta la swA hA/_rnam 
[\[28b.2\]]par lta la swA hA/_chu srin la swA hA/_mi la swA hA/_tshangs pa la swA hA/_khyab 'jug la swA hA/_drag po rnams la swA hA/_brgya byin la swA hA/_'jig rten skyong ba rnams la swA hA/_thams cad la swA hA/_lha rnams la swA hA/_nor rnams la swA hA/_ma mo rnams la swA hA/_
[\[28b.3\]]mtshun rnams la swA hA/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la swA hA/_sa la swA hA/_dbyangs can la swA hA/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /_srin po la 
[\[28b.4\]]sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la swA hA/_tshur shog tshur shog_/dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig_/ku ru ku ru/_sa ra sa ra/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_hU~M yU~M pU~M/_tsaN+Da li/_ma tang gi/_Dom+pi ni/_buk+ka 
[\[28b.5\]]si/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la gsang sngags gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang /_lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de 'jigs/_
[\[28b.6\]]dngangs skrag par gyur nas/_chu shing gi tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/_rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du zug cing zhigs la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[28b.7\]]la 'bod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor 'di slong shig_/ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go/_/rig sngags grub pa 'byor bar byed pa'i snying po la gzhol 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]ba bsgrags so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag 
[\[29a.2\]]po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M ki li ki la/_bA la ki li ki lA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te/_rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so/_/des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o/_/dbang 
[\[29a.3\]]du mchi'o/_/dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/_/lung bzhin bgyi'o/_/bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go/_/sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o/_/'byung po thams cad rnam par 
[\[29a.4\]]bshig par bgyi'o nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di ni 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa 
[\[29a.5\]]bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri zhim snang dpal 
[\[29a.6\]]gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la 
[\[29a.7\]]gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig lhogs shig_/'dzin du chug shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang /_bde ba dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa/_chags pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/su chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[29b.2\]]'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_kha ton byed pa 
[\[29b.3\]]dang /_nyan pa dang /_sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[29b.4\]]dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/_dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/_shes rab med par yang ma yin/_ma dul bar ma yin/_tshe thung bar ma yin zhing /_tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems brjed 
[\[29b.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/tshig gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[29b.6\]]shes rab chen po dang /_spobs pa chen po dang /_dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa'i grogs po yongs 
[\[29b.7\]]su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]ro/_/nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang /_log 'dren dang /_rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang /_'byung po dag dang /_gdon gyi tshogs dang /_ma mo dang /_
[\[30a.2\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[30a.3\]]nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[30a.4\]]de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[30a.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/de bzhin 
[\[30a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/
[\[30a.7\]]bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zung shig_/rig sngags dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_phyag rgya 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dang dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar zung shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[30b.2\]]kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[30b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi 
[\[30b.4\]]ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi 
[\[30b.5\]]mkhan po shA+e len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D947}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma 
[\[30b.6\]]ma hA yA n+wa sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri btang bzung chen po na chos ston 
[\[30b.7\]]te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gis 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]sems can rnams dbugs 'byin cing shar phyogs na me lce kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa/_lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs lag pa gcig gis ni phyag 
[\[31a.2\]]'tshal/_g.yas pa na ni be con thogs/_g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/_skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/_mig dmar ba'o/_/de'i 'og na ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so/_/g.yon 
[\[31a.3\]]na ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/_/de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur gzhag go/_/snying po ni ki li ki la dang /_'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang lus dmar po dang /_rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dang /_rdo rje rgya chen te/_snying po'i mchog go/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po 
[\[31a.4\]]drag po chen po dang nye ba na ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/_/'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang /_rdo rje lu gu rgyud do/_/sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje'i tho ba dang /_rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/_/g.yon logs su ni 
[\[31a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar mo'o/_/de'i 'og tu ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no/_/g.yon du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang /_de dag la sogs 
[\[31a.6\]]pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo /_/de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_yul 'khor srung dang dbang po'o/_/me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/_/lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug 
[\[31a.7\]]go/_/bden bral gyi phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po ma mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o/_/nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o/_/rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/byang phyogs su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_tshangs ba chen po dang /_de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[31b.2\]]ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal 
[\[31b.3\]]lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M ki li ki la badzra/_ki li ki la la swA hA/_spyi gtsug la swA hA/_dpral ba la swA hA/_mig la swA hA/_drag shul can la swA hA/_shin tu drag shul can la swA hA/_rdo rje zhags pa la swA hA/_lus 
[\[31b.4\]]dmar po la swA hA/_lag na rdo rje la swA hA/_lag na zhags pa la swA hA/_lag na ral gri la swA hA/_lag na dgra sta la swA hA/_gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/_gtun shing 'dzin la swA hA/_lag na 'khor lo la swA hA/_lag na mdung rtse gsum pa la swA hA/_snying po la swA hA/_nye ba'i 
[\[31b.5\]]snying po la swA hA/_drag po ki li ki la la swA hA/_byis pa ki li ki la la swA hA/_dmar po ki li ki la la swA hA/_stobs po che la swA hA/_ral pa can la swA hA/_gsus 'phyang po la swA hA/_khro bo chol pa la swA hA/_gshin rje la swA hA/_srin po la swA hA/_srin po ya mu na 
[\[31b.6\]]la swA hA/_drag po chen po la swA hA/_sprin la swA hA/_ri 'dzin la swA hA/_ri btang bzung 'dzin la swA hA/_rdo rje be con la swA hA/_'jigs byed chen po la swA hA/_lus 'jigs byed la swA hA/_sdigs byed la swA hA/_rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la swA hA/_rdo rje'i gtan pa la swA 
[\[31b.7\]]hA/_rdo rje'i lus la swA hA/_'gro lding ba la swA hA/_bdud rtsi la swA hA/_dka' thub 'dzin la swA hA/_lcags kyu la swA hA/_don yod pa la swA hA/_gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/_mdog dkar la swA hA/_sdo bsangs mdog la swA hA/_'phyang po la swA hA/_glang po che la swA hA/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]ba lang 'phel gyi lag la swA hA/_bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swA hA/_sbrul gyi ska rags can la swA hA/_rdo rje'i phur pa la swA hA/_lag pa gnyis ka la swA hA/_A rdo rje la swA hA/_'bar ba'i 'od byed la swA hA/_blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/_myu 
[\[32a.2\]]gu la swA hA/_'od byed pa la swA hA/_rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la swA hA/_rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/_rdo rje 'jigs byed la swA hA/_rdo rje khu tshur la swA hA/_sprin rnam par 'thor ba la swA hA/_char ba rton la swA hA/_rdo rje'i lcags kyu la swA hA/_rdo rje'i snying po la swA hA/_rdo rje'i 
[\[32a.3\]]nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/_mthe bo'i rgyal po la swA hA/_be con rgyal po la swA hA/_go cha'i rgyal po la swA hA/_o~M ng+h+ri~M_oM/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha 
[\[32a.4\]]ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT swA hA/_yul 'khor srung la swA hA/_mig mi bzang la swA hA/_'phags skyes po la swA hA/_lus ngan po la swA hA/_dbang po la swA hA/_me la swA hA/_drang srong chen po thams cad la swA hA/_nyi ma la swA hA/_zla ba 
[\[32a.5\]]la swA hA/_gshin rje la swA hA/_khyab 'jug la swA hA/_srin po'i bdag po la swA hA/_klu'i bdag po la swA hA/_rlung la swA hA/_dbang bdag la swA hA/_dbang bdag gi chung ma la swA hA/_brgya byin la swA hA/_nor lha'i bu la swA hA/_rdo rje chen po la swA hA/_tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/_
[\[32a.6\]]sa la swA hA/_dbyangs can la swA hA/_lha mo dpal la swA hA/_lha mo dka' thub zlog la swA hA/_rig sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/las thams 
[\[32a.7\]]cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas brtan blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ne mu ne/_ma hA mu ne/_ki li ki la/_ma hA ki 
[\[32b.2\]]li ki la d+hi ke/_ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/_ma hA ka Ta/_sha ma sha ma sha ma/_ma hA sha ma/_shA tri shA tri shA tri/_shAn+ta shAn+ta shAn+ta/_dan+ta dan+ta dan+ta/_d+hI ra d+hI ra d+hI ra/_ma hA me g+hA/_du ra du ra/_ha ri ha ri ha ri/_kuT+Ti kuT+Ti ku T+Ti/_tshin+da tshin+da tshin+da/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/_sarba du Sh+TA na/_gu mu 
[\[32b.3\]]gu mu gu mu/_ha ra ha ra ha ra/_prA NAn/_da ma ni dam ni/_Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha/_DA DA DA DA DA DA/_tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/_pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/_da ha da ha da ha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_he he he/_phaT phaT phaT/_sha ba ri sha ba ri sha ba ri/_mA ta~M gi/_/tsaN+DA li/_hu hu hu/_dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/_ha tA pra 
[\[32b.4\]]t+yar+thi na/_tsi li tsi li tsi li/_phaT phaT phaT/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_tiSh+Tha thi tiSh+Tha thi tiSh+Tha thi/_mA ti kra ma tha/_ma ta~M gi/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_he he he/_gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_kha dang /_mid pa dang /_mig dang /_snying dang ngag thams cad bcing ngo /_/dbrog go/_/
[\[32b.5\]]dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_dun+d+hu dun+d+hu dun+d+hu/_ban+d+hu ban+d+hu ban+d+hu/_nI la nI la nI lAng ga badzra d+hA ra/_stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig_/ko Ti ko Ti ko Ti ni/_sarba b+hU tA ni/_badzra mA li badzra d+hA ra/_badzra a T+Ta hA sa/_tsartu na rtu/_martu/_ku ru ku ru/_hu ru hu ru hu ru/_sems can 
[\[32b.6\]]chen po dran par gyis shig_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_he he he/_phaT phaT phaT/_tsaN+Da tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_ma hA tsaN+Da/_hu rtu hu rtu hu rtu/_mu ru mu ru mu ru/_gr-ih+na gr-ih+na gr-i h+na/_badzra pA Ni ha na ha na/_ma ma sarba sha trU NAn/_mUrti ni tA Da ya phaT/_ku ru ku ru ku ru/_lag na rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar 
[\[32b.7\]]ma byed cig_/dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig dral ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bslus par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tsu tsu tsu/_ha ra ha ra ha ra/_phuTu phuTu phuTu/_ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/_pa tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa ni/_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]lag na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig_/tsi li tsi li tsi li/_phu lu phu lu phu lu/_phu phu phu/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag snying po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i 
[\[33a.2\]]mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig_/dar phu/_tsar phu/_nar phu/_rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/_o~M/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT 
[\[33a.3\]]phaT swA hA/_de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun du 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_
[\[33a.4\]]kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun du snang ngo /_/de ltar gyur pa dang /_bdud sdig can ral gri dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu dang /_mda' la sogs pa dang /_mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do/_/
[\[33a.5\]]de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas de ltar gyur pa dang /_khro bo chol ba/_mdog dmar ba/_sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/_
[\[33a.6\]]mche ba gtsigs pa/_mi bzad pa/_skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/_lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/_lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa/_stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/_shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung nyi 
[\[33a.7\]]shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs su yang kun du snang ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can dang /_bgegs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya khro bo chol pas 'dar bar gyur to/_/bdud sdig can ni myos shing 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]gzir te 'phangs nas srog la mi lta ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings so/_/de ltar gyur pa dang /_de'i tshe 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis spos dang /_
[\[33b.2\]]me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod 
[\[33b.3\]]cing bsngags te mngon par dga' bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa 
[\[33b.4\]]zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/_/gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston 
[\[33b.5\]]tam/_bsti stang du byed dam/_bla mar byed dam/_rim gror byed dam/_mchod pa byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bshig pa dang /_bcom pa dang /_bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 
[\[33b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so/_/de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol 
[\[33b.7\]]gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di smras pa/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan+saya/_dzaTi lam po b+ha ra/_u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston tam/_rim gror bgyid dam/_mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur 
[\[34a.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/_stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin gyi bu'am/_srin po'am/_srin po'i bu'am/_grul bum mam/_grul bum gyi bu'am/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_nam mkha' lding 
[\[34a.3\]]gi bu'am/_klu'am/_klu'i bu'am/_dri za'am/_dri za'i bu'am/_sha za'am/_sha za'i bu'am/_smyo byed dam/_smyo byed kyi bu'am/_mkha' 'gro ma'am/_mkha' 'gro ma'i bu'am/_sgrub pa'am/_sbrul 'dzin bcas la sogs pa dang /_brjed byed dam/_
[\[34a.4\]]lus srul po'am/_ro langs la sogs pa dang /_gcod pa'i gdon thams cad dang /_brjed byed la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag 
[\[34a.5\]]na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/stong pa nyid do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/chen po stong pa nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 
[\[34a.6\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_rim gror bgyi ba dang /_bskor par bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po 
[\[34a.7\]]che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/_o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa drag shul can hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_o~M dz+yo tirnA da/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_o~M o~M o~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_stobs po che la swA hA/_o~M rdo rje khro bo stobs po che ha na da ha/_
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]ba cam tha/_bi ki ra/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_dza Ti la laM bo da ra u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_sarba duSh+Ta na/_stam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_du rA tsa rA na duSh+Ta na ni bA ra ya/_bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_o~M a nan+ta bi dza ya/_ma hA tsa N+Di hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M d+h+ri ka 
[\[34b.2\]]hU~M phaT/_o~M shi ri shi ro/_mA li ni/_si ni si ni/_shi shi ni shi shi ni/_o~M sarba At+ma dza/_ma hA te dzo/_badzra a sha ni badzra pA sha_/a nu pra bi sha sarba duSh+Tan/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hU~M phaT/_o~M hU~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M/_o~M a nan+ta bi dza ya/_ma hA tsaN+Di hU~M phaT/_o~M phaT phaT phaT/_
[\[34b.3\]]badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra karta ri/_ka ra ka ra/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la d+ha ka d+ha ka dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M phaT/_o~M bi pur rak+Sha badzra pany+tsa ra hU~M phaT/_o~M ki li ki la badzra badzrir b+hUr ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT/_
[\[34b.4\]]o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la da ra da ra/_d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_da ra da ra/_dA ra ya dA ra ya/_pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/_mo Ta ya mo Ta ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA pa ya ta Da ta Da/_tA Da ya tA Da ya hU~M phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la dz+wa 
[\[34b.5\]]la dz+wa la/_bra dz+wa la bra dz+wa la/_dI bya dI bya/_dI pa ya dI pa ya hU~M phaT/_o~M tsu ru tsu ru/_u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha shi kha/_ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la tsaN+Da ha na/_
[\[34b.6\]]da ha pa tsa/_ma tha/_bi ka ri/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/_ha na ha na/_ha ra ha ra/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_bid+h+wan+sa ya/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mchod pa/_thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa gzi brjid chen po/_
[\[34b.7\]]su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_kurba kurba/_ma hA kurba/_bi kurba/_ku naT+Ti ku naT+Ti/_na Ti na Ti/_shi ni shi ni/_khi ni khi ni/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_khu ru khu ru/_tu Tu tu Ta/_traT+Ta tra T+Ta/_tu ru tu ru/_'byung po'i bdag po/_klu'i 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]bdag po/_lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa khro bo chol pa stobs po che/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_su ru su ru hU~M phaT/_ha na ha na hU~M phaT/_da ha da ha hU~M phaT/_pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/_hrI/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_o~M tsu lu 
[\[35a.2\]]tsu lu ru swA hA/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la sarba duSh+Tan stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya hU~M phaT/_o~M ha ha/_sa ra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/_o~M bi sa ra/_san+t+ra ya hU~M/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha ra ha ra/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_nA sha ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT/_
[\[35a.3\]]hU~M hU~M/_mA ma mA ma phaT/_o~M badzra kro d+ha ni bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_o~M ma hA ba la badzra d+ha ra/_ka ra ka ra/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M phaT/_o~M dz+wa la gra sa/_u ts+tshuSh+ma sa ga ra hU~M/_rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 
[\[35a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/_dug gnon par 'gyur shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/_dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_bu mang bar 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs kyang gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags 
[\[35a.5\]]thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pas zin pa rnams la skyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo yang bde bar btsas par 'gyur 
[\[35a.6\]]ro/_/mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[35a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/_stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa lag 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]na rdo rje dga' ba/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang pos phyag byas pa/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_ro langs dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/_smyo byed dang /_skrod pa dang /_gsod pa dang /_skem byed dang /_sgo glegs 
[\[35b.2\]]dang /_'khrul 'khor dang /_gtan pa dang /_rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa/_las thams cad byed pa/_dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/_de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung po'i 
[\[35b.3\]]bdag po dbang bdag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje spar te rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs te/_rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi 
[\[35b.4\]]dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun du ston pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[35b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi sku zhes bya 
[\[35b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje sdom bag can du rdo rje spar te/_de nas rdo rje pad+ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi 
[\[35b.7\]]dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te/_rdo rje mi bzad pa'i khro bo chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khro bo chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]gzir ba bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo /_/de dag tshig nas smre zhing srog btang ste sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_
[\[36a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chol pas gzir cing myos te phongs nas srog la mi lta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te 
[\[36a.3\]]bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/_kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o mthu che ba'o/_/de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/_kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o mthu che ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[36a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la khro bo chol pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa smras pa/_o~M badzra krod+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha/_pa tsa/_bid+h+wa n+sa ya/_dza Ti lam bo d+ha ra u ts+tshuSh+ma 
[\[36a.5\]]kro d+ha hU~M phaT/_a AM/_ma hA~M swA hA/_grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro bo stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la drag po'i las dang nad thams cad 
[\[36a.6\]]kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dang bgegs dang /_log 'dren gyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/khro bo thams 
[\[36a.7\]]cad kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas khro bo chen po la lan khris sngar spyad pa byas te/_khro bo chen po'i 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]dkyil 'khor byed pa byas pa gzo ba/_rgyud shes pa/_gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/_gsum la skyabs su song ba/_byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_snying rje can du gyur pa/_dkyil 'khor mthong ba/_dbang bskur ba/_bla 
[\[36b.2\]]ma rnams kyis lung byin pa/_cho ga gang bdud thams cad dang sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/_rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa de bdud dang dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_
[\[36b.3\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_sul po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma dang /_brjed byed dang /_sgrub pa dang /_sbrul 'dzin bcas la sogs pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[36b.4\]]gsad pa dang /_bcing ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rmugs byed dang /_rengs byed dang /_rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar 
[\[36b.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_rjes su dran par byed na/_dbul pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 
[\[36b.6\]]las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lo nyes byung ba'i tshe stobs po che lan bdun bklags na sprin chen po las char 'bab po/_/gal te char mi 'bab na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[36b.7\]]mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so/_/gal te mi 'bebs na srog skam par 'gyur ro/_/gong du smas pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha'am/_klung gi ngos sam/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/_mtsho 'gram mam/_mchod rten 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang /_pad+ma dmar po dang /_a ti mu ka ta ka'i me tog dang /_tsam pa ka'i me tog dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dmar po la 
[\[37a.2\]]sogs pa dang /_bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa de g.yul de thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bkra mi shis pa thams 
[\[37a.3\]]cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags na g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[37a.4\]]nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stobs po che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/stobs po che 
[\[37a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni chos so/_/stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o/_/stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshul lo/_/stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o/_/stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[37a.6\]]po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/skyabs su mchi'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bde dang thar dang mtho ris dang /_/
[\[37a.7\]]mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/_/dam pa kun dang phan pa'i phyir/_/stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi/_/de nas bdud sdig can chos la dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs bar gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'o/_/de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor 
[\[37b.2\]]los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/_gtsang sbra med pa'am/_smyung ba byas pa'am/_smyung ba ma byas pa'am/_'khrig pa'i chos la sten 
[\[37b.3\]]pa la yang 'grub par byed pa'o/_/de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_dam pa ci zhig stsol ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[37b.4\]]stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_'bru sbyin par byed do/_/gos sbyin par byed do/_/dngul sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[37b.5\]]gser sbyin par byed do/_/ba lang sbyin par byed do/_/dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_sems can nyon mongs bas bsgribs pa rnams ni 
[\[37b.6\]]'bras bu'i dus su gnas so/_/'bras bu'i dus kyis yon tan gyi don du gnas so/_/yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs/_/gsang ba'i mtshan 
[\[37b.7\]]nyid ldan pa ste/_/stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/_/gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs/_/spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs/_/mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/_/rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/_/dbang cher grags 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]shing bsod nams che/_/yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/_/mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir/_/sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste/_dge bar 
[\[38a.2\]]byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis gsang sngags 'di sa'am/_ri'am/_klung gi ngogs sam/_rgya mtsho'i drung du bcangs na 'jigs pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces 
[\[38a.3\]]gsol to/_/su mdo sde 'di 'chang ngam/_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad ma mchis par lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/_
[\[38a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[38a.5\]]pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig_/sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang 
[\[38a.6\]]zung shig_/chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 
[\[38a.7\]]'drir 'jug pa dang /_bsti stang du byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa dang /_
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rjes gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa 
[\[38b.2\]]gzung bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing lta bur ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[38b.3\]]ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas mchod pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de la bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na lha dang /_mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi 
[\[38b.4\]]rgyal po stobs po che bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang drang srong chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o/_/stobs po che'i 
[\[38b.5\]]gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[38b.6\]]po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yi ge 'dri 'am/_tshig mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rjes 
[\[38b.7\]]gsol pa/_thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu zab pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems pa de myos par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba dang /_rgyas par bya ba dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang /_dpal gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang /_
[\[39a.2\]]sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong dong bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de thal 
[\[39a.3\]]mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so zhes mngon par dgyes pa mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/_bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu gsungs pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[39a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/stobs po che gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo /_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[39a.5\]]chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M ha na ha na badzra/_da ha da ha badzra/_pa tsa pa tsa badzra/_ma tha ma tha badzra/_dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_ka Tang ka ye/_dza ye bi dza ye/_a ji te/_a pa rA dzi te/_mA ra se n+ya pra marda nA ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[39a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig sdigs shig_/chings shig chings shig_/rnam par chings shig_/ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig_/grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig_/dul ba 
[\[39a.7\]]rnams chud mi za bar gyis shig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig_/lha dang klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog_/ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_
[\[39b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig_/'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni glog dang /_sprin dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[39b.3\]]'du byed thams cad ni mar me dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni chu bur dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed thams 
[\[39b.4\]]cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o/_/'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o/_/'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/_/skar ma dang 'dra'o/_/sems can rnams 
[\[39b.5\]]ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/_mi mthong /_mi shes/_mi mjal gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mjal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/_/'du byed thams cad stong pa nyid du 
[\[39b.6\]]mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/_/de bzhin nyid 
[\[39b.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid mthong zhing /_mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes te spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[40a.2\]]phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[40a.3\]]pa/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams mdo sde 'dis byed par 'gyur te/_mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul ba zhes bya'o/_/mdo sde 'di 
[\[40a.4\]]yongs su nub pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/_mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/_/mdo sde 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing sdod de/_mtshan nyid des na de bzhin 
[\[40a.5\]]gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di la phyag 'tshal te/_mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rangs 
[\[40a.6\]]nas bka' lung bzhin du bgyi zhing su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gan du mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo /_/lha thams 
[\[40a.7\]]cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/legs so legs so bdag cag kyang dam pa stsol bar mngon par dga' ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[40b.2\]]ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyin mo ri btang bzung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyis 
[\[40b.3\]]chos bstan te/_mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/_/mdo 
[\[40b.4\]]sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su 'du shes skyed do/_/'khor ba de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 
[\[40b.5\]]'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed do/_/lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_sangs rgyas 'khor ba bgrod dkar sems can gyi/_/srid pa'i phur pa 'byin cing shes rab kyis/_/srid phur sems klung 'joms shing thub pa yi/_/chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms 
[\[40b.6\]]legs chos spyod/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/_/lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pas 
[\[40b.7\]]bsod nams kyi phung po ci zhig thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa ngas ni ting nge 'dzin bye ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro/_/bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41a.2\]]rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/_/mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyang 'bul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang bde bar sbyar ba sgrub bo/_/dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi chos bstan pa la yang bsti stang du byas te nyan to/_/
[\[41a.4\]]len to 'dzin to klog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji lta ba dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/_/stobs po che pha rol gnon pa khro bo de'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad swa sti swa sti/_sid d+hi sid d+hi swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[41a.5\]]stsal nas/_'phags pa byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 
[\[41a.6\]]'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lag na rdo rje yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[41a.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]{D948}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya nI lAm+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ka lpa nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs 
[\[41b.2\]]rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/_mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/_dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/_'jigs pa'i nga ro can lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa klu nag po se ra la khar thogs pa/_klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar 
[\[41b.3\]]bas rna cha byas pa/_sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/_sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/_bzhin rgyas pa/_smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/_ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/_gshin rje'i cha byad can/_lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/_gsus po che sbrul za ba/_lag pa/_
[\[41b.4\]]brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/_klu'i rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ska rags su bcings pa/_a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/_rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/_dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/_klu thams cad 
[\[41b.5\]]rlag par byed pa/_gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa/_gshin rje'i gzugs can/_khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/_klu rnams 'ching bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis 
[\[41b.6\]]gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_b+ho b+ho bAn+nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/_id n+nI lA~M bar d+ha ra sha rI ra~M/_badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya~M/_yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/_ut+sa da na~M b+ha bi Sh+ya ti/_tad+ya thA/_bud+d+ha phud+d+ha/_bi bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha/_ma hi prA p+ta/_ha ra ha ra nA gA nA~M/_bra ha ra pra ha ra nA 
[\[41b.7\]]gA nA~M/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da nA ga hri da yA ni/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha nA ga ma rmA Ni/_bi sI r+yan+tu nA ga sha rI rA Ni/_bispo Ta ya nA ga nA ya nA ni/_tad+ya thA/_hU~M phaT/_nA ga bi da ra NA ya phaT/_nA got+sa da nA ya phaT/_nI lA~M pa sa nA ya phaT/_a pra ti ha ta pa la pa rA kra mA ya phaT/_kr-i tAn+tA ya phaT/_kr-itAn+ta rU pA ya 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]phaT/_ro Sha NA ya phaT/_trA sa nA ya phaT/_kum+b+ha N+Dot+sA da nA ya phaT/_pre ta pi shA tsi bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_yak+ShA bA smar bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_ha sa ha sa/_dA ra dA ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_nA sha ya nA sha ya/_sarba big+hA~M binA sha ka rA ya phaT/_sarba sha trU~M sa~M g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/_/
[\[42a.2\]]o~M nI yA~M pa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/_/klu bzlog par 'dod na smyag shad kyi lcug ma'am/_dal po'i se'u'i lcug mas bya'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_brjed byed rnams la skud pas bya'o/_/
[\[42a.3\]]rims nad med par bya ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_yi ge 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/_/nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar 'dug ste pog phor gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do/_/rgyas btab pa 
[\[42a.4\]]dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/_/sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa'am/_thal ba'am yungs kar gyis bya'o/_/nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags 
[\[42a.5\]]na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/chom rkun bzlog par 'dod nas sa bya'o/_/dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o/_/bdag bsrung ba la ni yid kyis 
[\[42a.6\]]sam chus bya'o/_/gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/_/las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam/_bdun nam/_bcu bzhi'am/_nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan
