[\[42a.7\]]pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de/_sngags stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI ba~M ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba rgya brtson 'grus seng 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ges dpal na lan dra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur//[ {D949}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra bi dA ra NA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[42b.2\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas 
[\[42b.3\]]thams cad kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/_mi chod pa/_mi shigs pa/_bden pa/_sra ba/_brtan pa/_thams cad 
[\[42b.4\]]du thogs pa med pa/_thams cad du ma pham pa/_sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/_sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/_rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/_rig sngags thams cad gnon par byed pa/_las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_
[\[42b.5\]]gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/_gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/_gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/_'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/_'byung po thams cad tshar gcod pa/_rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/_/ma 
[\[42b.6\]]grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/_grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/_'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/_sems can thams cad srung ba/_zhi ba/_rgyas pa/_sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa/_rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs 
[\[42b.7\]]rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha sen pa ta ye/_tad+ya thA/_o~M tu Ta tu Ta/_tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_g+h+rur+N+Na g+h+rur+N+Na/_g+hur+N+NA pa ya g+hUr+N+NA ba ya/_sarba sa twA ni/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_saM 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bo d+ha ya/_sa~M bo d+ha ya/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_sa~M b+h+ra ma ya sa~M b+h+rA ma ya/_sarba b+hA tA ni/_ku Ta ku Ta/_sa~M ku Ta ya sa~M ku Ta ya/_sarba sha trU na/_g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/_sa~M g+hA Ta ya sa~M g+hA Ta ya/_sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/_s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/_ka Ta badzra badzra/_ma Ta badzra badzra/_ma tha badzra badzra/_
[\[43a.2\]]aT+Ta hA sa nI la badzra/_su badzrA ya swA hA/_he phul+lu/_ni ru phul+lu/_ni gri h+na kul+lu/_mi li tsul+lu/_ku ru ku l+lu/_badzra bi dza yA ya swA hA/_kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_ra Ta ra Ta/_mo Ta na pra mo Ta nA ya swA hA/_tsa ra ni tsa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_sa ra sa ra/_mA ra ya/_badzra 
[\[43a.3\]]bi dA ra NA ya swA hA/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_ma hA kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_kro d+ha kro d+ha badzra kI le kI lA ya swA hA/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ye swA hA/_hrA sa ya trA sa ya/_badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/_ha ra ha ra/_badzra d+ta rA ya swA hA/_pra ha ra pra ha ra/_badzra pra b+hany+dzanA ya 
[\[43a.4\]]swA hA/_ma ti s+thi ra badzra/_shru ti s+thi ra badzra/_pra ti s+thi ra badzra/_ma hA badzra/_o pra ti ha ta badzra/_a mo g+ha badzra/_e hi badzra/_shIg+h+raM badzrA ya swA hA/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sarba badzra kU la mA brtA ya swA hA/_a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/_nam s+sa man+ta badzrA NAM/_sarba ba la~M A 
[\[43a.5\]]brta ya/_ma hA ba le/_ka ta ba le ta ta le/_a ca le/_maN+Da la ma ye/_a ti badzra/_ma hA ba le/_be ga ra Na/_a dzi te/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ti Ti ti Ti/_ting ga le/_da ha da ha/_te dzo ba ti/_ti li ti li/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ma hA ba le/_badzrA~M ku sha dzra lA ya swA hA/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_
[\[43a.6\]]na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pAN ye/_ma hA yak+Sha sa nA ba ta ye/_tad+ya thA/_a~M ha ra ha ra badzra/_ma tha ma tha badzra/_d+hu na d+hu na badzra/_da ha da ha badzra/_pa tsa pa tsa badzra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/_d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/_dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/_b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/_nam shA N+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/_
[\[43a.7\]]hu lu hu lu_/tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_a mraM te hU~M phaT/_sdig pa thams cad byang byas na/_/sdug bsngal thams cad med par 'gyur/_/rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/_/dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/_/sems can dbang po nyams pa dang /_/tshe zad pa dang 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]tshe nyams dang /_/phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang /_/lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_/mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang /_/bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang /_/phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang /_/nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang /_/mya ngan ngal las gnod pa 
[\[43b.2\]]dang /_/'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang /_/mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang /_/mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/_/rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang /_/des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis/_/mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/_/gang dag yid dge 
[\[43b.3\]]sems dang zhing /_/gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/_/mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/_/srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/_/mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang /_/de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/_/tshe 
[\[43b.4\]]dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/_/nor bu yungs kar dUr ba dang /_/rin chen rma med tsan+dan bcas/_/shel dang rdo rje me tog dang /_/chu yis gser ram yang na ni/_/dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung /_/gtsang ma'i gos kyis 
[\[43b.5\]]dkri zhing dgang /_/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_/yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/_/rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni/_/rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig_/rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po 
[\[43b.6\]]dzi na mi tra dang dA na shI la dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D950}]@#/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang 
[\[43b.7\]]bcas pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas/_gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du 
[\[44a.2\]]mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni khyod gtum pa 
[\[44a.3\]]yin/_bsten par dka' ba yin/_shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/_'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/_lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do/_/lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo 
[\[44a.4\]]rje'i rigs 'di dang /_rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad po gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_lag na rdo rje khyod kyang 
[\[44a.5\]]mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang /_log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa yang tshangs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[44a.6\]]thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang /_smyung ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang /_dge sbyong ma yin pa yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang /_
[\[44a.7\]]las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming brgyad po gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje ngas bshad kyis nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_khyod ni glang po che'i rna ba can yin/_khyod ni rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa yin/_khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/_/khyod ni rin po che'i 'byung 
[\[44b.2\]]gnas yin/_khyod ni bden pa'i sprin nyid yin/_/khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/_khyod ni 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/_khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin no/_/khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 
[\[44b.3\]]bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/_/chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_byang chub 
[\[44b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/_na mo d+ha rma s+ya/_na maHsa~M g+ha s+ya/_na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_a T+Te/_ma T+Te/_kha ra T+Te/_so me so mA su khi/_hi ri hi ri/_mi ri ki ri/_b+hi b+hi bi sa ni sid+d+ha n+tu sarba kAr+yA Ni sA d+ha 
[\[44b.5\]]ya man+t+ra pa da swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal ba gang lags pa de ni legs te/_bcom ldan 'das de de 
[\[44b.6\]]legs so/_/de de legs te/_bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog sgrub pa ni bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad po bklag par bgyi'o/_/bklags na bdag bstod par 'gyur te/_dga' nas dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/_/bgegs kyang 'byung 
[\[44b.7\]]bar mi 'gyur la lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar bgyid do/_/nyal ba'i tshe bklags na rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/_sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]med pa lnga bgyid pa yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bdag mchi'o/_/yang lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[45a.2\]{D951}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya da sha badzra pA Ni hr-i da ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[45a.3\]]na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming 
[\[45a.4\]]shes sam/_rus shes sam/_gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so/_/gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/srin po rnams dang /_lhag ma za ba rnams dang /_bdug pa za ba rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang 
[\[45a.5\]]gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_u ki ri ma ki ri/_mi rI ca par+Na sha ba ri/_u li me/_mi li me/_i li me/_mi li me/_i li me/_mi li me/_i li ma li me/_hig ke d+hig ke/_hug ke/_d+hu d+hu re/_pra d+ha re/_a la~M pha le/_phA la~M pha le/_khu khu me ti ku me tu 
[\[45a.6\]]me/_khi ri khi ri/_swa d+ha sA d+ha/_sarba bag kwa le/_ban d+ha ma bag kwa le/_kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid lag pa dang /_myos pa dang /_rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang /_
[\[45a.7\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig_/'di lta ste/_rgyal ba khyu mchog dang /_'brog gnas dang /_gangs gnas dang /_lngas rtsen 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dang /_nor bu bzang po dang /_grags pa bzang dang /_lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang /_phreng ba mdzes dang /_rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis 
[\[45b.2\]]log pa dang /_myos pa dang /_rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig_/gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 
[\[45b.3\]]rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_sa ra sa ra Ne swA hA/_de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/_tad+ya thA/_u ge te/_ke te/_sa~M ka te/_ud+du le/_d+ha d+he/_ta te/_ta pat+te swA hA/_tsi tse tsi tse/_tsi khe lo ts+tshed ne/_b+hed ni/_sarba 
[\[45b.4\]]bir+ya tshe da ni/_sarba kra ta kA khorda/_pa ra kr-i tanA sha ni/_de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_a le lak+She/_ba ke le la k+She/_a ke/_pa ke/_yak+She swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_hu tu hu tu/_hu tu tu/_bi 
[\[45b.5\]]tu bi tu/_bi tu tu/_gats+tsha/_sab te/_pa ta ha ta ye swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga bA te bud+d+ha s+ya sid+d+h+ya na tu man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs 
[\[45b.6\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab 
[\[45b.7\]]pa//[ {D952}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M mu tsi ni swA hA/_mu khe se swA hA/_mo ha ni swA hA/_dan ti ri swA hA/_
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]cho ga ni chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rjes rmi lam bstan par 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D953}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[46a.2\]]phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig sngags bshad do/_/dngos grub thob pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/_gdon thams cad yongs su 'dul ba/_kun du srung ba/_slar ldog pa 'di ni rdo 
[\[46a.3\]]rje 'dzin pas bshad de/_tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre/_sa ra sa ra/_a mo g+ha badzre/_badzra ka la ka la A ci ta badzre ni/_rak+Sha rak+Sha ra/_na maHsarba gra ho su batra be b+h+yeH/_ka ta ka ta/_ha na ha na/_sarba duSh+Ta nAn/_ka ra ma ni tranA ya/_bra sa ra bra sa ra/_da ma da ra/_sha ma sha ma/_g+hu ma 
[\[46a.4\]]g+hu ma/_g+hu me g+hu me/_badzra ma la da ri/_ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/_tsa kre hr-i da ya/_ni ra mi te/_nI la ba se ne/_so ma ka sA ya/_bi tsi na dra/_sa nan ti sa ka la ras+t+ri/_kri shan pa~M ga li/_be kri tra be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha man/_sarba ta sarba ta/_b+h+ya ye b+h+yaH/_sarba pa lA ya/_b+h+yi sas s+ya/_sarbA 
[\[46a.5\]]da tra rak+Sha ku ru ku ru/_ba ri ba pa ri grA ma la na shAn ting swa s+ya ya na~M/_da na ra pa ri ha ra~M/_shasta tha ri ha ra~M/_bi sha tu sha nan/_sarba a mr-i tani pa ra nan/_tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_badzre mA la d+ha ri/_badzra ni da ni/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig_/
[\[46a.6\]]gdug pa thams cad med par mdzod cig_/ha da ha ha ha da/_gdon thams cad la'o/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/ka da ug ka ru pi ni pa tsa pa tsa/_pra men ma thams cad bskrad do bzlog go/_/a be a be rdo rje gzhon nu rdo rje gzhon nus 'then pa rims thams 
[\[46a.7\]]cad med par byed pa/_gdon thams cad 'joms pa/_b+ha~M dza b+ha~M dza/_ta ma ta ma/_bdag la su zhig smod de/_tad+ya thA/_sa ra sa ra/_da ra ya da ra ya/_gdon thams cad 'gog pa dang /_rdo rje gzhon nu slar ldog pa'i rig sngags 'di la su zhig 'da' bar byed na/_de la rdo rje 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gzhon nu 'bar bas spyi bo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so/_/s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_gra sa ts+tshind ts+tshin da/_su zhig bdag la gzhan gyis rig sngags dang /_byad stems byed pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa de dag gi lus la slar 'gro zhing slar 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/ga ga te a tsa 
[\[46b.2\]]le/_ri pe ri pe/_pra ha ra stam b+ha ni/_pra ha ra sa~M ka ma ni/_'tsho ba'i dbang po la srungs shig srungs shig_/su zhig bdag la bgegs byed pa/_sdig pa thams cad du gdung bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyi phreng bas so/_/sa ra sa ra/_su re Na De su re Na De/_rdo rje'i pho nya 
[\[46b.3\]]mos phyogs thams cad bcing ngo bcing bar bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_mo ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_nad thams cad 'jil ba/_su zhig rig sngags 'di las 'da' bar byed na dug chen por 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rig sngags 'di lus la 'chang ba dang /_kha ton byed na/_de 
[\[46b.4\]]la nam yang dug gis mi tshugs/_ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang 'da' bar mi byed/_phra men ma thams cad kyang 'da' bar mi byed/_mthong ba tsam gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di'i stobs 
[\[46b.5\]]kyis thams cad sgrol lo/_/a mr-i te sa~M b+ha ba swA hA/_bdag la srungs shig srungs shig_/dgra thams cad kyi nang du song yang rung /_'tshe ba'i dus su yang rung /_dur khrod du song yang rung /_btson ra'i nang du song yang rung /_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'jil bar 
[\[46b.6\]]byed pa'i rgyal mo las ma 'da' shig_/lha dang 'jig rten dang bcas pa dang /_bdud sde dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs par bcas pas kyang mi 'da' na 'dre gdon ngan pa lta ci smos/_phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[46b.7\]{D954}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra a dzi ta a na la pra mo ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri/_gangs ri sul gyi mchog_/ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing re'ur bres pa 'bar ba/_rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna 
[\[47a.2\]]tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/_me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang /_bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/_gdugs dang /_a ga ru dang /_phye ma dang /_dril bu dang /_bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs 
[\[47a.3\]]te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_rlung lha rnams dang /_rlung lha'i bu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams 
[\[47a.4\]]dang /_srin po rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_log 'dren rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_snang ba dang mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[47a.5\]]'khor du gyur par 'dus te/_de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang /_dge slong khri nyi stong lnga brgya dang thabs cig go/_/bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/_gnas par bde ba/_mnyan na bde ba/_'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to/_/
[\[47a.6\]]de na lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang /_rlung lha rnams dang /_rlung lha'i bu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_mi 'am ci rnams dang /_srin po rnams 
[\[47a.7\]]dang /_srin po'i bu rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang /_'byung po rnams dang /_log 'dren rnams dang /_sha za rnams dang /_snang ba dang /_mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang /_'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang /_'byung 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye bzhin 
[\[47b.2\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ci'i phyir ku co dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nyam thag pa dang /_'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/_de dag gis gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dbang du bgyis te/_gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te tho btsams na/_bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu 
[\[47b.3\]]gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang /_blo dang /_las dang /_las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa/_sa chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal tshab tu nye ste/_chos kyi rgyal srid la 
[\[47b.4\]]dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/_rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/_rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/_rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/_lus mkhregs shing sra ba/_
[\[47b.5\]]lag na rdo rje dang /_zhags pa dang /_lag cha brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa/_rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang /_rdo rje'i sde 
[\[47b.6\]]dang /_rdo rje'i be con dang /_rdo rje'i snying po dang /_rdo rje'i tog dang /_rdo rje'i snang ba dang /_rdo rje sngon po dang /_rin po che'i rdo rje dang /_gsang ba'i rdo rje dang /_'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang /_rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang /_dmag skyong rnams dang /_
[\[47b.7\]]sa skyong rnams dang /_rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang /_rdo rje'i yum rnams dang /_rdo rje rnam par 'dren rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang /_rdo rje gnon po rnams dang /_rdo rje rmi lam ngan 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]byed rnams yang dag par skul/_rnam par skul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa thams cad la kun du snang bar byed/_rnam par snang bar byed/_gsal bar byed/_rnam par gsal bar byed/_rab tu dga' bar byed/_yang dag par skul/_so 
[\[48a.2\]]sor skul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/_rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams 
[\[48a.3\]]dang /_lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang /_rlung lha rnams dang /_rlung lha'i bu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang /_'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams kyi 
[\[48a.4\]]bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig_/de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_
[\[48a.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang /_me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang /_lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to/_/de nas bskal pa chen po lngar rmi lam dang /_chu dang /_gang gA'i klung 
[\[48a.6\]]gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang /_gzi brjid dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_gtsang ma dang /_bzod pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub 
[\[48a.7\]]sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu byin no/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]bzod pa dang /_snying rje byed pa/_rang gi rdo rje dang /_rigs kyi rig pa dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa drag po dang /_dbang po dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_lus ngan dang /_rlung lha dang /_nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba 
[\[48b.2\]]ste/_de ltar de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/_sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/_sdang ba rnams skyod pa/_rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/_dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/_rgyas pa rnams spur mar rlog pa/_yon po rnams 
[\[48b.3\]]srong ba/_gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/_'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/_srin po rnams dngangs par byed pa/_rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa/_gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/_nub pa rnams ston par byed pa/_gsod par 
[\[48b.4\]]byed pa/_gsod pa/_gnod par byed pa/_phung bar byed pa de der song nas lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/_de ltar drag po pa drag po grub pa dang /_khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang /_lha ma yin pa lha ma yin grub pa dang /_de dag spyir skul zhing 
[\[48b.5\]]dkyil 'khor du 'jug_/skyod par byed/_mthu ston par byed/_rjed par byed/_rnam par skrag par byed do/_/stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs gsung ba dang /_gzungs 'di'i stobs 
[\[48b.6\]]dang /_bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/_'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang /_zla ba'i 'od zil du 
[\[48b.7\]]brlag par byas nas snang ba gcig bur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni g.yo bar byed/_glog gi 'khor lo dang /_lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/_sgra drag po ni phyung /_bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/_skrag par ni byas so/_/de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa/_skra tshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/_rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_yid pas ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba 
[\[49a.2\]]lta bur drag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo /_/de 'ongs pa dang /_'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/_skal ba chen po dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma/_'di dag la lag cha dang mthun par bya ba'i stobs 
[\[49a.3\]]byin cig_/de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/_'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so/_/thor tshugs gsum ma/_sa gsum dang /_dus gsum dang /_drag po rtse gsum dang /_khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dang /_gshin rje'i be con dang /_lus ngan gyi dbyug tho 
[\[49a.4\]]dang /_dbang po'i rdo rje dang /_chu lha'i zhags pa dang /_log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang /_rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang /_shugs dang grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang /_ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang /_klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang /_dug dang /_
[\[49a.5\]]khro bo dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po dang /_tshangs pa'i srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_bden bral dang /_gnon po dang /_ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang /_de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyongs shig_/mig gi 'dzums 
[\[49a.6\]]pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/_ma hA a brta yi Sh+yA mi/_a hi 
[\[49a.7\]]badzre/_ku Ti li/_ko Ti pA ba kA ku la shi khi/_ka bi la ke shi/_ta Ti tsi Ta tsi Ti ma Ta ni/_karka Ta mu Ti baT+Ti badzre/_ma hA bi d+hu l+lo lo le/_pa gu pu lu/_su mu su mu/_sa ra sa ra/_s+pha Ta s+pha Ta/_su d+yo te/_piM ga le ci Te/_bi tsa Ti/_/dzra la bi ga le/_sarba de bag 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]na/_pra ha ra Na mA yA/_sid+d+ha dA yi ge/_su ru ke/_su ru ke/_badzra g+ho Ne/_badzra D+D+hi/_sA ra pra ha ra Ne/_rat+Na tra ya/_di kra la bud+d+he te/_badzra d+ha ra bi shwa sa ni ka/_a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swA hA/_gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam/_sgom mam/_'dzin 
[\[49b.2\]]pa de thos na ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas 'gugs 
[\[49b.3\]]par byed do/_/dug dang /_gsang sngags dang /_mdud pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pas rnam par skrag par byed do/_/de nas lha dang /_lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang /_
[\[49b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang /_'og min gyi lha dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa'i sprin dang /_rin po che mang po'i char 
[\[49b.5\]]rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang /_bsil ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub 
[\[49b.6\]]sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[49b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]{D955}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra sU k+Sh+ma a pra ti ha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[50a.2\]]rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste/_
[\[50a.3\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po/_rig pa'i bdag po/_gzungs kyi bdag po/_lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang /_klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang rig sngags 
[\[50a.4\]]gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol/_lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA 
[\[50a.5\]]yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_tad+ya thA/_o~M hA ra ha ra badzra/_ma tha ma tha badzra/_d+hu na d+hu na badzra/_da ha da ha badzra/_pa tsa pa tsa badzra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/_dA ra ya dA ra ya badzra/_dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/_b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hU~M phaT/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/_hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_
[\[50a.6\]]ban d+ha ban d+ha/_ha na ha na/_a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste/_khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/_
[\[50a.7\]]sems can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang /_tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/_dgra dang /_dug dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/_gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma gi ta sprin gyis bshig pa'am/_skyu ru ra rlon pa gser 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]gyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/_rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing /_rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du brlag par 'gyur ro/_/lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam/_lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis smras na bdud kyi 
[\[50b.2\]]mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro/_/mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam/_mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang /_bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[50b.3\]]bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste/_rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so/_/rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D956}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra b+hai ra ba d+hA ra NI nA ma/_bod 
[\[50b.4\]]skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma sel ba/_mtha' yas pa/_mu thug pa med pa/_dam pa sbyin pa/_shin tu 
[\[50b.5\]]rgya che ba/_thams cad bdag la mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig_/de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/_/a ra ra/_a sa ma/_sa ma tA/_a nan+ta d+harma tre/_kha NA kha NA/_ma hA bi re/_tsa les ma ma/_A sa hA/_ma hA ba le/_ka Na ka Na/_
[\[50b.6\]]ma hA ba la A gri he/_ha ha badzra badzrA hA ye/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_hU~M hU~M maN+Da la/_sa ma pa ra a kra bi kra me/_ku ru ku ru/_tu ru tu ru sarba~M thA/_sarba hi/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_a kri ni phaT swA hA/_rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan stong 
[\[50b.7\]]bzlas brjod byas na/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/_dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_snying 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]po dang /_gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/_rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni/_/klu dang lha min srin bcas pa'i/_/sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa/_/de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/_/brgya byin 
[\[51a.2\]]nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/_/'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa/_/de ni srung bar byed pa'i mchog_/ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na/_/sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni/_/skye bo kun la bsrung gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_o~M badzra prA ka ra/_badzra 
[\[51a.3\]]prA ka ra/_badzra da~M Sh+TA/_b+ha lA ba hA/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pa ri tsu ma bi ke/_tsu lu te le/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo badzra b+hai ra ba s+ya/_ma hA ga na pa ti s+ya/_badzra shak+ti/_par+shu/_pA sha/_ha stA ya/_badzra ka na ka/_badzra bai DU r+ya/_a lang kr-i ta/_sha rI rA ya/_badzra pA Ni ra nu 
[\[51a.4\]]pA lA ya/_tad+ya thA/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_A na yA/_A na yA/_ma hA ga nA pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/_e hi e hi/_A kra ma A kra ma/_sha rI ra~M/_gr-i hI ta~M/_gr-i hI ta~M/_dr-iSh+Ta~M/_dr-iSh+Ta~M bA/_a tra bi sha tu sha rI ra~M/_kiny+tsa rA ya si/_bid+hu na/_bad+ha na/_pa Ta pa Ta/_kam pa kam pa/_
[\[51a.5\]]rang ga rang ga_/mo da mo da/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_bi dzr-i m+b+ha bi dzr-i m+b+ha/_pU ra pU ra/_g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/_A bi sha A bi sha/_shI g+h+ra shIg+h+ra/_ma hA badzra b+hai ra bo/_ga na pa ti rA dz+nyA+e pa ya ti swA hA/_cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /_byad stems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i lci 
[\[51a.6\]]ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/_sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byad stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas 
[\[51a.7\]]te/_de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro/_/klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na glu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ser ba zlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing /_sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/chang bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/_/nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad 
[\[51b.2\]]las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/las gang byed pa thams cad la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'phags pas gsungs pa'i 
[\[51b.3\]]gzungs rnams rnam mang yang /_/rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/_/bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/_/kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur 
[\[51b.4\]]nas/_bod kyi ban+de skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo //[ {D957}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kuN+Da l+ya mr-i ta hr-i da ya tsa tu r+tha nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon 
[\[51b.5\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[51b.6\]]ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang /_tshul la mi gnas pa dang /_pha ma la ma gus pa dang /_bsod nams chung ba dang /_dad pa ma mchis pa dang /_glags tshol ba dang /_rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang /_rtag tu log 'dren dang /_'tshe ba 
[\[51b.7\]]can dang /_sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/_bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang /_mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so/_/khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig_/de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/_bcom 
[\[52a.2\]]ldan 'das dang /_lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_nam sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_pra dz+wa li ta dI p+ta/_daM Sh+Tot+ka Ta/_b+ha ya b+hai ra bA ya/_a 
[\[52a.3\]]si mu sa la/_badzra pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M hu lu hu lu/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ni/_kha kha kha kha/_kha na kha na/_khA da khA da/_khA hi khA hi/_khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_gr-ih+na 
[\[52a.4\]]gr-ih+na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_gardza gardza/_tardza tardza/_bi sngo Ta ya/_bi sngo Ta ya/_b+ha ga bA na/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_mUr+d+hA na tA Da ya badzre Ni/_sarba big+h+nAn pi na ya kA na/_ni bA ra ya/_ma hA ga na pa ti dzA bi tAn+ta/_kA rA ya hU~M phaT phaT phaT/_
[\[52a.5\]]o~M kro d+ha ga na pa ta ye swA hA/_bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang po'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mo ma hA badzra kro d+hA ya daMSh+T+rot+kaT/_b+hai ra bA ya/_a si baSh+Ta na ha stA ya/_he he/_pa 
[\[52a.6\]]ta pa ta/_d+ha ba d+ha ba/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_gardza gardza/_gan pa ti dzI bi tA n+ta ka rA ya swA hA/_gsang sngags gnyis pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_namash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na 
[\[52a.7\]]ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/_bi ma la ka na ka dz+wa la b+hU Sha NA ya/_ga ga na a mr-i tasa~M b+ha bA ya/_rak+ta mA l+ya/_a nu li pa na pri yA ya/_badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/_badzra pA Ni tu l+ya/_be gA ya/_deb/_nA ga_/yak+Sha/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]rAk+Sha/_sa pra ma tha nA ya/_trai lo kya go tsa rA ya/_sha ta sai n+ya/_bi dra ba na ka rA ya/_tri rat+na gar+b+hot+ta mA ya/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_o h+ye haM da~MSh+Tot+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya ga ga na bi d+yud dz+wa la spu la~M gA sha ni/_tu l+ye ru bo d+hi ta/_sa~M b+hu ta/_o~M 
[\[52b.2\]]kha kha kha kha/_gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_gardza gardza/_bi s+pho Ta ya/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_gra sa gra sa/_sarba big+h+nan bi nA ya ka nA nA~M/_hr-i da yaM phaT/_gan+d+harba hr-i da yaM phaT/_
[\[52b.3\]]ra k+Sha hr-i da yaM phaT/_brah+ma rak+Sha sa hr-i da yaM phaT/_sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM phaT/_sarba tsA tur+tha ka hr-i da yaM phaT/_sarba nA gA nAn hr-i da yaM phaT/_hu~M hu~M phaT/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_A bi sha A bi sha_/a diny+tsa me kAr+ya~M ku ru badzra d+ha ra A dz+hA pa ya ti 
[\[52b.4\]]swA hA/_gsang sngags gsum pa'o/_/na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/_da~MSh+Tot+ka Ta/_b+hai ra bA ya/_tad+ya thA/_hu lu hu lu/_kha kha/_khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/_khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[52b.5\]]'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang /_bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na/_bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang /_bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo/_/de la 'di ni bdag 
[\[52b.6\]]gi snying po lags so/_/o~M a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o/_/rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/_skyabs 
[\[52b.7\]]med cing rten med par gyur nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo bo thur du gtugs so/_/kye kye 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig_/rdo rje kun du 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo gshags sa re/_ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du 
[\[53a.2\]]log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang /_gtubs pa dang /_brdungs pa dang /_gzir ba dang /_skams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig_/nga'i mthu dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig_/gang 'di gsang 
[\[53a.3\]]sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_des srung ba byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig_/til sprus pa'am/_zas ngan pa za yang rung /_grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/_rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig_/zan za ba'i tshe yang 
[\[53a.4\]]kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/_/nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo /_/log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo/_/til dang /_sran chung dang /_'bras dang /_pen tse yang rung /_snum 
[\[53a.5\]]mkhur bar pa ta dang /_la phug kyang rung ste/_thams cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/_/'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po 
[\[53a.6\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D958}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA da N+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs 
[\[53a.7\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na/_bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/_/der 'di lta ste/_lha'i gdon rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang /_klu'i 
[\[53b.2\]]gdon rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /_srin po'i gdon rnams dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang /_dri za'i gdon rnams dang /_mi'i gdon rnams dang /_rlung lha'i gdon

[\[53b.4\]]rnams dang /_sdig sbrul rnams dang /_gzhan yang mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la shin tu ga[#]sa so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[53b.5\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]bI re/_ta ra ta ra bI re/_ku ru bI re/_ku ru ku ru bI re/_tsu ru bI re/_tsu ru bI re/_tsu ru tsu ru bI re/_ma hA bI re/_i ra ma ti/_ba ra ma ti/_rak+Sha ma ti/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_ba ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/_a pra ti ha te/_rgyal po dbang po

[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ban+d+hu ma ti/_hi ri hi ri/_ge li ri le/_hu ru hu ru/_ping ga le swA hA/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa bcu pa 'di skud pa la mdud de/_

[\[55a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/mtshon dang /_dug dang /_nad dang /_rims nad dang /_rims drag po dang /_rig sngags dang /_ro langs dang /_khro gdug dang /_me dang /_chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang 
[\[55a.4\]]sngags sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par byed pa'o/_/grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa'o/_/pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o/_/pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/_/nad dang /_mya ngan 
[\[55a.5\]]dang /_bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o/_/'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/_/gdon gang gis gtong ba de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[55a.6\]]gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/_kun du 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri'i so lta 
[\[55a.7\]]bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas/_lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo/_/sgra gcan zin rgyal po dang /_mi rgod dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_mtshon dang /_'brog dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dgon pa dang /_ri dang /_mya ngam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod na/_sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i 
[\[55b.2\]]klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/_gsung ba/_gsung bar 'gyur ba mchog tu grub pa/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba ste/_bdag dang 
[\[55b.3\]]sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig_/nad med pa dang /_'jigs pa med par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 
[\[55b.4\]]la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang 
[\[55b.5\]]bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D959}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya big+hA bi nA ya kA ra d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[55b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des 
[\[55b.7\]]cho ga thams cad dang /_dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_na mo stu te/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_da ra da ra/_Ta ha Da ha/_gr-ih+na/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_na mo stu te/_ru ru tsa tsa 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]ye swA hA/_a b+hu trA/_bi na du mkhan man tsed+d+ha pa ra sa ma gats+tsha ti/_ha ha ya/_ma hA ha sti k+Sha ta nan/_bra go ba ye mo/_ku ru ku ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_na mo na maHswA hA/_nang bar langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la/_chu khyor 
[\[56a.2\]]ba gang steng dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang /_bgegs thams cad bcings bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas/_skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/_lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs thams 
[\[56a.3\]]cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan cig bklags na yang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[56a.4\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs sto//_//gu gul ser bo dang /_pha bang gi rtug pa kun la rku ba'i rtag pa sbyar ba'i 
[\[56a.5\]]du bas bdugs na/_'go ba'i nad pa'i gam du phyin yang mi tshugs/_gos pa la thug na myur du sel/_khyim du 'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so//[ {D960}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba la ba tI nA ma pra t+yang+gi rA/_
[\[56a.6\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 
[\[56a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/'byung po thams cad 'gog pa/_rims nad thams cad zlog pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/_gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gdon dang /_'byung po'i gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/_bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'joms pa/_mi 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]mdza' ba thams cad so sor rengs par byed pa/_tshe skyong ba srog skyong ba'i phyir bzlog pa 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ba lo ki te/_a ba lo ki ta/_sa~M b+ha be/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bar bar ba ra/_kA le kA le kA le/_ma hA kA la/_a ba lo ki ta/_bra sA dA ne/_d+ha me d+ha me d+ha me/_d+ha ma ne/_
[\[56b.2\]]sa mA hi te/_bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/_yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_yongs su gzung du gsol/_yongs su bskyang du gsol/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/_
[\[56b.3\]]chad pa spong bar mdzad du gsol/_mtshon cha spong bar mdzad du gsol/_mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/_sa bcing bar mdzad du gsol/_ku ru ku ru pa~M ma k+Shi/_bi d+hi bi d+hi bi d+hi/_mArga sa~M pra swa te/_a mr-i ta te dza ba ti/_gnod pa thams cad las bdag la rtag par bsrung 
[\[56b.4\]]du gsol bsrung du gsol/_mu lu mu lu mu lu/_khu khu me/_g+ho ri g+ho ri/_ba le ba le/_ta ra ta ra ta ra/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa ni/_kha kha re/_d+hu hU~M ni d+hu hU~M ni/_bdag 'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/_
[\[56b.5\]]dza ya~M ku ru ku ru/_phu ru phu ru swA hA/_a ma le swA hA/_a mr-i te swA hA/_'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D961}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsau ra bi d+h+wan+sa na nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi 
[\[56b.6\]]rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ri las gshegs 
[\[56b.7\]]pa'i tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag cig go/_/bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag cig 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[57a.2\]]bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_a nu lo me/_pra ti lo me/_a nu lo ma/_pra ti lo ma/_a ta~M ke/_pra taM ke/_pa~M ke/_a ti pa~M ke/_gau ri/_
[\[57a.3\]]gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma ta~M gi/_pUk+ka si/_ri mi ri mi/_rid+d+hi ma tse baSh+Ti ti tsau ra pra dan+hu/_bis+tha han+tu/_b+ha man+tu/_mA mi yan+tu ya bad+g+ran+thi na muny+tsa mi swA hA/_kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun du bsrung ba dang /_mi rgod thams cad dang /_ri gseb kyi grong mi thams cad dang /_
[\[57a.4\]]gsab lam srung ba thams cad dang /_gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so/_/rmugs par byas so/_/rengs par byas so/_/ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/_ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar mi rgod rnams 'dar 
[\[57a.5\]]bar gyur cig_/rengs par gyur cig_/mgo rmongs par gyur cig_/mdud pa ma grol ba'i bar du 'chi bar ma gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[57a.6\]]do//_//cho ga ni shing kun dang /_bong bu'i spu bsres te/_bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa bor te/_bde bar phyin nas dgrol bar bya'o/_/'di ni grub pa'o/_/'phags pa mi rgod 
[\[57a.7\]]rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D962}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/_o~M ga ga bA hi khA hi/_hU~M hU~M/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_bra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]phaT phaT/_sarba dur ni mit+ta/_duHswa p+na shIn+ta~M ku ru swA hA/_sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/_/gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes grags te/_/las rnams gang dag stong phrag ni/_/brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang /_/bkra shis dpal grags thams 
[\[57b.2\]]cad byed/_/rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/_/lan cig bzlas bas sel bar byed/_/gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D963}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khro bo mi g.yo 
[\[57b.3\]]ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud dang klu la sogs te ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba sku byad skyes bu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu/_mdog dbyar gyi char sprin lta bu/_nam mkha' 'od kyis 'gengs pa bskal 
[\[57b.4\]]pa'i me lta bu/_shin tu 'gying ba dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu/_zhabs brkyang bskum gyad kyi 'gros lta bu/_spyan dmar ba pa la sha'i me tog lta bu/_mche ba gtsigs pa/_zla ba tshes pa lta bu/_ljags 'gyu ba thog gi glog lta bu/_smin ma khro gnyer bsdus pa shing b+hi 
[\[57b.5\]]sha'i lo ma lta bu/_phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa gza'i mda' lta bu/_g.yon na zhags pa bsnams pa rgya mtsho mjing gi sbrul lta bu/_dga' bo dang nye dga' sngon pos thod byas pa/_pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po ser khras rna cha byas pa/_dung skyong dkar pos do shal byas pa/_
[\[57b.6\]]rigs ldan ljang gus ga shal byas pa/_mtha' yas dang 'jog po nag pos zhabs gdub byas pa/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_sha za dang 'byung po thams cad ha hi hU~M zhes brjod pas skrag par byed pa/_ha~M ma~M 
[\[57b.7\]]zhes brjod pas brgyal bar byed pa/_nad dang rims dang /_gdon dang dgra dang /_mtshon dang chom rkun dang /_gcan gzan dang 'thab rtsod dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa rnams zlog pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_'byung bo rnams lan cig brjod pas 'joms par byed pa'i 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]gsang sngags smras pa/_na maHsa man+ta Ar+ya tsa la na~M/_tra Ta tra Ta/_a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hU~M/_tra ma ya tra ma ya hU~M phaT/_t+r+wa thaHha~M ma~M/_tad+ya thA/_o~M AHhU~M/_shud+d+he shud+d+he/_ra~M ho ya/_bi shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/_a shu ma~M bi shu ra~M/_sho d+ha ne bi sho 
[\[58a.2\]]d+ha ne/_tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_ma ma/_ba la ba la/_ma ra ma ra/_ma ra ya ma ra ya/_sarba sha tru~M/_sarba big+h+na na/_sarba duSh+Ta~M hU~M phaT/_o~M tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_de'i cho ga la ha~M ma~M zhes bya ba rdzas gang dang gang la bkod de/_sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags na gang bsgrubs pa 'grub 
[\[58a.3\]]po/_/lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gris gzhan gyi g.yul thams cad zlog par byed do/_/gla rtsi dang /_btsan dug dang /_shing kun dang /_bya rog gi mchus gdon gyi rigs tsam thub par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa chus bkang bas bkrus na nad thams cad sos par byed do/_/
[\[58a.4\]]rin po che'i snod du gser dang /_dngul dang /_byi ru dang /_mu tig dang /_shel stsal te gsol ba btab na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gla rtsi dang /_ma lA dang /_sgog pa dkar pos nad thams cad srung bar byed do/_/dzA ti pha la dang /_gur gum dang /_li shi dang /_sug smel dang /_cu 
[\[58a.5\]]gang dang /_kak+ko la dang /_gla rtsi dang /_ga bur rnams za ma tog gtsang bar sbyar te mig la bskus na 'byung po rnams mthong ngo /_/bya rgod kyi sder mo dang stag gi mche ba ser ba g.yo ba'i phyogs su phyar na slar zlog go/_/klu'i gzugs spra tshil la byas te blag ba med par mchod na char ba phebs 
[\[58a.6\]]par byed do/_/shir shing gi phur pa la sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bcas te tshags byas na dgra rkun zlog par 'gyur ro/_/ye shes kyi 'od zer la dmigs pa bcas na sdig sgrib thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis snying rje dang ldan par yi dam du byas te klog pa dang /_
[\[58a.7\]]kha ton dang zlos par byed na/_gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa khro bo mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//paN+Di ta d+harma tA shI la dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]{D964}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra tuN+Da nA ma nA ga sa ma ya/_bod skad du/_rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig go/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yog 'dor na bzhugs te/_'khor 'dus ba chen po 'jog po 
[\[58b.2\]]la sogs pa klu'i 'khor dang /_lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir te/_bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba bde bar byed pa'i chos ston to/_/de nas grong khyer de na bram ze'i khye'u khyad ma spyan zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/_longs spyod che 
[\[58b.3\]]ba/_rdzas dang yo byad mang po phun sum tshogs pa/_rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/_sngags la 'jug pa/_sngags grub pa zhig 'dug ste/_de yang yang dang yang du klu 'gugs shing me'i sbyin sreg byed do/_/bram ze de'i lo tog smin kar char chad par gyur 
[\[58b.4\]]nas/_des nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang mthun pas 'di skad ces bdag gis char gyi rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o zhes smras te des me'i sbyin sreg bya bar bshams nas til dang /_'bras dang yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang bsres te sbyin sreg byed do/_/de nas klu mi srun pa 
[\[58b.5\]]zhig gi gzugs byas te/_des lcags kyi phur bu la sngags nas klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang /_klu'i spyi bo gas nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to/_/klu de yang cher 'khrugs te khros nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rdul 
[\[58b.6\]]'byung ba'i 'od zer tsha ba rang gi lus las bkye ste gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so/_/de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon med skyabs med/_dpung gnyen med de/_me'i sbyin sreg byed pa btang nas de 
[\[58b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen btsal te 'bros par bsams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das klu khro bo 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bdag gi srog ma rungs par bgyid par 'tshal te skyabs su yang ma mchis na/_/bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[59a.2\]]stsal to/_/bram ze chen po ma 'jigs shig_/ngas khyod kyi mgon dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[59a.3\]]ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/_/mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang klu mi bgrungs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi slad na slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/_ji ltar 'gyur/_
[\[59a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das lo tog thams cad kyi don du/_lo tog rnams tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang /_kun du bsrung ba dang /_rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par gyur pa lo tog yongs su skyong zhing klu zlog pa de bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo 
[\[59a.5\]]rje la bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rjes klu rab tu 'gro bar byed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de ngas bshad par bya'o/_/des 
[\[59a.6\]]myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo tog thams cad myur du bskyang bar 'gyur ro/_/legs par bsrungs par 'gyur/_me'i ri sul chen po so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/me lce 'bar ba'i rim pa'i sprin chen po nam mkha' lding 'dab ma gdengs pa'i 
[\[59a.7\]]shugs zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi rim pas nam mkha' khebs par byed do/_/lo tog dang me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad kun du bsrung ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun du rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/klu mi bgrungs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dum 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[59b.2\]]snying po 'di bka' stsal to/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_sarba bud d+hA nA na/_na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya rA dzA ya/_o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_gi rI ba b+ha ni/_dIp+ta be ga ma hA ba de b+ha ga ba te ma hA tsaN+Da hr-i da ya sa la ni/_hu ru hu ru/_ha ra ha ra/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_sarba sa s+yaM nA sha ya/_nA ga ku la ba~M 
[\[59b.3\]]shan d+ha ra d+ha ra bra sa ra tsaN+Da be ga ma hA ba la pa rA kra ma s+phu ri ta rau dra bak+t+ra/_ma tha ma tha/_pra dz+wa ya mA la d+hA ra NI/_tsaN+Da be ga ba ti/_pra par bi man d+hA ra NI/_hU~M hU~M/_ba la ba ti/_be ga ba ti/_sa ra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra sa ran+ti/_sarba sa dri s+ya na nA ma dri ba na ya dri bu ya pha la phaT/_dra san 
[\[59b.4\]]d+hA ra NI/_a pa sarban+tu sarba nA gto Sha sarba ba b+ha ba b+ha ni/_ba ga ta be ga pa ti swA hA/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_nA ga bi sa ra ni phaT/_dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/_dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu thams cad dang /_klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed 
[\[59b.5\]]pa'i rig pa 'di bshad ma thag tu klu dang klu chen po thams cad klad pa na bar gyur/_lus rul te lus rnags shing dri mi zhim par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' 
[\[59b.6\]]stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis mi dran du lags kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das rig 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang /_rdeg pa dang 'ching ba dang /_skrod pa dang /_gnod pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das klu mi bgrungs pa rnams 
[\[59b.7\]]'khrugs te/_de'i tshe lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ma rungs par bgyid/_ser ba 'bab par bgyid/_sad dang rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid/_ha cang char che ba dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus ma lags par char 'bab par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]'dzin pa sngags smra bas byams pa la gnas par bgyi/_byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/_byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi ste/_byams pas gnod par bgyid pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs 
[\[60a.2\]]pa'i spyan sngar bdag cag dam bca' bar 'tshal te/_gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di rab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do/_/gang na snying po'i gzungs 'dis srung bar bgyis pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar 
[\[60a.3\]]bgyis pa dang /_srad bU bre ba dang /_mtshams dgum pa dang /_dkyil 'khor gyis ris gcad par bgyis pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi 'tshal lo/_/lo tog dang me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad kun du bsrung bar 
[\[60a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/yongs su bskyang bar 'tshal lo/_/tha na rkun po dang /_g.yo can dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams kyang kun du bsrung bar 'tshal te/_slad kyis kyang ma rungs par mi bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_
[\[60a.5\]]klu'i bdag po dag legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig_/khyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs par srung bas bsrung bar gyis shig_/de nas de'i 'og tu cho gar bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/lo tog la gnod par byed na de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas 
[\[60a.6\]]zhing gi dbus sam khang steng ngam/_gnas mthon por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/_/me tog sil mas gcal bkram ste gzhag go/_/gzugs 'khyil ba bdun bya'o/_/'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil pa bdun bya ste/_gzugs re re zhing 
[\[60a.7\]]yang gzungs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o/_/'bras dang 'o thug bsres ba dang zho dang 'o ma gzhag par bgyi'o/_/phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o/_/pad+ma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bzhag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang /_'o 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]ma dang chus dgang ngo /_/yungs kar dang 'bras yos blug par bya'o/_/sngags lan drug cur yongs su bzlas par bya'o/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang /_lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/_thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o/_/ba ser skya'i lci ba'am/_bag phye las 
[\[60b.2\]]byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu de dag kyang snying gar nub par gzugs so/_/sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o/_/shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun pa gzhag par bya'o/_/nub phyogs su 
[\[60b.3\]]mgo brgyad pa'o/_/lho phyogs su mgo lnga pa'o/_/byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo dgu ba gzhag par bya'o/_/pog phor re re ste lnga gzhag par bya'o/_/yungs kar dang bra yos su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/phyogs bzhir 
[\[60b.4\]]gtor ro/_/gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzugs so/_/zhing gi dbus su yang gzugs so/_/skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su yang gzugs so/_/de btsugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur 
[\[60b.5\]]ro/_/ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/lo tog thams cad dang me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/tha na 'dab ma gcig kyang skams par mi 'gyur na/_yal ga dang sdong bu skam par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_srog 
[\[60b.6\]]chags kyi rigs [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/_/ma rungs par byed kyang mi nus so/_/gnas der rlung dang /_sprin dang ser ba dang sad dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/_/klu'i gnod pa byas kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/_/ma rungs pa 
[\[60b.7\]]zhig tu gyur na de yang slar rtas par 'gyur ro/_/yang stobs dang /_rtas pa dang 'od yod par 'gyur ro/_/bum pa chen po nang na yod pa de yang zhing dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs bzhi kun du gtor ba byas na srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul dang /_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]byi ba dang /_ne'u le dang /_byi dur dang /_dom dang /_sbal pa dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_'dab chags rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/grog sbur thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/tha na phye ma leb la sogs pa yang nam yang mi 'byung ngo /_/drod gsher 
[\[61a.2\]]las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa'i bar gyis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/_/rlan dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma phyung gi bar du nam yang mi 'byung ngo /_/phur bu ma phyung gi bar du klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'byung 
[\[61a.3\]]shing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ro zhim pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur 
[\[61a.4\]]ro/_/phye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'dab ma dang /_shing ljon pa rnams la gtor na srog chags thams cad ltung zhing med par 'gyur ro/_/srin bu trai ma bu ka dang /_trai la ta dang /_sbrul gdug pa dang /_rkang brgyad pa dang /_srog 
[\[61a.5\]]chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu ma phyung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhing gi phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i las bya ste/_nas dang /_gro dang /_til dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bras dang mar bsres te sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 
[\[61a.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/_/gzungs 'di dang /_cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha' dag bri bar bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang /_rdo rje 'dzin bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por 
[\[61a.7\]]gzugs so/_/gtor ma dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa yang 'bul lo/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa la lan stong yongs su bzlas pa byas te khang steng du btsugs na rlung dang /_sad dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro/_/lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]'bras bu dang /_'dab ma ma rungs bar byed pa'i srog chags rnams med par 'gyur te/_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_pi tsi li ka dang /_byi ba dang /_sbrang ma dang /_trai ma bu ka dang /_trai la ta dang /_bi sha ki ta ka dang /_nya phyis can dang /_nya dang lo mi ka dang /_sbal pa dang /_ne'u le dang /_
[\[61b.2\]]phag dang /_kan ti ka dang /_seng ge dang /_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_rkang gcig pa dang /_rus sbal dang /_grog mo dang /_sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma dang /_thang gi sbrang ma dang /_bung ba dang /_nag po dang /_shang ga ni ka dang /_sa'i 'og nas byung ba dang /_ma lu shi ka dang /_'ug pa dang /_byi 
[\[61b.3\]]ba dang /_mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro/_/bya rog dang /_bye'u dang /_khug rta dang /_phug ron dang /_ma du ri ka dang /_'ug pa dang /_kha na dza na ka dang /_ne'u tsho dang /_ri 
[\[61b.4\]]skegs la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'dis phur bu la yongs su bzlas par byas te phyogs bcing ngo /_/na mo bud d+hA ya/_o~M ki li mi li tsat+te/_me ri li/_tsaN+Da tsaN+De ban+d+ha ya swA hA/_de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 
[\[61b.5\]]'dug pas gzungs 'di thos nas de stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags kyi rigs gnod par sems pa/_rab tu gnod par sems pa/_dug 'chang ba 
[\[61b.6\]]lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_sdong bu dang /_rtsa ba ma rungs bar bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o/_/bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bsdigs par bgyi'o/_/phyogs bzhi kun nas dpag tshad du mtshams gcad pa chen po bgyi'o/_/kun du bsrung 
[\[61b.7\]]bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gnod par sems pa/_rab tu gnod par sems pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/_/sngags kyi tshig rjes su gsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_bdag la thugs brtse 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ba'i slad du de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_ldum ra yongs su bsrung ba'i 
[\[62a.2\]]phyir gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig smros shig_/de nas drang srong chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo a gastA ya/_ma hA r-i Sha ye/_tad+ya thA/_k+Sha mi tsu yi/_tsa la tsa ra tsa ra/_ho mi li/_
[\[62a.3\]]ban+d+ha ni/_nA sha ni/_da ha da ha/_su mu ri tsa ri/_sarba duSh+TaM b+han+d+ha ni/_tuN+Da ban+d+ha ni/_sa ra sa ra Ni/_k+Shu k+Shu k+Shu/_ma ni shu ri bi sa ra sa ra/_ha li tu li/_hu ti hu ti/_sa ra ma ni/_sa ran+du/_sarba pA pa pA nag k+Shu d+ha li swA hA/_drang srong chen po nyes 'dor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa 
[\[62a.4\]]'di smras ma thag tu klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po gnod par sems pa de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel nas bcom ldan 'das la skad kyi gsang mthon pos smre sngags 'don te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma rungs lags so/_/drang srong gi dmod pa bab par gyur to/_/bcom 
[\[62a.5\]]ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong gi dmod pa'i mes tshig go/_/kun du tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma 
[\[62a.6\]]ma rungs par mi bgyid do/_/srog chags kyi rigs thams cad bzlog par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/_klu'i bdag po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig_/'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_
[\[62a.7\]]yal ga bde bar kun du 'phel bar gyur pa rjes su srungs shig_/de nas drang srong chen po des cho gar bya ba smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kha shar phyogs su bltas te mchis la/_rig pa drang srong chen po'i snying po 'di ril ba b+h+r-ing gar chus bkang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]bgyi ste/_drang srong gi mi smra bas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/_/a ba sa ra sa ra/_sha pa ta pa dA ma/_hri da ya kro d+ha/_a mu ka ban+d+ha ya/_pra na tsa ra/_su mu ru tsa la swA hA/_sngags 'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa bgyi ste/_bzlas pa tsam gyis klu gnod par sems pa thams cad 
[\[62b.2\]]tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur ro/_/rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags kyi rigs thams cad dmod pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byer ro/_/slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod pa mi bgyid do/_/srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[62b.3\]]srog chags kyi rigs thams cad phyis kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/yang lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_drang srong chen po legs so legs so/_/
[\[62b.4\]]khyod kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrung bar gyur pa de ltar gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[62b.5\]]slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/_yongs su srung bar bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig_/lo thog la gnod par byed pa klu'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//
[\[62b.6\]]de nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das zham ring chen po dang /_'khor 'dus pa chen po dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_don yod pa'i mthu chen po dang /_cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas su gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas 
[\[62b.7\]]dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byon pa dang /_sa phyogs de na 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_nags de'i mthongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/_rdzing bu de'i mthus lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi zhing dang kun dga' ra ba dang /_nags dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]bu rnams kun du tshim par gyur to/_/skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_ba lang dang /_rta dang /_rta rgod ma dang /_ma he dang /_glang po che dang /_bong bu dang /_skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bde bas tshim par gyur to/_/rdzing bu de 
[\[63a.2\]]yang phyogs bzhi kun du rgyar dpag tshad gnyis kyi tshad do/_/rdzing bu de yang me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mud dang /_pun+da ri ka sna tshogs kyis kun du khebs shing /_nya sna tshogs dang /_chu bran dang /_nya mid dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_bung ba gzugs sna tshogs 
[\[63a.3\]]can no/_/de nas de'i 'og tu than pa byung ba de'i tshe nags tshal dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_'dab ma dang /_yal ga thams cad skams te me tog de dag rnyings so/_/nya dang /_chu srin dang /_nya mid dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_bung ba gzugs sna tshogs pa de dag kyang 
[\[63a.4\]]chu bri ste chu cung zad cig lus pas phyogs bcur rgyug_/kun du rgyug rab tu rgyug ste/_srog 'gags la thug_/srog 'chad la thug pas snying 'phar zhing rgyug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba chen po dang rdzing bu der byon pa dang /_de na nya dang /_chu srin dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod 
[\[63a.5\]]dang /_bung ba brgya stong du ma srog 'gags la thug_/srog 'chad la thug ste phyogs bcur rgyug cing snying rje rje ltar gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rjes dbugs byung ste se gol gyi sgras klu rnams 'bod cing lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol rdob cing 
[\[63a.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra grag par mdzad do/_/sngon las kyi rkyen 'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma chad do/_/klu chen po de dag gis sgra de yang ma thos/_bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes su ma dran no/_/de nas bdud kyi rigs kyi gnod sbyin rnam 
[\[63a.7\]]par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra bsgrags pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par sreg pa'i bskal ba 'byung ste/_'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las gang tshig bar mi 'gyur ba cung zad kyang 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]mi srid do/_/'jig rten du 'jigs pa chen po byung zhes sgra grag go/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas 
[\[63b.2\]]kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten ma rungs bar gyur to zhes ngu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar mkhyen mod gyi/_'on kyang dgongs pa mdzad de bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung nas/_'od zer des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar 
[\[63b.3\]]byas nas kyang slar log ste spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye klu dang klu chen po dag ci'i phyir 'od zer byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung /_de nas 
[\[63b.4\]]klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshos bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od zer byung bar mthong ngo /_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[63b.5\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_'od zer rab tu bgye ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyis te/_slar ldog par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye klu'i bdag po dag 
[\[63b.6\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po srog 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rdzing bu char gyi rgyun gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so/_/de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung bar gyur nas sa phyogs der bcom 
[\[63b.7\]]ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas bskor te mdun du bdar ba'i dbus na bzhugs so/_/klu'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po stong phrag brgyad cu ste/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba de stan las langs nas 
[\[64a\]]
