[\[64a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub 
[\[64a.2\]]dang /_na bza' sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa chen 
[\[64a.3\]]po mi bzad pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_'di ltar than pa byung zhing mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon ma mchis/_skyabs ma mchis/_dpung gnyen ma mchis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta 
[\[64a.4\]]bu dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/_gang gis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun du sgrol ba dang /_ha cang char che ba dang /_char ma mchis pa dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char dang /_ser ba dang /_sad dang /_tsha ba 
[\[64a.5\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /_mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /_bzlog pa dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung 
[\[64a.6\]]dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po dag klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bya ba yod de/_de dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi 
[\[64a.7\]]khyim dang /_klu thams cad kyi lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'phar bar 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad kyi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/mig dang mgo rnams gas nas dum bu dum bur chad cing 'brul bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]po dag klu gnod par sems pa dang /_rab tu gnod par sems pa rnams kyi don dang /_sems can thams cad kyi phyir zung shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das klu'i 
[\[64b.2\]]snying po'i sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lta stangs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs stangs kyis rnam par gzigs nas klu'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces 
[\[64b.3\]]bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po dag nga las gzungs kyi tshig gi sngags kyi tshig nyon cig_/tad+ya thA/_o~M bi pu le/_bra ba re/_nA ge ma hA nA ga hr-i da ya/_A brte/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_ki mi ki mi/_nA ga ku la bi d+h+wan+sa ni/_ha na ha na/_sarba nA ga du Sh+TAM hr-i da yA ni/_
[\[64b.4\]]ha na ha na/_sarba du Sh+TAM nA ga b+ha pa nA ni/_pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa ya/_sarba duSh+TAM nA gA nAM/_a kr-i ma/_a kr-i ma/_sa mu drA sA ga ra/_bi ma le/_bi kra me/_ma hA nA ga ga te/_dza ba re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de dag thams 
[\[64b.5\]]cad 'dar zhing lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to/_/me 'bar ba bzhin du lus la du bar 'thul zhing 'gre ldog go/_/thams cad skad cher bcom ldan 'das la ngu zhing thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag 
[\[64b.6\]]bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyi snying la g.yo ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma rungs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad mthun par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yi dam bgyid do/_/bcom 
[\[64b.7\]]ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling du 'tshe ba mi bgyid do/_/ma rungs par mi bgyid do/_/me tog dang yal ga dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid do/_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'bab par bgyid do/_/bde ba dang yid bde bar bgyid do/_/lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su bskyang bar bgyid do/_/bden pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do/_/bu 
[\[65a.2\]]gcig pa la bgyi ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rjes su bskyang bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mthun par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag 
[\[65a.3\]]thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do/_/dran pa tsam gyis kyang ha cang char che bzlog par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las log par mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das yang ma nas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig stsal to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag 
[\[65a.4\]]thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M tsa ta tsa ta/_bi tsa ta/_sha ta sha ta/_ba tsa ra ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gdugs zhag gcig cho ga bgyis la/_bdag cag gis 
[\[65a.5\]]sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khus par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar gyur du yang mchi ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[65a.6\]]'das de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mnas bsgag pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di thog ma nyid du lan bdun du brjod par bgyi'o/_/de'i 'og tu ske tshe'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe 'ur dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi khang khyim mtha' dag 
[\[65a.7\]]zhugs 'bar bar gyur/_bdag shi keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas yongs su thar bar gyur gyi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis myur bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do/_/gal te myur du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/_bcom ldan 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du mchi'o/_/bu dang tsha bor bcas te 'gum par mchi'o/_/de nas rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig 
[\[65b.2\]]shin tu mi bzad pa dag bshad do/_/snying rje ma mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa dag bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bgrungs pa ma rungs ba gtum pa gnod par byed pa dag 'byung ste/_de'i tshe mna' 'dis 'jigs 
[\[65b.3\]]par 'gyur/_skrag par 'gyur/_dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni legs par 'bebs so/_/dus dus su lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams sgrub po/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgya cher 
[\[65b.4\]]bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa/_char mi 'bab pa'i dus na des ri'am/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_chu mig gam/_mtshe'u 'am/_mtsho'am/_lteng ka'am/_khron pa'am/_klu'i gnas kyi mtshe'u 'am/_
[\[65b.5\]]'jim pa dang /_lci bar bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste/_dkyil 'khor dbus zabs khru gang brkos la/_kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o/_/shin tu 'jam pa dang /_shin tu phyi bar bya'o/_/spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro/_/de'i dbus su rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste/_
[\[65b.6\]]ba ser skya'i lci ba dang /_'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdengs ka can lus dbyibs sku bar byas te/_thams cad kyi mgo la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu bya'o/_/shar phyogs su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bya'o/_/lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o/_/nub phyogs 
[\[65b.7\]]su klu'i rgyal po chu lha bya'o/_/byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu ka ra bya'o/_/de'i g.yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum pa/_mgo gnyis pa/_mgo lnga par bya'o/_/lus dag la spos sna tshogs kyis byug par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dkar dmar dang /_su ra bin tsan+dan dang /_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]shug pa dang /_gur gum rnams phye mar byas te gtor bar bya'o/_/me tog dang me tog phreng ba gdags so/_/gnas de'i dbus su 'bras yos dang /_yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o/_/grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/phyogs 
[\[66a.2\]]chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang /_mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa dag gzhag go/_/dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o/_/mchod pa lngas mchod do/_/a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_tu ruSh+kas bdug go/_/rgya spos 
[\[66a.3\]]dang /_na la dang /_kun du ru dang /_yungs kar dang /_gan+d+ha ras dang /_sra rtsi'i pog dkar po rnams dang /_sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te klu rnams la bdug par bya'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o/_/sgo bzhi 
[\[66a.4\]]btod la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor mas gzhong pa bkang ba bdun bdun gzhag par bya'o/_/gtor ma dkar po dang /_ci 'byor pa'i ro rnam pa mang po gzhag go/_/me tog sil ma gtor bar bya'o/_/bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/_/bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzhi 
[\[66a.5\]]gzhag go/_/pog por bzhi nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go/_/mar me kha brgyad du bud do/_/rig pa 'dzin pas shar gyi sgo ru sbyin sreg bya ste/_shing ka ra bI ra dang /_yungs kar dang lci tsha dmar po bsres te lan brgya rtsa brgyad dor to/_/dor ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang 
[\[66a.6\]]klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs te/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/klu de dag thams cad 'dir char 'bebs so/_/'di ni cho ga dang po'o//_//yungs kar dang mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog 
[\[66a.7\]]dang /_nA ga ge sar dang btags pa'i ril bu byas la/_de nas ril bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/_klu'i mtshor bor na bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar gyur te/_char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs so/_/gal te de ma thag ma phab na klu de dag thams cad lus zhig 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na bar 'gyur/_sdug bsngal chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gnyis pa'o//_//sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang /_rtsa ba mo dkrugs la sngags lan drug cu bzlas pa byas te khyim gyi nang du pho na pho ma thag tu klu thams cad 'khrugs 
[\[66b.2\]]par gyur te/_de'i phyir char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/gal te de ma thag tu ma phab na klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par 'gyur long bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga gsum pa'o//_//shug pa dang ut+pal sngon po dang /_ba bla dang zangs phye dang /_yungs 
[\[66b.3\]]kar dang /_in+d+ra ha sta dang /_ba la sha bsres te bu ram gyi khu bas sprus la shes rab can gyi sngags lan brgyad cu bzlas te/_ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus na ril bu bdun klu'i khyim du bor na nyin mtshan bdun char 'bebs so/_/gal te 'phral 
[\[66b.4\]]du ma phab na de'i phyir klu'i khyim chu thams cad skams par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro/_/ril bu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te klu'i mtshor gzugs so/_/ba dan sngon po gdags so/_/sngags 'di bris te der gdags 
[\[66b.5\]]pa byas na ji srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid du klu thams cad char 'bebs so/_/yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te khang thog mthon por gzugs so/_/ser ba bab pa'i dus na yang klu rnams ser ba 'bebs kyang mi nus so/_/klu rnams kyis gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 
[\[66b.6\]]'dra bar mthong ste/_klu thams cad dang ngas skrag cing gnas der 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so/_/o~M su pra te badzra dun+de mi li mi li swA hA 'di ni sngags so/_/bag phye las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugs byas la lus mtshal gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/mgul du ba dan gdags so/_/
[\[66b.7\]]dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tog sil mas gtor to/_/gtor ma dkar po ci 'byor tshad sbyin no/_/me tog dang /_bdug spos kyang sbyin no/_/bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/_sngags 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dang bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la klu'i gzugs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab pa byas na klu gang gi ming bris pa'i klu de bkug par 'gyur te/_klu de yang rang gi khyim la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab na 'phral du srog ma 
[\[67a.2\]]rung bar 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad re re la yongs su bzlas ba byas te/_stong rtsa brgyad du tshang na klu'i gzugs thams cad 'gro zhing mgo gdengs ka byed do/_/de'i 'og tu bal po se'u'i lcug mas bsdigs na ldang zhing lce ston par 'gyur/_lus kyi bar 
[\[67a.3\]]du ston par 'gyur/_klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/_gang bsgo ba de bzhin byed do/_/'o ma dang yungs kar la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te/_gnas thams cad du gtor na thams cad la phyir legs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni cho ga bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[67a.4\]]de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba klu'i rgyal po brgya stong stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to/_/las 
[\[67a.5\]]sgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad par bgyi'o/_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/slan chad sems can dag la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu mi bgrungs 
[\[67a.6\]]pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa rnams kyi don du dam tshig ma 'tshal ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_klu'i bdag po dag ngas dam tshig gi sngags byin gyis brlab kyis de shod cig_/na mo b+ha ga ba te 
[\[67a.7\]]shAkya mu na ye/_tathA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_b+hu dze b+hu dze/_sa ma ya b+hu dze/_tatwa b+hu dze/_pra b+ha ra b+hu dze/_sa man+ta A kA ra b+hu dze/_du ru du ru swA hA/_sa ma ya ba la ne swA hA/_nA ga ma ra sany+tso da ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis klu'i dam tshig gi sngags 'di bshad do/_/ha cang char che ba'i tshe dang /_char dkon pa'i tshe dang /_sad dang /_ser ba dang /_ser ba bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o/_/brjod par bgyi'o/_/de nas klu thams 
[\[67b.2\]]cad bskul bar bgyi'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pa des shin tu khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la/_gos sar pa bgos te klu'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o/_/klu'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam/_
[\[67b.3\]]sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/_me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod par bgyi/_klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o/_/sku bsil ba'i chab de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis te/_de'i nang du yungs kar stsal 
[\[67b.4\]]nas mtshe'u de'i nang du dbo zhing phyogs bzhi nas bdug pas bdugs na de pho ma thag tu skad cig de la klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du ba lta bu byung nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur te/_nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su yungs 
[\[67b.5\]]kar dang /_til bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bgyis te phyogs bzhir bcing bar bya'o/_/klu'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o/_/ser ba mi 'bab pa dang /_klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sad dang ser ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tu zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[67b.6\]]ro/_/klu'i mtsho 'gram mam/_khron pa'am/_lteng ka'am/_rdzing bu'i 'gram mam/_ri'i rtse mor shing arka dang /_zhun mar dang /_yungs mar dang /_shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog gis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg byas ma thag tu 
[\[67b.7\]]char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/ha cang yang char che ba'i dus na/_'bras yos dang /_yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po zlog par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis dgung gsum gyis char gyi 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]rgyun ma phab na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/long ba dang lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur lags so/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun slu bar bgyid pa lags so/_/'jig rten gsum slu bar 
[\[68a.2\]]bgyid pa lags so/_/bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'pho bar gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan thams cad la yang sbyor bar bgyid na thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag dbugs phyung /_dam tshig la bkod nas rgyal 
[\[68a.3\]]po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la yongs su gtad de/_rjes su gtad nas sa phyogs de nas gshegs so/_/rnam thos kyi bu ni gzhi la bzhugs so/_/klu'i dam tshig ces bya ba char 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs so//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i 
[\[68a.4\]]khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang /_lha'i tshogs du ma lhags/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po yang lhags/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_klu'i dbang po mthu che ba thams cad kyang lhags/_
[\[68a.5\]]nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang /_rgyal po chen po gser mig gi 'dab ma can/_rdo rje'i mchu can/_bdag nyid chen po lus 'bar zhing khro ba/_'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can/_rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang /_mu tig dang /_gser gyis spras pa'i cod pan mgo la 
[\[68a.6\]]thogs pa gser gyis bklubs pa/_drag po'i gzugs can/_'gying bar lta ba/_klu'i dbang po gdan du bting ba/_g.yog 'khor mang po thams cad dang lhags so/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bye ba dang /_rdo rje 'dzin g.yog 'khor rig 'dzin stong 
[\[68a.7\]]lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/_mu tig dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/_khang pa brtsegs pa na zham ring chen po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]pas bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'od zer sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis sku ni shin tu brgyan/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar ni 'bar/_nyi ma ltar ni snang /_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mnga' ba/_'od 'dom gang bas ni sku legs par 
[\[68b.2\]]brgyan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni shin tu rnam par dag cing shin tu dri ma dang skyon med pa'i 'od ni gsal/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po 'dus par mkhyen nas sku las 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste/_'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun du khyab par mdzad do/_/de 
[\[68b.3\]]nas tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam bu'i gling na klu mi bgrungs pas sad dang ser ba dang /_rlung dang ser sprin phab ste/_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad dang /_lo tog thams cad dang /_shing dang /_
[\[68b.4\]]rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_sman gyi bar bsregs te ma rungs par byas nas/_yal ga yang 'dzam bu'i gling na med par byas te ma rungs par byas na/_de na sems can de dag sdug bsngal chen pos gzir cing nyam thag pa'i skad byung ba thos so/_/
[\[68b.5\]]de nas tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par sems pa gtum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshig ste/_thams cad ma rungs par 
[\[68b.6\]]bgyis nas sems can rnams sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zab mo dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[68b.7\]]pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyi byin gyi brlabs la ltos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' lding bsgyings pas rnam par bltas ba zhes bya ba kun nas me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba can rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]sku phrag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/_'bar ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur to/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas gdugs kyis rnam par bskor bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[69a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das tshig lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa tshig lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas steng du rnam par gzigs te phyogs bcu kun du yang gzigs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te nam mkha' lding gi 
[\[69a.3\]]shugs chen pos kun du 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rjes su dgongs so/_/o~M badzra ba ti ga ru Da be ge hU~M hU~M/_tsa ri sri dza hU~M phaT/_de nas klu mi srun pa de dag yur yur bor gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'dar yed yed 
[\[69a.4\]]do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po bka' stsal pa/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_o~M badzra dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra dz+wa la/_ha na ha na/_sarba nA ga hr-i da ya d+hA ra NI/_ha ra ha ra/_
[\[69a.5\]]sarba kan naM ba la bIr+ya pa rA kra maM/_da ha da ha/_sarba rA ga_/sha rI ra NI/_pa tsa pa tsa/_sarba nA ga marmA Ni/_ga ru Da be ga bak+Shi ni pa te/_na t+pa ta ya pa ta ya/_sarba nA ga b+hu ba nA ni/_o~M ma ta ma ta/_ma hA bi tsi tra ma ni mo hu li da ra ha ma hA ru dra be ga da ra bi tsi tra/_A bar Na bi bu hu shI ta kA ya/_
[\[69a.6\]]sarba nA gA nAM/_ka ra ka ra/_sma ra sma ra/_b+ho g+ha ru De na pa ra tha gaM baM tra na shAkya mu ne pra ca na ma nu pA la ya/_ta rdza ya/_nA gA nAM/_bak+ShA ya/_duSh+TaM pra ma dA ya/_bA yu be dza ga baM/_s+pho Ta ya/_mU rtA nA na sho Sha ya/_bi du dz+wa la na/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_pra ma ta sarba ba ta a shin+ne me kaM/_nA sha ya nA 
[\[69a.7\]]sha ya/_sarba nA ga ba laM ba ha ra/_pra tsa dun+te na/_A ga ra pA ya/_su shA nA ga na/_gardza gardza ma hA ga ru Da be ga na/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_stam+b+ha ya ni shI ta pa la ha kaM/_saM b+ha k+Sha ya/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT stam+b+ha ya/_shI ta bA yu/_me g+ha na/_sarba nA gA b+hi ha ri Ni/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]b+ho nA ga ma d+hi ba ti/_muny+tsa hrIHb+hak+Sha bu yuM ga ru Da kro d+ha ma hA be ga b+han+d+ha ya/_bA yu ba la ha kan+ti ti/_Ti Ti Ti/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_b+ha sha ya/_ba ta shI ta A shanA ni/_nA sha ya/_tsi ti tsi ti/_phaT phaT/_swA hA/_A shA ya/_nA gA nA na/_ban+d+ha ya/_badzra b+hin+de na ta thA gtas man+te na/_sa 
[\[69b.2\]]t+ye na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_ti ti ti ti/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT swA hA/_dza laM ba duHsarba a shan+ta thA ga ta ad+hiSh+ShA ne na hU~M phaT/_a mr-i te ma b+ha ba tu/_sarba shI ta bA yu be ga A sha ni/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_mA ti kra ma s+pho Ta ya/_nA ga ma ti kra ma mA te murta naM/_ya ti shi ti/_hu ru hu 
[\[69b.3\]]ru/_hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT swA hA/_brtA ya swA hA/_nA ga s+pho Ta ya swA hA/_nA ga bi dA rA ya swA hA/_o~M swA hA/_sarba swA hA/_b+hu ba swA hA/_ta thA ga ta sa ma ya swA hA/_trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/_o~M hU~M hU~M/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_klu'i bdag po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' 
[\[69b.4\]]lding gi 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di klu mi srun pa thams cad zlog par byed do/_/sprin dang /_lhags pa dang /_rlung dang ser ba thams cad 'jig pa'o/_/zlog pa'o/_/lo tog yongs su skyong ba'o/_/me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_nags tshal yongs su skyong ba'o/_/
[\[69b.5\]]bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yongs su 'grub par byed pa'o/_/de bas bstabs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/kye klu'i bdag po dag 'di dran ma thag pa tsam gyis klu'i dkyil 'khor byed pa/_bu dang chung mar bcas pa dang /_blon por bcas pa dang /_mngag gzhug par bcas pa dang /_
[\[69b.6\]]'khor dang bcas pa lhags pa'i stobs byed pa/_rlung gi stobs byed pa/_sdud la stobs byed pa kun thams cad mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gnang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi brlabs kyis phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lo 
[\[69b.7\]]tog thams cad dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad dang /_rdzas dang /_shing dang /_sman thams cad kun du bsrung bar gyis shig_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun phob shig_/bdag gi srog ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad rtas par 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]byed pa/_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog rnams yongs su skyongs shig_/gal te gzhan du 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dge ba ltar ma byas na de'i tshe klu thams cad kyi khyim kun du 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu 'bar 
[\[70a.2\]]te/_me lce gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig_/klu la mu ge chen po 'byung bar gyur cig_/stobs bri zhing brtson 'grus ma rungs par gyur cig_/chu skams par gyur cig_/khyim skams par gyur cig_/lus rtsub par gyur cig_/'dab [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]'jigs pa dang /_me 
[\[70a.3\]]dang bye ma yis 'jigs pa dang /_rtag tu bkres pa dang /_skom pa yis 'jigs pa can du gyur cig_/phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing lus kun du tshig pa dang /_nyi ma'i dugs kyis yongs su gdungs pas lus tshig par gyur cig_/nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba sna 
[\[70a.4\]]tshogs pa 'dus par gyur cig_/de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi srun pa/_klu gtum pa/_rab tu gtum pa rnams gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di las 'gal bar byed na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[70a.5\]]klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir bden pa'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi rjes su bsrung bar bya'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o/_/bsrung bar bya'o/_/bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas 
[\[70a.6\]]bskor ba klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi can dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po hu la pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po chu lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po 'bar ba kun du 'dzin pa kha bye rab tu dga' ba'i gtsug zhes 
[\[70a.7\]]bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang phyug 'od dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po 'od rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rgyal 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]mtshan gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po nor bu mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu gnas pa tshangs pa'i gtsug dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po gtsug gi nor bu 'bar dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po mtsho chen po gnon dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po kun du lta 
[\[70b.2\]]ba'i mig dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po khyab 'jug 'khor yug dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rnam par bral dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu dga' bas char 'bebs dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam dag rab dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu gtor ba 
[\[70b.3\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po glog 'bar dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po sa srung gi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po chu 'bebs sna tshogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po btang bzung stobs dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gsum du rab tu char 'bebs dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[70b.4\]]po chen po rnam thos kyi bu sna tshogs dang /_de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong klu'i rgyal po chen po re re yang g.yog 'khor klu'i rigs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun yod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba 
[\[70b.5\]]byas te/_mchod pa chen pos mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa drag po chen po lta dka' ba chen po dag bka' stsal pas/_bcom ldan 
[\[70b.6\]]'das bdag cag ni phung ngo /_/tshig go/_/lus rab tu 'dar ro/_/spu zing zhes bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mngon sum du gyur par gnas pa lags te/_'di ltar 'jigs skrag ba spu'i bu ga nas skyi bung zhes bgyid cing /_
[\[70b.7\]]'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po skyes te/_bas par yang sgyid lug cing mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na dge slong drag shul bgyid pa nor la brkam pa dag mchis pa la/_sad dang /_rlung dang /_
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]ser ba zlog pa'i slad du gsol ba btab par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la klu mi bgrungs ba de dag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/_de dag gi srog slar zhing ji ltar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bu dang tsha bo ji lta bu mang bar 'gyur/_de nas 
[\[71a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byams pa la gnas par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang mthun par bya'o/_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun phob cig_/dus dus su me 
[\[71a.3\]]tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog sgrubs shig_/rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad zlog shig_/chud za bar ma byed cig_/klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir khyed phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na gnod pa med par gnas par gyis shig_/klu'i bdag po dag gal te yang 
[\[71a.4\]]dag par dam tshig ma bsrungs na de'i phyir klu'i bdag po dag khyed la nyes pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smra'o/_/thog mar klu bskul ba'i rig pa rdzogs so//_//de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'i cho ga klu rnams kyi khros pa zhi bar byed pa nam mkha' lding 'bar ba'i gzi 
[\[71a.5\]]brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di brjod par bya'o/_/thog ma kho nar gnam du bltas te/_yungs kar dang chu bsres pa phyogs bzhir gtor na/_sad dang /_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro/_/bcings par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad 'dar 
[\[71a.6\]]yed yed cing 'khod par 'gyur ro/_/thal ba dang chur bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/_dbang bskur na bdag bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/'brug zer ba'i tshe yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa bdun yongs su bzlas pa byas la/_chu la lan bdun du yongs su 
[\[71a.7\]]bzlas pa byas te/_gnam la sprin bcing bar bya'o/_/de nas sprin la bltas te/_yungs kar gnam du gtor na me tog dang /_'bras bu thams cad bsdus nas sa'i steng du ltung ngo /_/sngags kyang brjod cing khros pas phaT ces bya ba brjod par bya ste/_phaT ces bya ba la lan 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gsum gyis klu phru gu rnams kyang lhung bar 'gyur/_klu rnams kyi lus kyang zhig ste thang la lhung bar 'gyur ro/_/bal po se'u'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/_'khor lo'i tshul du lan bdun bskor na klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad sad dang /_
[\[71b.2\]]sprin dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba thams cad sa la mi 'bebs so/_/mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/mig 'byung ngo /_/khros pas brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas na/_klu rnams rigs dang /_sprin dang /_g.yog 'khor kun dang bcas te sa'i steng du lhung ngo /_/
[\[71b.3\]]klu'i khyim dang /_gzhal yas khang mtha' dag dang /_chu dang /_shing dang /_nags tshal du bcas pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che ba mthu che ba thams cad kyang klad nad drag pos btab par 'gyur ro/_/gal te rig pa 'dzin pas 
[\[71b.4\]]myur du ma bskyabs na rigs thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro/_/bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_'khor du bcas pa dang /_bzhon par bcas te rnam par med par 'gyur/_mig med par 'gyur ro/_/char med pa'i dus na yungs kar la lan stong bzlas te/_khyim la gtor na/_klu thams cad 
[\[71b.5\]]'dar yed yed cing /_khyim dang mtsho me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/_'dod pa bzhin du myur du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/yang dang yang char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/gang gi tshe char dgos pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas chu dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas 
[\[71b.6\]]te/_gnas mthon por song la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas chu snyim pa bdun la sngags lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzlas te/_shar phyogs su gtor na klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'phral du gcig tu 'dus te char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/skya rengs shar ba'i dus na yungs 
[\[71b.7\]]kar dang /_gur gum dang chur bsres la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor zhing steng dang 'og tu yang gtor na sad dang /_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad la kun nas dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/klu mi srun pa thams 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad mi 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/ba ser skya'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bar blangs pa dang /_de nyid kyi mar dang /_'o ma dang /_gcin blangs la sab ta byi sa ka dang /_bag phye dang /_thams cad bsres la lan dgu bcu 
[\[72a.2\]]rtsa gnyis bzlas pa byas te/_de nas klu mgo lnga pa bya'o/_/mgo gdengs ka can gyi skyil mo krung byas pa lus gcus pa byas te/_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gur gum gyis lus bkru bar bya'o/_/stan gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag go/_/dar gyi cod pan gyis dbang bskur 
[\[72a.3\]]ro/_/me tog phreng ba gdags so/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_me tog sil ma gtor/_bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag go/_/mda' bzhi bcugs te/_dar gyi ba dan dkar po bzhi gdags so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag go/_/dkyil 
[\[72a.4\]]'khor gyi grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi gzugs so/_/tshon sna lnga'i skud pas lan lnga bskor ro/_/kun la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te las bya'o/_/bum pa'i mgul dar gyis bcing ngo /_/na la dang /_sra rtsi pog dang /_rgya spos dang /_kun du ra dang /_sen 
[\[72a.5\]]mo dang /_nA ga puSh+pa dang /_yungs kar dkar po dang /_sha ka ra dang bsres la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug par bya'o/_/bdug pa 'di sbyar la/_de nas rig pa 'dzin pas shin tu khrus byas te/_gos gtsang ma gyon la sngags 'di nyid kyis nye reg dang /_brag bcing 
[\[72a.6\]]ba dang /_mtshams bcing ba dang /_phyogs bcing ba dang /_dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /_gos gdegs pa dang /_bdag bsrung ba dang /_khrus bya ba rnams bya'o/_/klu kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/_rig pa 'dzin pa klu la bltas te skyil mo krung du 'dug la/_
[\[72a.7\]]sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang /_gtor ma dang /_bdug pas slar gtang bar bya'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_yungs kar re re la bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bsnun par bya'o/_/mar me kha bzhi bud do/_/klu'i ming bri'o/_/gang pos pa de 'greng 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/_/ci bsams pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/dbang thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi skye bo dang /_'khor du 
[\[72b.2\]]bcas pa dang /_bu dang tsha bor bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag la me tog dang bdug pa sbyin no/_/lang long med par bzhag cing 
[\[72b.3\]]mi mthong bar bya ste/_su la yang mi bstan no/_/gos gtsang mas dga' bo/_/nam dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te bsnun na dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gar btang ba der 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong ngo /_/rmi lam du dgos 
[\[72b.4\]]pa thams cad ston cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang /_rlung dang ser ba dang sad byung ba de'i tshe skye tshe'i 'bru dang yungs kar du bsres la lan brgya rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te khros pas klu'i gzugs la 
[\[72b.5\]]bsnun na skad cig de la rlung dang ser ba dang /_sprin med par 'gyur te thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro/_/than pa byung ba de'i tshe yi ger bris la skud pa dmar pos dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/_klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[72b.6\]]pa byas na skad cig de la char gyi rgyun 'bebs te sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so/_/ha cang char chen skud pa sngon po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun bor na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/cho ga dang rig pa sgrub pa gzhan thams cad la yang sngags 'di 
[\[72b.7\]]thog ma kho nar lan bdun bdun brjod do/_/'di kun du sbyor ba ste brjod pa bsgrub pa 'grub bo/_/nam mkha' lding chen po rdo rje shugs 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i snying po'i cho ga 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bstan to/_/gzungs bton ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad 'dar yed yed do/_/bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma dang /_shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas rlung dang sprin bzlog par bya'o/_/ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas khang steng du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa 
[\[73a.2\]]shin tu rnam par phye ba re'u cha legs par byas pa bya ste/_seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa brgyad phyogs mtshams su gzugs so/_/mda' lnga gzugs so/_/rtse gsum pa gzugs so/_/mda' bzhi la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa bzhi 'khor bar bskor ro/_/bum pa gang ba 
[\[73a.3\]]bzhi dang /_pog phor dang /_gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go/_/gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag_/me tog sil mas gang bar gtor/_bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor ro/_/thams cad la lan bdun bdun gyis bzlas pa byas 
[\[73a.4\]]te gzugs so/_/yungs kar dang chu bsres la bzlas pa byas pas phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad do/_/de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/de klu mi srun pa rnams 'phrog mi nus so/_/klu chen po rnams kyang rtag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung 
[\[73a.5\]]dang /_sprin dang ser ba 'bebs mi nus so/_/me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad 'tshe yang mi nus/_lan 'ga' yang rtswa'i lo ma yang 'tshe mi nus/_bcing ba lngas bsdams te thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/'di zla ba brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur/_gnod sbyin 
[\[73a.6\]]dang /_'byung po dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_grul bum dang /_gsang ba pa de rnams gnas 'di las mi 'da'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/_bal po se'u yi shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas klu bzlog par bya'o/_/shin tu khro bas 
[\[73a.7\]]bzlog par bya ba ni ma yin no/_/klu'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/_mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdengs ka ltar byas la mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ngo /_/'di ni klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/_/brjod ma thag tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gal te klu dag phyogs de ma rung bar bya bar 'dod na/_de'i tshe bye tshan mgo la 'bab bo/_/mgo dang /_mjug ma dang /_khog pa ji tsam bar de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de nas klu thams cad dngangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur 
[\[73b.2\]]te/_de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/khang steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la bdug pas bdugs te/_bum pa chus bkang ba thams cad 
[\[73b.3\]]la lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o/_/gtor ma gzhag go/_/seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_seng ldeng gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na rlung dang /_sprin dang ser ba dang sad kyi nyes pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/_phur bu ma 
[\[73b.4\]]phyung gi bar du thub par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la sprin la bltas te gtor na ser ba thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gdu bur byas na thams cad du ser ba chod par 'gyur ro/_/shing ka ra 
[\[73b.5\]]bA ra dmar po'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te glog 'byung ba'i tshe na nam mkha' la 'phangs na nam mkha' nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro/_/chu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
[\[73b.6\]]te/_dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su btsugs na rtse gsum pa ma phyung gi bar du 'brug zer te sprin bcings par 'gyur ro/_/phyung nas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/ral gri la lan bdun bzlas te klu'i phyag rgya skyil mo krung gis bzung la sprin la bltas te 'dug na bzung ma thag tu mtha' dag 
[\[73b.7\]]'bar bar 'gyur te klu thams cad lkugs par 'gyur ro/_/ral gri thogs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_gur gum gyis de'i steng du nam mkha' lding bris nas ji lta ji lta bur bskor ba de lta bur nam mkha' lding gi 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'babs par 'gyur te/_klu thams cad 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]skrag cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur te phyis rlung dang ser ba 'bebs mi nus so/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i me tog dang yungs kar bsres te dkyil 'khor du lan drug cu sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad grang ba'i stobs byed pa dang /_ser ba dang kha ba'i bar la 
[\[74a.2\]]sogs pa thub par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe char dgos par 'gyur ba de'i tshe char 'bebs so/_/spra tshil la klu'i gzugs tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te/_gser gyis g.yogs la steng gos dkar pos g.yogs te/_rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la/_bum 
[\[74a.3\]]pa sar ba ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste lus gos kyis dkri'o/_/rgyas gdab bo/_/ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor la bdug pas bdugs te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas te/_bum pa 
[\[74a.4\]]la dal bu dal bus gzhus na ser ba thams cad bum pa'i nang du 'pho'o/_/klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs spra chil la byas pa la klu thams cad kyi ming bris na gang gi ming gis rigs brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te/_'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyis 
[\[74a.5\]]mdun na 'dug cing ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed do/_/klu'i rgyal po chos can ma yin pa yul yongs su mi skyong ba lo tog dang 'bras bu chud gzon pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste/_shin tu khrus byas la gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na klu'i khyim de nas bud med 
[\[74a.6\]]rgan mo dag 'byung zhing /_rig pa 'dzin pa ci tshol zhes zer ba dang /_lan mi gdab par rdo rje sa la brdab par bya'o/_/phaT zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/klu rgan mo de ngus nas shi'o shi'o zhes zer zhing khyim du 'jug go/_/de nas klu rnams 'dus te dngangs skrag ste/_khye'u yi gzugs 
[\[74a.7\]]su bskyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/_kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol/_rig pa 'dzin pas sngar sngags brjod la/_khros pas bal po se'u shing gi lcug ma sa la brdabs pa dang /_khye'u yi gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cing /_kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]zhes smra'o/_/rig pa 'dzin pas snying rje med par bya ste/_bsgyel ba'i tshul gyis bsgyel ba dang /_'di skad ces kye rig pa 'dzin pa bsgo ba thams cad bgyid do zhes smra'o/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'di skad ces brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam 
[\[74b.2\]]tshig srungs shig_/srung ngo /_/rig pa 'dzin pas yang 'di skad ces brjod do/_/dge ba bcu zung shig 'dzin to/_/rig pa 'dzin pas yang gsum la skyabs su gsol gtang ngo /_/rjes su 'dzin to/_/rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol mi dbyung ngo /_/
[\[74b.3\]]'di skad ces brjod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bzlas pa rjes su zung shig_/gdod phur bu dbyung ngo zhes bya'o/_/'on tang klu de 'khor dang bcas te rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rjes su sbyin 
[\[74b.4\]]par bya'o/_/dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go/_/de nas gdod phur bu phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin dang klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rang gi khyim du 'jug pa bzhin du zhugs shig_/las su bya ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 
[\[74b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gang du btang ba der 'gro'o/_/bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/klu'i khyim der phyis klu mi srun pa mi 'byung ngo /_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/dus dus su lo tog sgrub bo/_/der me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo ma rnams sgrub bo/_/phyis gnod pa byed par 
[\[74b.6\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs chen po las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/las thams cad 'grub/_mchog 'grub pa/_bla na med pa'o/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bya ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de/_bcom 
[\[74b.7\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar bgyid pa/_dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad bzlog pa/_me tog dang /_'bras 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bu dang /_lo tog thams cad sgrub pa/_sa'i rdul dang /_snying po dang /_byin 'phel bar bgyid pa/_rdo rje'i mchu glog 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bgyi na/_sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/_
[\[75a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nam mkha' lding gi bdag po rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[75a.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha' lding gi bdag po klu mi srun pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir smros shig_/de nas nam mkha' lding gi bdag pos rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras so/_/
[\[75a.4\]]na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pAN ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_na ma ste lokya a d+hi ba ta ye/_na maHtsa tu r+NAM ma hA rA dzA nAM/_o~M badzra dun+te dun+te/_ma hA dun+ta/_du ti du ti/_badzra shi kha ra dun+te/_ma Ni ka na ka pi tsi tra/_A pa ra Na bi b+hu Shi ta sha rI re/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT 
[\[75a.5\]]phaT phaT phaT/_nA ga rA dza bi dra ba Ni hr-id yaM/_s+pho Ta ya badzra dun+te na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_dz+wa la ti badzra dun+te na/_ha na ha na/_ga ru Da bak+Sha ni pa te na b+ha smiM/_ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru duSh+TaM nA gA nAM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_b+ho b+ho pan nA gen+d+ra spu ta spu ta spu tan+tu nA ga 
[\[75a.6\]]sma shA ni kro d+ha rA dza ma hA ba la pa rA kra ma/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra dz+wa la/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/_b+ho ga ru Da rA dza badzra dun+te/_su bar+Na bak+Sha ma hA ba la/_ma hA ka na ka bi tsi tri ma hU~M dar/_b+hak+Sha ya duSh+Ta nA gaM bi ba du b+ho bA yu ba la ha kaM hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT/_sho Sha ya shI ta ba la 
[\[75a.7\]]ha ga ga ru Da uSh+me na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT/_b+ho b+ho badzra dun+ta bi cu hu na/_bi d+yud dz+wa la na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_ban+dza ya/_sarba sha ra ni mA ti kra ma si maM/_b+ho pan nA gen+d+ra mA te/_badzra dun+ten mU r+NAM spa ta yA mi/_ha ra ha ra/_pra ha ra hU~M phaT/_ma 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ta ma ta/_sarba nA gA nAM hU~M hU~M phaT/_ta thA ga ta bA tsa na ma nu sma ra hU~M hU~M phaT/_badzra bA Ni sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_trai lokya a d+hi ba terbA tsa na ma nu pA la ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_sa ra sa ra/_sma ra sma ra/_sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/_tri rat+na sa t+ye na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT 
[\[75b.2\]]phaT phaT/_hrIHbadzra dun+ta sarbanA ga bi dra ba Na ka ra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_tri rat+na ma nu pA la ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_pra ma dan+ta ha da sa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_bi ni tsakra ha ta/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_ma he shwa ra tri shU la ha stA ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_ga ru Da te dza ha stA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_ga 
[\[75b.3\]]ru Da bi kra mA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_nA ga ku la nA sha nA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_ga ru Da sarba a sha ni ba pa na ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_sarba pA ba bA yu saM b+hak+Sha NA ya hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/_sarba a kA la bA ta me g+ha a sha ni ba ra NA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_ma hA badzra dz+wa la swA hA/_sarba duSh+TaM nA 
[\[75b.4\]]ga bi nA sha kA ya swA hA/_ga ru Da hr-i dA ya swA hA/_ga ru Da dun+tA ya swA hA/_sarba nA sha nA ya swA hA/_o~M du ru du ru swA hA/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_tu ru tu ru swA hA/_di ri di ri/_du ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang 
[\[75b.5\]]pos rdo rje mchu'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu'i rgyal bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu khas bub tu 'gyel nas lus rdul byung zhing lus rab tu 'dar te brgyal nas sa la 'gre ldog go/_/kye ma'o gzungs chen po sngags kyi tshig mi bzad pa dag smras so zhes 'dzer zhing /_
[\[75b.6\]]thams cad lus 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling du ma rungs par mi 
[\[75b.7\]]bgyid do/_/me tog dang 'bras bu dang /_lo tog ma rungs bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs 'di mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin te/_gang na cho ga'i rgyal po chen po 'di spyod pa dang /_gang na gnas pas spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rgyun 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'dzin to/_/yul lam/_grong khyer ram/_ljongs sam/_ri brags sam/_grong ngam/_gtsug lag khang ste rtag par rgyun du bsrung ma dang /_bskyang ba dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/sad dang /_
[\[76a.2\]]rlung dang /_ser ba dang /_dus ma lags pa'i sprin thams cad snum pa dang /_mngar ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang /_ro zhim pa dang /_snyi ba dang /_ro bro ba'i me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/'thab pa dang /_sdig pa thams 
[\[76a.3\]]cad byang ba dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun dbab par bgyi'o/_/me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog rnams yang dag par 'grub par bgyi/_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_byi ba dang /_sbrul dang /_sbal 
[\[76a.4\]]pa dang /_trai ma bu ka dang /_mak+Shi ka dang /_trai la ta dang /_sha ta pa da dang /_bung ba dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs kyis 'jigs pa thams cad med par bgyi/_rnam par 'jig par bgyi/_yams kyi nad dang 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/bzlog par bgyi'o/_/
[\[76a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das slan chad sdig pa'i las kun du spyod pa'i tshul mi spyod par bgyi/_char gnod par 'bab pa dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis gnas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dkon 
[\[76a.6\]]mchog gsum gyi dgongs pa bslab pa'i sdom pa yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid/_bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[76a.7\]]bka' lung bzhin du slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/kun du 'dzin par bgyi'o/_/dge ba dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa kun du bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po la dbugs phyung 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i rgyal po dag de ltar gyis shig_/yal bar ma gtang shig_/de nas de'i 'og tu cho ga bya ba brjod par bya ste/_sngags 'di dpa' ba gcig pu ni/_/las kun byed pa dge ba ste/_/shes rab can gyis lan cig dran/_/dgos pa 
[\[76b.2\]]thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/mthon po'i gnas su mkhas pa yis/_/sgra skad chen po brjod par bya'o/_/gnas gang dang gang du sgra bsgrags pa de dang der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_sad dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang /_glog thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/sus kyang byin 
[\[76b.3\]]'phrog par mi nus so/_/gtse bar mi nus so/_/gnas mthon po'i ri'am/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_grong ngam/_gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang shin tu mtho ba der rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te/_gos gtsang ma dkar po bgos la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_ba'i lci ba dang 
[\[76b.4\]]'jim pa bsres pas dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi ba byas la/_dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mda' gang tsam pa cig btsugs te/_sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/_/dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa btsugs te/_sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa 
[\[76b.5\]]byas la/_tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lan gsum 'khris par bskor ro/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bog bor bzhag la lan bdun bzlas pa'i bdug pas bdug go/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas la yungs kar gyis gtor ro/_/me tog sil mas gang bar gtor ro/_/phyogs 
[\[76b.6\]]bzhir gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go/_/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_'bras btsos pa dang /_bu ram dang /_sha ka ras gdab bo/_/chu dang yungs kar la sngags lan lnga brjod de/_phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bgyi zla ba nya la sbyor 
[\[76b.7\]]ba bya'o/_/skad cher bklags la phyogs bzhi dang /_steng dang 'og tu yungs kar gtor zhing klu thams cad kyi so so'i ming nas brjod na/_cho ga 'di byas ma thag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_sprin dang ser ba dang klu mi srun pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur thub par 'gyur ro/_/ltas ngan pa dang 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang gdon 'byung po dang /_sha za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad rgyang ring du spangs par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gcig kho ra kho ra yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang na ba thams cad dang gnod par 
[\[77a.2\]]sems pa dang rab tu gnod par sems pa dang phyir rgol ba dang phyir gnod par byed pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/_legs par yongs su smin pa dang ro zhim par 'gyur ro/_/sa bon 
[\[77a.3\]]legs par btab pa thams cad legs par 'khrungs par 'gyur ro/_/gshed byed dang las dang byad stems thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/_/de srid du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 
[\[77a.4\]]'bebs so/_/me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo tog thams cad legs par yongs su rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du dgos par 'gyur ba thams cad lan cig dran par byas na 'grub par 'gyur/_spra tshil las nam mkha' lding gi gzugs sor brgyad pa skyil mo krung bcas pa/_
[\[77a.5\]]'dab ma brkyang ba/_klu rgyal gdan du bting ba/_mgo dgu ba mgo rgyan du thogs pa/_klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g.yas na thogs pa/_nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g.yon na thogs pa/_gser gyi g.yogs pa byas te cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris la/_
[\[77a.6\]]stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la/_nyin zhag gcig la sngags stong brjod do/_/nam lus kyis mi thub pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar bya ste/_yang khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o/_/gu gul gyis bdug go/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_gtor 
[\[77a.7\]]ma ci 'byor pa sbyar ro/_/mar me btang la de'i mdun du nyal na ston par 'gyur zhing las thams cad brjod par 'gyur ro/_/mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/_las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/lang long med pa'i 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gnas su bzhag la/_nam than pa byung ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas blangs te/_klu'i gnas su bkur bar bya/_klu'i gnas mtshor bzhag la/_me tog dang bdug pa byin la yungs kar la sngags lan gsum bzlas te gnas su gtor na/_'phral du klu 
[\[77b.2\]]thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/gal te 'phral du char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs na/_de'i phyir klu gnas kun du nam mkha' lding gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur/_gnas me lce gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur/_bya tshan mgo la 'bab par 'gyur/_chu skams par 'gyur 
[\[77b.3\]]ro/_/than pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan na char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang /_sad dang /_char sprin la bstan na skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun du ser ba mi 'bab cing sad dang dus ma 
[\[77b.4\]]yin pa'i rlung gis mi tshugs par 'gyur te/_thams cad thub par 'gyur/_rlung 'khrugs pa'i tshe lam gyi bzhi mdor gzhag go/_/yang na grong khyer gyi sgor ro/_/yang na rgyal po'i sgor gzhag go/_/des rlung thams cad chod par 'gyur ro/_/rlung chen po rnam par 
[\[77b.5\]]'thor yang chod par 'gyur ro/_/phyis ldang mi nus so/_/bstan ma thag tu klu thams cad 'phros par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje mchu'i gzungs las thams cad byed pa nam mkha' lding bklags pas grub pa mchog tu 'grub bo/_/de nas tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po 
[\[77b.6\]]dang /_rgyal po chen po dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshogs pas kyang /_rdo rje 'bar ba'i 
[\[77b.7\]]lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/_klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog pa/_snying 'gems pa/_klu mi srun pa'i rigs phung bar bgyid pa/_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad sel ba/_lo tog dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu thams 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]cad sgrub pa 'bul na/_sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po 
[\[78a.2\]]bzhi dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis brjod cig_/de nas tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[78a.3\]]po dag gis gzungs 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra d+ha rA ya/_ma hA ba la pa rA kra mA ya/_na ma s+t+rai lo kya mU rta ye/_na mash+tsa tur+NAM/_ma hA rA dzA nAM/_na mo badzra 
[\[78a.4\]]sha ni dz+wa li ta rau drA T+Ta ha sa ya/_dza ya ma hA ba la bI r+ya ba rA kra ma kro d+ha rA dza brah+me su brad+mebrah+ma brah+ma swa ra b+ho b+ho nA ga a d+hi ba ti pi sa ra da bi sa ra/_ma re brah+ma da n+ten mU r+d+ha nAM/_pra ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_bik+Shu tsakra ha stan bosh+na ge na du ma ti biSh+Ta tsakre shrIts+tshin+dA mi/_tu ti tu ti/_li 
[\[78a.5\]]li li li/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_mu hu mu hu/_mu h+yan+tu sarba duSh+Ta nA gaM/_s+pho Ta ya hr-i da yaM ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU la d+ha ra/_ha na ha na/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_mu tsi mu tsi/_tu ti tu ti/_b+ha ba b+ha ba/_k+Shi ni k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/_tsa tur+NAM/_ma ri tsi naM/_dz+wa li ta shak+ti d+ha ra d+ha ra/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_s+phu ra 
[\[78a.6\]]s+phu ra/_bi s+phu ra bi s+phu ra/_tsa rwa tswa rwa/_nA sha ya/_duSh+TaM nA ga hr-i da yaM/_s+pho Ta ya hU~M hU~M phaT/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_duSh+TaM ya sha ni/_ba ti nA ga na shA ti bid+yu da dz+wa la b+ha smi ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+ho nA ga a d+hi pa te badzri bA ya b+ho b+ho tu ti tu ti hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_
[\[78a.7\]]badzra a sha nA ni nA sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_/sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_bi s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_bud d+ha bi lo ki tA ya swA hA/_brat+mA ya swA hA/_biSh+Nu murti swA hA/_ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU lA ya swA hA/_tsa tu ra ma hA rA dza sa ma ya d+ha rA ya swA hA/_b+hu dzaM gA ya swA hA/_nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]swA hA/_o~M d+hi ri d+hi ri swA hA/_dz+wa li ta bak+t+rA ya swA hA/_ro ma hA ra nA shA ya swA hA/_dzu ti dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/_phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu mi srun pa thams cad lus rul te 
[\[78b.2\]]dri mi zhim par gyur to/_/lus shig shig por gyur cing /_sha bkras btab par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[78b.3\]]rten gyis smad par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni brlag go/_/bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do/_/gnod par mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu'i gzungs 'di 
[\[78b.4\]]brjod pa der/_bcom ldan 'das klu thams cad gnod par sems shing mi mchi ste/_tha na lta bar yang mi bgyid na 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de nas 'di'i cho ga brjod de/_gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'brul lo/_/
[\[78b.5\]]lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_phyogs bzhir gtor na klu thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad bdun kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ba byas te 
[\[78b.6\]]klu bzlog par bya'o/_/lan cig brjod na/_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad bzlog go/_/thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis ser ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'bab na yang /_yud tsam gyis chur 
[\[78b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na/_rdo rje bskor na phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'drim par 'gyur te/_phyogs der ser ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nad par dben par song ste/_nang du yang dag 'jog tu zhugs la/_skyil mo krung 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]gi phyag rgya bcings te/_sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod de/_brjod ma thag tu rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/rlung thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79a.2\]]yungs kar phyogs bzhir gtor na/_lo gcig khyu dkor du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bu dang tsha bo 'khor dang bcas pa rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[79a.3\]]phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dkrol na/_klu mi srun pa thams cad kyi klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' las sa la lhung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[79a.4\]]las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 'di ni thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang 
[\[79a.5\]]ste/_tshangs pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_klu mi srun pa snying rje med pa 'tshe ba rnams gdul ba dang /_tshar gcad pa dang /_chad pas gcad pa'i phyir/_khyod kyis rig pa chen po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod 
[\[79a.6\]]nas/_'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag pa legs so legs so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam par kun nas bskor ba dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /_gzhan yang klu mi 
[\[79a.7\]]srun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas slad ma'i tshe slad 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ma'i dus na/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_lo ma dang /_yal ga rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang bar bgyid do/_/rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang /_sad dang /_
[\[79b.2\]]tshad pa thams cad zlog par bgyid do/_/dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'tshal lo/_/rang gi mna'i yi dam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bskyang bar 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa 
[\[79b.3\]]grub par 'tshal lo/_/mi 'tshe bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te cho ga'i rgyal po 'di las gong du sngags dang gzungs ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang 'gal bar bgyid na/_bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[79b.4\]]'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig_/'di ni bro bor ba ste/_tad+ya thA/_pa ki tsa ti/_shu li shu mu li/_sha sha shu shu/_ti ti bi ri ti/_hu yu hu yu/_hu ri ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni klu'i mna' lags te/_slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu mi srun pa 
[\[79b.5\]]rnams 'jig par bgyid do/_/than pa dang /_than pa che ba dang /_dus ma lags pa'i char dang /_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser ba dang /_sad dang /_dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /_glog byung na ri'am khang pa mthon po'i steng du rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogs su 
[\[79b.6\]]bltas te/_mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la/_chu dang yungs kar bsres pas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/_/gtor cing dran ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rnams dum bu brgyar 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gyes par 'gyur ro/_/'gugs 
[\[79b.7\]]par 'gyur te/_de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i rgyal po khyod kyis de ltar byos shig_/rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]{D965}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra lo ha tuN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshangs ba dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_rgyal 
[\[80a.2\]]po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad 'dus nas klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par bgyid pa/_snying 'gums par bgyid pa/_klu 
[\[80a.3\]]ma rungs pa rnams kyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ba/_rlung dang ser ba'i sprin thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu dang lo tog thams cad 'byor par bgyid pa rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par 'tshal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[80a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i slad du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu rnams ngas sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_
[\[80a.5\]]'phags pa thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis khyed kyis smros shig ces bka' stsal ba dang /_de nas tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis gzungs sngags 'di smras te/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[80a.6\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'dzin drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol zil gyis gnon pa'i mthu bo che rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[80a.7\]]'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ma rungs ba drag tu dgod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_dza li ta/_bi kr-i ta/_badzra dza ya dza ya/_ma hA ba le b+h+yo ra 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]bi ra ba rA kra ma kro d+ha rA dza/_bra ma b+ha pu pu ma/_pra ma swa re/_b+ho b+ho nA ga de bi di/_byi sa ra ma d+ha/_pra ma d+ha na d+he na/_mUd+tA nAM/_s+pho Ta yAM hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_brna tsakra/_hA d+ha ni b+ho pan nA gen+d+ra/_mA ti kra ma tha bar+Na tsakre/_shi ra tsin+tA Ni hU~M ti hU~M ti li hU~M hU~M phaT 
[\[80b.2\]]phaT/_mu du mu du mu h+yen+tu/_sarba duSh+Tha na s+pho Ta ya/_hr-i da ya/_ma he shwa ra dz+wa la ta/_tri shU la d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ha na ha na/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_mu tsi mu tsi/_du di ba b+ha ba b+ha/_k+Sha Ne k+Sha Ne/_tsa tur+NAM/_ma hA rA dzA nAM/_dzA la ti/_shak+ti/_d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M phaT/_spu ra spu ra/_bi spu ra bi spu ra bi spu 
[\[80b.3\]]ra/_tsa ra rba tsa ra rba tsa ra rba/_nA sha ya duSh+TaM nA ga hr-i da ya/_s+pho Ta ya/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_duSh+Ta A shA ni/_b+hut+ta ma ga sha bI r+ya dz+wa la/_b+hasmiM ku ru hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ya/_b+ho nA gA d+hi pa ti bi tsin+tu/_b+h+yi b+ho ya/_b+ho b+ho tu/_ti tu ti tu/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_badzra a sha 
[\[80b.4\]]ni nA sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_badzra a sha ni nA sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/_bi s+pho Ta kA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_bud+d+ha bi lo ki tA ya swA hA/_prah+ma swA hA/_biTh+Nu mUrtA ya swA hA/_ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU lA ya swA hA/_tsa turma hA rA dza sam d+ha rA ya swA hA/_bi tsa ga ti ya 
[\[80b.5\]]phaT swA hA/_o~M di ri di ri swA hA/_dz+wa li ta bak+t+rA ya swA hA/_dzu ti dzu ti swA hA/_phaT phaT/_rdo rje 'bar ba gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di thos ma thag tu klu ma rungs pa thams cad lus rul nas dri mi zhim pa mnam par 'gyur ro/_/lus so sor zhig cing 'pho 
[\[80b.6\]]bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyab tu gsol/_lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad kyis dmad par gyur/_bdag cag ni ma rungs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam 
[\[80b.7\]]bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gnod par mi bgyid/_'gums par mi bgyid/_chung ngu na mig kyang blta bar mi bgyid na skabs lta ba lta ci smos/_rgya mtsho klu'i rgyal po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gdugs lta bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba dang /_mdangs che ba dang /_ma 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]rungs pa la sogs te/_klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_klu thams cad kyis dus phyi ma'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la gnod par mi bgyid/_me tog dang /_
[\[81a.2\]]'bras bu dang /_lo tog dang /_lo ma dang /_yal ga thams cad srung bar bgyid/_rlung dang /_ser ba thams cad dgag par bgyid/_dus dus su char dbab par bgyid par rang gi bro'i tshig gi yi dam dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung bar 
[\[81a.3\]]bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su skong ba dang yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/_gnod par mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag la 'gal bar bgyid na/_bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[81a.4\]]bar ma gyur cig_/bro'i tshig kyang 'di lags te/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ta gi tsa gi g+hu li g+hu li/_mu li sha sha/_/gu gu shi ti/_bi ra ma ti/_hu yu hu yu swA hA/_char che ba'am/_char mi 'bab pa'am/_dus ma yin par char 'bab pa'am/_rlung dang /_sprin dang /_ser 
[\[81a.5\]]ba dang /_grang ba'i rlung dang /_gnam lcags lhung ba'i tshe rig 'dzin gyi bro tshig 'di khang thog gam sa mthon po'am ri'i steng du yang rung kha shar phyogs su bltas te lan bdun skad chen por bzlas yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te gyen du gtor na/_gtor ma thag tu klu thams 
[\[81a.6\]]cad dum bur 'gyur zhing nan tan byas bas myur du char 'bebs so/_/gzungs 'di nyid kyis dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nan tur drag por byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur/_rdo rje gnam lcags 
[\[81a.7\]]mchu lan brgyad du bzlas pas klu dgug par bya lan cig dran pas rlung dang ser ba slar bzlog par bya'o/_/gnam lcags lhung na yang chur 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje skor na phyogs gang du bskor ba der ser ba 'byol lo/_/nang bar sngar sa dben par 'dug ste sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bzlas na rlung dang sprin dang ser ba yang 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/klus gnod pa mi byed cing phyis kyang mi tshugs so/_/yungs kar la sngags te phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig gi bar du mtshams bcad de rlung dang sprin dang ser ba yang mi g.yo'o/_/ngag nyan cing 
[\[81b.2\]]kun du bsrung ba dang las byed par 'gyur ro/_/sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dril bu dkrol na klad pa 'gas shing sa la ltung bar 'gyur te gnod pa byed pa sel lo/_/mchod pa tshul bzhin bsngags par byas te skad gsal bar bklags te phyogs bzhi steng 'og 
[\[81b.3\]]tu yungs kar gtor na ser ba dang rlung dang klus gnod pa byed pa bcings par 'gyur/_ltas ngan pa dang /_mi dge ba dang bkra mi shis pa dang gza' dang 'byung po dang sha za dang gnod sbyin dang srin po yang phyir bskrad par 'gyur/_dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu mtshams 
[\[81b.4\]]bcad par 'gyur/_nad dang gnod par sems pa dang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra bgegs thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/_/lo tog dang 'bras bu dang khu ba rgyas pa dang /_smin pa dang che bar 'gyur/_'byung po dang gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje 
[\[81b.5\]]gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D966}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kr-iSh+NA ya oSh+Tha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lcags mchu nag po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[81b.6\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi gnas der 
[\[81b.7\]]'dong ngo /_/btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_dga' bo dang /_
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'jog po dang /_mtha' yas dang /_dung skyong dang /_gzi can dang /_e la'i 'dab ma dang /_mdangs bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul dang /_klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[82a.2\]]po mgo bdun pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga ba dang /_mgo drug pa dang /_mgo gsum pa dang /_mgo gnyis pa dang /_mgo stong pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis mnas bor shig_/a na na ste/_bi na na ste/_bi shi ki shi a gu bi gu re re/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT 
[\[82a.3\]]phaT phaT/_stam+b+ha ya/_b+hany+dza ya/_ba sa sha rI ra ni/_ma tri tra/_ma tra ma ni swA hA/_sngags tshan dang po des klu rnams 'khrugs nas brgyal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das lags lo tog dang 'bras bu dang sman rnams dang rtsi shing dang myu gu dang 'dab ma dang me tog rnams 
[\[82a.4\]]skams par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/char chu dus su 'bebs so/_/rtsi shing dang /_nags tshal skyed bar bgyid lags so/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi longs spyod 'tshe bar rngo mi thogs lags so/_/sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi bgyid lags so/_/
[\[82a.5\]]gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' las 'das na bdag cag klu rnams kyi lus 'khums par gyur cig_/gnas med par gyur cig_/lus rtsub par gyur cig_/mdze dang shu ba dang sha bkra 'byung bar gyur cig_/mgo 'gas pa dang snying 'brul bar gyur cig ces bros bor ro/_/
[\[82a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'ongs te/_de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis ni rgats+tsha ta ni rgats+tsha ta ni rgats+tsha ta myur du byer cig_/khyed cag la gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni 
[\[82a.7\]]phung bar gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la bsrung bar 'dod pa de dag ni khyed cag gi lus la 'jug par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/_su mu su mu/_su mu su mu/_su mu ru su mu 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]ru/_su mu ru su mu ru/_su mu ru su mu ru/_su su/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_mi ri mi ri swA hA/_lha rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin pho mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod pa'i char gyi rgyun myur du 'bebs so/_/klu'i gnas kun nas 
[\[82b.2\]]chab phul dgu blangs la chab so sor bzhag la/_yungs kar gyis bsngags shing chu ru stsal/_sngags rdzogs pa dang klu'i gnas su bskyal lo/_/char ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis sems can rnams la phan 
[\[82b.3\]]par lhag par dgongs pa mnga' ba byams pa la gnas pa thugs rje dang ldan pa dga' ba la gnas pa btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs shig_/k+Shi pra na ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/_nA ga yu yu swA hA/_sprin la blta zhing phyogs bzhir kha bltas la phyag bya zhing lan lnga bcur bzlas na char 
[\[82b.4\]]nges par myur du 'bab bo/_/char 'bebs pa'i tshe klu mi srun pa'i gnas su song la/_lus spos chus bkrus la zas dkar gsum 'tshal la sha chang sgog btsong spang bar bya'o/_/byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsams la kha shar phyogs su bltas nas 'phags pa 
[\[82b.5\]]rnams la gsol ba gdab bo/_/ri bu ri bu/_ba la ya thA/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_badzra badzra dzA la ya swA hA/_sarba du shaM na bi ra na sha ga swA hA/_ga ru Da hri ti swA hA/_ya stags la bla re sngon pos dbub/_rgyal mtshan sngon po gzugs rig sngags 'chang stan sngon po 
[\[82b.6\]]gos sngon po rkang pa yang sngon por bgrad/_lha bshos sngon po bum pa chus bkang ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag_/dbus su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gzugs dgod/_shar gyi pad+ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dgod/_lho phyogs kyi pad+ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun 
[\[82b.7\]]pa dgod/_nub phyogs kyi pad+ma la klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu pa dgod/_byang phyogs kyi pad+ma la klu mgo lnga ba dgod/_phrin las kyi gzhung las 'byung ba yang dgod/_o~M hi hU~M phaT phaT/_hU~M bi dza ya phaT phaT/_nA ga li dz+wa la shad shad/_dz+wa li bi kra ta/_badzra badzra la ma hA 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]pa la bIr+ya pa rA kr-i ta/_da ra tsi/_pra me ru/_phaT phaT du/_gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnams g.yo bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu khas sbub tu 'gyel nas rab tu 'dar te brgyal nas 'gre ldog 
[\[83a.2\]]cing ngu'o/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la smre zhing sngags 'dis klu rnams shin tu tshig go/_/ma rungs lags so zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can la phan pa dang bde ba 
[\[83a.3\]]dang lo legs pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang zhing rnams kyi mig shin tu gang bar gyis shig_/lo tog phun sum tshogs pa sgrubs shig_/mi rnams dang mi ma yin pa rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar ma byed cig char gyi rgyun phob shig_/'on kyang khyed kyis yun ring po'i bde ba dang klu'i 
[\[83a.4\]]gnod pa kun dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang med khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong rnams kyang bde legs shog_/
[\[83a.5\]]khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khong /_/gling 'dir char phob don rnams kyis/_/sa dang bar snang gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu 
[\[83a.6\]]rnams la byams byed shog_/char med than pa byung ba'i tshe sngags tshan dang po brgya bzlas so/_/bar ma lnga bcu bzlas/_tha ma bdun bzlas par bya'o/_/sprin la blta zhing bar par sus kyang ma tshor bar shib bur bzlas so/_/grangs las thal na ser bar 'gyur bas sdig che'o/_/klu gnad 
[\[83a.7\]]la gtad pa yin pas sdig che'o/_/lan grangs yang yang mi gdab bo/_/zhag gcig gam/_zhag gnyis sam/_zhag lngar char gyi rgyun mi 'bab mi srid do/_/chos kyi rgyal bo rga shi mi mnga' ba/_/kun gyi smon lam myur du 'grub 'gyur shog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag rnams yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa lcags mchu nag po'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[83b.2\]{D967}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya o dzaHpra t+yaM gi ra Na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[83b.3\]]'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung shig_/chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig mdangs 
[\[83b.4\]]phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ngam/_ston tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na de'i mdangs phyir mi 'phrogs shing 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro/_/phrogs na yang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' 
[\[83b.5\]]stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_phi le phi la me/_phi lu meM ge_/phi lu ma ti/_ba lgu ma ti/_sA ra ba ti/_k+Shi ra ba ti/_ku ru mA ti/_u ta ba la ni/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsau ri/_tsaN+Da li/_stu re/_stu ba re/_in+d+ra mA li ni/_dza la ni/_so bA ke tri k+Sho Sha ne/_sA ga re/_ma hA sA ga re/_pu ru 
[\[83b.6\]]tse/_pu ru tsu re/_sa ne ma ne/_da ba phe da dam pa phe/_hu lu hu lu swA hA/_rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos pa nas/_'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun du rab tu 'khrugs

[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]tshig gang gis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'di gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des ngas bsrung bar bya'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/de'i mdangs dbrog par bya'o/_/phyir dbrog par bya'o/_/nye bar

[\[84a.5\]]gi rA/_bod skad du/_phyir zlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang thams cad

[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dbugs kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_'byung po rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rnams la phyag bgyis nas/_mgo'am/_mgul du

[\[86a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

[\[86b.1\]]der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong ngam/_

[\[86b.3\]]'bru dang dngul dag kyang stsal bar 'tshal lo/_/de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/de'i bya ba sna tshogs thams cad kyang mod la sgrub par 'tshal te/_'khrig pa dang ldan pa ni ma gtogs so/_/na mo 
[\[86b.4\]]rat+Na tra yA ya/_na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_s+yAd ya the da na/_hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/_ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsi li tsi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsu lu ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsu lu tsu lu ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_

[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]{D971}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_kA ru Ni ka s+ya Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la dza lan+d+ra su shaM ka ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[87a.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i grong khyer gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po byang chub sems dpa' nor bu bzang po'i bu'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang po'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
