[\[87a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sems par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag rtag tu de'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyid/_bdag dpag tshad 
[\[87a.4\]]brgyar yang gnod sbyin rnams las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/'dod pa dang ldan pa'i kha na ma tho ba ma gtogs pa 'di lta ste zas dang skom dang bca' ba dang bza' ba dang nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser stsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[87a.5\]]tad+ya thA/_hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_hi li hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/_ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/_ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/_ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_su ru su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/_o~M 
[\[87a.6\]]e h+ye hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha me sAd+ha ya swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_pU ta ne pU ta ne/_su ru me/_su mA te/_su ban+te su pU Sh+ya/_hi li mi li swA hA/_cho ga ni zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la tsan+dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byas la a ka ru bsregs nas bzlas brjod byas na de'i 'og tu gser thob par 'gyur 
[\[87a.7\]]ro/_/'phags pa gnod 'dzin chu dbang snying rje can gyi gzungs bde byed ces bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D972}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka_/bod skad du/_'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_'phags pa 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas bo/_/gser dag gis ni legs par brgyan/_/rin chen gyis ni rab mdzes shing /_/me ni shin tu 'bar 'dra ba/_/lcang lo can du bzhugs nas kyang /_/gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi/_/zhabs gnyis la ni 
[\[87b.2\]]rab 'jus nas/_shin tu mnyam bzhag dris ba ni/_/bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyal dbang po/_/gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag_/rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod/_/lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/_/ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/_/byang chub sems 
[\[87b.3\]]dpa'i yon tan ldan/_/mgon po sems can kun don mdzad/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin/_/sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pas/_/snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis su/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir/_/bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de/_/
[\[87b.4\]]mi rnams nor ni nyung ba dang /_/bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba/_/mthong nas sdug bsngal chen po yis/_/rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag_/de skad gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas/_/bcom ldan gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag_/snying rjes non te smras pa ni/_/
[\[87b.5\]]legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa/_/mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan/_/sems can kun gyi don byed pa/_/dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba bo/_/nor ro cog gi dbang phyug gi/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan/_/dbul ba'i nyes sdig sel byed pa/_/
[\[87b.6\]]gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi/_/rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa/_/'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi/_/zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal/_/chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang /_/de ni rang gi sngon thos te/_/dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan/_/de ni bdag gi 
[\[87b.7\]]shes rab kyis/_/sems can kun don brtson pa po/_/khyod la legs par bstan par bya/_/khyod ni mnyam bzhag rab tu nyon/_/'phags pa lha dang lha min bla/_/shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus/_/snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan/_/dbang po zhi ba dbang 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]po thul/_/dge ba sdig 'joms shes nyen can/_/des shing don kun sgrub pa po/_/mi gnod mi slu dpal dang ldan/_/mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs gcig pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po/_/
[\[88a.2\]]gter rnams skyong ba gzi brjid can/_/rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa/_/rin chen 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul/_/chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa/_/gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can/_/gter don nye bar ston pa po/_/gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste/_/dbul ba'i gdon 
[\[88a.3\]]las thar byed pa/_/dbang po nye dbang 'gro ba'i mgon/_/chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can/_/'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten bla/_/nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa/_/nor chen rgyal po chen po ste/_/lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa/_/gzhon nu seng ge tog can te/_/
[\[88a.4\]]gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che/_/tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa/_/gsong por snyan par smra ba bo/_/bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste/_/che ba don 'grub grub pas mchod/_/rig sngags 'chad pa 'khor los sgyur/_/ku be ra dang mi la zhon/_/bum pa'i 
[\[88a.5\]]lto can mig yangs pa/_/lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs/_/khyab bdag bde 'byung nor bzang sras/_/sems can rnams ni skyong la dga'/_/'dod dgur sgyur gzugs yid kyi lha/_/cod pan can de rigs dga' ba/_/g.yon phyogs cod pan lag na dbyug_/
[\[88a.6\]]lag pa brgya pa stobs po che/_/sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul ba/_/zla ba nya ba'i zhal mdog can/_/ded dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste/_/gnas brtan tshong pa skal bzang ba/_/yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang /_/dpag bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag_/mchog 
[\[88a.7\]]don 'os pa gtso bo ste/_/mchog sbyin mi'u thung khyab 'jug pa/_/skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba bo/_/rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan/_/lha yi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi bdag_/rab tu ngar ba nor mi zad/_/seng ge'i rtsal 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]gyi mthu rtsal can/_/ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/_/gtso bo tshong ba rigs kyi mchog_/pad+ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal/_/tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che/_/gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di/_/sdig pa thams cad 'joms byed 
[\[88b.2\]]cing /_/dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa/_/'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po/_/glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa/_/gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan/_/ltas ngan sel bar byed pa ste/_/nags sam gal te grong dang ni/_/dur khrod yang na ri yang rung /_/mkhas pa gang 
[\[88b.3\]]na klog pa der/_/g.yul dang dgra ni nyam nga ba/_/sbrul dang me chu chom rkun sogs/_/stag dang dom dang 'jig pa che/_/rgya mtsho bgrod dka' mi bzad las/_/mi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/dbang po me dang chu lha dang /_/gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang /_/nor sbyin 
[\[88b.4\]]dpal ldan ku be ra/_/nor bu bzang sras lngas rtsen dang /_/rtsed mo can dang 'phrog gnas dang /_/lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang /_/g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du/_/rab tu dga' bzhin srung bar byed/_/gang na ming 'di klog pa der/_/glang chen rta dang ba lang 
[\[88b.5\]]dang /_/lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel/_/mi nad dang ni 'go ba'i nad/_/gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams/_/thams cad du ni bde legs 'gyur/_/lhag par byis pa rnams la shis/_/de la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]klu rnams dang /_/
[\[88b.6\]]ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma dang mi'am ci/_/srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi byed/_/nad do cog las rnam par grol/_/de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan/_/bu dag dang ni tsha bo dang /_/dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis rgyas/_/rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba 
[\[88b.7\]]dang /_/longs spyod chen po'i nad du skye/_/tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang /_/nad med gdon dang bral bar 'gyur/_/tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran/_/lobs skyen thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan/_/skal ba bzang po nyid du 'gyur/_/phyag 'tshal 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje/_/gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te/_/ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa po/_/lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud/_/sems can dad la mnyes gshin pa/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sras kyi grags pa 'di/_/dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa/_/rab tu 
[\[89a.2\]]bshad pa legs par gsungs/_/don kun grub pa gsang ba'i sngags/_/bdag gis kyang ni 'dir 'bul te/_/de ni legs par dran tsam gyis/_/mi ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing /_/gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur/_/dgra rnams kyis kyang mi choms shing /_/skal 
[\[89a.3\]]ba bzang dang skal dang ldan/_/lo brgya yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/lha yi glang po rin chen dang /_/rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang /_/nges par myur du thob 'gyur te/_/rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_o~M hrIM 
[\[89a.4\]]hrIM k+ShA dzrA+oM hrAM hrA~M/_/dI bya ra trA+au ga ba ri sha na a ta bA ka de ba yak+Sha sa ma ya ma nu smar hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/_'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//[ {D973}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la shrI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gnod 
[\[89a.5\]]'dzin dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje lcang lo can gyi gnas dam pa na 'khor gnod sbyin du mas bskor te bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 
[\[89a.6\]]gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal la gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba de dag zhi ba'i phyir rang gi srog gi snying po dang /_rig sngags khyod kyis ston cig_/ngas kyang byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas gnod 'dzin 
[\[89a.7\]]dpal gyis gsol ba/_gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das/_/sems can sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir/_/rig sngags bdag gis bstan par bgyi/_/sdug bsngal spong zhing bde ba thob/_/tshogs chen gnyis ni rdzogs 'dod pas/_/rang lus bsrung phyir rig sngags 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]'di/_/bzlas shing yongs su gzung bar bya/_/na ma Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la/_ma hA dzam+b+ha la/_tad+ya thA/_ra ra ra ra/_ku nu/_ku nu/_khu nu/_khu nu/_gu nu gu nu/_sa pa sa pa/_ka ra ka ra/_ma hA bi ra ram/_ma hA ka ra do/_ma ra Sha/_ha ra Sha/_du ma sarba swa twA nA na tsa swA hA/_bcom 
[\[89b.2\]]ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po sngags 'di 'don pas skud pa sngon po la lan bdun du sngags kyis btab ste lan re mdud pa re bor nas dpung pa la bcings na gnod pa med cing dgos pa 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gu gul tsan dan tu ruSh+ka/_/ka ta ra dang sbyar ba'i sman/_/de 
[\[89b.3\]]yis mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/_/na ma Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la/_na mo dan+tA ya/_dan+ti shwa rA ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_a ka ra mi ta/_dan ti shwa rA ya/_ba ra ma ka rdu ni ya/_sarba sa twa hi ta dzi ta/_ma ma da na ta/_na maHpa ri ya sha_/sa ma ya A ka ra sha swA hA/_rig sngags 'di lan bdun 
[\[89b.4\]]tshang bar bzlas te de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i snying po gdon par bgyi'o/_/de yang sngar 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod nas de'i 'og tu bdag gi ming nas brjod par bgyid na nor rdzas dang /_ci 'dod pa dag 'grub par bgyid 
[\[89b.5\]]cing bde ba stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas bdag gis gsang sngags yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di 'don cing yi dam du bgyid na de'i dgos pa ci smos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid lags so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po gnod 'dzin dpal gyis nyid kyi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu 
[\[89b.6\]]lta bu dpal phyag na rdo rje la phul ba/_na ma Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la/_ma hA dza m+b+ha la/_tad+ya thA/_si mi si mi/_/su mu su mu/_sh+tsaN+Da sh+tsaN+Da/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_mu ru mu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_sad ya da ma/_ma ma ni da ma a na na ta/_dAn+te 
[\[89b.7\]]swA hA/_Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la swA hA/_dan+tA ya swA hA/_ma nor tha pa ri pU ra kA ya swA hA/_de nas gnod sbyin gnod 'dzin dpal gyi 'khor rnams kyis de'i tshe rang rang gi snying po smras pa/_o~M dzam+b+ha la ma Ni b+ha dA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha la pU r+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha la dan dA ta b+ha d+TA ya swA hA/_o~M 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]dzam+b+ha la ma hA da na dA ta b+ha drA ya swA hA/_oM dzam+b+ha li tsi bi kuN+Da li swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha la ki li mA li ni swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha la mu khen+d+ra b+ha drA ya swA hA/_o~M dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra b+ha drA ya swA hA/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/_nor gyi bdag po khyod kyis gang gzungs 'di 
[\[90a.2\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_'dri ba dang /_klog pa de dag thams cad la yid bzhin du bde ba stsal bar gyis shig_/de nas gnod 'dzin gyis gsang ba'i bdag po de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/_lan gsum du bskor ba chos bzhin du byas te 'khod par gyur to/_/'phags pa gnod 'dzin 
[\[90a.3\]]dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D974}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha dra rA trI nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[90a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu ta la po ta'i 'gram na 'dug go/_/de nas lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong 
[\[90a.5\]]de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chu ta la bo ta'i 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis 
[\[90a.6\]]mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu su mchis/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal bo'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal 
[\[90a.7\]]bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/_khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong de nang 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]par langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mdang dgung 
[\[90b.2\]]rmongs nas bdag gi der lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba der mchis te/_chab ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pas snang bar bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_bdag gis 
[\[90b.3\]]de la 'di skad ces bgyis so/_/lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan 
[\[90b.4\]]mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'chal ba de lta bu su mchis/_des 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyed la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di zung la brtson par gyis shig 
[\[90b.5\]]ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi gda' bar gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di yongs su zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/_dge slong des gsol ba/_btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[90b.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon te tsan+dan zhes bya'o/_/dge slong des gsol ba/_btsun pa bdag kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod de'i phyir legs par 
[\[90b.7\]]rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong chos gsum dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_'das pa la rjes su phrad par mi byed pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang /_da 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/_chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces 
[\[91a.2\]]gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad du gsung ngo /_/'das pa rjes su phrad mi byed/_/ma 'ongs pa la re ba med/_/'das pa gang yin de 'gags te/_/ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o/_/gang dag da ltar byung ba'i chos/_/de dang de la rab bltas nas/_/rnam par rtogs 
[\[91a.3\]]pas mi phrogs par/_/de dag mkhas pas khong du chud/_/sang tsam 'chi'am sus shes kyis/_/de ring nyid du rtun de bya/_/'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/_/bdag tu shes pa ma yin no/_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang thams cad kyang /_/bde ba 'ba' 
[\[91a.4\]]zhig 'grub 'gyur te/_/thams cad nyon mongs med par shog_/thams cad bzang por mthong gyur te/_/gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig_/de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la/_/nyin mtshan snyom las med pas na/_/de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yi/_/mdo sde thub pas rtag tu 
[\[91a.5\]]gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/_'gro lding pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/tad+ya thA/_bi ni bi ra Ni/_pa ni pU ra ni/_bud+d+ha marte/_ma ni ni/_Ni Ni Ni Ni/_Ti Ti 
[\[91a.6\]]Ti Ti/_pa ra Ti/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma taM gi/_puk+ka si/_b+ha ma ni/_dra mi dri/_dra mi dri/_sha ba ri/_sa ra lam+b+he/_hI na ma d+ha ma d+ha tra ra ni/_ma ho la na/_da la ba ni/_da la ba ni/_da la bat+te/_ma hA da li ni/_tsa li ni/_muSh+Te tsa kra pA ti/_ma hA tsakra bA ti/_sha ba ri sha ba ri/_ma hA sha 
[\[91a.7\]]ba ri/_b+hU tsid+gi ni/_b+hU ci rang gi ni/_ni mi/_ni mong gi ri/_ni mi na d+hi ri/_b+hU d+ha ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_e Tu Tu Tu Tu/_na Tu mi r+Ni/_ki r+Ni/_ed+ku/_sid da ta ri/_tsa la lu/_naM tu/_na ra lam lu/_ga la lu/_A ba tra no no/_she ku ni ra ba rang sa le/_ta ra ke/_ta re/_ta rod tu/_nor tu/_ti la 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]la lu/_b+hU ta ba ti ya/_ba ta yi ye swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_a ra gar+De/_na ra gar+De/_ba~M su ka_/pA yi ye/_ka po ta ka pa yi ye ye ta bo d+ha ne swA hA/_dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i 
[\[91b.2\]]mdo dang /_tshig dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/_de'i lus la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/_dug 
[\[91b.3\]]gis ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_chus ma yin/_rgyal po'i chad pas ma yin/_rkun po'i chad pas ma yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing /_nges par mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/mtshan 
[\[91b.4\]]mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na/_/skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang /_/dbang phyug tu yang nges par 'gyur/_/lan cig gis ni gnas kun du/_/dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor/_/bdag gis bdag la mi sbyor bar/_/dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin/_/sems can thams cad srung 
[\[91b.5\]]zhing sel/_/nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang /_/rmi lam mi shes mya ngan du/_/brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur/_/gang gis bris te skyes pa dang /_/bud med lus la btags na ni/_/skal ba bzang dang gzi brjid dang /_/de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag dang yid 
[\[91b.6\]]kyis su/_/mi dge cung zad gang byas ba/_/de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos/_/dus ma yin par 'chi las skyob/_/rgyal po chu dang me dang glog_/chom po nad dang dgra dag dang /_/g.yul sprod pa dang 'thab par yang /_/bzang po dran na skyob par byed/_/rig pa bzang po 'di dang 
[\[91b.7\]]ni/_/gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na/_/mi dag mi zhum gnas kun du/_/de bas 'di ni yid kyis brjod/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bya ste/_rig sngags 'dis bdag 'byor par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni min d+hi re/_ti mi ti ming gi li/_trai lo ki ni/_a lo ki ni/_tri shU la d+ha ra Ni/_a ku pi Ni kri mi kri ti/_ko li ko li/_kud to kud to 
[\[92a.2\]]ku to ki si/_ku ti/_ku pi ti/_bdag dang sems can thams cad lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig tu 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_dug thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_gdug pas zin pa thams cad dang /_chom rkun 
[\[92a.3\]]thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba thams cad dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis 
[\[92a.4\]]ngan par spyad pa thams cad dang /_thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li/_i li mi li/_bi shI tsa na/_pa r+Na sha ba ri/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_
[\[92a.5\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[92a.6\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la 
[\[92a.7\]]phab pa//[ {D975}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_A r+yad+ha rma sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[92b.2\]]'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_cha phra ba/_brtags pa mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogs so/_/ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po 
[\[92b.3\]]la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o/_/dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i 
[\[92b.4\]]gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/_rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/_gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/_
[\[92b.5\]]spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/_mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/_gang dag de shes pa dang /_gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba 
[\[92b.6\]]dang /_brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_yi ge dang /_don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[92b.7\]]sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/_chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhag go/_/da ltar nga yang 'jog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/_des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bzung 
[\[93a.2\]]ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro/_/nyams su blangs ba'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do/_/tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_bla na med 
[\[93a.3\]]pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o/_/de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[93a.4\]]kyi gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa/_de bzhin 
[\[93a.5\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis mnos ba bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig_/khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/_s+yAd ya the da na/_karma ke ta ma nuts+tshe/_ra ti ru ta gra na dra 
[\[93a.6\]]ma/_thu ma na/_nai la ta/_a saM ku la s+thA/_bu mi a nusma ri/_i sha~M ga ma i sha stA/_kle na a nu ga te/_yA mu la gum b+he/_pa b+he ma gu rba ya ba/_a s+ya bA kya s+ya bi laM ga be la ma tha shrI ba ba rI bany+tsa ka_/bra sa te/_a ba be la/_a gra be la/_ni shi khu u tse dzu me/_u dze 
[\[93a.7\]]dzu me/_kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang /_gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/_rim gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ba ste/_kun dga' bo 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]khyod kyis gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas 
[\[93b.2\]]so/_/kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod 
[\[93b.3\]]kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/_kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[93b.4\]]kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[93b.5\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyi na 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so/_/s+yAd ya the da na/_dan 
[\[93b.6\]]d+ha ra ma hA ha ra/_ha ra ma pa ra na/_rud dra tra/_ku ma ti dri tra/_in+d+ra man+du ke/_a ba te/_sa ha rA/_sa d+hu ma ti/_i la la pa ma ti/_a ba ti/_ta ra ba ra/_yi biSh+Ta sa da biSh+Ta/_a ba tiSh+Ta/_pa ri brta/_i sha brta/_sa da brta/_kra ma kra ma ti ra na/_a si ba ce ma la bi na ha thi/_
[\[93b.7\]]bra sha su re/_d+hu d+hu/_uk+ka muk+g+ra/_uk+g+ra ba ti/_bi sa ra gra ma ti/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi ba chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang /_lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig_/phyis 'gyod ta re/_
[\[94a.2\]]de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni/_/gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya/_/gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/_/de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/_/gnod 
[\[94a.3\]]sbyin de dag lhags nas ni/_/chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag_/nyams par gyur ba de la ston/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag mang por yang /_/mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang /_/zab cing don dang ldan pa yi/_/tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya/_/'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste/_/
[\[94a.4\]]de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis/_/drag po dag gis thos na yang /_/phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste/_/gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med/_/de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/sa 'di chags pa med pa ste/_/sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab/_/chags pa med par bstan pa 
[\[94a.5\]]yi/_/bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas/_/nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar/_/de ni sa steng de bzhin snang /_/'di la skye mched phung bo rnams/_/bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang /_/dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod/_/de yi thos pa'i 
[\[94a.6\]]tshogs rnams gang /_/nams kyang chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/ma thos chos rnams de dag thos/_/nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas/_/rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog_/mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams kyang dag par 'gyur/_/'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa/_/de ni rtag tu sangs 
[\[94a.7\]]rgyas bsngags/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/_/the tshom mi mnga' bden pa gang /_/bden des bdag la lung mnos pa/_/ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la/_/byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des/_/rang gi sems 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]dang gzhan sems la/_/ston pa rab tu gnas gyur cig_/gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag_/ma dad pa dang dad par bstan/_/gang la rtogs pa mi gnang ba/_/de la de kun don ston 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang /_/glang chen sna dang khyad par 
[\[94b.2\]]stobs/_/drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang /_/zla ba mgo med lug gsod pa/_/dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang /_/srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa/_/ljang khu kha dang rna bzang dang /_/ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams/_/thams cad grub par byed par shog_/gsang 
[\[94b.3\]]sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la/_/gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni/_/spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed/_/rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang /_/tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang /_/nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang /_/yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur/_/lung mnos pa yang chud 
[\[94b.4\]]mi za/_/rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu don dang yi ge la/_/de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang /_/mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang /_/de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams/_/de yi mod la dran par byed/_/s+yAd ya 
[\[94b.5\]]the da na/_hu ku na/_mu ku na/_ha ra Na/_bi nya ra Na/_i sha sa~M kra ma Na/_o~M su mu kha/_ta ga Na/_a ga Na/_a pri ya/_us+thA me/_ko ba ha re/_u ru pa/_pra ba Na ta na/_saM gra me ba ha dza ga re/_bra shi ga re/_gu D+ha ba ne/_ut+ta na/_bi ku Na/_i sha ku na/_a 
[\[94b.6\]]tu la tu la/_a Ti ba Ti/_ba ri tsa mo sha_/ha ra/_dza ga ta/_e ba sa~M pra mu khe/_a ga ba re/_Tha hu sa hu/_i ti ya/_thA hu/_tsa tu ra dwI bi kA yan/_Tha hu ma hu/_uk+ga hu/_d+hA ra sa hu/_saM gra ha/_a'i na gra ha/_a bi na gra ha/_bradz+nyA brid b+ha ye/_tha hu sa hu/_ka ra ku ru/_d+ha sa 
[\[94b.7\]]hu/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag_/gang gi lag dang lus la yod/_/de ni thos la rmongs pa med/_/de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur/_/skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/_/zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin/_/de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang /_/mya 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_tsa ra d+he bi tsa ra d+he/_a maM ku te/_a ti mi ti/_pa ra ha re/_g+ha Na b+he/_hi pa ra me/_ma hA pra ti pA hA ne/_dza ya dza ya/_
[\[95a.2\]]a nu ke/_ba la ba le/_uk+g+ra ba ti/_swa ra swa ra/_a bi sa re/_gu gun+de/_pra bi bar+d+he/_sa me/_a dzi ta dza ye/_nu ba le su kho ma su san+d+hi ni kuM ma no/_sak+She/_shA pe tsA pe/_tsA pe tsA pe/_tsu be tsu be/_tsu lu tsu lu/_pu lu pu lu/_bya ba pra sa re/_ka ra ka b+hin+d+he/_bi dzA bi je/_a 
[\[95a.3\]]pra ti san+d+hi/_nA nA nu ma ti/_pra na nu ma ti/_a ri da si/_dzeSh+ShA nu pa ni de/_a saM gra a ba ti/_rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /_yi 
[\[95a.4\]]dgas dang /_sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing dbang du ma gyur ba rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/don thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/_
[\[95a.5\]]dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o/_/de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[95a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i 
[\[95a.7\]]gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA ba ra ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D976}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba hu 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]pu tra pra ti sa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal 
[\[95b.2\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[95b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag deng 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thab rtsod mtshang brus te bkye bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[95b.4\]]stsal to/_/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di zung shig chongs shig lhogs shig kun chub par gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_da De/_ba da De/_u pa da Da da De/_u pa da De da Da/_gam b+hI ri/_a brta ne/_ni brta ne/_d+ha hi d+ha hi/_a brta 
[\[95b.5\]]ni/_bdag gi/_sarbe shA na karmi kA nAM/_pra t+yanri kA nAM/_pra t+ya mo tri NAM/_tsak+Shu mo hA nAM ka ro mi/_shro tre mo hA nAM ka ro mi/_dzi hwA grA tAM ka ro mi/_dza mab+hA nAM/_stam b+ha nAM/_mo hA nAM/_pra mo hA NAM/_khyim bdag gang la la zhig bu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar 
[\[95b.6\]]po la lan bdun sngags te/_lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na de'i lus la dug dang mtshon dang nad dang rims nad dang rims drag pos mi tshugs so/_/'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[95b.7\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D977}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ni sh+tsa ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs 
[\[96a.2\]]rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das be sha li'i spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[96a.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag lha ma yin rnams kyis rgol zhing gtses te/_bdag dang lha ma yin dus yun ring por mi mdza' zhing dgrar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ci nas kyang yun ring bor phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bu'i chos bdag 
[\[96a.4\]]la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir kau shi ka khyod kyis nga'i snying po gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di long shig_/tad+ya thA/_urba ba/_ni rbi sirbi/_
[\[96a.5\]]urbu rbu re/_hU le hU me/_di khu me/_pra t+ya~M ga ma A gats+tsha ma hA ma yU ri nA ma/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_'tshe ba thams cad dang /_'khor thams cad dang bcas pa la srungs shig srungs shig_/sarba kA ya bA ga ma na sh+tsa ri te swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de 
[\[96a.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po yid dga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/'phags pa gdon mi za ba zhes bya 
[\[96a.7\]]ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D978}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA bi d+yA a pa rA dzi ta/_bod skad du/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rig pa chen mo/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las rgal/_/rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjid che/_/rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor te/_/thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang /_/log dad sel ba'i stobs nyid dang /_/gser thub 
[\[96b.2\]]kyi ni bslab pa dang /_/'od srung gi ni yon tan dang /_/shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/bdag ni rtag tu bde bar shog_/tad+ya thA/_dza yan ti/_bi dza yan ti/_dza ye bi dza ye/_dzi ti dzi te/_a pa rA dzi ti/_bar sai n+ya pra mar+d+ha ni ye swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi 
[\[96b.3\]]thub pa'i rig pa chen mo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D979}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bratI t+ya sa mut+pA da hr-i da ya bi d+hi d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying bo'i cho ga'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang 
[\[96b.4\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos gang rgyus byung de dag ni/_/rgyu las 'gog pa gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong che/_/tshig 'di bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/_/sems can rnams la phan byed pa/_/
[\[96b.5\]]las kun grub par byed pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs/_/rigs kyi bu dag gang gis ni/_/dang por bcom ldan sangs rgyas la/_/gus shing dang ba'i sems bskyed nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/rten 'brel zab mo'i cho 
[\[96b.6\]]ga bshad/_/thams cad las dang mthun par gsungs/_/dang por 'jug pa'i tshig gsungs pa/_/'di ltar las dang nyon mongs yod gyur na/_/sems can rnams ni 'khor bar 'gro 'gyur la/_/las dang nyon mongs med na 'khor ba las kyang ldog_/bden pa 
[\[96b.7\]]'di yis bdag gi bsam pa grub gyur cig_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bzhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[97a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can gyi sman pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nor bu grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_o~M ye d+harmA he tupra b+ha bA he tu na te ShA~M ta 
[\[97a.3\]]thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/_las rnams kun gyi cho ga la/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod/_/bsam rgyud rang gi lag mthil la/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan/_/
[\[97a.4\]]dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras/_/me yi khams la bzhugs par bsgom/_/da ni lha dag rjes su dran/_/da ni sbyor ba'i las bshad de/_/rim pa bzhin du so sor bstan/_/rims kyis btab nas na ba dang /_/klad pa na dang mig nad dang /_/khong nad la sogs 
[\[97a.5\]]nad rnams la/_/tshigs bcad 'di dang snying po 'di/_/mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/_/dbyung pa'i thabs su byab par bya'o/_/nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/_/nyin gcig nyin gnyis nyin gsum dang /_/nyin 
[\[97a.6\]]bzhi rtag pa'i rims rnams la/_/bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi/_/skud pa dkar po sum sgril la/_/bzlas brjod nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas/_/mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho/_/nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/_/gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang /_/
[\[97a.7\]]snying nad rtsib logs na ba dang /_/khong na nad rnams ci yod la/_/chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas/_/blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/_/bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang /_/phol mig 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dang ni rma red la/_/grog tshang sa la snying po 'di/_/mang du bzlas shing btab na 'tsho/_/gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za khu dang /_/pho mtshan skrangs shing na ba la/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da'i ril bu'am/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la/_/nyi shu bzlas shing 
[\[97b.2\]]bskus na phan/_/nad kyi rnam par gang na yang /_/na tshabs che chung tshod brtags nas/_/tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/_/mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas kyang /_/lus la byab cing bzlas na phan/_/'khru ba gnad kyis btab pa la/_/sman nam ril 
[\[97b.3\]]bu kha zas la/_/bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang /_/khong du btang na phan par 'gyur/_/de yi bzlas brjod snga ma ste//'di dag rab tu bzlas bar bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_o~M ye ng+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tu na tA+e NI ta thA ga to h+ya ba datA/_/te ShA ny+tsa ya na rat+na aM 
[\[97b.4\]]baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHsAhA/_de dag bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho/_/de ni nad rnams 'tsho ba'o/_/de nas yang ni bka' stsal ba/_/nas dang gro dang sran ma dang /_/'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang /_/shing tog rgun 'brum a ru ra/_/de dag kun la za ba yi/_/
[\[97b.5\]]srin bu sbur bu phye ma leb/_/byi'u dang byi ba ne tso dang /_/lo tog za ba kha bcing na/_/zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang /_/bye ma sa dang thal ba la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/zhing dang shing tog gtor byas na/_/de dag kun kyang kha bcings 'gyur/_/
[\[97b.6\]]ha cang char pa ches pa na/_/bcom ldan 'das la phul ba yi/_/me tog sman ma re re la/_/bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/_/gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu/_/bum pa gang ba'i steng dag tu/_/kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du 
[\[97b.7\]]yang /_/me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/_/bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/_/ser ba drag po 'ong ba na/_/se ba nya mig lcug ma la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/ser ba gang nas yong ngos su/_/klad la bskor zhing byabs na 'chad/_yang na thal 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]chen yungs kar la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/_/thum po byas te lcug ma la/_/btags te btsugs na ser ba chad/_/'byung po sha za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la/_/dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi 
[\[98a.2\]]la/_/bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/_/gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang /_/yungs kar ga pur tsan+dan dang /_/gla rtsi la sogs sman sbyar te/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/gos dang zas ni dkar po sbyar/_/dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug_/
[\[98a.3\]]bum pa'i chu yis bkru bar bya/_/sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chus/_/bkrus shing blud na rab tu phan/_/nad dang gnod pa kun las thar/_/'byung po brjed byed sha za yis/_/glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/byis pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la/_/
[\[98a.4\]]gi wang la ni sngags bzlas nas/_/snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan+sa ya dza Ti loM b+ho d+ha ra u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_/gtsang sbra byas te mgul par gdags/_/de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang /_/bzlas 
[\[98a.5\]]brjod byas te btums la gdags/_/mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis zin pa na/_/yungs kar dang ni gu gul la/_/sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdun bzlas/_/dud pas bdugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/de la the tshom mi za'o/_/byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/_/bud 
[\[98a.6\]]med bu ni thogs gyur na/_/chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/_/blud na legs par btsas par 'gyur/_/bud med mo sham bu med la/_/sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/_/de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya/_/khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/_/chu de blud na bu tsha 
[\[98a.7\]]'phan/_/rigs rgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/_/skud pa dang ni gos kyi grwar/_/bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun/_/mdud cing bzlas te song ba na/_/bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/_/dgra dang nye zho med par 'go/_/yid 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/_/shu dag tshon gang tsam pa dang /_/mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/_/bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang /_/bum pa gcig tu blugs la dkrugs/_/nyi ma re re lo gcig tu/_/shu dag dag ni dum re dang /_/mar srang dag ni re re 
[\[98b.2\]]la/_/bzlas brjod re re bya zhing bza'/_/des ni yid gzhungs blo ldan 'gyur/_/de bzhin ba ni ser skya ma'i/_/mar dang 'o ma dag la yang /_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad du/_/bzlas te 'o thug dkrug cing bza'/_/yid gzhungs ba yi mchog tu 'gyur/_/
[\[98b.3\]]mi dang 'grogs shing mdza' 'dod na/_/gang dag yid dang 'thad pa la/_/me tog dang ni rtswa shing la/_/'bras bu 'am ni 'jim pa dag_/lag pa g.yas pa'i chang par bcug_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa gcig gdab/_/gang gi lag tu byin pa na/_/de dang 
[\[98b.4\]]rtag tu [(]mja' [,]mdza' [)]bar 'gyur/_/rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun/_/'chi bar nye bar gnas pa na/_/chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la/_/bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya/_/de la gtor na sos par 'gyur/_/yang na yungs kar brgya brgyad la/_/bzlas 
[\[98b.5\]]pa'i thum po mgul du gdags/_/des ni nad med bde bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs gyur na/_/yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod bya/_/thum bo byas te sgo la gdags/_/bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas/_/mi nad dang ni phyugs nad kun/_/
[\[98b.6\]]ming yang med cing bde bar 'gyur/_/de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni/_/'di dag kun du rgya cher gsungs/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_o~M ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA~M ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/_te ShAny+ca yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaHswA hA/_rtag tu bzlas brjod 
[\[98b.7\]]byas na ni/_/bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/gnod pa ces kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/_/dam chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni/_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/_/cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/_/gang la dad 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pas yid ches na/_/'grub par the tshom med par 'gyur/_/bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas gyur na/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/ston pa shAkya'i thugs rje 'di/_/dge slong ner ban rak+Shi tas/_/tho gar yul nas rnyed pa ste/_/
[\[99a.2\]]'gro ba kun gyi dpal du shar/_/'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D980}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya pratI t+ya sa mut+pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 
[\[99a.3\]]rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb la/_tshe 
[\[99a.4\]]dang ldan pa rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_'phags pa byams pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /_mi 
[\[99a.5\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga ba la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[99a.6\]]dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[99a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na/_ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[99b.2\]]'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he hu n+te ShA~M ta thA ga to h+yab data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bAdI ma hA shra ma NaH/_chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gis/_/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/_/de bzhin 
[\[99b.3\]]gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/_sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des de 
[\[99b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/_srog shing ni khab tsam/_gdugs ni bak+ku la'i me tog tsam zhig 
[\[99b.5\]]byas la/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na des tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[99b.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 
[\[99b.7\]]la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D981}]@#/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos gang rgyus 'byung de dag gi/_/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/_/ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te 
[\[100a.2\]]ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/_snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad zhi zhing bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po gang la dmigs te brjod na sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/_mchod rten du byas par 
[\[100a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/mchod pa gang la dmigs te brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba tsam phul bar 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i snying po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D982}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ra smibi ma la bi shud+d+he pra b+ha nA 
[\[100a.4\]]mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong 
[\[100a.5\]]khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa 
[\[100a.6\]]thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_shes rab 'od dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu 
[\[100a.7\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom ldan 'das la zhe sar byas/_ri mor byas/_bkur stir byas te/_yongs 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]su bskor ba la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe ser skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram ze chen po ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la yid mi ches shing log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/_gzhan zhig gi rmi ltas 
[\[100b.2\]]su rmis te bstan pa/_bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba thos nas/_bram ze de shin tu yang mi dga' ste/_'jigs skrag nas yid la bsams pa/_da bdag gi srog gi skyabs su la btsal bar bya/_yang 
[\[100b.3\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no zhes grags na/_bdag de'i gan du song ste/_de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag na de 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i phyir chos ston gor ma chag go snyam bsams 
[\[100b.4\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang /_rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te sems shing 'dug pa la/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[100b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa sgrib pa mi mnga' bas bram ze de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs te/_bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 
[\[100b.6\]]'gro mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu kha brgyud de skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan shan pa'i lus su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas yang 
[\[100b.7\]]phag gi lus su skye bar 'gyur te/_rtag tu ngan skyugs mi gtsang ba za zhing 'dam rdzab kyi nang du yang yun ring du gnas te rgyun du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na yang shin tu dbul ba dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_dri nga ba dang /_mdog 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]mi sdug cing gnag pa dang /_lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang mdze nad can du 'gyur te/_skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam thag pa skye bo yongs kyis smad brtag par brdeg btsog bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[101a.2\]]bka' stsal pa de thos nas/_bram ze de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid gdungs pas ngus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[101a.3\]]mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na bdag ni sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/_deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na/_bdag ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las skyabs mdzad par gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[101a.4\]]gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod song la/_grong khyer ser skya'i lam gyi sum mdo na mchod rten ring bsrel can rnying pa ral ba zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te/_mchod rten gyi rtse mor srog shing btsugs la/_gsang 
[\[101a.5\]]sngags yi ger bris pa de'i nang du bcug ste mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags lan bdun bdun bton na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur te 'phel bar 'gyur la/_'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnams su skye ste/_bskal ba stong phrag 
[\[101a.6\]]brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang phyir 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/_de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya stong du mar bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang shi 
[\[101a.7\]]'phos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/_der yang bskal ba chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun du yang yid gzhungs shing tshe'i bar chad med pa 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad nas nam du yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad do/_/bram ze chen po gzhan yang dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[101b.2\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la tshe thung ba'am/_nad mang ba zhig yod na/_des mchod rten rnying pa bcos sam/_gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/_gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du 
[\[101b.3\]]bzhugs nas dkyil 'khor byi dor byas te mchod na/_de dag gi yon tan ni tshe zad pa yang tshe slar nur zhing ring ba dang /_nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba yang nad do cog las thar ba dang /_nam du yang ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song 
[\[101b.4\]]gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/_de dag gi sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na de dag tu skye ba lta ci smos/_de nas bram ze des de skad zer ba thos nas shin tu yi rangs te/_mchod rten zhig pa bcos par bsams nas de 
[\[101b.5\]]'khor de nas langs te song ngo /_/de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba zhig stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsang 
[\[101b.6\]]sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bur bgyis na/_yon tan dang legs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsang sngags chen po rnams kyi yang mchog bdag nyid che ba dri ma med 
[\[101b.7\]]cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na mtshams 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/ser sna dang /_brnab sems dang /_phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/_tshe zad pa las kyang tshe ring du nur ba dang /_bkra 
[\[102a.2\]]shis dang legs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das bcom 
[\[102a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_
[\[102a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi steng nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mkhyen 
[\[102a.5\]]par mdzad nas/_'od zer de dag slar 'dus te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing bya ka la ping ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/_na maHsab+tA nA na/_saMmyak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI nA na/_pa ri 
[\[102a.6\]]shud+d+he ma na si/_a b+h+yArtsi ta bra tiSh+Thi tA nA na/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a mr-i ta A yu Sha s+ya/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_oM sarba ta thA ga ta shud+d+he/_A yu ra bi shod+ha ni/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta bIr+ya ba len pra ti sa~M ha ra/_A yuHsA ra sA ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/_bo d+hi 
[\[102a.7\]]bod+hi/_bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_ma ma sarba pA ba A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/_bi ga ta ma laM/_tshar su bud+d+he bud+d+he/_hu ru hu ru swA hA/_'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te gang la la 'di'i cho ga byed par 'dod na tshes brgyad dang /_bcu gsum dang /_bcu bzhi dang /_bco lnga rnams gang yang 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rung ba la mchod rten ring bsrel can la lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/_gsang sngags 'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas la dkyil 'khor byas nas gsang sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/_de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang yi ger 
[\[102b.2\]]'dri ba yang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te lus spos kyis byugs nas kha zas gtsang ma zos la me tog dang bdug pas mchod de/_de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/_yang na bdag gi nyams kyis ci 'byor par phul yang rung ste sems mgu bar bya'o/_/
[\[102b.3\]]chos btsun par bya ba'i phyir bsti stang dang ri mo cher bya'o/_/gsang sngags kyi yi ge la yang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du shes bzhag ste/_mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing /_de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste/_sems 
[\[102b.4\]]rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas na tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grangs med pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas/_nam du yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas thams cad du 
[\[102b.5\]]skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang du skye ba'i gnas thams cad du yang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/_yid la bsams pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/_
[\[102b.6\]]nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig nad tshabs po ches btab ste/_'chi ba'i dus byed pa la thug na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la/_de'i steng du tshon sna lngas ri mor bris te/_dbus kyi char ni 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_
[\[102b.7\]]dung dang /_mdung rtse gsum pa dang /_g.yung drung ris dang /_pad+mo rnams bri'o/_/grwa bzhir yang pad+mo re re bris te/_de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re grwa bzhir gzhag go/_/bdug spos kyi snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs 'thul ba yang gzhag go/_/
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]kha dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang /_zas dkar gsum dang 'bras chan du sbyar ba gzhag_/yang dri'i chu dang /_me tog dang /_'bras sam 'bru'i snod bkang ba phor bu re re blugs pa dang /_yang kha zas sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma 
[\[103a.2\]]spos chu bum pa gang dang sbyar te dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag go/_/gtor ma de dang 'bras kyi drung du nye bar tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i steng du mar me gzhag go/_/de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa bzhag la/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 
[\[103a.3\]]kha bstan pa'i nad pa'i mdun du yang mchod pa'i bshos bzhag ste 'bul du gzhug go/_/de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te/_nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab ste/_cho ga 'di ltar byas na nad pa tshe zad de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba 
[\[103a.4\]]zhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul par 'gyur ba yang tshe slar nur zhing tshe ring bor 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te/_nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid 
[\[103a.5\]]'tsho'i bar du bton na/_de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang bde ba mi zad pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/dus ma 
[\[103a.6\]]yin pa'i 'chi ba dang sgrib pa thams cad byang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang sngags lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas na/_shi ba de ngan song gi gnas su lhung na yang de'i mod la 
[\[103a.7\]]las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags yi ger bris pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos te/_mchod rten gyi nang du bcug la nan tan du mchod pa byas na/_shi ba gang yin 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]ba de ngan song gi gnas nas thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod 
[\[103b.2\]]rten de la bskor ba byas sam/_phyag byas sam/_mchod pa phul yang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[103b.3\]]tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs te gang dag la mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam du yang dud 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa yang mchod rten de la reg gam/_de'i grib 
[\[103b.4\]]mas phog kyang rung ste/_de'i sdig pa thams cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro/_/mchod rten de'i gnas na 'byung po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za la sogs pa lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang /_gcan gzan khro ba dang /_thog 
[\[103b.5\]]'bab pa dang /_sdig sbrul kha gdug pa dang /_sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_ser ba dang /_mu ge dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba 
[\[103b.6\]]dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na yang mchod rten dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis 'od zer chen po byung bas/_ltas ngan pa dang /_bkra mi 
[\[103b.7\]]shis pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/_/gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang /_chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/_dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lce 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]kun du 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang nas dmag gi dpung dang /_mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyis kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa byas te phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgya tshun 
[\[104a.2\]]chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro/_/'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis gcad pa dang /_gnon 
[\[104a.3\]]par mi nus te/_gsang sngags thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/_o~M sarba ta thA ga ta bi bu la yaSh+Ti/_ma Ni ka na ka rA dza ta/_bi bu Shi ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/_sa man+he bi lo ki te/_sa ra sa ra/_ma ma 
[\[104a.4\]]sarba pA ba bi sho d+ha ni/_sam bo d+ha ni/_pra ba ra yaSh+Ti/_pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta hu ru tsi ra ma la bi shud+d+he hU~M hU~M swA hA/_rigs kyi bu ci nas kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te/_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go/_/de yang cho 
[\[104a.5\]]ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi nang du gzhug go/_/cho ga de ltar byas na mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o/_/de'i gong du yang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa dang 'dra'o/_/de'i yang gong du yang rin po che 
[\[104a.6\]]sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o/_/yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim 
[\[104a.7\]]pa las mchod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/_de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/_phyag byas sam/_thal mo 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sbyar ram/_me tog phul lam/_byug pa dang /_bdug spos phul lam/_dril bu dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa yin no/_/
[\[104b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal dang /_mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/_tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na yang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[104b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu rmi lam du rmis sam/_rgyang nas mthong ngam/_dril bu'i sgra thos sam/_mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam 
[\[104b.4\]]thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/_sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis srung ba dang /_rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam 
[\[104b.5\]]yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags 'di ni mchod rten gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o/_/yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta/_ma la bi sho d+ha ni/_
[\[104b.6\]]rud+d+ha ba le pra ti saM skAr/_ta thA ga ta d+hA tu d+ha re/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_san+d+ha ra san+d+ha ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+TA na a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gang la la zhig gis mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/_
[\[104b.7\]]gzhan byed du bcug gam/_mchod rten rnying pa bcas legs byas kyang rung /_sa 'jim las mchod rten chung ngu byas sam/_so phag gam/_rdo ba la byas kyang rung ste/_dang por gsang sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad tshang du bzlas brjod byas te/_de'i 'og tu 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]mchod rten sen mo gang tsam gyi sa la byas sam/_khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/_dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/_gsang sngags kyi mthu dang /_sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spos 
[\[105a.2\]]kyi ngad ldang ste/_tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_gur gum la sogs pa'i dri bro 'am/_/lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 
[\[105a.3\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/_yon tan dang /_legs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur/_tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na yang tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/_nam 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na yang sangs rgyas 
[\[105a.4\]]bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes su dgongs te/_skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/_der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[105a.5\]]brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba shes pa 'thob bo/_/lus las tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung zhing /_kha nas 
[\[105a.6\]]ut+pa la'i bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste/_gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten la bskus na yang de dag gi 
[\[105a.7\]]yon tan dang /_legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang bar byas te/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang /_rin 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]po cher 'du shes pas gzung na de de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/_gsang sngags rnams la gus pa bskyed nas yi ger bri bar bya ste/_gong du bshad pa bzhin du gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po 
[\[105b.2\]]bcug ste mchod rten byas na de dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/_yon tan dang /_legs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[105b.3\]]na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing /_thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas/_gsang 
[\[105b.4\]]sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i byin gyi brlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni legs so legs so/_/shin tu yang legs te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor gyi 
[\[105b.5\]]dkyil 'khor de nyid na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'jig rten skyong 
[\[105b.6\]]ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_ku be ra dang /_de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas bdag cag rang rang gi 
[\[105b.7\]]spyod yul la skyo zhing yid byung bar gyur te/_mthar gyis yon tan chen po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig la gcig bos te smras pa/_kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o/_/de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rnyed par dka'/_gsang sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smras so/_/de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba 
[\[106a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang /_cho ga'i yon tan chen po de dag thos shing thob nas/_sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dang bar 'gyur/_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/_tshe 
[\[106a.3\]]yang phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas/_dga' mgu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob par gyur to/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems dang zhing rjes su yi rangs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel 
[\[106a.4\]]bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig mngon par sprul nas/_chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[106a.5\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu gling gi 
[\[106a.6\]]sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na de 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la 
[\[106a.7\]]gsol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal lo/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_na ba na ba tI nA~M/_saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ko Ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NA~M/_na maHsarba ni bA 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]raN/_bi skam bi ni bo d+hi satwA ya/_o~M tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi shod+ha ni/_sarba ta thA ga ta A yur ba lA ni/_bi pu la nirma le/_sarba sid+d+hi nam skr-i twA/_ba ra bar/_sarba sa twA a ba lo ki ni/_o~M sarba ni bA ra Na/_bi skam bi Ni/_ma ma sarba 
[\[106b.2\]]pA ba bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/_gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu byas te/_skad cig gcig bton na yang sdig pa 
[\[106b.3\]]thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na mchod rten de la la la zhig gis phyag byas sam/_tshig snyan pas bstod dam/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[106b.4\]]byug pa dang /_mar me 'bul na/_rigs kyi bu de de'i tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa thams cad byang zhing las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal te/_bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du grub par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa gang 
[\[106b.5\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po sogs par 
[\[106b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis tshes brgyad dang /_bcu bzhi dang /[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga gang yang rung ba la khrus dang /_gtsang sbra byas te/_gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig smyung ba'am/_yang na zas dkar gsum zos te/_mchod rten la 
[\[106b.7\]]bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/_gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]cad rnam par dag par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/_bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mdzad cing /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams 
[\[107a.2\]]cad kyi zhal yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton na sgrib pa thams cad byang ste phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang 
[\[107a.3\]]gis bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad bton na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/_bsrung ba dang /_skyabs byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar sgrub bo/_/gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton 
[\[107a.4\]]na dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa 'thob bo/_/yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/_nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bton 
[\[107a.5\]]na legs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad bton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/_sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na phung po lnga rnam 
[\[107a.6\]]par dag par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/gang gis nyis stong tshang bar bton na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo/_/gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[107a.7\]]'thob bo/_/gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar bton na dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis lnga stong tshang bar bton na rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis drug stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gnas 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis bdun stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis brgyad stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis dgu stong tshang bar 
[\[107b.2\]]bton na rig sngags dang gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gnon par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar bton na bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[107b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur te/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang gang la la zhig gis pha ma'i don gyi phyir bsod nams kyi las bya bar 'dod na/_mchod rten rnying pa ring bsrel can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la bcos legs 
[\[107b.4\]]byas te/_g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du bskor ba byas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la legs so 
[\[107b.5\]]zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi cho ga tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhin no/_/de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba ba'i bdag pos bcom 
[\[107b.6\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/_gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 
[\[107b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad bsal nas de phyin cad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]po la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'dra ba yin no/_/ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba
