[\[108a.2\]]chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon che bar gnas par 'gyur na/_las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de dag gi yon tan ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye 
[\[108a.3\]]ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen cing gzigs par zad do/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das las tshegs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyis na 
[\[108a.4\]]bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[108a.5\]]bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob cing /_yon tan thob par 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/_dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 
[\[108a.6\]]'khor gru bzhir byas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/_grwa bzhir dri'i chu phor bu bkang ba re re bzhag_/bdug spos kyi snod du ba 'thul ba yang bzhag nas/_snod chen po'i nang du me tog dang /_dri'i chu dang /_'bras skam po rnams blugs te/_dkyil 
[\[108a.7\]]'khor gyi steng du gzhag pa dang /_yang til nag po dang /_sran ma ma sha dang /_'bras rnams bsres te/_btsos pa'i 'bras thug kri sar zhes bya ba dang /_zas dkar gsum dang /_'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blugs pa dang /_yang shing tog 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]sna tshogs 'bras bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_kha zas ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang /_spos dang /_me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkram la/_gsang sngags kyi yi ge mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du bcug nas mchod rten gyi 
[\[108b.2\]]phyogs bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phyag byas la sems rtse gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_o~M bi pu la bi ma le/_pra bar dzin ba re/_sa ra sa ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar+b+he a 
[\[108b.3\]]d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_A ya ta to ba Ni swA hA/_sarba de ba Ni/_ba ha ya bi bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ShA na sa ma ye swA hA/_bdug spos 'thul ba rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing /_gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[108b.4\]]dpon chen po brgyad dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed de srog shing brtan par byed do/_/de bas gong du yang sangs 
[\[108b.5\]]rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te/_mchod rten de la mchod pa dang /_chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring bsrel dang ldan par mdzad do/_/de ltar sems thag pa nas cho ga tshul bzhin du byas na 
[\[108b.6\]]yon tan de dag dang /_gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur te/_rin po che'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan zhing 
[\[108b.7\]]lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /_bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/_mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/_mtshams 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o/_/gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam thos pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 
[\[109a.2\]]'gyur/_tha na bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa sems can gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/_bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs 
[\[109a.3\]]par spyod par 'dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/_sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyong nul gyis byugs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod re re bzhag la/_sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags bzhi 
[\[109a.4\]]po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/_rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re re'i nang du gzhug go/_/de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te/_mchod rten 
[\[109a.5\]]gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug la/_mchod rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/_me tog dang byug pas mchod la/_lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o/_/na maHna pan pa tI nA~M/_ta thA ga ta ga~M gA nA 
[\[109a.6\]]tI bA lu kA nA~M/_ko Ti ni yu ta sha ta sa ha srA NA~M/_yo~M po bo ri/_tsa ri Ni tsa ri/_mo ri ko ri tsa la bA ri swA hA/_cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/_des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang 
[\[109a.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]mchod rten de la yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang /_yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis mkhyen cing gzigs te byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/_/rigs 
[\[109b.2\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod nams dang /_yon tan thams cad thob par mdzad do/_/yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po ma nor bar yi ger bris la rtag tu bton te/_mchod pa'i las byas la lus 
[\[109b.3\]]la thogs na rig pa de nyid kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa mdzad de/_phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thams cad dang /_shar gnyer ba rnams dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa thams cad kyang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[109b.4\]]'jigs shing skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/_grib mas phog 
[\[109b.5\]]gam/_lus la reg kyang rung ste/_de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/_mes mi tshig_/chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/_gdon thams cad kyis kyang 
[\[109b.6\]]glags mi rnyed/_thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad do/_/lha thams cad dang /_dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang de la stong grogs byed par 'gyur te/_gzhan gyi rig 
[\[109b.7\]]sngags dang /_byad dang /_sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/_gsang sngags yi ger bris la lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/_sum mdo skye bo mang po phan 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]tshun 'gro ba'i gnas su mchod rten byas la/_de'i nang du bcug na/_'gro ba thams cad dang /_bya dang /_sbrang ma dang /_tha na grog sbur yan chad kyis mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_reg pa dang /_de la phog pa'i sa dang /_rdul dang /_rlung dang /_grib mas phog na yang byol 
[\[110a.2\]]song dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bas tshe rabs rjes su dran pa 'thob par 
[\[110a.3\]]'gyur zhing /_phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa mi mjed kyi 
[\[110a.4\]]bdag po dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag ngas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongs su gtad kyis/_rtag tu rim gror bya zhing yongs su gzung bar bya ste/_rin 
[\[110a.5\]]po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/_nam du yang rgyun ma gcad par sems can la ston cig_/mthong zhing thos par byas na mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa 
[\[110a.6\]]thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams 
[\[110a.7\]]cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_tshig mthun par smras te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga dang /_mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsungs pa rnams sems can 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bdag cag kun gyis bsrung zhing rim gror bgyi/_rtag par gzungs su gzung zhing mi bskyud par bgyi/_yi ger bri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[110b.2\]]thos shing khong du chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/_bdag cag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin spyi bos blangs pa'i slad du gsang 
[\[110b.3\]]sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag rim gror bgyid/_btsun par bgyi/_gus par bgyi/_rin po che'i 'du shes gzhag par bgyi/_rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi ste/_nam du yang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i 
[\[110b.4\]]slad du nan tan bgyi bar 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag bsrung ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_yongs su bzung bar khas blangs pa ni 
[\[110b.5\]]legs so legs so shin tu yang legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od 
[\[110b.6\]]ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sid+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/_/jo bo a ti sha dang dge bshes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[110b.7\]{D983}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_saman+ta mu kha pra be sha ra sh+mi bi ma loSh+NI Sha bra b+hAs sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya sa ma ya bi lo ki tanA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_zham ring ba lha'i tshogs 
[\[111a.2\]]chen po dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_'khor mang bo tshogs pa la bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_ji ltar 
[\[111a.3\]]sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab pa dang /_lhun gyis grub pa'i gter chen po skyed par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji 
[\[111a.4\]]ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshangs pa dang /_lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar lha'i gzugs 'dod pa dang 
[\[111a.5\]]lta bas chog mi shes pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa lta ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_rga shi dang /_skye ba las grol ba dang /_brdzus 
[\[111a.6\]]te skye ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[111a.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ji ltar shes rab dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po dang /_thos pa rgya mtsho bsags pa dang /_mang du thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]drug gi chos kyi sgo 'di nyid nyin mtshan du rjes su sems shing rjes su spyad de dka' ba chen po'i phyir sgom par yang byed do/_/de nas lha'i 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba g.yog lha'i bu bye ba phrag stong dang 
[\[111b.2\]]ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa/_lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor ba/_lha'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang /_lha'i me tog gis mdzes par byas pa'i rdzing gis legs 
[\[111b.3\]]par brgyan pa dang ldan pa zhig yod de/_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de lha'i bu mo'i mchog me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang lhan cig dga' ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha'i bde ba la ni chags/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgo bzhi dang ldan 
[\[111b.4\]]pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo/_/de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid kyis log cing lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgra bskyungs te nyal bar gyur to/_/de nas gnas 
[\[111b.5\]]mchog de na lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul ba/_kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs/_khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/_dga' ba la goms 
[\[111b.6\]]par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/_lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/_da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_lha'i longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/_khyod kyi gnas 
[\[111b.7\]]gzhal med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos/_khyod kyi srog ni yod med kyis/_/thabs ni myur du rnam par soms/_/zhes de skad smras nas/_lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu nor 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bu'i snying po dri ma med pas tshig mi snyan pa de thos nas brgyal te mal nas khas bub tu sa la ltung ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu mo'i tshogs de dag kyang skra ni bshig_/rgyan rnams ni lhung /_gos ni bsnyil/_kha nas khrag dang gsher bag ni chang nas mchu 
[\[112a.2\]]dang rkan dang mid pa dang lce ni skams la/_smre sngags stong phrag du ma ni smra ste ngu zhing cho nges 'debs la/_kyi hud kyi hud ces 'dzer cing lha'i rin po che'i snod nas spos chu dang /_tsan+dan gyi chu grang mos 'thor zhing /_kha cig ni mgul nas 'ju/_kha cig ni lag 
[\[112a.3\]]pa nas 'ju/_kha cig ni de'i skra la 'o byed/_kha cig ni rkang pa nas 'ju/_kha cig ni mgo la 'ju/_kha cig ni brgyal te 'gyel/_kha cig ni sa'i steng na chu med pa'i nya bzhin du 'gro ldog_/kha cig ni lus la mes tshig pa bzhin du 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni smre 
[\[112a.4\]]sngags du ma 'don cing kyi hud kyi hud ces zer zhing ngu'o/_/de nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de brgyal ba sangs te dran pa thob nas/_kha nas khrag skyug cing sdug bsngal chen po drag po nyams su myang nas shugs ring du phyung ste lus 'dar zhing shing rlung gi shugs kyis 
[\[112a.5\]]btab pa bzhin du g.yo bar gyur la/_sgra bskyungs ba'i snying gis rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la gtugs te/_rkang pa gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[112a.6\]]bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po che ba'i bdag nyid can bskyab tu gsol/_lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis bsgo ba thos na bdag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyid do zhes mchi zhing /_sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba 
[\[112a.7\]]soms shig ces mchi na/_lha'i dbang po thabs gang gis bdag 'chi bdag gi dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i gnyen po bka' stsal du gsol/_lha'i dbang po ci nas kyang bdag 'chi bdag gi sgo nas thar 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ba'i tshogs bdag la bskyab tu gsol/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas snying rab tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu ma 'jigs shig_/gang gis 'chi bdag pham par 'gyur zhing /_sems 
[\[112b.2\]]can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang mya ngan las rgal ba bla na med pa'i sman pa yod de/_de ni khyod kyi skyabs dang rtsa lag bzang po dang /_
[\[112b.3\]]dpung gnyen dang /_pha ma lta bur gyur ba yin no/_/de ni ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa yin gyis 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs pa der bdag cag myur du 'dong ngo /_/de nas de'i tho rangs lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang /_lha dang 
[\[112b.4\]]lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig dga' ldan ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[112b.5\]]brgya byin gyis dman pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di la lha'i gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda'i gdong gis bskul te/_de dgung bdun gyi gdugs la nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di 
[\[112b.6\]]'chi bdag gi sgo'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshig gsan nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/_'dzum pa bstan pa des zhal nas kha dog du 
[\[112b.7\]]ma dang ldan pa'i 'od zer byung ste/_'od zer byung ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byas te/_'od zer gyi snang ba des lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]srin po dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byas nas bskul te/_bskul nas kyang 'od zer de slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/_/zhugs ma thag tu lha'i 
[\[113a.2\]]dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi bdag gi sgo'i 'jigs par 'gyur ba de nyon cig_/'di gal te 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa chen po drag po'i tshor 
[\[113a.3\]]ba sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/_/thog mar ni grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sIr smyig ma mkhan gyi phyis khung gi 'dam rdzab kyi nang du sha za mo phag mgo can du skye bar 'gyur te/_phyis khung de na bshang gci za'o/_/phyi sa khung de nyid kyi nang na srog chags bye ba 
[\[113a.4\]]brgya stong gnas te/_de dag dus gsum du phag mo de'i sha za zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par byed do/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus kun rdzogs par 'gyur te lo bdun 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_de nas dgon par rus 
[\[113a.5\]]sbal gyi skye gnas su skye la/_de na chu'i ming yang mi grag cing shing grib kyang med de/_nyi tshan gyis lus gdungs shing tshig la bye tshan za zhing bya rog dag gis lus btogs nas lus dum bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung nas zhig par 'gyur te/_lo lnga tshang 
[\[113a.6\]]bar de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_bA rA Na sI de nyid du 'bab chu chen por nya chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis gang na chu med pa der 'phangs nas lus chen po de la sbrul gdug pa dang /_bya rog dang /_sre mo dang /_khyi dang /_gzig 
[\[113a.7\]]dang /_dred dang /_ce spyang la sogs pas za'o/_/srog chags sna tshogs pa gzhan dag gis kyang za'o/_/de nas yang las kyi dbang gis lus byung zhing zad par 'gyur te/_lo gsum du de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas khyim bdun du skye zhing 'dzam bu'i gling gi sdug 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_mdze can gyi khyim dang /_dbul po'i khyim dang /_g.yung po'i khyim dang /_shan pa'i khyim dang /_rigs ngan gyi khyim dang /_gdol pa'i khyim dang /_dmus long gi khyim du skyes te lo drug cu'i bar du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug 
[\[113b.2\]]bsngal de dag myong nas de nas shi 'phos te sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste brgya la mi'i lus thob na yang dbul ba dang /_
[\[113b.3\]]yan lag ma tshang ba dang /_shes rab chung ba dang yi ge mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang bral ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis smad pa dang rtag tu skom pa dang bkres pa sems pa dang tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[113b.4\]]lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa'i gtam ngan thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shin tu 'jigs skrag ste yid mi dga' nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag re ba ma mchis par gyur to/_/bdag la skyabs bgyid pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[113b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po 'chi bdag gi chad pa chen po'i gnyen po yod kyis de bas na re ba med par ma byed cig_/des phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 
[\[113b.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa tsam gyis sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring por 'gyur ro/_/shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 
[\[113b.7\]]'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das re ba 'phel bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das skye dgu'i 'jig 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]rten thams cad bsgral du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sel du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dgug tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 
[\[114a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dbugs dbyung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas la gzigs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya chen pos gdab tu 
[\[114a.3\]]gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnyen po ston pa chen po bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub 
[\[114a.4\]]pas de skad ces gsol ba thugs su chud nas rnam pa kun du rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rnam pa kun zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gtsug tor gyi dbus nas byung nas/_des phyogs kun du snang bar 
[\[114a.5\]]byas te/_rin po che'i gdugs lta bur nam mkha' la 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de gzigs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang po kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin 
[\[114a.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags zung shig_/phyag rgya 'di ni gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/_/gzungs sngags 
[\[114a.7\]]'di mthong ba dang thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing /_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur te/_dper na me yis rtswa bsregs pa/_/rlung gis thal ba myur du ded/_/de bzhin tshe rabs snga ma la/_/bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad sreg_/dper na char ba 'bab 'gyur te/_/ri la 'bab chu babs pa yis/_/sa yi steng gi phyag dar 
[\[114b.2\]]dang /_/nyal nyil thams cad 'ded bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gzungs 'di mthong ba dang /_/thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa 'byang /_/dper na me yis gser sbyangs pa/_/sos gcad rung bar snyi bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/_/lus sbyong 'gyur te the tshom med/_/dper na nyi ma shar 
[\[114b.3\]]gyur na/_/'od zer kun du rab tu 'byung /_/de bzhin su zhig gzungs 'chang ba/_/de yi lus kyang rnam par mdzes/_/dper na skam por nya 'gre ldog_/chu dang bral bas 'chi sgor 'gro/_/la las slar yang chur bor bas/_/de na gnas shing yang rtse'o/_/de bzhin dran pa tsam gyis kyang /_/mi 
[\[114b.4\]]rnams tshe ni zlog par byed/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags bstan gyis nyon cig_/na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_o~M ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la na/_sA gar ga m+b+hi re/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_A yun+d+ha ra/_A yun+d+ha ra/_san+d+ha ra san+d+ha ra/_k+Sha Na k+Sha Na/_k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/_k+Shu Nu k+Shu Nu/_sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya/_
[\[114b.5\]]tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ma hA b+hu ba na/_sA ga ra/_saM sho d+ha ya/_mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa/_b+ha ga ba ti sarba pA paM bi ma la/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya lab+d+he/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_bi ga ta A ba ra Ni/_b+ha ya ha ra Ni/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_mr-i t+yu da N+Da d+ha re/_a b+ha ya pra de/_uSh+NI Sha bya ba lo ki te/_sa man+ta mu khe/_sa man+ta bya ba lo ki 
[\[114b.6\]]te/_ma hA mA ye/_ma hA bA sha d+ha ra/_a mo g+ha bi ma le A kar+Shi ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kaN+D+ha ya/_A kaD+D+ha ya/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_in+d+ri ya bi shod+ha ni/_b+hU Shi ta b+hU dze/_ma hA mu drA bi lo ki te/_dza ya dza ya/_sid+d+he sid+d+he/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ni/_sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/_
[\[114b.7\]]saM shod+ha ni saM shod+ha ni/_bi shod+ha ni bi shod+ha naM/_ha ra ha ra/_ma ma sarba pA paM/_sarba ta thA ga ta ku la b+hu dze/_sa ma ya tiSh+The/_pra sa ra tu ma ma puN+ye/_bin sh+yan+tu pA paM/_sarba ki lbi Sha ha re/_ma Ni bi shud+d+he/_shod+ha ya bi ma la/_bi kA si ta pad+me/_ka ba tsi ta b+hu dze/_ShaT+bA ra mi tA pa ri bU ra Ni/_sarba ta thA 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ga toSh+NI Sha bi lo ki te swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta guh+ya a d+hiSh+ShA na ad+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_A yurda de swA hA/_puN+yad de swA hA/_puN+ya pi lo ki te swA hAM/_puN+ya a ba lo ki te swA hA/_mr-i t+yudaN+De swA hA/_yam daN+De swA hA/_ya ma dU te swA hA/_saM ha ra Ni swA hA/_saM b+ha ra Ni swA hA/_san+d+ha ra Ni swA hA/_pra tis 
[\[115a.2\]]ra Ni swA hA/_te jo ba ti swA hA/_te dzo ba ti swA hA/_dza ya ba ti swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta mu drA ad+hi Sh+ShA na a b+hiSh+ShI te swA hA/_lha'i dbang po gzungs sngags 'di lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la rjes su ston cig_/des ni khyod kyis lha'i bu de la yun ring por phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas sgor 
[\[115a.3\]]'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bris la mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug go/_/mchod rten sar pa'am/_rnying ba bcos pa yang rung ste de'i nang du gzhug go/_/spos 
[\[115a.4\]]dang byug pa yang phul la gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad dran par bya zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsgom par bya'o/_/nyin zhag gcig la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma shar ba dang shar phyogs su bltas te spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/_nyi ma logs 
[\[115a.5\]]su me tog gis gtor ro/_/a ga ru dang tu ruSh+ka'i bdug pas bdugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/mchod rten brgya rtsa brgyad btab pa la rig sngags kyi snying po 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[115a.6\]]steng du bzhag na gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug par 'gyur ro/_/ring bsrel gyi snying por yang 'gyur ro/_/snying po 'di bris la gzhug go/_/o~M na ma s+t+rai yad+h+wi kA nAM 
[\[115a.7\]]sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya kar+b+hi dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he saM b+ha ra ma ma A yuH/_saM sho d+ha ya/_ma ma sarba pA baM/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+toSh+tI Sha bi ma la bi shud+d+he/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_aM baM saM dzaHswA hA/_kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba dus gsum 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di la gus par byas te mchod rten gyi las byas na tshe zad pa las slar nur te tshe ring por sbyong bar byed do/_/gal te shi 'phos na yang sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro 
[\[115b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin cad nam yang 'chi ba'i tshor ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phyin cad sems can 
[\[115b.3\]]dmyal ba pa'i sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rig sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das las bzung nas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang lhan cig tu nam nangs pa dang rang 
[\[115b.4\]]gi gnas su song ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lung bzhin du cho ga [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du mchod rten gyi las byas nas bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yang byas pa dang /_byas ma thag tu lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi nas sdig pa thams 
[\[115b.5\]]cad dang bral te/_lus rnam par dag nas pags pa'i mdog ni gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur/_skra dang mig ni mthon mthing lta bur gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mngon du mthong /_nam mkha'i dbyings nas de bzhin gshegs pas legs so legs so 
[\[115b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i gsung ni phyung ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu de sgrib pa dang bral ba'i lus su gyur par mthong nas ya mtshan cher bzung ste rab tu dga' nas/_a la la sangs rgyas/_a la la rig sngags/_a la la chos/_'bras bu 'phral du ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[115b.7\]]pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje mchog tu che ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas lha'i bu de rang gi gnas su song nas lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa sna 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]tshogs blangs te/_lha'i gos dang /_spud pa dang /_rgyan kyang blangs nas g.yog 'khor thams cad dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_lha'i tshogs dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas su dong ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[116a.2\]]'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_
[\[116a.3\]]dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das su ga las gang gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi 
[\[116a.4\]]bzad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag legs par dris so/_/de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje sngon 
[\[116a.5\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs ba 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/_de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa byang ba gsal ba yid gzhungs pa gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mdog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_dad pa dang 
[\[116a.6\]]ldan pa/_dge ba'i bsam pa can rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/_de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du byed de/_sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do/_/de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab snang zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che la longs spyod che ba/_g.yog 
[\[116a.7\]]'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/_khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang mi ldan zhing gzhan mu stegs can la dad do/_/bram ze de ni khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa sgrogs kyang khyim bdag de ni de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngas bram 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang rus sbal bsregs pa bzhin du bor te kha ngan skyugs kyis dgang ngo snyam mo/_/des 'di snyam du bsams ma thag tu khyim bdag de sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis btab bo/_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi kar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen 
[\[116b.2\]]po myong ste/_shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes te/_der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo /_/de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang /_phag dang /_rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems 
[\[116b.3\]]can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/_der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo /_/de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang /_gtsug lag khang cig tu phyin pa na de na dge slong 
[\[116b.4\]]snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/_des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas te zas byin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang bsgrags so/_/dmus long des gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te/_rjes su sems shing kye ma'o 
[\[116b.5\]]mi bzad pa'i las byas so snyam nas ngo tsha dang khrel yod par gyur te/_'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te/_gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong 
[\[116b.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus long du gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do/_/lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sdom pa gsum gyis bsdam par 
[\[116b.7\]]bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje las des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo /_/lha'i bu 'dis byang chub snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo /_/lag na rdo rje de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom mam yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta ste/_lag na rdo rje khyod nyid do/_/dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrogs pa'i dge slong de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong du 
[\[117a.2\]]gyur to/_/de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/_dga' ba thob par gyur te/_ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung nas a la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du brjod 
[\[117a.3\]]pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum ni bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[117a.4\]]chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni mthu che ba phan yon cher lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing /_gang gis 
[\[117a.5\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang /_sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di nyon cig_/'di ltar 
[\[117a.6\]]phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen mas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/_/ring bsrel gyi snying po'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi 
[\[117a.7\]]snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor ba bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/_/des ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/bsod 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 
[\[117b.2\]]ring por 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/phyin cad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der brdzus te skye zhing pad+ma 
[\[117b.3\]]las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na des khrus 
[\[117b.4\]]byas la gos sar pa bgos te/_spos kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o/_/snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o/_/mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o/_/rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/mchod rten bzhi ni grwa bzhir gzhag go/_/
[\[117b.5\]]gcig ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go/_/shing bu btsugs te ba dan dmar po dpyang bar bya'o/_/me tog gis gtor ro/_/bum pa gang ba lnga gzhag go/_/grwa bzhir phog por bzhi nas tu ru Sh+ka dang /_a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gu gul gyi bdug 
[\[117b.6\]]pas bdug par bya'o/_/spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/_/snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/nad kyis btab pa dang /_gnod 
[\[117b.7\]]pa dang /_nad tshabs che ba dang /_tshe zad pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang /_bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go/_/rma bya'i sgro lngas byab par bya'o/_/mchod 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/_/cho ga 'di lan cig byas na bskal par bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro/_/nad thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[118a.2\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig 
[\[118a.3\]]nas gcig tu brgyud de byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te sha zad pa yang lus yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur 
[\[118a.4\]]ro/_/bsam pa yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad 'chi bdag gis sgo'i sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang 
[\[118a.5\]]gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na 
[\[118a.6\]]de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na 'jigs pa med par lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[118a.7\]]cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyi pags pa brjes 
[\[118b.2\]]pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun du shes so/_/tshes brgyad dam/_bcu bzhi'am/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po'i gzungs 
[\[118b.3\]]sngags 'di gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba byas na bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'phral du mchod rten la sgra 'byung ste legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/'phral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[118b.4\]]pa thams cad dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dri ma dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_bye'u 'am/_bu mo gang dang gtam byas pa de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[118b.5\]]sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la smras na yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bya'i tshogs thams cad la smras na yang bya'i tshogs thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na khyi dang /_
[\[118b.6\]]rus sbal dang /_sbrul dang /_byi la dang /_sre mo dang /_srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na/_gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes 
[\[118b.7\]]pa de dag de nas yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag mtho ris su skyes pa de dag gi lus la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/gcan gzan dang /_bya sna tshogs gang dag dur khrod der 'gro ba de dag thams cad kyang bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ri la gtor na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/_gal te mtshams 
[\[119a.2\]]med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par ltung nas gdung bas bsregs pa las 'phral du yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/_gal te mgul nas thag pas btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[119a.3\]]de'i 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyang rnam par zhi zhing rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te the tshom med do/_/chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'dug go/_/lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin 
[\[119a.4\]]nam/_sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/_'bum tshad nas mchod rten thams cad 
[\[119a.5\]]'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed 
[\[119a.6\]]cing lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o/_/gang dag de las bya ba rnams byed pa de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog 
[\[119a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang /_gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dong ba de dag kyang phyir mi ldog 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/tha na grib mas phog na yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni brjod par mi nus so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[119b.2\]]tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha'i bu de dag dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa dang /_de dag thams cad 
[\[119b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags mthu 
[\[119b.4\]]chen po 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur mthong ba dang /_thos par dka' ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lhan cig tshogs nas slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/rgyas par bgyi'o/_/sems can 
[\[119b.5\]]thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o/_/'di 'dzin pa'i sems can chen po de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[119b.6\]]pa/_grogs po dag legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di ngas khyod la gtad do/_/'phags pa kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[119b.7\]]cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]{D984}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yasarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[120a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba zhig sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa na gnas te/_lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po na lha'i longs spyod chen po dang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs chen pos bskor nas rtse dga' zhing dga' 
[\[120a.3\]]mgur spyod de/_de lha'i longs spyod myong ba las mtshan mo sgra zhig thos pa lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'chi ba'i dus byed de/_de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te/_der yang 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro/_/'gro ba bdun po 
[\[120a.4\]]myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang der de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur ro zhes des thos so/_/de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos nas 'jigs skrag dngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/_de rings pa rings par 
[\[120a.5\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_brtabs par smra zhing de kyi hud kyi hud ces smre sngags 'don bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol/_lha'i 
[\[120a.6\]]dbang po bdag deng lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te/_lha'i longs spyod kyi dga' bas rtse zhing bde ba myong ba las sgra zhig thos pa/_lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang 'gro ba bdun myong 
[\[120a.7\]]nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang der de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur ro zhes thos na/_lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu shin tu 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]brtan pa'i tshig de thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/_lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_'gro ba bdun ni phag gi skye gnas dang /_khyi dang /_wa dang /_spre'u dang /_sbrul gdug pa 
[\[120b.2\]]dang /_bya rgod dang /_bya khwa ste/_'gro ba bdun po de dag shin tu mi gtsang ba za ba myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du e ma lha'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong bar 'gyur na/_de 
[\[120b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par de'i skyabs dang /_rten dang /_dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su yod snyam du bsams so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nub mo de'i srod la spos dang /_me tog 
[\[120b.4\]]dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs dang /_gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[120b.5\]]'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba bdun po dag bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu gsol to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag gsol ma thag tu/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste/_
[\[120b.6\]]des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas snang bar byas te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[120b.7\]]lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/_ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_sgrib pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar skye ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod de/_lha'i dbang po de lta bas na gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su 
[\[121a.2\]]sbyong ba thos ma thag tu sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs shin tu mang po 'jig par byed do/_/skye ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[121a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i 'jig rten nas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po de brjod ma thag tu tshe zad pa yang tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ba'i las thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[121a.4\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bsags pa bde bar reg pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la gzigs so/_/de dag de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba 
[\[121a.5\]]ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par 'gyur/_brjod pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul thams cad skems par 'gyur/_rnam 
[\[121a.6\]]par 'jig par 'gyur rnam par 'thor bar 'gyur/_rnam par sel bar 'gyur/_stongs par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_lha'i gnas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phye bar 'gyur 
[\[121a.7\]]ro/_/de gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs de bka' stsal du gsol/_sems can thams cad kyi srog la sman gdags pa bshad du 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba trai lo kya pra ti biShaSh+TI ya bud+d+hA ya te na maH_tad+ya thA/_o~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/_shod+ha ya shod+ha ya/_bi shod+ha ya/_
[\[121b.2\]]bi sho d+ha ya/_a sa ma sa man+ta/_a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/_ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/_u Sh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/_a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mA~M/_sarba ta thA ga ta su ga ta ba ra bA tsa na/_a mr-i ta/_a b+hi She kai ra/_ma hA mu dra/_man+ha pa daiHA ha ra 
[\[121b.3\]]A ha ra/_ma ma A yuHsan+d+ha ra Ni/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+h+ra ya bi sho d+ha ya/_ga ga na swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he/_uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya ba ri shud+d+he/_sa ha sra ra smis ny+tso di te/_sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki ni/_ShaT pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/_sarba te thA ga tA mA te da

[\[121b.5\]]ne mu ni/_ma hA mu ne/_bi mu ni bi mu ni/_ma hA bi mu ni/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_ma ma ti/_su ma ti/_ta thA tA/_b+hU ta ko Ti/_pa ri shud+d+he/_bi s+phu Ta/_bud+d+he shud+d+he/_he he/_dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_sma ra sma ra/_s+pha ra s+pha ra/_

[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/_mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_bi mo tsa ya bi me tsa ya/_sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/_bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_sa man+ta na mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/_sa man+ta ra smi pa ri shud+d+he/_sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_mu dre mu dre/_ma hA mu dre ma 
[\[122a.2\]]hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswA hA/_lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/_sdig pa dang /_las dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/_bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_ngan 
[\[122a.3\]]'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[122a.4\]]kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/_sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /_ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug

[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang /_gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad do/_/de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du

[\[122b.3\]]gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_brjed byed dang /_khyi dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbrul dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /_bya dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sbrang ma dang /_
[\[122b.4\]]sdig sbrul dang /_grog sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs su phyis mi skye bar shes par bya'o/_/gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni ma gtogs so/_/de rigs chen po 'di lta ste/_bram 
[\[122b.5\]]ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/_tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su 
[\[122b.6\]]dag pa chen po 'thob ste/_lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ste/_lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di ni de ltar mthu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_mthu stobs che ba/_dge zhing shis pa yin te/_lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor 
[\[122b.7\]]rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]go/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ni dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa shin tu mnyen pa shin tu sdug pa'o/_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin 
[\[123a.2\]]du sems can de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang /_bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[123a.3\]]'don pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/_sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang 
[\[123a.4\]]po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/_ri mthon po'am/_khang pa mthon po'am/_mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du gzhag par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge 
[\[123a.5\]]bsnyen ma'am/_de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag pa mthong ngam/_de dang de nye bar gnas par gyur na/_tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/_de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i 
[\[123a.6\]]dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin gyi ris thams 
[\[123a.7\]]cad du mi skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po sems can de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed cing 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_spos dang /_rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te/_gzungs 'di 
[\[123b.2\]]bzhag pa la thal mo sbyor ba'am phyag 'tshal ba'am/_bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/_lha'i dbang po sems can de ni sems can chen por rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/_/chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[123b.3\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/_/de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo nam langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang /_gos dang /_rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang /_bsti stang byas 
[\[123b.4\]]nas/_des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu 
[\[123b.5\]]rgyun mi 'chad par sems can de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/_/sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa gzo bar bgyid cing /_
[\[123b.6\]]byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /_bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par 
[\[123b.7\]]bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o/_/sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos tshes 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zla ba nya ba la khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/_des sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir nur nas nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[124a.2\]]dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrags par bya ste/_des ni de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang zhig nad chen 
[\[124a.3\]]pos btab ste sman pa rnams kyis bye brag phye ba de yang nad de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid de'i mngal gyi 
[\[124a.4\]]gnas kyi tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag gi 
[\[124a.5\]]don du gzungs yungs kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag dmyal ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnams 
[\[124a.6\]]su skyes bar gyur kyang rung ste/_de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'di nyi ma gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i 
[\[124a.7\]]mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston 
[\[124b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po thabs 'dis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gi 
[\[124b.3\]]'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig_/lha'i dbang bo des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe 
[\[124b.4\]]ring bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs che bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te/_de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di byin no/_/de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i 
[\[124b.5\]]bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/_ngan 'gro las ni yongs su thar/_bde 'gro'i lam la yang gnas tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/_a la la sangs rgyas/_a la la chos/_a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 
[\[124b.6\]]'jig rten du byung ste/_des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar bar gyur to zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[124b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhug te gtan la phab pa//[ {D985}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta ba trA nA 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ma a pa rA dzi tA bra t+yaM gi ra ma hA bid+yA rA dz+nyI/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo'o/_/dkon 
[\[125a.2\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i yul sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha'i 'dun sa na/_dge 
[\[125a.3\]]slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/_gtsug tor la rnam par gzigs pa 
[\[125a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gtsug tor gyi gseb nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byung ngo /_/na mo b+ha ga ba te uSh+NI ShA ya shud+d+he bi ra dze bi ma le swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[125a.5\]]gtsug tor thogs pa med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[125a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir 
[\[125a.7\]]mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong rnams la phyag 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'tshal lo/_/rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i drang srong dmod pa'i mtshon cha can dmod pas phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs ldan drag po dka' thub 
[\[125b.2\]]zlog ma'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das legs ldan dga' byed dbang phyug nag po chen po 
[\[125b.3\]]grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa kha che'i dur khrod chen po na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa dang lhan cig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 
[\[125b.4\]]gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das las kyi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[125b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das gti mug gi gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[125b.6\]]chags pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[125b.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa rgya mtsho 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[126a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog shin tu rgyas pa la 
[\[126a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma mchog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[126a.4\]]rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

[\[126a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[126a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[126b.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa dang ut+pa la'i dri'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[126b.3\]]lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/_/'thab pa 
[\[126b.4\]]dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/_'byung po dang gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa/_pha rol gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba las yongs su skyob pa/_sems can 
[\[126b.5\]]bcings pa thams cad thar bar byed pa/_sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gdon thams cad rnam par rlag par byed pa/_gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/_rgyu 
[\[126b.6\]]skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/_dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/_gza' chen po brgyad rnam par rlag par byed pa/_sdang ba dang drag po dang rmi lam ngan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par byed pa/_dug dang mtshon dang me dang chu las skyob par 
[\[126b.7\]]byed pa/_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol ba/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad kyi bar du yongs su skyob par byed pa ste/_gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/_/stobs chen gzi brjid chen mo ste/_/gtum po chen mo dkar mo che/_/
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]gsal ba chen mo stobs chen mo/_/'bar ba chen mo phreng ba che/_/gos dkar mo ni chen mo ste/_/'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/_/rdo rje phreng ba rnam bsgyings ma/_/pad+ma'i snang ba rdo rje'i mtshan/_/gzhan gyis mi thub 
[\[127a.2\]]phreng ba can/_/rdo rje khar bsnams 'joms pa mo/_/zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/_/gzugs zhi dkar mo chen mo ste/_/'bar ba dang ni gos dkar mo/_/'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/_/'chi med rdo rje lu gu rgyud/_/rdo rje 
[\[127a.3\]]gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/_/lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje dang /_/rig sngags gser gyi phreng ba can/_/le brgan rtsi dang rin chen mo/_/rnam par snang mdzad rigs kyi 'od/_/de bzhin gshegs rigs gtsug tor ma/_/rnam par bsgyings ma'i phreng 
[\[127a.4\]]ba dang /_/rdo rje gser 'od lta bu'i spyan/_/rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang /_/pad+ma'i spyan dpal sangs rgyas spyan/_/de bzhin rdo rje zla ba'i 'od/_/de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin ma dang /_/rdo rje phreng ba sgyu 'phrul che'i/_/lha mo dang ni gser 'od can/_/spyan 
[\[127a.5\]]mdzes ma dang dkar mo dang /_/pad+ma yi ni spyan can dang /_/rnam dul zhi ba'i sems dang ni/_/zla 'od bdag gi yon tan shes/_/phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag dang /_ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can thams cad la 
[\[127a.6\]]bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/_/o~M raM Shi ga Na pra shA sta sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M hrU~MHSh+To~M/_dzam+b+ha ni hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_s+t+wam+b+ha ni hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+ToM/_mo ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrU~MHSh+To~M/_pa ra bid+yA sa ma b+ha k+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drA~M hrIHSh+ToM/_sarba ba ra 
[\[127a.7\]]bid+yA ts+tsed na ka rI hU~M drIhrIHSh+To~M/_rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_sarba duSh+Ta nAM stam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa gra hA NAM bi d+h+wan+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To/_tsa tu rA shI tI nAM gra ha sa ha srA NAM bi d+hA n+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_aSh+Ta bi shatI nAM nak+Sha trA tA m+p+ra sA da na ka rI hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_aSh+TA naM ma hA gra 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]hA NA m+bi d+h+wa n+sa na ka rni hU~M drU~M hrIHSh+To~M/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar mo can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/_dbu stong mnga' ba chen 
[\[127b.2\]]mo/_spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/_mi phyed 'bar ba'i mtshan rtags can/_rdo rje lto ba yangs pa chen mo can/_sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/o~M swa stir+b+ha ban+tu ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twAM sh+tsa swA hA/_rgyal 
[\[127b.3\]]po yis 'jigs pa dang chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang /_me yis 'jigs pa dang /_chu yis 'jigs pa dang /_dug gis 'jigs pa dang /_mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang /_dgra yis 'jigs pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jigs 
[\[127b.4\]]pa dang /_mu ge yis 'jigs pa dang /_dgra bo yis 'jigs pa dang /_thog gis 'jigs pa dang /_dus ma yin par 'chi ba yis 'jigs pa dang /_sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_rgyal po'i chad 
[\[127b.5\]]pas 'jigs pa dang /_gcan gzan gtum pos 'jigs pa dang /_klu yis 'jigs pa dang /_glog gis 'jigs pa dang /_bye ma tsha mo'i 'jigs pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_
[\[127b.6\]]'go ba'i nad dang /_'khrug pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa dang /_gdon gyis 'jigs pa dang /_lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_srin po'i gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /_

[\[128a.1\]]bum gyi gdon dang /_srul po'i gdon dang /_lus srul po'i gdon dang /_skem byed kyi gdon dang /_smyo byed kyi gdon dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon dang /_brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_gnon po'i gdon dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i

[\[128a.3\]]dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang /_lus mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon dang /_ka Tang ka Ta'i tshogs can gyi gdon dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_mdangs 'phrog pa dang /_mngal za ba dang /_khrag 'thung ba dang /_zhag za ba dang /_sha za ba

[\[128a.6\]]ba dang /_nor 'phrog pa dang /_sems 'phrog pa rnams dang /_de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris 
[\[128a.7\]]gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/brgya byin 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rigs sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/phyugs bdag chen po dang drag pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad 
[\[128b.2\]]do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/nag po chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/mi'i thod pa can 
[\[128b.3\]]gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/ri khrod pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/g.yung pos byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab 
[\[128b.4\]]bo/_/skar mda' gdong gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/rdo rje gzhon nu mas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/gshin rje gshed kyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral 
[\[128b.5\]]gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/gshin rje'i pho nyas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/klu ma rungs pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/me'i las kyis byas pa'i 
[\[128b.6\]]rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/log 'dren gyis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/gzhon nus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[128b.7\]]po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/nam mkha' lding yang dag pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]phur bus gdab po/_/rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang grub par byed pa dang don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/b+h+r-ing gi ri ti dang /_dga' byed dbang phyug dang 
[\[129a.2\]]smin drug gi bu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab bo/_/
[\[129a.3\]]dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byas pa'i rig sngags ral gris gcad do/_/rdo rje phur bus gdab po/_/'dod chags dang bral bas byas ba'i rig sngags

[\[129b.1\]]'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_sdang ba dang /_rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba'am/_mi mdza' ba'am/_mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du

[\[132b.1\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nyid dang /_sha za nyid dang /_srul po nyid dang /_lus srul po nyid dang /_mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan

[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]zlog pa chen mo 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_ljongs sam/_grong rdal lam/_dur khrod dam/_
