[\[133a.3\]]dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /_klu'i rgyal po dungaskyong dang /_klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_de dag 
[\[133a.4\]]dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/_/dus dus su glog 'byin to/_/dus dus su 'brug sgrogs so/_/nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M hU~M Sh+To~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha ma ma sa pa 
[\[133a.5\]]ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAsh+tsa swA hA/_oM hU~M Sh+To~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba duSh+TAn rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa ba ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwAM sh+tsa badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M sarba ta thA gtoSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/_o~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_khA da khA da/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/d+ha ra d+ha ri/_bi da ra bi da ra/_
[\[133a.6\]]ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twAM sh+tsa swA hA/_o~M sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta ba tre hU~M phaT swA hA/_hU~M ra k+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twAM sh+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a na le/_a na le/_a tsa le/_a tsa 
[\[133a.7\]]le/_kha sa me kha sa me/_bI re bI re/_bai ra bai ra/_sau me sau me sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ShA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga to Shi Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsi t+tA na hU~M phaT swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/_/
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[133b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdzogs so//_//
[\[133b.3\]{D986}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+nyASha si tA ta ba tra a ba rA dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon 
[\[133b.4\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[133b.5\]]rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir 
[\[133b.6\]]mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig 
[\[133b.7\]]sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[134a.2\]]pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal 
[\[134a.3\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i 
[\[134a.4\]]sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[134a.5\]]rgyas sman gyi bla baiDAr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[134a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[134a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ut+pa la'i bsung gi tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba

[\[135a.1\]]b+ha k+Sha Na karI hU~M drU~M/_sarba duSh+TA NAM g+tam+b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_sarba yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa gra hA NI bi d+h+wa n+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_tsa tu rA shi tI nAM gra ha sa ha swA NI bi d+h+wan+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_aSh+Ta biM ga tI nAM na k+Sha trA NAM pra sA da na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_aSh+Ta NAM ma hA gra ha DAM bid+h+wan+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/_rak+Sha ra ka nAM/_/

[\[136b.1\]]dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/_ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/_badzra shr-ing kha lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/_ma hA kA lA ya ma tr-i ga Na na ma skr-i tA ya b+h+yaHphaT/_biSh+Na bI ye phaT/_brah+ma NI ye phaT/_a g+ni ye phaT/_ma hA kA lI ye phaT/_kA la daN+DI ye phaT/_rau drI ye phaT/_kau ma

[\[137b.5\]]mi tshugs/_dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/_byad kyis mi tshugs/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[137b.6\]]brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed par byed de/_de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang /_dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/nam du yang gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul 
[\[137b.7\]]po dang /_lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/_/mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog ma chen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/_/thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/_/mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/_/bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang 
[\[138a.2\]]bsen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/_/smyang ba ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138a.3\]]pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma chen po 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/_tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 
[\[138a.4\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_gnag nad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i 
[\[138a.5\]]gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/_rim gro cher byas te/_mchod pa chen po byas la/_grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[138a.6\]]su gzugs so/_/gzhan gyis ma thub ma phyir zlog ma chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te/_btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yams kyi nad dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab 
[\[138a.7\]]tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_o~M Sh+To~M ban+h+ra ban+d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/_o~M hU~M Sh+To~M ban+d+ha ban+d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra bA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M sarba ta thA ga to Sh+Ni Sha a na ba le ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/_o~M hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/da ra da ra/_bi da ra bi da ra/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_hU~M hU~M 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]phaT phaT swA hA/_o~M sarba ta thA ga to Sh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a na le a na le/_kha sa me kha sa me/_bai ra bai ra/_sau me sau me/_sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+DA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/_hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/_sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal po rnams 
[\[138b.2\]]kyis kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/_/'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D987}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[138b.3\]]shrI de bi uSh+NA Sha la lA tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_dpal lha mo gtsug tor rol pa'i tan+t+ra/_dpal rang byung gi lha mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ro langs nag mo'i gdon dang /_sha za nag mo'i gdon dang /_smyo byed nag mo'i gdon dang /_sgrib byed nag mo'i gdon dang /_phung byed nag 
[\[138b.4\]]mo'i gdon dang /_drang srong nag mo'i gdon dang /_srin mo nag mo'i gdon dang /_rlung lha nag mo'i gdon dang /_dbang ldan nag mo'i gdon dang /_nam gru nag mo'i gdon dang /_grul bum nag mo'i gdon dang /_klu mo nag mo'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin nag mo'i gdon dang /_
[\[138b.5\]]nam gru skyong byed ro langs nag mo'i gdon dang /_nam gru chen mo phung byed seng ge'i gdong gi gdon dang /_nam gru chen mo mkha' 'gro khyung gshog ma'i gdon dang /_nam gru chen mo lag gcig nyab pa'i gdon dang /_nam gru chen mo so gcig mig gcig ma'i gdon 
[\[138b.6\]]dang /_nam gru chen mo bong zhon ma'i gdon nyid yin pas sprul pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma nyid do/_/yang sprul gur bdag bcu gsum ni thugs kyi sprul pa chen mo ni gur gcig la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur gnyis la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur gsum la byed pa'i gdon 
[\[138b.7\]]dang /_gur bzhi la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur lnga la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur drug la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur bdun la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur brgyad la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur dgu la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur bcu la dbang 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur bcu gcig la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur bcu gnyis la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang /_gur bcu gsum la dbang byed ba'i gdon no/_/yang sprul thugs kyi sprul ba yis rims nad la dbang byed pa dang /_'khrug pa la 
[\[139a.2\]]dbang byed pa dang /_bdud kyi dmag dpung thams cad la dbang byed pa dang /_nad dang rims kyi dbang sgyur ma/_mgo nad la dbang byed pa dang /_kha nad la dbang byed pa dang /_snying nad la dbang byed pa dang /_
[\[139a.3\]]lkog nad la dbang byed pa dang /_lha gor na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_brlan ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_rje ngar na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_lhog pa'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_skem pa'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_chu so'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_shu ba'i 
[\[139a.4\]]nad la dbang byed pa dang /_yan lag na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /_'brum bu phra mo la dbang byed pa dang /_bas bldags la dbang byed pa dang /_me dpal la dbang byed pa dang /_lhog pa la dbang byed pa dang /_dbyig dug la dbang byed pa dang /_dug nad la 
[\[139a.5\]]dbang byed pa dang /_rgyu gzer la dbang byed pa dang /_pho log la dbang byed pa dang /_gnyan po la dbang byed pa dang /_skya rims klad gzer gyi nad la sogs te/_nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dag la dbang byed pa ni e ka dza TI'i sprul pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[139a.6\]]thams cad la ni rig sngags bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi rig sngags kyis gcad do/_/drag po zlog pa'i phur bus gdab po/_/gnod byed kyi gdon du gyur pa ni ro langs ma srin mo nag mos grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad 
[\[139a.7\]]do/_/phur bus gdab bo/_/gnod byed kyi gdon dang /_smyo byed rnga zhon gyi gdon dang /_grong rgyun la sogs pa'i gdon rnams ni smyo byed gdon du za ba yin pas na shugs sgrol ma'i rig sngags kyis gcad do/_/rig sngags 'chang gi phur bus gdab po/_/o~M a 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ka ra pra ma ni b+h+yaHphaT/_sha tu ma ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT/_bud med nag mor mngon pa dang /_/rnal 'byor spyan rtul byed pa ni/_/sgrol byed nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_/legs ldan dka' thub kyi rig sngags kyis gcad do/_/shugs sgrol ma dbang phyug gtso mo'i phur 
[\[139b.2\]]bus gdab po/_/sarba pra ma ni b+h+yaHphaT/_ro ti ba~M ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT/_skya rims klad pa na ba dang /_/rkang lag 'khol ba'i nad byung na 'byung po nag po'i gdon yin pas dpal chen dbang gi rig sngags kyis gcad do/_/shugs sgrol chen mo'i phur bus gdab po/_/dza 
[\[139b.3\]]lar ye b+h+yaHphaT/_bram ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/_lci zhing nad byung 'thibs pa dang /_/gnyid bro zhing sems la mi dran pa'i nad byung na bud med nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_rgyal bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/sbrang rtsir byed pa'i phur bus gdab/_/ru tra ya na byi sha b+h+yaHphaT/_
[\[139b.4\]]ka ba la ki li ki la ya phaT/_byas dgur ye nas mi btub cing /_/las byas bsam pa mi 'grub pa ni drang srong gzi can gyi gdon yin pas/_thod pa can gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dge sbyong gcer bu'i phur bus gdab/_tsa ya ma me b+h+yaHphaT/_ro ti ba ma ki li ki la ya hU~M 
[\[139b.5\]]drU~M/_rnal 'byor sems la yeng yeng po seng seng phya phya byed pa'i nad byung na srin mo nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_phyag na rdo rje'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dbang ldan mgon po'i phur bus gdab/_/rak+Sha ya ni b+h+yaHphaT/_du ni rAk+Sha ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/_sems la mi dga' 
[\[139b.6\]]phya phya'o/_/rlung 'phyo'i thabs su na ba ni rlung lha nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_ma mo bdun gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_sring mo bzhi'i phur bus gdab/_/ha sa ya ni ra re b+h+yaHphaT/_du ya ka sa ya ni ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/_khro ba dang ni 'tshig pa dang /_/smra 'dod dang ni 'tshig 
[\[139b.7\]]'dre dang /_/rkang lag bya ba tsag mang po'i nad byung na dbang ldan nag po'i gdon yin pas/_dbang ldan gtso bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_rigs kyi khro bo'i phur bus gdab/_/de ba lo yA b+h+yaHphaT/_de ba ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/_nam phyed gung la gnyid med dang /_/cho 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'phrul chen po 'byung ba dang /_/bung bu phag gi gzugs ston pa ni nam gru nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_dpal chen gtso bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/rigs kyi khro bo'i phur bus gdab/_/de ba ki li ki la A b+h+yaHphaT/_de ba dra ti 
[\[140a.2\]]ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/_rkang lag khol zhing na ba dang /_/yi ga bcings nas skyug bro ba'i nad byung na ya ma nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_'jam dpal gshin rje'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/mi pham mdzes pa'i phur bus gdab/_/ya ma rA dza hriH
[\[140a.3\]]Sh+Ti bi kri kri nad ma hA hU~M drU~M/_tsa ya ra~M ba ni ki li ki la ya b+h+yaHphaT/_gzhogs skams pa dang rengs pa dang /_/zha grum sha lus sngo la 'jam/_/mig mdog gnag cing rkong ba ni/_/shu ba mdze'i cho 'phrul ni klu mo nag mo'i gdon yin pas/_bya khyung he'i 
[\[140a.4\]]rig sngags kyis gcad/_/drang srong rgad po'i phur bus gdab/_/nA ga le ya hU~M drU~M/_tsa ya ka b+h+yaHphaT/_sems la yeng yeng seng seng po ro stod mnan pa snyam byed pa dang /_snyang snyong byed pa'i nad byung na/_/kha so 'brul ba snyam byed na gnod sbyin 
[\[140a.5\]]nag po'i gdon yin pas/_/rnam thos sras kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/sprul byed ma'i phur bus gdab/_/ti ti ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/_ku ku rA dza ye hU~M drU~M/_shu ba 'brum bu na ba dang /_/sha lus g.ya' ba'i nad byung na nam gru skyong byed ro langs nag mo'i 
[\[140a.6\]]gdon yin pas/_gshin rje thogs med kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/'dod pa dmar mo'i phur bus gdab/_/ba ren he ya hU~M drU~M/_ku ma la gur dang b+h+yaHphaT/_khrag tu na zhing lci ba dang /_/mig rgyang ring du mi mthong ba dang /_/sems la yeng yeng 
[\[140a.7\]]seng seng po'i nad byung na nam gru khyung gshog ma'i gdon yin pas/_dpal chen dbang gi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/khro bo hU~M chen 'bar ba'i phur bus gdab/_/du ya ku la hU~M phaT/_ma ma kha du ye b+h+yaHphaT/_g.yas kyi lag pa zha ba dang /_/rtsib mar 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]gzer zhing na ba ni lag gcig nyab pa'i gdon yin pas/_dbyings kyi khro bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dbang mo dmar mo'i phur bus gdab/_/ma ma ri ha ya hU~M drU~M/_ka pa la ya he b+h+yaHphaT/_myos shing khrag tu bshal ba dang /_/mig 
[\[140b.2\]]sngar sna tshogs gzugs 'ong ba ni so gcig mig gcig ma'i gdon yin pas/_legs ldan phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab/_/rAk+Sha se hU~M drU~M/_rAk+Sha la~M ke la ye b+h+yaHphaT/_ma bdud kyi gdon bcu 
[\[140b.3\]]gnyis la/_/dar dkar gur gyi nang shed na/_/bud med mnga' bdag cho 'phrul ni/_/mi bzang dkar mo byung ba ni/_/gser dang g.yus brgyan dbang mo che/_/ye shes kun du bzang mo'i gdon/_/dus ngan char pa 'khrug pa dang /_/sad dang ser ba'i 
[\[140b.4\]]cho 'phrul te/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phur bus gdab/_ni d+harma d+hA tu sa ma ya hU~M drU~M/_ku ma la tsa g.ye sa ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/_g.yu gur gnyis la dbang byed ma/_/mthing ka chen mo dbang mo che/_/ba lang 
[\[140b.5\]]dre rta zhon pa dang /_/'jig rten yo ga phung bar byed/_/dbang byed chen mo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/khyab pa chen mo'i phur bus gdab/_a ra li b+h+yaHphaT/_ra du hU~M drU~M/_byi ru'i gur gsum dbang byed ma/_/gur nang snying gi mnga' bdag ste/_/gser gur mchod 
[\[140b.6\]]pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab/_/tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/_ba phA ma hU~M drU~M/_gser gur bzhi la dbang byed ma/_/lha gor ba dang lhog nad kun gyi bdag_/'jam dpal ro tan gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/mi pham mdzes 
[\[140b.7\]]pa'i phur bus gdab/_/ro ro ba~M hU~M drU~M/_ku ku ye b+h+yaHphaT/_mthing nag gi gur lnga la dbang byed ma/_/gzer ma kha ral bud med yin/_/chu so'i nad dang lkog nad dang /_/khrag nad dang ni shu ba'i nang /_/yam rol pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/mi pham rol ba'i 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]phur bus gdab/_ya go le hU~M drU~M/_pra do pra ye b+h+yaHphaT/_bsam med zhing chen gyi gur drug la dbang byed ma/_/lha mo nyid kyi nad lags te/_/kha nas khrag tu skyug pa dang /_/lus la tsha ba skyes pa dang /_/yan lag 'khongs par byed 
[\[141a.2\]]pa'o/_/ya ma thugs rje'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/yam chags byed kyi phur bus gdab/_/tsa ga ya ba~M b+h+yaHphaT/_gur la de hU~M drU~M/_re lde'i gur bdun pa'i nang shed na/_/khram la 'debs pa'i ma mo ste/_/kha nas khrag nad 'bebs pa dang /_/lus la tsha ba'i me chen 
[\[141a.3\]]sbar ba dang /_/zangs gri thogs pa'i las byed de/_/khyung chen 'bar ba'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/dug chen tshar gcod kyi phur bus gdab/_/da he ya a hU~M drU~M/_me tsa ye b+h+yaHphaT/_glang po che'i gur brgyad pa'i nang shed na/_/bong bu dre'u zhon pa'i bud med de/_/lhog pa glo 
[\[141a.4\]]dang rkang pa nad kyi bdag_/gshin rje thugs kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/'bar ma dbang gi phur bus gdab/_/tsa kra ki li ki la ye b+h+yaHphaT/_A ko la~M hU~M drU~M/_bse gur khra bo dgu'i nang shed na/_/rnga bran sman gyi gtso mo dgus/_/ser ba sad dang 'gong nad dang /_/phung 
[\[141a.5\]]byed khang ba rdib pa dang /_/lbo zhing sna thabs sun pa ni nag po dgu'i nad yin pas/_dbyings kyi gtso mo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/_/'khor ba rab 'joms kyi phur bus gdab/_/ku ma la ya hU~M drU~M/_sha ma ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/_mthing nag gi gur bcu phub pa'i nang shed na/_/
[\[141a.6\]]gur la dbang ba bcu gnas pa/_/mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang /_/dug sbyor ma dang 'khrug byed dang /_/gri thabs su gsod par byed pa ni khro bo grags 'dzin gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_khyab pa ma'i phur bus gdab/_/a ko sha me rar hU~M drU~M/_pra du le b+h+yaHphaT/_gsang ba pad+ma 
[\[141a.7\]]gur bcu gcig pa'i nang shed na/_/bcu gcig dbang gi gur bdag mo/_/khyab bdal chen mo dbang gi sku/_/'jig rten du char sgo gza' yis 'gegs shing /_char pa 'bebs su mi ster ba ni dpal chen dbyings kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/_/mdzes ma 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]sa 'dzin ma'i phur bus gdab/_/a ko mu na b+h+yaHphaT/_tsa ye ma hU~M drU~M/_ga phur shel gyi gur bcu gnyis pa'i nang shed na/_/mu kha le ma cig dbyings kyi yum/_/bcu gnyis bcu bzhi khyod la rdzogs/_/'gro ba yongs la sman slad du/_/bdud rtsi'i 
[\[141b.2\]]bcud kyi nang na bzhugs/_/phyag na rig pa thugs kyi sdong bu bsnams/_/srid pa thams cad dus gcig gsal/_/gsal 'bar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/bdud bzhi shin+taM ku ru swA hA/_ri tshe 'gong g.yag shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_pho bdud bcu 
[\[141b.3\]]gnyis shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_skos rje drang dkar shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_gnam the dkar po shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_bar the khra bo shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_sa the nag po shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_byang shar mtshams 
[\[141b.4\]]kyi gdon btsan 'gong dmar po shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/_yams dang nad kyi bdag mo shin+taM ku ru swA hA/_sman dang yul sa shin+ti ku ru swa hA/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i gtsug tor phan yon rtsa ba dang bcas pa gdon zlog pa'i mdo'i gzungs 'di ni 
[\[141b.5\]]lan gsum du dag par bklags te/_las dka' ba la dmod btsugs na ji ltar bsams pa ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bse phor gyi nang du gtor ma lnga byas la/_cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas na/_ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[141b.6\]]dpal lha mo gtsug tor gyis gdon zlog pa 'di ni mtshan mar bzung ste/_yang dang yang du bton zhing cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas te/_gtor ma chu chen po'am/_ri mthon po la bskyal na/_'khrug pa chen po byed na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/drag 
[\[141b.7\]]po'i las byed na dgra bo'i snying la gtad de gur bcu gnyis kyi bdag mo la gtad na dgra phung zhing rlag par 'gyur ro/_/dpal lha mo gtsug tor rol pa'i tan+t+ra rdzogs so//_//
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]{D988}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mA rI tsI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig 
[\[142a.2\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[142a.3\]]te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste/_de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]med/_gzung du med/_bcing du med/_dgag tu med/_brgal 
[\[142a.4\]]du med/_rmongs par byar med/_chad pas gcad du med/_mgo breg tu med/_gzhur med/_tshig par byar med/_dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o/_/dge slong dag gang gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de yang bltar med/_gzung du med/_bcing 
[\[142a.5\]]du med/_dgag tu med/_brgal du med/_rmongs par byar med/_chad pas gcad du med/_mgo breg tu med/_gzhur med/_tshig par byar med/_de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar bdag gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can gyi ming shes 
[\[142a.6\]]kyis bdag kyang bltar med par gyur cig_/gzung du med par gyur cig_/bcing du med par gyur cig_/dgag tu med par gyur cig_/brgal du med par gyur cig_/rmongs par byar med par gyur cig_/chad pas gcad du med par gyur cig_/mgo 
[\[142a.7\]]breg tu med par gyur cig_/gzhur med par gyur cig_/tshig par byar med par gyur cig_/dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_oM pa tA kra ma si/_ba rA kra ma si/_u da ya ma si/_nai 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]ra ma si/_ar+k+ka ma si/_mar+k+ka ma si/_ur ma ma si/_pha na ma si/_gul ma ma si/_tsI ba ra ma si/_ma hA tsI bar ma si/_an+ta rad+haM na ma si swA hA/_oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig_/bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig_/bdag skye 
[\[142b.2\]]po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag seng ge'i 
[\[142b.3\]]'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag stag gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag chu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig_/bdag dug gri 'jigs pa las skyobs 
[\[142b.4\]]shig_/bdag phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad las skyobs shig_/'khrugs pa dang /_ma 'khrugs pa dang /_nyams pa dang /_ma nyams pa thams cad du yang bdag seng ge las srungs shig_/bdag stag las srungs shig_/bdag klu las 
[\[142b.5\]]srungs shig_/bdag sbrul las srungs shig swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrugs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM A lo/_tA lo/_kA lo/_sats+tsha lo sa ma 
[\[142b.6\]]ba mUr d+ti Ti rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba dang /_'jigs pa dang /_nad thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mo 'od zer can gyi snying po brjod par bya ste/_tad+ya thA/_oM bat+tA li/_pa 
[\[142b.7\]]dA li/_ba rA li/_pA rA ha mu khi/_sarba duSh+TA/_pra duSh+TA nAM/_tsak+Shurmu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ban+d+ha mu khaM/_dzaM b+ha ya/_staM b+ha ya/_mo ha ya swA hA/_oM mA rI ts+yi swA hA/_oM ba rA li/_ba dA li/_bat+tA lI/_bA rA tra mu khi/_sarba duSh+TA nAM pra duSh+TA nAM/_tsak+Shurmu 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas 
[\[143a.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta a mo g+ha badzra dang /_lo ts+tsha ba dge slong ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o//_//
[\[143a.3\]{D989}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsun+da de bI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[143a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 
[\[143a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig_/na maHsa b+tA nI/_saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ke TI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsa le tsu le/_tsun+de swA hA/_brtson 'grus chen mo thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/_stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa che ba/_
[\[143a.6\]]phyag na ral gri dang /_dgra sta dang /_lcags kyu dang /_zhags pa bsnams pa/_khro mo chen mo/_khro mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/_drag po'i gzugs can ma/_zhal ras mtha' yas ma/_phyag stong mnga' ma/_ma pham ma/_gzhan gyis mi 
[\[143a.7\]]thub ma/_don yod ma/_gdul bar dka' ma/_mig stong ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/_lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/_rdo rje sen mo can/_rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/_rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]rdo rje'i sku can ma/_rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/_rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/_drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/_sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma/_oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de/_d+h+raM d+h+ruM/_krUM krUM/_mrUM mrUM/_
[\[143b.2\]]srUM srUM/_rUM rUM/_A be sha ya/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_gr-ih+NA pa ya/_gr-ih+NA ba ya/_ha ra ha ra/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_sa ra sa ra/_ma ra ma ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_pa tsa pa tsa/_da ha da ha/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_sdang ba'i gdon dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag 
[\[143b.3\]]bzhi pa dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_'byung po dang /_ro langs dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_mngal las skyes pa dang /_las las skyes pa dang /_

[\[143b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i gzung pa rdzogs so//[ {D990}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dzaM gu li nA ma bid+yA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[143b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i tshe nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/_gangs kyi ri yi byang ngos na/_/spos ngad sdang ba'i ri bo la/_/ri rgyal de yi sul gnas tshe/_/gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/_/e ne ya yi pags gyon la/_/sbrul 
[\[144a.2\]]gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can/_/gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/_/mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/_/dug gi me tog rnams za zhing /_/ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung /_/nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug_/bu khyod tshur shog nga las nyon/_/nga la dug 
[\[144a.3\]]sel ces bya ba/_/dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod/_/dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/_/nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur/_/tad+ya thA/_oM i li mit+te/_ti li mit+te/_i li ti li mit+te/_dum+be/_dum+bA li ye/_dusme/_dusma li ye/_ta ra ke/_ta 
[\[144a.4\]]kar Ne/_ma rma/_marme ra Ne/_kash+mI ri/_ka shrIr mug te/_ag+he a g+haNe/_ag+Na na g+ha Ne/_i lI a lI e/_a khA/_I e/_a byA/_i e/_shwe te/_sha ta/_duN+De/_a nu rak+te swA hA/_dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni 
[\[144a.5\]]sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/_sus rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o/_/de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs so/_/sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na de'i mgo shing ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/
[\[144a.6\]]gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro/_/tad+ya thA/_i la la/_tsi la lI/_tsakra bak+ko/_kau Da/_kau De Di/_ku ru ta/_ku ru Da ti/_po DA ti/_bu ru dA/_/pu ru de ti/_mo De ti/_

[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]le/_mA tA le/_ha le ha le/_ha la ha la/_ha la le/_i la le/_ki pa tsa le/_mi la le/_taN+Di taN+Di/_ta Ta ta Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_phaT Ta phaT Ta/_ha ra bi shwa swA hA/_dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang

[\[144b.5\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb 
[\[144b.6\]]la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[144b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas la bka' stsal pa/_legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par 'dod pa des/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]gshegs pa rnams mthong ngo /_/thos so/_/myong ngo /_/gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_myong ba des/_gzungs thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub

[\[145a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin par mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/_mtshan nyid du mi rtog_/yongs

[\[145a.6\]]gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing /_kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/_don dang tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/yongs

[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/_/rigs pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o/_/legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/_/mi 'chang ngo /_/mi 'grol lo/_/

[\[145b.3\]]gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo/_/tad+ya thA/_ku Ti ku Ti/_ku tsa la/_e lA i mi ri to/_ko thA la/_i re ri/_i mi ri Ni/_legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi

[\[145b.5\]]yum mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'das pa'i don la mi gnas ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas 
[\[145b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang /_khong du chud par byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa 
[\[145b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/_/legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/_sangs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas/_bsnyen bkur byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do snyam du shes par bya'o/_/su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig gang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 
[\[146a.2\]]'gyur te/_shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang /_gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang /_dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang /_thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i 
[\[146a.3\]]chan dang 'o mar sbags te bza'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[146a.4\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi 'am ci 'am/_lto 'phye chen po 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_grul bum mam/_sha za 'am/_mi 'am/_mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' 
[\[146a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/_rtag tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang /_yangs pa chen po dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_yongs su dga' ldan dang /_ri dben pa la gnas pa dang /_
[\[146a.6\]]gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/_dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/_dgon par [(]da [,]de [)]la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/_de la mi 'jigs pa 
[\[146a.7\]]sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing /_de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur 
[\[146b.2\]]cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D992}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ya sho ba tI d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[146b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/_du khe muk+ta su saM pan+ne/_ma hA saM pan+ne/_saM pat+ti/_ma hA saM pat+ti/_ka se ma hA ka 
[\[146b.4\]]se/_kats+tsha dz+wa ra muk+te si swA hA/_skud pa'am chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_mi li mi li/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_Ar+yA 
[\[146b.5\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA swA hA/_gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'am/_skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du sngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_
[\[146b.6\]]ma hA sa twa ya/_tad+ya thA/_ki li ki li/_tsi li tsi li/_ni gi le swA hA/_'bru mar la lan gsum sngags te bskus na skran 'tsho'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sa re sa re/_bi 
[\[146b.7\]]sa re bi sa re/_sa ra nA sha ni swA hA/_shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma A r+yA ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ni si re ni si re/_ka la ni mi re/_ka la ri tsi rI/_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa tsi le swA hA/_wa ba dang /_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_lce kyi ba na ba dang /_gdon nad thams cad la 'jim pa la lan gsum du sngags te bskus na phan no/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_badzra pA Ni d+h+ya ma/_oM oM 
[\[147a.2\]]krAr pra b+ha be/_b+ha ga ba ti bud+d+he/_bra ti bud+d+he/_shud+d+he/_shAn+ti ki ri/_ha na ha na ma ma pA pa maM/_da ha da ha/_ma ma pA pa daM/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma ma pA pa kaM/_oM o De/_gra sa gra sa/_ri te De ri te De/_shIn+taM ka rI ya swA hA/_shub+ha ka rI ya swA hA/_k+She ma ka rI ya swA hA/_
[\[147a.3\]]rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/_/sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/_/zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i 
[\[147a.4\]]skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D993}]/_/bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can 
[\[147a.5\]]zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar tshes la dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te/_de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/_des bdag la smras pa/_bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig_/
[\[147a.6\]]klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/_sbrul gyi dug med bar byed g.yog rnams dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za rnams dang /_sems can stobs po che rnams dang /_grul bum rnams dang /_sems can phra mo rnams dang /_
[\[147a.7\]]phra men pha dang /_phra men ma dang /_chu srin dang /_stag dang /_grul bum dang /_rwa can dang /_mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po aM gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ste/_sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed do/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya aM gu li/_tad+ya thA/_oM/_klu 'am/_klu mo 'am/_sbrul lam/_sbrul mo 'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo 'am/_'byung po 'am/_

[\[147b.3\]]ra ma ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_ma Ta ma Ta/_mo ta ya mo ta ya/_shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/_la g+hu lag+hu/_A na ya A na ya/_ng+ha ra d+ha ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/_g+hur+Na ya g+hur+Na ya/_dpag tshad stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par

[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]thams cad zlog shig_/pha pham pha rol pham par mdzod cig swA hA/_bklags pas 'grub pa aM gu li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o/_/tad+ya thA/_oM d+hu ne d+hu ne/_d+hu ni d+hu ni/_sat+ya tA T+Ta hA si ni d+hu d+hu ni/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos

[\[148a.6\]]ke tsi da u ba d+Na bAHye ke tsid u pA yA sA/_ye ke tsid a b+h+yA d+mi kA b+ha yA/_ye ke tsi da u pa sar+g+ga u pa sar+g+ga saM bad d+ha bA/_uh+ba d+yan+te/_sarbA ni tA ni/_sarba sta/_sarbi ta bA la tA e bot+ba d+yan+te/_na baN+Di ta taH/_ta da ne nas t+ye nas t+ya pa tsa ne nas t+ya pA ba ke na/_

[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]yA bad bi Sha d+hu Sha NaM ku ru/_ag+ni pa ri hA raM ku ru/_u da ka pa ri hA raM ku ru/_ka khorda ts+tshe da naM ku ru/_sI mA ban+d+haM ku ru/_d+ha ra NI pan+d+haM ku ru/_tad+ya thA/_a mi te a mi te/_a mi tod+d+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_A shwa ste/_A shwa stAM ge_/mA ma ra mA

[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/_/stag gis 'jigs pa la dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o/_/chu srin gyis 'jigs pa la mda' dang pha gu la sngags na sbrul dang /_byi ba dang /_sdig

[\[149b.1\]]'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /_gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /_'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang /_khong du gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_'go ba dang 'brel ba gang dag ci yang rung ba de

[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]tu zhi bar byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/_nga yang da ltar 'chad pa zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_a brte a brte/_bi brte pi brte/_b+ha ga ma shud+d+he/_pra b+hA swa re tA ra Ne/_uk+kha le/_muk+kha le/_sarba d+ha rmA bA shi

[\[150a.3\]]ga te sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ta ye/_prA pa te dz+yosna ka ra a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne bi shud+d+he ba ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[150a.5\]]ma gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'phags ma bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod 
[\[150a.6\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_bdud dang /_gshin rje dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig dmar dang /_gza' lhag dang /_phur bu dang /_
