[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[150b.2\]]dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[150b.3\]]dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang /_
[\[150b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal 
[\[150b.5\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar ba la chos ston te/_bkod pa chen po'i rgyan yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/_thog 
[\[150b.6\]]mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dga'/_yongs su byang ba'i chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de rnams la 
[\[150b.7\]]bltas nas langs te/_bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/_snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas pas 'khor de rnams la bltas 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]te/_rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gza' rnams ni gtum zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can drag cing drag pa'i gzugs can khro zhing khro ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams 
[\[151a.2\]]la rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod par bgyid la mdangs 'phrog par bgyid de/_kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog par bgyid/_kha cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid/_sems can tshe ring po kha cig ni tshe thung bar bgyid/_de ltar sems can rnams la gnod pas 'tshe 
[\[151a.3\]]bar bgyid pas na/_de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du 
[\[151a.4\]]snying rje bskyed nas gsang ba chen po shin tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so/_/de dag ngas bshad kyis nyon la legs par rab tu zung la yid la gyis shig_/gza' rnams gtum pa'i gzugs la shin tu khro zhing 'jigs 
[\[151a.5\]]pa rnams la mchod pa bzang po mchod yon dang bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba las ches gsang ba ngas bshad par bya'o/_/de dag mchod pas mchod 'gyur zhing /_/gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/_/gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang /_/ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[151a.6\]]ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni lha min dang /_/mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang /_/gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang /_/srul po dang ni mi rnams dang /_/drag po gzi brjid chen po dag_/khros pa zhi bar byed pa yi/_/gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag_/rim 
[\[151a.7\]]pa bzhin du bshad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba phyung nas gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de nyid kyi skad cig nyid la nyi ma la sogs pa'i 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gza' rnams langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag rnams la sman yon btags par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 
[\[151b.2\]]rnam grangs bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag rnams tshogs nas yo byad du gyur par byed pa'i chos smra ba rnams la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_rim gro dang chad pa bzlog 
[\[151b.3\]]pa dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bar 'gyur ba rnams bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[151b.4\]]sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi mchod pa dang gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/_ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas phyogs rnams su dri'i dkyil 'khor byas la pad+ma sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du byas pa'i 'dab ma bris te/_lte ba yang sor bcu 
[\[151b.5\]]gnyis pa la sgo bzhis mdzes pa rim pa bzhin du byas pa la pad+ma rgyas pa'i steng du lha nyi ma bsam par bya ba ni lus gzi brjid kyi phung po li khri nye bar 'bar ba lta bu nyi ma stong dang mtshungs ba'i 'od zer can no/_/oM mai g+holkA ya swA hA/_shar du zla ba dkar bo/_
[\[151b.6\]]oM shi tAM sha be swA hA/_me'i mtshams su mig dmar po/_oM rak+tAM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/_gshin rje'i phyogs su rgyal rigs gza' lhag mdog ser po/_oM bu d+hA ya swA hA/_bden bral du phur bu dmar ser/_oM braM ha spa ha ye swA hA/_nub kyi 
[\[151b.7\]]phyogs su ba ba sangs dkar po/_oM a su rot+ta mA ya swA hA/_rlung du spen pa mig sman ltar shin tu gnag pa/_oM kr-iSh+Na war+N+N+la ya swA hA/_lus ngan po'i phyogs su sgra gcan dmar nag_/oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/_dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]dud sprin gyi mdog lta bu'i mjug [{]rings[,]ring[}]/_oM dz+yo ti ke ta be swA hA/_shar gyi sgor rje btsun sangs rgyas/_lho sgor phyag na rdo rje/_nub sgor 'jig rten mgon po/_byang gi sgor 'jam dpal lo/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi byang shar du 
[\[152a.2\]]gza' thams cad do/_/shar lho'i mtshams su khyim rnams dang rgyu skar rnams so/_/lho nub tu gnod pa thams cad do/_/nub byang du rje btsun rig pa chen mo'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi shar du yul 'khor srung /_lhor 'phags skyes po/_nub tu 
[\[152a.3\]]mig mi bzang /_byang du lus ngan po'o/_/nyi ma'i 'o thug dang /_zla ba'i zho zan dang /_mig dmar gyi sran ma/_ma sha'i bza' ba dang /_lhag pa'i mar gyi khur ba dang /_phur bu'i 'o ma dang /_ba ba sangs kyi khur ba dang /_spen pa'i sran ma/_ma sha 
[\[152a.4\]]dang /_mu ngag bsres pa dang /_sgra gcan gyi til gyi thug pa dang /_mjug [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]til gyi thug pa dang /_bu ram gyi tshod ma'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma ni yul 'khor srung gi zho zan no/_/'phags skyes po'i zho dang sran ma/_ma sha'i bza' ba'o/_/mig 
[\[152a.5\]]mi bzang gi 'o thug gi bza' ba'o/_/lus ngan po'i zho dang sran ma/_ma sha'i bza' ba dang bu ram chang dang sbyar ba'o/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi me tog dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi bdug spos dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha 
[\[152a.6\]]dog gi ba dan dbul lo/_/so so la mar me dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i mchod pa bya'o/_/mar dang sbrang rtsis dung phor bkang ste rin chen sna lnga bcug la mchod yon dbul zhing gdong la yang dar bcing bar bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje gza' 'di rnams 
[\[152a.7\]]kyi snying po'i sngags bklags pas 'grub pa rnams yin te/_ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/_/kham pa'am zangs la sogs pa 'am/_gser ram dngul gyi 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]snod du mchod yon phul nas/_re re la yang bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje de nas yang de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams lan bdun brjod par bya'o/_/de nas gza' nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' 
[\[152b.2\]]thams cad kyis srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbul ba'i gdon las grol bar byed do/_/tshe zad pa rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje yang gang zhig dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams sam/_sems 
[\[152b.3\]]can gzhan sems can gyi skye bar gtogs pa gang dag gi rna lam du thos na de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje yang gang zhig gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod cing /_nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed 
[\[152b.4\]]pa'i chos smra bar byed pa de la gza' rnams thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de'i rigs rgyud kyi dbul ba yang nyams par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya 
[\[152b.5\]]thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo badzra d+hA rA ya/_na mo pad+ma d+ha rA ya/_na mo ku mA rA ya/_na mo gra hA NAM/_sarbA sha pa ri pU ra kA nAM/_na mo nak+Sha trA NAM/_na mo dwA da sha rA shI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM 
[\[152b.6\]]bud+d+he bud+d+he/_badzre badzre/_pad+me pad+me/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sma ra sma ra/_krI Da ya krA Da ya/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_mAr+d+ha ya mAr+d+ha ya/_g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya/_sarba pig+h+nAM/_ku ru ku ru/_ma ma kA r+yAM/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_sarba duSh+TAM/_k+ShA pa ya 
[\[152b.7\]]k+ShA pa ya/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_hA ma ya dA ma ya swA hA/_dru tA na da r+sha ya/_At+ma naM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_sarba satrAM sh+tsa/_sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra/_bi d+h+waM sa ni bar+t+ta ya/_b+ha ga ba ti ma hA mA ye/_pra sA da ya/_sarba duSh+TaM sho d+ha ya sarba pA paM/_tsaN+De 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]tsaN+De/_tu ru tu ru/_tsaN+De ni tsaN+De ni/_mu yu su yu/_mu tsu mu tsu/_ba ha ba ha/_u gre u gra ta me/_pU ra ya me/_ma no ra thaM pa ri pU ra ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/_oM swA hA/_hU~M swA hA/_hrI swA hA/_d+h+ruM swA hA/_
[\[153a.2\]]d+h+riM swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_A di t+yA ya swA hA/_sau mA ya swA hA/_d+hA ra NI su tA ya swA hA/_bau d+hA ya swA hA/_pr-i ha spa ta ye swA hA/_shu krA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na war+N+Na ya swA hA/_rA ha be swA hA/_ke ta be swA hA/_bud d+hA ya swA hA/_badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma 
[\[153a.3\]]d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ku mA rA ya swA hA/_sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba na k+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba dwA da sha rA shi ni b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/_oM sarba bi d+ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 
[\[153a.4\]]'di dag ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]smin drug gi zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te/_gso sbyong blangs nas tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod cing brjod par byas nas de nas nya la nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de la lo dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du 'chi 
[\[153a.5\]]ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skar mda' ltung ba dang /_gza' dang rgyu skar gyis gdungs ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gza' rnams kyis de la ci 
[\[153a.6\]]'dod pa'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gza' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/'phags ma gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgyal blon byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153a.7\]]rnams kyi sku ring la bsgyur ba las/_dus phyis dge bsnyen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i dben gnas su rgya dpe la gtugs nas shin tu dag par byas pa'o//_//
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]{D998}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_gra ha mA tr-i kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[153b.2\]]'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_bdud dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig dmar 
[\[153b.3\]]dang /_ba ba sangs dang /_phur bu dang /_gza' lhag dang /_spen pa dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]rnams dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa/_rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gis byin gyis brlabs kyis 
[\[153b.4\]]rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[153b.5\]]dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[153b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten 
[\[153b.7\]]dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]po pad+ma'i spyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis 
[\[154a.2\]]bltas pa la chos ston to/_/bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang /_bar du dge ba dang /_tha mar dge ba dang /_don bzang po dang /_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to/_/de nas phyag 
[\[154a.3\]]na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas 'khor de 
[\[154a.4\]]dag la 'gying bag du bltas te/_rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying gar bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzang pa/_mi bzad pa'i gzugs can drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_khro ba 
[\[154a.5\]]khro ba'i gzugs can dag sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa tho 'tsham par bgyid pa/_mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid cing /_kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/_kha cig srog 'phrog par bgyid/_sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni tshe thung ngur bgyid do/_/
[\[154a.6\]]de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang yang khyod kyis 
[\[154a.7\]]snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]tu khro ba dang /_shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_mchod yon dang /_bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do/_/de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing /_/gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/_/gza' de kun gyi 
[\[154b.2\]]kha dog dang /_/ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni lha min dang /_/mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang /_/gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang /_/mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin/_/drag po gzi brjid chen po dang /_/khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i/_/gsang 
[\[154b.3\]]sngags rnams dang mchod pa dang /_/rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/_gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so/_/de nas de'i mod 
[\[154b.4\]]la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[154b.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[154b.6\]]dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad 
[\[154b.7\]]du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang gsang sngags bka' stsal to/_/oM mai g+holkA ya swA hA/_oM shitAM sha be swA hA/_oM rak+tAM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/_oM bud+hA ya swA hA/_oM br-i ha spa ta 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]ye swA hA/_oM a lu rot+ta mA ya swA hA/_oM kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na ya swA hA/_oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/_oM dz+yi ti ke ta be swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas grub pa yin te/_kha dog dang mthun 
[\[155a.2\]]par spos kyis dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/_/kham pa'am zangs la sogs pa 'am/_gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' 
[\[155a.3\]]rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o/_/de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbul ba'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro/_/lag na 
[\[155a.4\]]rdo rje dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang /_gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje 
[\[155a.5\]]gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par bya ste/_nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dang rigs gcig pa 
[\[155a.6\]]rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal 
[\[155a.7\]]lo/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gza' khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_badzre badzre/_pad+me pad+me/_sa ra 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sma ra sma ra/_krI Da ya krI Da ya/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_mAr+ng+ha ya mAr+d+ha ya/_g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya/_sarba big+hAM/_ku ru ku ru/_ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_k+ShA pa ya k+ShA pa ya/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_dA ma ya dA ma ya/_bcom ldan 'das ma 
[\[155b.2\]]bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol/_bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/_gza' thams cad dang /_rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' 
[\[155b.3\]]ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol/_bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol/_tsaN+De tsaN+De/_tu ru tu ru/_tsaN+De ni tsaN+De ni/_mu yu mu yu/_mu tsu mu tsu/_ba ha ba ha/_u gre u gra ta me/_pU ra ya me/_ma nor thaM pa ri pU ra ya/_sarba 
[\[155b.4\]]ta thA ga ta ad+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/_oM swA hA/_hU~M swA hA/_hrI swA hA/_d+h+ruM swA hA/_d+h+riM swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_A di t+yA ya swA hA/_sau mA ya swA hA/_d+hA ra NI su tA ya swA hA/_bu d+hA ya swA hA/_br-i ha sba ta ye swA hA/_shu krA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na bar+t+Na ya 
[\[155b.5\]]swA hA/_rA ha be swA hA/_ke ta ba swA hA/_bud d+hA ya swA hA/_badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya sa hA/_ku mA rA ya swA hA/_sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba na k+She tre b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba dA da sha rA shi ni b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/_oM sarba bid+ye hU~M 
[\[155b.6\]]hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/_/phyag na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]yar gyi ngo'i 
[\[155b.7\]]tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/_tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de dag la lo dgu'i bar 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/gza'i 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]'jigs pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par 
[\[156a.2\]]byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te legs so legs so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to/_/gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[156a.3\]{D999}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta de bI d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa 
[\[156a.4\]]thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/_bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jig par mdzad ma/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/_gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsarba ta 
[\[156a.5\]]thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/_he bud+d+ha mA ta ri/_sarba pA ba nA sha ni/_gardza gardza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_marda marda/_gam+b+ha ri gam+b+ha ri/_ha sa ha sa/_da ma da ma/_ma tha ma tha/_bi d+h+ran+sa ya bi d+hA na ya/_sarba sha tUn ta ra ma ti/_bi ma le/_bU 
[\[156a.6\]]ra ya pU ra ya/_pra ti dz+nyA na/_sarba bud+d+ha pa r+yu pa si ti/_b+ha ga ba ti/_ga na ga na/_dza hi dza hi/_bi ma sa ni/_kra ma Ni d+ha ba ni ra ma Ni mA taM gi ge swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/
[\[156a.7\]]namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_a ma ri/_a ma ri/_ta Ta/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dz+ha dz+ha/_mi tsi mi tsi/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ma tha ma tha/_durdAn+ta da ma ka swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_he he/_ki na de/_sarba 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ta thA ga ta b+ha ne ke/_b+ho d+hi na dad/_twA Ta twA Ta/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_gardza gardza/_ba ra ma ti/_bi hu ri ke swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi te a/_sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri dz+nyA+e na artsi spa ra Ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_
[\[156b.2\]]ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma/_A na ya A na ya/_sa ra sa ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba bud+d+ha dza ne trI yai swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/_gardza gardza/_ma tha ma tha/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dun+du b+hi/_sarba ni r+g+ho She/_
[\[156b.3\]]ha na ha na/_b+hi d+h+wan+sa ya bi d+h+wan+sa ya/_mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/_da ha da ha/_bi phu la ni rmal ni rdzA te/_A ha ra A ha ra/_gats+tsha gats+tsha/_sarba bud+d+ha par+yu pa sa ti ma/_mA bi la mA swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[156b.4\]]so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ka_/bU ra ya pra ti dz+nyA na/_ta Ta ta Ta/_marda marda/_A ha ra A ha ra/_hU~M hU~M dza ti swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i 
[\[156b.5\]]gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_hU~M hrIH/_sarba bud+d+ha mA ti ri/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma ni da ma ni/_ga rgA ri gargA ri hrI swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA 
[\[156b.6\]]te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_trA Ta trA Ta/_mu hu mu hu/_sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/mo Ta mo Ta/_da ha 
[\[156b.7\]]da ha/_sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ni rdzA ta swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_ha ha mi hu mi hu/_da ma da ma/_khA hi khA hi/_d+hu na d+hu na/_mi tsi mi tsi/_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]durdAn+ta da ma ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_mi tsi mi tsi/_gardza gardza/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma 
[\[157a.2\]]swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/_/'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/_de gal te chom 
[\[157a.3\]]rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/_srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/_dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/_'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/_chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/_srin po la sogs pas gtse 
[\[157a.4\]]bar mi 'gyur/_de la dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/_rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/_de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 
[\[157a.5\]]yang de nyid la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur/_shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/_gang 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yid 
[\[157a.6\]]la byed pa dang /_mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/_de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/des ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur ro/_/de ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas su/_/
[\[157a.7\]]lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/_/srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa/_/sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/srin po la sogs chom rkun dang /_/mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing /_/dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/_/rtag tu dpal dang ldan 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]par 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang /_/ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/_/bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[157b.2\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la 
[\[157b.3\]]phab pa//[ {D1000}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tA rA b+haT+TA ra ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kaM/_bod skad du/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_rje 
[\[157b.4\]]btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal ldan yid 'ong po Ta la/_/sna tshogs khams kyis rnam par spras/_/sna tshogs ljon pas bkram pa ste/_/skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/_/'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sna 
[\[157b.5\]]tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/_/me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/_/kun du dri yis bkang ba ste/_/sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/_/rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/_/mi 'am ci yi glu snyan len/_/glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/_/rig 'dzin 
[\[157b.6\]]grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang /_/dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/_/thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang /_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni/_/'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/_/rig pa'i rgyal 
[\[157b.7\]]mo stong rnams kyis/_/rtag tu legs par bsten pa'o/_/khro bo'i rgyal po tshogs gzhan dang /_/rta mgrin la sogs kyis bskor ba/_/sems can kun la phan par brtson/_/bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/_/bzhugs te de phyir dpal 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]dang ldan/_/pad+ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/_/dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/_/byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan/_/lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/_/chos gsung ba ni yang dag bzhugs/_/de ru nyer bdug yang dag langs/_/phyag na 
[\[158a.2\]]rdo rje stobs po che/_/mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/_/spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/_/rkun po sbrul dang seng ge me/_/glang po stag dang chu 'jigs pas/_/zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/_/
[\[158a.3\]]'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/_/chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/_/gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/_/de gsungs bdag la thub chen po/_/'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs/_/dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/_/
[\[158a.4\]]phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed/_/snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/_/nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/_/skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/_/smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste/_/nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes/_/snying rje che dang ldan pa yis/_/'gro 
[\[158a.5\]]ba 'don par brtson pa mo/_/nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/_/zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/_/lha bcas mi dang lha min dang /_/'di rnams thams cad gsal bar byed/_/'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/_/gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/_/
[\[158a.6\]]phyag na ut+pal sngon po ste/_/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/_/bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas/_/'gro ba yang dag bsrung don du/_/mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang /_/'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis 
[\[158a.7\]]bdag bskyed de/_/ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis bsrung /_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho las/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/_/des na bdag la 'jig rten du/_/rgyal ba'i tshogs 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/_/spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/_/gus dang bcas pas yang dag gnas/_/gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/_/gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug 
[\[158b.2\]]mgon rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba'i/_/sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang /_/bkra shis grags pa 'phel bar byed/_/gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/_/nad rnams thams cad rlag par byed/_/dpal dang shis 
[\[158b.3\]]pa 'jog par byed/_/nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed/_/sems can rnams la byams bsgoms la/_/de dag sgrogs shig thub chen po/_/'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/_/mchog rnams rab tu 
[\[158b.4\]]rnam gzigs nas/_/'di lta bu yi byams pa spros/_/phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thabs mdzad/_/bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/_/de gsungs shes rab shin tu che/_/legs so legs so dka' thub che/_/sems can kun la gcig tu brtse/_/
[\[158b.5\]]skal ba chen po'i mi rnams nyon/_/mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/_/nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/_/nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol/_/dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan/_/dus min 'chi ba nges par bsregs/_/'chi ba bde 
[\[158b.6\]]ba can 'gro ba/_/de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/_/lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/_/'di la rjes su yi rangs gyis/_/legs par bsdams par gyur la bstod/_/oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/_/'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/_/
[\[158b.7\]]dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma/_/shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/_/gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs ma/_swA hA/_oM gyis rnam pa 'dod gzugs ma/_/sems can kun la phan par brtson/_/g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/_/lha mo shes 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rab pha rol phyin/_/'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/_/rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo/_/rig pa'i rgyal mo tshig snyan ma/_/zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che/_/mi pham gos ni ser mo can/_/sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/_/stobs po 
[\[159a.2\]]che la pha rol phyin/_/rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo/_/sdang ba'i sems kyis rlag byed ma/_/rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/_/rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/_/glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can/_/ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/_/
[\[159a.3\]]'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni/_/mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/_/srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/_/mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i lding /_/tshangs pa mo dang rig byed mo/_/gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas/_/bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo/_/skyes 
[\[159a.4\]]nas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/_/thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/_/tshangs ma bde ma gzhan mi rgyal/_/ded dpon chen mo snying rje gnas/_/chud zos pa la lam rab ston/_/mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo/_/bud med gzugs la dpag med 
[\[159a.5\]]gnon/_/ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/_/grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma/_/des ma nor can bsod nams ma/_/skal chen skal bzang mdzes ston ma/_/mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/_/grags dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma/_/'gro la 
[\[159a.6\]]gcig tu phan par brtson/_/skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/_/ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/_/rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/_/don kun sgrub byed bzang po ma/_/gsang byed gso byed nor ster ma/_/mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma/_/spyan 
[\[159a.7\]]ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid stes/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/phan par byed par grags pa ste/_/mchog tu rmad byung gsang ba'o/_/lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba/_/skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed/_/dug ni thams cad nyams 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]byed la/_/nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma/_/sems can kun la bde ster ma/_/blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog_/mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/_/des ni dus mi ring ba ru/_/rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu sdug 
[\[159b.2\]]pa'ang bde bar 'gyur/_/bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o/_/rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/_/yid gzhungs 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur/_/tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/_/dgra bo bshes por 
[\[159b.3\]]'gyur ba ste/_/rwa can dang ni mche ba can/_/dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' dang /_/sna tshogs 'jigs pa 'khrugs pa las/_/mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/_/'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed/_/dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed/_/
[\[159b.4\]]skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed/_/mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/_/de gcig bu yi phan yon gyis/_/gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas/_/skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa/_/de ni dus ring tshe dang ldan/_/mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te/_/lha dang 
[\[159b.5\]]klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za dang ni lus srul po/_/'byung po gshed byed srin po dang /_/ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa/_/gnod sbyin mo dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byed/_/smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams/_/grib gnon dang ni brjed byed dang /_/sha za la 
[\[159b.6\]]sogs pa rnams dang /_/ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams/_/skul byed gzhan sems sdang ba rnams/_/grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar slar ni rtsod par 'gyur/_/sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar 'gyur/_/nad la sogs pas 
[\[159b.7\]]thebs mi 'gyur/_/phyug dang longs spyod yon tan ldan/_/bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/_/blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/_/bstan bcos thams cad rig 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/dge bshes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten/_/byang chub sems kyis brgyan pa dang /_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong /_/dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 
[\[160a.2\]]gsungs pa/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//[ {D1001}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te 
[\[160a.3\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_/ma hA sa hA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tut+ta re tu re sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TaM ma ma kr-i te dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_mo ha ya/_ban+d+ha ya/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_sarba duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ni tA re swA hA/_/'phags ma sgrol 
[\[160a.4\]]ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D1002}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_/A r+ya tA rA sA pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 
[\[160a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_oM tA re tA rA yai/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_sa ma ya s+thi te/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sarbA b+ha ra Na/_bi b+hU Shi te/_pad+ma ni pad+ma/_ma hA pad+ma/_A sa na s+thi te/_ha sa ha sa/_trai lo kya 
[\[160a.6\]]bar de/_sarba de ba dA na pa/_pU dzi te sma dA hi/_b+ha ga ba ti tA re/_sma rA hI/_b+ha ga bAn ta/_ta thA ga ta s+ya/_bu ra taH/_sa ma yaM/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA sa twa a ba lo ki te/_ma Ni ka ni ka_/bi tsi trA b+ha ra Ne/_oM bi lo kA ya/_che ge mo/_b+ha 
[\[160a.7\]]ga ba te/_tA re/_hrIM hrIM hrIM phaT swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/dkar po'i tshes 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]brgyad dam [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/_sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par bya'o/_/gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/_/mchog thams cad ster ro/_/ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/_/
[\[160b.2\]]gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/_'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[160b.3\]{D1003}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[160b.4\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri la bzhugs te/_de'i tshe 'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas/_ma dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am 
[\[160b.5\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te/_dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams gang dag sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[160b.6\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de de'i tshe ku co'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs te/_phyogs bzhi nas 
[\[160b.7\]]glog dang /_ser ba dang /_char chen 'bab pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do/_/de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te/_stan las langs nas shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba stong 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams pa la nyon cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di bya'o/_/da ltar dang ma 'ongs ba'i dus na 'byung po gtum 
[\[161a.2\]]po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ri gi ri badzra/_ha la ha la badzra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/_ha na 
[\[161a.3\]]ha na badzra/_da ha da ha badzra/_pa tsa pa tsa badzra/_sarba b+hU tA nAM/_b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/_b+ho b+ho badzra d+ha ra badzre Na/_pA ta ya/_bA ta ya/_shIg+h+raM shIg+h+raM/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_dzA la ya/_nA ga b+ha bA 
[\[161a.4\]]nAM/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/_/rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/su zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[161a.5\]]snying 'grum par 'gyur ro/_/badzrA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzrA ya swA hA/_badzra b+hai ra bA ya swA hA/_a pra ti ha ha ba la pa rA kra mo badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_de nas rdo rje khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogs su rnam par bltas nas khros te gsang ba 
[\[161a.6\]]ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po nged nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar brlag go/_/lus sprul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o/_/klu thams cad kyi gnas rnams dkrug 
[\[161a.7\]]par bya'o/_/yang smras pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag gi rdo rje lha ma yin dang /_klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/_rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/_rmongs 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]par byed pa'i rdo rje/_lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/_mgo 'gems par byed pa'i rdo rje/_snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/_da ltar byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs ba'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[161b.2\]]tad+ya thA/_sa ra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_A ba r+t+tA ya/_saM go tsa la/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_d+ho na d+ho na d+ho na/_d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_sarba pA she na/_mo ha ya/_dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya/_ha sa ha sa ha sa/_san+t+rA sa ya/_sarba duSh+TA nAM/_
[\[161b.3\]]badzra d+ha ra Adz+hA pa ya ti swA hA/_de nas rdo rje pho nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na bdag gis kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams 
[\[161b.4\]]cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/_/snying rnams dgrum mo/_/tad+ya thA/_ki li ki li/_mi li mi li/_tra Ta tra Ta/_b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/_slo Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_dzra la ya dzra la ya/_dU ti da yaM/_sho Sha ya/_
[\[161b.5\]]gang zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/_kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar bar byed do/_/hU~M hU~M hU~M/_badzra d+ha ri badzre Na/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_badzra dU ti/_rA dz+nyA pa ya ti 
[\[161b.6\]]swA hA/_de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang bcas pa stan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa bdag gis 
[\[161b.7\]]kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par sems pa nas lus srul po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la bzlog par bgyid do/_/da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_lo tog kyang ma rungs bar bgyid pa de dag gi 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]don gyi slad du gsang sngags kyi gzhi mi bzad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_tsi li tsi li/_d+ha ka d+ha ka_/d+hU ma d+hU ma/_d+hU na d+hU na/_ma tha ma tha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_
[\[162a.2\]]na shA ya nA sha ya/_ha ha ha ha ha/_badzra dU ti mo ha ya/_dzam+b+ha ya/_sta m+b+ha ya/_sarba nA gA nAM/_sarba a hi te Sha No/_badzra Ni bud+d+ha mai tri/_d+harma sa t+ye na/_in+d+ra sat+ye na/_in+d+ra bA len/_lo ka pA la/_pra Sh+hA be na/_dzam+b+ha yA mi/_sarba nA 
[\[162a.3\]]gA nA stam+b+ha yA mi/_sarba i ha te Shi No/_ba ru na pA pa she na/_ban+d+ha yA mi/_sarba nA gA nA in+d+ra tsi le nAM/_sarba a hi te Shi Na tsha ga li ka ro mi/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_badzra shaM ka le swA hA/_ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor 
[\[162a.4\]]bskus te/_me tog bkram la/_a ga ru dang /_tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/_kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/_/de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/_de'i 'og tu las gang 'dod pa de bya'o/_/skud pa nag pos ni 
[\[162a.5\]]rims nad sel to/_/shing ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni sprin zlog go/_/chu'i nang du 'dug na ni dran par bya'o/_/gcan gzan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na ni gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa bor ro/_/lto sbos na ni tshwa chus zhi bar byed do/_/so na ba la skud pas 
[\[162a.6\]]zhi bar byed do/_/sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya me tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor ro/_/nyi ma bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/_a 
[\[162a.7\]]pra ti ha ta pa la pa rA gra ma ye/_na maHsarba badzra ku la bid+yA/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgyas yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang /_mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang /_bde 
[\[162b.2\]]bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal 
[\[162b.3\]]ba can 'di bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/_ngas kyang da thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/_sems can thams cad 
[\[162b.4\]]kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir bshad kyis khyod kyis zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_dza ya bA ha nI ye bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ne/_bud+d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+hA se swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de 
[\[162b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/_lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang /_glegs bam la yod par gyur pa de'i lus 
[\[162b.6\]]la phyir rgol ba rnams kyis dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod par byar mi chud do/_/mtshon dang /_dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_byad kyis mi tshugs so/_/mi'i bdag po dbang po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo /_/yul 
[\[162b.7\]]'khor der phyir rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chub par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te/_'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang /_mtshon dang /_chu 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]dang /_dbyig dug dang /_sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan gyis kyang mi tshugs so/_/dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de la rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_tho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_chom rkun 
[\[163a.2\]]gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/g.yul ngor zhugs na yang lus la mtshon gyis mi phog go/_/thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzi brjid dang /_mthu dang byin gyi brlabs kyis thogs pa med 
[\[163a.3\]]cing ma snad ma smas par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ye/_dza yot+ta me/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/_a ba ro ha Ni/_a ba ro ha Ni/_a ba 
[\[163a.4\]]ro bya ni/_dza ya ku su me/_swa re swa re ba ti/_dr-i D+he dr-i D+he dr-i D+he/_dr-i D+ha pI sha ni daSh+te/_mo ha ni/_mo ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_dzam+b+hi ni dzam+b+hi ni/_mo ha ni/_sarbA hi te Shi nan/_na mo b+ha ga ba to/_bud+d+ha s+ya 
[\[163a.5\]]ma hA kA ru Na/_bi hA ri ne/_sid+d+h+yan+t+ya me man+t+ra pA dA ni swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_bdag 
[\[163a.6\]]gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya dza ya/_pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_badzri Ni/_pra ha ra pra ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/_
[\[163a.7\]]ha ra ha ra ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ta ra ta ra/_dza ya ku su me/_ba la ba la/_tsakra tsakra/_pI Da ya pI Da ya/_a kra ma a kra ma/_bi kra me/_a tsa le/_ma tsa le/_kha ga tsA ri Ni/_nI la b+ha sa ni/_badzra pra ha ra Ni/_badzra 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]sam+b+ha be/_badzra ki li/_bud+d+ha/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_bud+d+ha rash+mi/_ma hA pra b+ha be/_uts+tsha skan+d+he/_ma hA te dza ba ti/_a le pa tsa le/_d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/_kang ka kang ka re/_ka si ni sa ma he te d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/_g+hu g+hu te/_
[\[163b.2\]]badzra mA lA d+ha ri/_sa ra sa ra sa ra/_kA lA tsA ra Ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa lags te/_gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 
[\[163b.3\]]'gal bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khu ba lags so/_/'di lta ste/_lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_srin po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_sha za'am/_grul bum mam/_grib gnon

[\[163b.5\]]pa dang /_rengs pa dang /_rmongs par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre badzre/_ha na badzre/_ni ha na badzre/_khA da khA da/_badzre Na/_s+phA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/_badzre Na/_i daM gra ha na/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_phaT phaT phaT/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_

[\[164a.1\]]zhes bya ba byin te lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni

[\[164b.1\]]mu khe mu khe su mu khe/_swa la bra ti sa mA d+hi sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_mA na si/_phu ru phu ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/_/gsang ba'i gnas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa

[\[164b.5\]]go/_/'jug na yang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/_bgegs sna tshogs brgya dag dang /_bgegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[164b.6\]]mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du gzhag par bya'o/_/gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/_dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor

[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]na rdo rje grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_gtsug lag khang gang du nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang /_mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal 
[\[165a.2\]]ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la gtor ma'i cho ga gzhong khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/_de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 
[\[165a.3\]]'khor dang bcas te gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang /_mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[165a.4\]]'di'i gong na rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/_gzi brjid che ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/_mthu che ba ni gang yang ma mchis te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/_/yul 
[\[165a.5\]]gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre/_a mi ta badzre/_dz+wa li ta badzre/_hu ta sha ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_sarba

[\[165a.7\]]g+ho ri/_g+ho ri/_g+ho ri/_badzra mA na si/_badzra hu ti/_phu ru phu ru phu ru/_gra sa gra sa gra sa/_sarba a hi te shi nI/_su ru me mu mu le/_badzra pra ti pa ti/_sarba ba le phu swA hA/_a lu ba la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza ya 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]sam+b+ha be swA hA/_dza yot+ta me swA hA/_dza la bar de swA hA/_dza lan+d+ha re swA hA/_dza ya ma ni swA hA/_dza ya badzrA ya swA hA/_a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hu ta sha nA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la

[\[165b.3\]]gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang /_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang /_
[\[165b.4\]]'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_khrag khrug thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/_/mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye dza ye/_ma 
[\[165b.5\]]hA dza ye/_mi li mi li/_mA na si dz+hu dz+hu dz+hu/_dz+hu ru me/_mu ru mu ru/_tu Tu tu Tu tu Tu/_mu lu le swA hA/_mA rga ba tI d+hu d+hu me be ge/_be ga d+ha ri Ni/_te dza ba ti/_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 
[\[165b.6\]]'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing /_byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_bud+d+he 
[\[165b.7\]]bud+d+he/_bud+d+he bud+d+ha ba ti/_bud+d+ha a pa b+hA sa ni/_d+ha rma ba ti/_sa ma hi te/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_bud+d+ha a ti ga me/_bud+d+ha bi hA re/_d+harma a ba b+ha sa ne swA hA/_gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]bgyid na/_de'i mgo sid d+ha ka bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_
[\[166a.2\]]yi ger 'dri ba dang /_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_gtsug lag khang du glegs bam gnas par bgyid na/_der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba 
[\[166a.3\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgyad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang /_dgra rnams las thams cad du bsrung ba dang /_mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[166a.4\]]khrag khrug dang /_'thab pa dang /_'thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/_/slar bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 
[\[166a.5\]]la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_snying brtse ba dang /_bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa 
[\[166a.6\]]byed pa khyod yang legs so/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs 
[\[166a.7\]]so/_/dug dang /_dbyig dug dang /_byad dang /_gshed byed dang /_rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/_/pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/_/lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus 
[\[166b.2\]]lnga brgya ba tha ma dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe gnod sbyin dang /_srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_shin tu mi bzad pa dag dang /_chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung 
[\[166b.3\]]bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa/_mi bzad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag dang sems can sdang ba thams cad kyi don dang /_tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal 
[\[166b.4\]]ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad 
[\[166b.5\]]kyis phyag byas pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[166b.6\]]stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar 
[\[166b.7\]]yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na 
[\[167a.2\]]shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1004}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal ba can 
[\[167a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[167a.4\]]chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[167a.5\]]sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang /_sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[167a.6\]]rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bka' stsal pa/_
[\[167a.7\]]lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_snying brtse ba'i phyir nga yang da ltar 'chad 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]pa 'di zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye dza ye/_ma hA dza ya bA ti ye/_bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te/_d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/_bud+d+ha ad+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+hA se swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 
[\[167b.2\]]rnams te/_lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig 'di dag gang gis lus la btags sam/_glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon dang /_
[\[167b.3\]]dug dang /_dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/_/rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo /_/phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig 
[\[167b.4\]]sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang dug dang /_chu dang /_rims dang /_dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/de la dgra'i 'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang tho 
[\[167b.5\]]'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog_/thams cad du yang nga rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur/_gnod pa med cing ma 
[\[167b.6\]]snad ya ma smas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang /_gzi brjid dang /_stobs dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ye dza ye/_dza yot+ta me/_d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/_bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/_d+ha ra d+ha

[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]ni/_stam+b+hi ta/_sarba a hi tiSh+Thi NAM/_na mo b+ha ga ba ti/_bud+d+ha s+ya/_ma hA ga ru NAM/_bi ha ri ni/_sid+d+h+yan+tu man+dza pa dA swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/

[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]d+hu ru me/_d+hu ru me/_bud+d+ha ad+hiSh+Thi te/_mu khe/_mu khe/_su mu khe/_su mu khe/_pra la pra la te/_sa mA d+hi te/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/_samA d+hi gar+b+he/_mA na si/_phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/_bud+d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/_lag na

[\[169a.3\]]zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/_lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri

[\[169a.7\]]zhugs na der rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ni rgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/lag 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]na rdo rje grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang /_mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung na/_der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang /_me tog

[\[169b.5\]]'gyur ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzre badzre badzre/_a mr-i ta badzro/_dz+wa li ta badzra/_hu tA sha ni/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_dzam+b+ha/_stam+b+ha ya/_sarba gra hA NAM/_hU~M hU~M hU~M/_

[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]swA hA/_dza ya mA na si swA hA/_dza ya badzra swA hA/_a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hu tA sha nA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha badzra ha sta ya swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_

[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]ngam/_klog gam/_mchod par bgyid dam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_glegs bam la bris te/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/_gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/_der bdag

[\[170b.3\]]dang /_dgra dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/slar bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
