[\[170b.7\]]par gyis shig_/lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/_sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/_shin tu mi bzad pa/_mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams dang /_
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal bo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/_sems mi bzad pa de dag dang /_sdang ba 
[\[171a.2\]]dang /_rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[171a.3\]]du mas gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang phyag rgyas btab pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[171a.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig_/
[\[171a.5\]]bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha 
[\[171a.6\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[171a.7\]{D1005}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA la k+ShI NI sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 
[\[171b.2\]]'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[171b.3\]]slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/_gang gis shes pa dang /_gang la la 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs 
[\[171b.4\]]thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/_dpal ldan ma/_bkra shis ma/_pad+ma'i phreng ba can/_nor gyi bdag mo/_dkar mo/_grags pa chen 
[\[171b.5\]]mo/_pad+ma'i spyan/_byed pa mo/_'od chen mo/_zas sbyin ma/_rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/_dpal chen mo/_/s+yAd ya the da nA/_dzi ni/_g+h+ri ni/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_sha shi ni a lak+Sh+mi ni/_me nA sha ya sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra padAHswA hA/_oM b+h+r-i ku TI 
[\[171b.6\]]pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/_lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/_gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/mi dang phrad du 
[\[171b.7\]]'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad par byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsko ba bzhin byed do/_/rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/_sangs rgyas 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[172a.2\]]do/_/'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1006}]@#/_/dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/_
[\[172a.3\]]dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bde ba can 
[\[172a.4\]]gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang 
[\[172a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la 
[\[172a.6\]]gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 'am/_sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis 
[\[172a.7\]]shes te/_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_sgrub par byed pa dang /_rjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/_/dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/_bkra shis ma/_dpal ldan ma/_pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma/_nor bdag ma/_dkar sham ma/_grags chen ma/_pad+ma spyan mnga' ma/_grags ma/_'od chen ma/_zas sbyin ma/_rin chen 'od ldan ma/_dpal chen mo ma/_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[172b.2\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_dzi ni/_g+h+ri Ni/_dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/_si mi si mi/_ni mi ni mi/_bdag gi mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod 
[\[172b.3\]]cig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/_/dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[172b.4\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1007}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba su d+hA rA nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs/_
[\[172b.5\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nags mchog chen po na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang 
[\[172b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe kau shAm+bI'i grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba/_dbang po nye bar zhi ba/_yid nye bar zhi ba/_bu pho dang /_bu 
[\[172b.7\]]mo mang ba/_bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa/_dad cing cher dad pa zhig gnas pa de/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[173a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_khyod 
[\[173a.3\]]kyis ji skad dris pa'i dri ba lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[173a.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing /_bro nad kyis thebs na yang bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[173a.5\]]kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'dri/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[173a.6\]]'das bdag ni dbul ba mang ba dang /_gso ba mang ba/_bu pho dang /_bu mo mang ba/_bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags te/_de'i slad du gang gi sems can dbul bo rnams kyi dbul pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_bro nad kyis thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis 
[\[173a.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_yid du mchi ba dang /_mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang /_dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin bdag mdzod pas mi 'tshal zhing /_dbyig dang /_gser 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]dang /_nor dang /_'bru'i mdzod dang /_bang mdzod rnams dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dbul bsam 'tshal cing 'byor bar 'gyur ba dang /_khyim gyi bu smad dang /_bza' mi 
[\[173b.2\]]rnams brtan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus bskal ba grangs med 
[\[173b.3\]]pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi 
[\[173b.4\]]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te bzung zhing bcangs/_bklags/_kun chub par byas/_rjes su yi rang 
[\[173b.5\]]bar byas shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/_rigs kyi bu de yang ngas de bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/
[\[173b.6\]]gnod sbyin rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/srin po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/sha za rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/'byung po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/grul 
[\[173b.7\]]bum rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/brjed byed rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/gnon po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/lus srul po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/lha ma yin rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su sha za ba rnams dang /_zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /_zas su rkang za ba rnams dang /_zas su 
[\[174a.2\]]ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas su stong khung nas 'bab pa za ba rnams dang /_zas su dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba za ba'i bar rnams rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/_
[\[174a.3\]]snying la yod dam/_lag na yod dam/_glegs bam du chud dam/_thos par gyur tam/_kun chub par byas sam/_bklags sam/_bzung ngam/_rjes su yi rang bar byas sam/_gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i 
[\[174a.4\]]don dang /_phan pa dang /_dge ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/_nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/_lan gsum mam/_lan bzhi bton na de'i lha yi rangs 
[\[174a.5\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang /_chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang /_dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang /_chos smra ba la dga' ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te 'bru'i char 'bebs so/_/na mo badzra d+ha ra sA 
[\[174a.6\]]gar ni r+g+ho ShA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM su rU be/_b+ha dre/_b+ha drA ba ti/_ad+ga le/_mang+ga le/_mang+ga la ba ti/_a le/_a tsa le/_a tsa la ba le/_ud+g+ha ta ni/_ud+b+he da ni/_bas+ya ba ti/_dA na pa ti/_d+ha n+ya pa ti/_shrI ma ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_
[\[174a.7\]]nirma le/_ru ru/_su rU pe/_su rU pa ma le/_bi ma le/_tsa le/_artsa naste/_a na naste/_bi na naste/_bi shwa ke shi/_bi shwa ni shi/_ang+ku re/_mang+ku re/_pra bang+ku re/_bI ra me/_bid+ha me/_ri ri me/_di di me/_du du me/_kha kha me/_ta ta re/_ta ra ta ra/_tA ra 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]tA ra/_badzre badzre badzre ba me/_Ta ke Ta ke/_Tha ke Tha ke/_uk+ke/_buk+ke/_Tha ke Tha ra ke/_a brta ni/_ba ra sha na/_Sha da ni badzra d+hA ra sA ga ra ni r+g+ho ShAn/_ta thA ga ta ma nu sma ra/_sma ra/_sma ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_d+harma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_sang+g+ha sat+ya ma nu 
[\[174b.2\]]sma ra/_da Ta da Ta/_pU ra pU ra/_pU ra ya/_bU ra ya/_bU ra Ni/_b+ha ra b+ha ra Ni/_a ma le/_su mang+ga le/_shAn+ta ma ti/_shu b+ha ma ti/_mang+ga la b+ha ni/_ma hA ma ti/_b+ha dra ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_su tsan+d+ra ma ti/_A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA 
[\[174b.3\]]hA/_A par Ni ma nu sma ra swA hA/_pra b+ha ba ma nu sma ra swA hA/_dI dI ma nu sma ra swA hA/_te dzo ma nu sma ra swA hA/_bi dza ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_sarba sa twa bi na ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_oM ba su d+hA re swA hA/_oM ba su shri ye swA hA/_oM shrI ba su swA hA/_oM ba 
[\[174b.4\]]su swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni nor rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/_gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus mu ge dang /_nad dang /_'chi ngas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 
[\[174b.5\]]mchod pa byas te/_nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/_de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam/_gzhan gyi khyim mam/_gnas gtsang ma bang mdzod dam/_gnas gang du yang rung bar de 
[\[174b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan+dan gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te nub gcig bton na/_rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang /_'bru dang /_
[\[174b.7\]]gser dngul dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i mtshan tsam gyis gang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung shig_/
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_de khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_khyim bdag zla 
[\[175a.2\]]ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[175a.3\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags/_gzungs su zin lags bzung lags/_bklags lags/_kun chub par bgyis lags/_rjes su yi rang bar bgyis lags te/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[175a.4\]]rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/_/de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[175a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang /_'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[175a.6\]]dang /_mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas kau shAm+b+hi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nang du 
[\[175a.7\]]zhugs pa dang /_nor dang /_'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la mgu 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]zhing yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[175b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag 
[\[175b.3\]]zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad cing dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung zhing rab tu bton te/_blangs shing /_bklags/_kun chub par byas/_rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i 
[\[175b.4\]]phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_
[\[175b.5\]]skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_
[\[175b.6\]]tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo /_/lan gnyis su bton tam/_lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi 
[\[175b.7\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad ba rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur na glegs bam la yi ger bri ba dang yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/_gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can dbul po dang /_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /_'jigs pa dang /_sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 
[\[176a.2\]]dang /_bshad pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rab tu phye ba dang /_bsngags pa dang /_bkrol ba dang /_gsal bar mdzad pa dang /_bskyed pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_snyan par brjod pa dang /_go bar mdzad 
[\[176a.3\]]pa dang /_bsnyad pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi 
[\[176a.4\]]khyab lags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyi/_/rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/_/zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/_/chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/_/ye shes pha rol bgrod par phyin gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 
[\[176a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_
[\[176a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/_kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 
[\[176a.7\]]zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1008}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bid+yA 
[\[176b.2\]]man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na shAkya 
[\[176b.3\]]rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe sta tu sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos la skyabs su song /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song /_sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.4\]]la gcig tu phyogs/_chos la gcig tu phyogs/_dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/_sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/_chos dang dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam la nem nur med cing the tshom 
[\[176b.5\]]med la bden pa mthong ba/_'bras bu thob pa/_mngon par rtogs par gyur pa/_mtshon cha dang /_dbyig pa bor ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang /_mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang bar ma gyur nas/_de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes 
[\[176b.6\]]te yid la byed cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/_sgron ma 'dzin pa/_gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_gsal bar 
[\[176b.7\]]mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyong du gsol zhes byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/_lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas shAkya bde bas tshig de skad brjod pa gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]de las bzhengs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung bgyis shig_/yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[177a.2\]]bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing bgyis shig_/de dang de bzhin du 'khor bzhi bo dge slong rnams 
[\[177a.3\]]dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /_sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig_/mig gi sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig_/mig gi skyon med par gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_ki li mi 
[\[177a.4\]]li/_hi li te mi li/_hu yA hu yA hU A ma ni/_hu lu hu lu hu lu hu du hu du hu du/_tsak+Shur me bi shod+ha ya swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni mig gi skyon dang /_rlung gi skyon dang /_mkhris pa'i skyon dang /_bad kan gyi skyon dang /_
[\[177a.5\]]'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/_tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang /_brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang /_drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i 
[\[177a.6\]]bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig_/mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig_/kun du mchi ma 'dzag 
[\[177a.7\]]par ma gyur cig_/bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs ba'o/_/nga yang da lta 'chad de/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la thibs por 'gyur ba'am/_rab rib bam/_ling tog gam/_mig nad sngon por mthong ba'am/_mig 
[\[177b.2\]]gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/_klu las gyur pa rnams sam/_dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/_gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/_srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/_sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/_byad las gyur pa rnams sam/_ro langs 
[\[177b.3\]]las gyur pa rnams sam/_ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/_kun du rgyu las gyur pa rnams sam/_kun du rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge 
[\[177b.4\]]sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/_gsang 
[\[177b.5\]]sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams bzung ste kun chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/_bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/_/
[\[177b.6\]]shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/_mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_shAkya bde ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 
[\[177b.7\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]{D1009}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[178a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/_oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/_ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/_tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/_trA sa ni trA sa ni/_bra ti ha na pra ti ha na/_sarba karma ba raM parA Ni me swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin 
[\[178a.3\]]te/_rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang /_rmi lam 
[\[178a.4\]]ngan pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/_/lus la 'chang ngam/_glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na/_de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig snying rjes non te/_
[\[178a.5\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/_'chi ba'i tshe rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang na shi ste/_dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te/_de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/_
[\[178a.6\]]stong ngam/_'bum du brjod na sems can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang /_de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sa'am/_til lam/_yungs kar ram/_chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te/_shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/_khrus byas 
[\[178a.7\]]nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa'am/_yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/_rig sngags kyang bris te mgo bo la btags na des ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/_dus gsum du gos brje zhing /_kha zas mi za ba'am/_yang na kha zas dkar bag za zhing /_sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang 
[\[178b.2\]]gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de ngan song nas thar te/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas/_sgrub ba po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la/_legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[178b.3\]]de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing /_mchod rten 'bum byas la/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas/_rgya mtsho chen po'am/_yang na chu klung du btang na/_des sems can dmyal ba la 
[\[178b.4\]]sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas/_mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston 
[\[178b.5\]]gsol nas/_yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas/_'di che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig_/'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/_des de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing /_legs 
[\[178b.6\]]so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa'am/_dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/_'phags pa la skur ba btab pa yang rung ste/_'chi kar rtsig pa la gzungs 'di bris ba mthong na yang /_de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad 
[\[178b.7\]]par 'gyur na/_'don pa dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa lta ci smos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1010}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra saM grA sa d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[179a.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang /_mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang /_ltogs pa dang /_
[\[179a.3\]]mtshon brgyab pa dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang /_mes tshig pa dang /_chur 'chi ba dang /_'go ba'i rims gzhan ya nga ba dang /_mdze'i nad dang /_gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya nga ba dang /_g.yang la lhung ba dang /_gzhan gyi byad dang /_zas kyis brnangs pa dang /_
[\[179a.4\]]bdag rang gis gsod pa dang /_de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams 
[\[179a.5\]]kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[179a.6\]]oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/_a pra ti ha ta ba la hU~M phaT/_sarba big+ha nAM an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o/_/nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[179a.7\]{D1011}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_dak+Shi NI pa ri sho d+ha nI nA ma/_bod skad du/_yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsa man+ta bra b+hA rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_arta te b+h+yaH/_samya k+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na mo many+dzu shri ye/_ku mA ra b+tA tA ya/_bod+hi sa twa ya/_ma hA 
[\[179b.2\]]sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM ni rA lam+pe ni rA b+hA se/_dza ye dza ya lab+d+he/_ma hA mA te dak+She dak+ShI NI me b.rI shod+hA ya swA hA/_'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yon mang po la sbyang bar yang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel 
[\[179b.3\]]bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[179b.4\]{D1012}]@#/_/de nas yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_su me ru kalparA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM kalpe kalpe/_ma hA kalpe/_kalpa pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/_gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas ri rab tsam gyi yon yongs su sbyong bar 
[\[179b.5\]]byed par gsungs pas/_lan lnga 'am drug tsam bzlas so/_/yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1013}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sel ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[179b.6\]]rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM sho d+ha naM/_bi sho d+ha naM/_bi sho d+ha ne ma ma sarba pA pi pi sho d+ha ne/_shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/_sarba karma A bar Na bi Shud+d+he swA hA/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs 'di'i yi ge'am/_tshig gam/_ming ngam/_thams cad byang chub par 'dzin na/_mi de 
[\[179b.7\]]bskal pa 'bum phrag bcu bzhir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byang la myur du phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/_byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du bsod nams zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]{D1014}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[180a.2\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[180a.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig_/tad+ya thA/_tsi li mi/_tsi li mi/_pan na ko ki li/_shrI ma ti/_kuN+Da li dun+du 
[\[180a.4\]]b+hi/_in+d+ra ni mu khe swA hA/_'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang /_sbos pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang /_gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang /_gzhang nad can dang /_za khu dang /_lud pa can dang /_rims nad can dang /_klad 
[\[180a.5\]]pa na ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/_kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/tshe zad 
[\[180a.6\]]pa ni ma gtogs so/_/gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/_'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog go/_/'dod chags dang bral 
[\[180a.7\]]ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go/_/dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go/_/bden pa'i tshig dang /_bden pa'i ngag 'dis bdag gis zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[180b.2\]]gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1015}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 
[\[180b.3\]]bla ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra badzra/_ma hA badzra/_sarba b+h+ya d+hi ha na ha na/_badzre na swA hA/_'phags pa nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[180b.4\]{D1016}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[180b.5\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po'i bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs 
[\[180b.6\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa dag mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la 
[\[180b.7\]]bsrung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su gzigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce phreng ba zhes pa'i rims gnas te/_de sems can rnams la nyin gcig pa dang /_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed de/_de bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/_pra dz+wa la ni/_pra ti pa ni/_pra sha ma 
[\[181a.2\]]ni/_bdag gi rims nad song shig_/ma 'dug shig swA hA/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang /_'jig rten na chos dang /_dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi 
[\[181a.3\]]rims nad song ma 'dug shig swA hA/_sid+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dai/_ta ra tu/_bid+ya taM bra h+ma a nu mo te swA hA/_skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_

[\[181a.5\]]la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1017}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la 
[\[181a.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/ta d+ya thA/_i li me ti me li/_ha ne su ha ne/_che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban d+hA mi/_e ka hi kaM/_tri hi kaM tsa turtsa kaM/_ni t+ya dz+wa raM swA hA/_cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims nad med par byed do/_/rims nad 
[\[181a.7\]]zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1018}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ga pra sha ma ni sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po bcom ldan 'das 
[\[181b.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mig nad dag byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[181b.3\]]ba/_nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/_tad+ya thA/_ru d+hi re phuH/_ru d+hi ra ak+Shi phuH/_ru d+hi ra piM ga le phuH/_bA te phuH/_ba te le phuH/_han+te phuH/_mA~M sa dun+du b+hi phuH/_pad+ma ak+Shi phuH/_pad+ma daN+Da hi ra NI ye 
[\[181b.4\]]phuHswA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/cho ga ni 'di yin te/_srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas 
[\[181b.5\]]pa byas te mdud pa bdun dor ro/_/chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas bya bas na mig nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1019}]@#/_/dkon 
[\[181b.6\]]mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/he b+ha ga bA na/_many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_ba la bi d+hi dz+nya/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_nA gai sti tiSh+Tha/_sarba satwA nAM swA hA/_'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[181b.7\]{D1020}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ar+sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bco lnga'i gso sbyong 
[\[182a.2\]]zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe/_dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga yab thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[182a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[182a.4\]]'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi bro nad kyis gzir te/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar 
[\[182a.5\]]bsgrub par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di long shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis gzhang 
[\[182a.6\]]'brum sel ba'i mdo'i ming dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge shes na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_a lan+te/_a la me/_shwa li tsi ni ku 
[\[182a.7\]]shi sam+b+ha ba swA hA/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba de na sA la'i shing rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/_gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/_gnyis pa ni 'jam pa zhes bya/_gsum pa ni 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]skam po zhes bya ste/_ji ltar de bskams pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mkhris pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams 
[\[182b.2\]]par gyur cig_/khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par 
[\[182b.3\]]gyur cig_/khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/sna'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/'phyang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_sha me sha mA ne/_sha me sha mA 
[\[182b.4\]]ne swA hA/_na bar ma gyur cig_/rengs par ma gyur cig_/sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig_/'dzag par ma gyur cig_/sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig_/rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig_/zag par ma gyur cig_/rab tu zag par ma

[\[182b.7\]]mgul du gdags so/_/'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan

[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan na 'khor thams cad la chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba/_kye kye bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes zhus

[\[185b\]]

[\[185b.7\]]cig_/'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1037}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]bod skad du/_shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la 
[\[186a.2\]]bzhugs te/_ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol ba/_
[\[186a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul po/_blo zhan pa/_yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab skyed pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/_bshad pa/_hU~M pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bud+d+hi 
[\[186a.4\]]bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_chung ngu na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang de'i tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/_/gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsa ba

[\[186a.7\]]lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1038}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satrA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_s+kha la te sla la te ma ni te swA hA/_rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab skyed

[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
