[\[190b.4\]]nags 'dab dag dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/_de la gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang /_mngon par ma dad pa 
[\[190b.5\]]dag kyang mchis te/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas 
[\[190b.6\]]pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar 
[\[190b.7\]]bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing /_kun chub par 
[\[191a.2\]]bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar 
[\[191a.3\]]rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 
[\[191a.4\]]'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/_/skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing /_/phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pas/_/mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/_/gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/_/des na nyin mor 
[\[191a.5\]]brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/_/
[\[191a.6\]]de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang 
[\[191a.7\]]po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 
[\[191b.2\]]'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/
[\[191b.3\]]phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zhes bgyi ba/_/rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/_/srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/_/'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/_/phyogs de 
[\[191b.4\]]mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor 
[\[191b.5\]]cing /_/grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du 
[\[191b.6\]]gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang 
[\[191b.7\]]ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen 
[\[192a.2\]]grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang zhig nub pa kho na las/_/des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/_/de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/_/shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/_/
[\[192a.3\]]de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/_/skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/
[\[192a.4\]]glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi 
[\[192a.5\]]stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 
[\[192a.6\]]'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di 
[\[192a.7\]]skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid cing /_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/_/dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang /_/gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/_/brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag mi rmo mi 'debs 
[\[192b.2\]]la/_/gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing /_/tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang /_/nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing /_/zas su sA lu kha dog dang /_/dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang /_/dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing /_/lha yi bdud rtsi 
[\[192b.3\]]'dra ba 'tshal/_/na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/_/tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/_/gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/_/sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod 
[\[192b.4\]]sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/
[\[192b.5\]]brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 
[\[192b.6\]]gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi 
[\[192b.7\]]min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]mchi/_/de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags 
[\[193a.2\]]skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag gi 
[\[193a.3\]]mngag gzhug pa/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing /_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/_/de dag ni chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_
[\[193a.4\]]bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog 
[\[193a.5\]]dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/
[\[193a.6\]]bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag_/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/_/'di lta ste/_kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_sa la kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_gar bcas 
[\[193a.7\]]sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang /_sbubs can dang /_grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi bdag lags so/_/byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/_/nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang /_gos can 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]dang /_gos mchog can dang /_pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma bzang po can dang /_sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so/_/chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/_/'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/_/chab rgyun tha dad de las byung /_/
[\[193b.2\]]de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/_/btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/_lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang /_/de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/_/rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang /_/bar snang mkha' 
[\[193b.3\]]la bya ltar gda'/_/btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/_der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/_/rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang /_/'jigs rung 
[\[193b.4\]]lto spu can dag mchis/_/de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang /_/khu byug sgra skad chen po dang /_/shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing /_/rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag kyang /_/gau kum b+ha dang chun lag dang /_/bya 
[\[193b.5\]]rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing /_/me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/_/lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/_/pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/_/btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis 
[\[193b.6\]]lags so/_/bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/_bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_i li mi li/_
[\[193b.7\]]kiT+Ti mU le/_hi li kiT+Ti mU le/_hu du me/_hu du ra du me/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_go do ha ni/_o ke mo ke swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang /_dri za chen po rnams dang /_dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang /_
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang /_/glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/_/phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/_/me tog myos pa spun rnams dang /_/rtag 
[\[194a.2\]]tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/_/nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang /_/ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang /_/lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/_/tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang /_/gser spyod bu mo gser can dang /_/pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag_/'gro 
[\[194a.3\]]gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/_/de dag bdag gi spun lags te/_/de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang /_/bdag 
[\[194a.4\]]mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu 
[\[194a.5\]]le/_e hi e hi/_sa dA mat+ti ke/_sa dA b+haN+Di ni ke/_tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad+d+ho si swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags 
[\[194a.6\]]pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te dri za 'am/_dri za mo'am/_dri za rgan po'am/_dri 
[\[194a.7\]]za rgan mo'am/_dri za'i bu pho'am/_dri za'i bu mo'am/_dri za'i 'khor pho'am/_dri za'i 'khor mo'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 
[\[194b.2\]]'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba 
[\[194b.3\]]dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te sha za 'am/_sha za mo'am/_sha za rgan po'am/_sha za rgan mo'am/_sha za'i bu pho'am/_sha za'i bu mo'am/_sha za'i 'khor pho'am/_sha za'i 'khor mo'am/_
[\[194b.4\]]sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na 
[\[194b.5\]]glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang 
[\[194b.6\]]sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hu me hu me/_hu mi le/_hu mi lA bA tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang /_grul bum chen po rnams dang /_grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams 
[\[194b.7\]]dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/_/rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/_/lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/_/g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang /_/sprin mdog dang ni 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]dri med dang /_/rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/_/ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang /_/srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/_/'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/_/la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang /_/tshon kun dang ni mig bkra bo/_/
[\[195a.2\]]'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 
[\[195a.3\]]'tshe ba'i grul bum dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya 
[\[195a.4\]]thA/_si re bi si re/_kr-iSh+Na cha ga le/_ka rA Di ping+ga li swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 
[\[195a.5\]]mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_grul bum rgan po'am/_grul 
[\[195a.6\]]bum rgan mo'am/_grul bum gyi bu pho'am/_grul bum gyi bu mo'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/_grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/_grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags 
[\[195a.7\]]lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu 
[\[195b.2\]]ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/_yi 
[\[195b.3\]]dgas rgan po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug 
[\[195b.4\]]ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i 
[\[195b.5\]]pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_yu mi yu mi/_yu mi li yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/_
[\[195b.6\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang /_klu chen po rnams dang /_klu'i sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang /_/nor 
[\[195b.7\]]rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang /_/ser po dang ni zho rna dang /_/dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang /_/mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/_/rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag_/ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang /_/yangs pa can dang bkra 'dud 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]rgyal/_/gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang /_/nag po che dang lag 'gro dang /_/ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang /_/g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang /_/sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/_/'gro gnas ji snyed 
[\[196a.2\]]mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe 'o/_/klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i 
[\[196a.3\]]klu rnams kyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi le bi tsi le/_tsi le pi tsi le/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_
[\[196a.4\]]ma taM gi tsaN+Da li swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_
[\[196a.5\]]sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te klu'am/_klu mo'am/_klu rgan po'am/_klu rgan mo'am/_klu'i bu pho'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_klu'i 'khor pho'am/_klu'i 
[\[196a.6\]]'khor mo'am/_klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/_klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_klu 
[\[196a.7\]]rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid 
[\[196b.2\]]pa de la/_gal te lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_lus srul rgan po 'am/_lus srul rgan mo'am/_lus srul po'i bu pho'am/_lus srul po'i bu mo'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/_
[\[196b.3\]]lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_lus 
[\[196b.4\]]srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag 
[\[196b.5\]]lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_a be/_ba ha ne/_ba ha na ba tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon 
[\[196b.6\]]rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/bar dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang /_/mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang /_/stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang /_/skra 
[\[196b.7\]]rab dang ni nye rnga dang /_/ri mnyam gser can gang po dang /_/seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba'i khyu mchog mi rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/lcags mdud ring dang ma lan dang /_/
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang /_/gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/_/'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag 
[\[197a.2\]]gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/_/legs par smras pa 
[\[197a.3\]]'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/ta d+ya thA/_hi le mi le/_hi le mi le/_kIrti mU li/_hi li kIrti mU le/_o tum+be tum+pe/_
[\[197a.4\]]o tum+ba tum+be/_o g+he mo g+he/_go de hi/_b+h+ring+gA re/_r-i Shi sat+ta me swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags 
[\[197a.5\]]pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_gnod sbyin rgan 
[\[197a.6\]]po'am/_gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar 
[\[197a.7\]]bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun 
[\[197b.2\]]du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_srin 
[\[197b.3\]]po rgan po'am/_srin po rgan mo'am/_srin po'i bu pho'am/_srin po'i bu mo'am/_srin po'i 'khor pho'am/_srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags 
[\[197b.4\]]lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob 
[\[197b.5\]]ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_yu me yu me le/_yu mi la ba tI ye swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po 
[\[197b.6\]]rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[197b.7\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du 
[\[198a.2\]]ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /_nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/_nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus 
[\[198a.3\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/blo ldan khyod kyis 
[\[198a.4\]]gang mkhyen pa/_/lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /_/da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/_/thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su 
[\[198a.5\]]mchi/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang /_nags 'dab dag dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/_
[\[198a.6\]]de na gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang /_mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/_gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar 
[\[198a.7\]]gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mang lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par 
[\[198b.2\]]bgyid pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa 
[\[198b.3\]]dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol ba dang /_dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos 
[\[198b.4\]]kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_nga'i spyan sngar kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun 
[\[198b.5\]]pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/_/skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing /_/phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/_/mi de 
[\[198b.6\]]rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/_/gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/_/des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags 
[\[198b.7\]]dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag 
[\[199a.2\]]rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/
[\[199a.3\]]bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig 
[\[199a.4\]]dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zhes bgyi ba/_/
[\[199a.5\]]rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/_/srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/_/'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags 
[\[199a.6\]]skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag 
[\[199a.7\]]ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang 
[\[199b.2\]]du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/_/bzang 
[\[199b.3\]]ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang zhig nub pa kho na las/_/des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang du nub 
[\[199b.4\]]'gyur ba/_/de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/_/shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/_/de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/_/skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po 
[\[199b.5\]]ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang 
[\[199b.6\]]gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/
[\[199b.7\]]skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/
[\[200a.2\]]de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/_/dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang /_/gang na mi rnams 
[\[200a.3\]]tshe lo ni/_/brgya phrag bcu ba skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/_/gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing /_/tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang /_/nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing /_/zas su sA lu kha dog dang /_/dri dang ro 
[\[200a.4\]]dang ldan pa dang /_/dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing /_/lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/_/na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/_/tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/_/gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/_/sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/_/phyogs 
[\[200a.5\]]de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/
[\[200a.6\]]gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi 
[\[200a.7\]]thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol 
[\[200b.2\]]cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/
[\[200b.3\]]shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs 
[\[200b.4\]]po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing /_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/_/de dag ni chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_
[\[200b.5\]]khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs 
[\[200b.6\]]shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma gcig gis 
[\[200b.7\]]shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag ni grong khyer 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]dag_/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/_/'di lta ste/_kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_sa la kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_gar bcas sa steng kun du rgyu ba dang /_sbubs can dang /_grong khyer sbubs 
[\[201a.2\]]can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/_/byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/_/nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang /_/gos can dang /_gos mchog can dang /_pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma bzang po can dang /_
[\[201a.3\]]sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/_/chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur ba/_/'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/_/chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung /_/de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/_/btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i 
[\[201a.4\]]sbubs kyi pha rol na/_lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang /_/de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/_/rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang /_/bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/_/btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 
[\[201a.5\]]'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis te/_der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/_/rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang /_/'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/_/de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang /_/
[\[201a.6\]]khu byug sgra skad chen po dang /_/shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing /_/rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang /_/gau kum b+ha dang chun lag dang /_/bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing /_/me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/_/lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/_/
[\[201a.7\]]pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/_/btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/_/bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/_bdag gi ming ni rnam thos 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_i li mi li/_kiT+Ti mU le/_hi li kiT+Ti mU le/_hu du me/_hu du ra du me/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_go do ha ni/_o ke mo ke 
[\[201b.2\]]swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang /_dri za chen po rnams dang /_dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_'dod myos dga' bas myos pa 
[\[201b.3\]]dang /_/glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/_/phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/_/me tog myos pa spun rnams dang /_/rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/_/nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang /_/ut+pal zla ba pad+ma dang /_/lnga 'dzin dang ni khu 
[\[201b.4\]]byug sgra/_/tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang /_/gser spyod bu mo gser can dang /_/pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag_/'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 
[\[201b.5\]]'tshe'o/_/dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo 
[\[201b.6\]]tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_e hi e hi/_sa dA mat+ti ke/_sa dA b+haN+Di ni ke/_tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad+d+ho si swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[201b.7\]]'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_dri za rgan po'am/_dri za rgan mo'am/_dri za'i bu pho'am/_dri za'i bu mo'am/_dri za'i 'khor pho'am/_dri za'i 'khor mo'am/_dri za'i 
[\[202a.2\]]mngag gzhug pa'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir 
[\[202a.3\]]mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge 
[\[202a.4\]]bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te sha za 'am/_

[\[202a.6\]]lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_

[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]bdag gis grul bum rnams dang /_grul bum chen po rnams dang /_grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_byin dang nye byin kri mi sha_/rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/_/

[\[202b.4\]]de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags

[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du

[\[203b.1\]]dga' dang /_/nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang /_/ser po dang ni zho rna dang /_/dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang /_/mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/_/rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag_/ngos yangs po nang ngos bkra dang /_/yangs pa can dang

[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge

[\[204a.6\]]ta d+ya thA/_a be/_ba ha ne/_ba ha na ba tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par

[\[204b.1\]]mnyam gser can gang po dang /_/seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang /_/tshig lnga ser po yid dga'

[\[204b.5\]]re r-i Shi sat+ya me swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba 
[\[204b.6\]]dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_gnod sbyin rgan po'am/_gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu

[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_

[\[205a.3\]]mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang ba la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_srin po rgan po'am/_srin po rgan

[\[205a.5\]]zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na/_glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i

[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_
