[\[205b.3\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bar sdom ni/_i/_ku/_hu/_si/_yu/_tsi/_A/_hi/_hi/_gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du sbyar ro/_/mdo chen po kun du rgyu ba dang kun du rgyu ba ma 
[\[205b.4\]]yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_bra dz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[205b.5\]{D1062}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA sa mA dza sU tri nA ma ma hA sU traM/_bod skad du/_mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[205b.6\]]'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/_dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba 
[\[205b.7\]]yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/_
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha 
[\[206a.2\]]tshangs ba'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi sar skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/_dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas 
[\[206a.3\]]pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 
[\[206a.4\]]'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/_de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong 
[\[206a.5\]]gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan 
[\[206a.6\]]pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs ba'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su bcad 
[\[206a.7\]]de gsol ba/_'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi/_/lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur bas/_/gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/_/blta ba'i slad du bdag cag mchis/_/tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis bas tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/_drang bor gyur 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]pa'i sems kyis ni/_/'di na dge slong rab brtson pa/_/kha lo ba ltar mig blangs shing /_/dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid/_/tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_dbang phur 'od pa 'obs 'dra ba'i/_/phur bu 
[\[206b.2\]]rab bcom bkrir mi tshugs/_/de dag sred bral dag spyod cing /_/'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/_/tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi pas tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/_gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing /_/mi 
[\[206b.3\]]lus spangs bar gyur nas kyang /_/lha yi lus ni thob par 'gyur/_/tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na bag bcum ste 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas 
[\[206b.4\]]dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no/_/dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[206b.5\]]gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[206b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/dge 
[\[206b.7\]]slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/_lha rnams kyi ming dag zung shig_/gang dag sa la gnas pa dang /_/gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/_/seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/_/sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/kun nas 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]'dus par gyur pa ni/_/spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/_/gang dag sa la gnas pa dang /_/gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/_/seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/_/sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes/_/
[\[207a.2\]]byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya/_/yid byang dag cing rab dang la/_/rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs ba rnams/_/tshangs ba'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i/_/lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod/_/slob pa lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag 
[\[207a.3\]]dang /_/stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi/_/lha rnams 'dus par gyur ba dag_/mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing /_/phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur ba/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/_/de nas 
[\[207a.4\]]ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/_/nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag_/lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur gyis/_/nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/_/tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis/_/de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyis/_/rtse gcig gyur pa'i 
[\[207a.5\]]yid kyis ni/_/nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyis/_/gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag 
[\[207a.6\]]kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gser can stong phrag drug po kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/
[\[207a.7\]]ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni/_/ri mnyam stong phrag gsum po dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus 
[\[207b.2\]]par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i 
[\[207b.3\]]gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i 
[\[207b.4\]]tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/_/yangs pa la ni rtag gnas shing /_/brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi/_/gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan 
[\[207b.5\]]zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de gnyis kyang ni 
[\[207b.6\]]'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i 
[\[207b.7\]]bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 
[\[208a.2\]]'gyed par/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal 
[\[208a.3\]]zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang 
[\[208a.4\]]gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal 
[\[208a.5\]]du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/
[\[208a.6\]]gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/
[\[208a.7\]]nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu 
[\[208b.2\]]dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus 
[\[208b.3\]]par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen 
[\[208b.4\]]grags dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[208b.5\]]ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags 
[\[208b.6\]]pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog 
[\[208b.7\]]ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang 
[\[209a.2\]]ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de dag gi ni khol po rnams/_/mchod rten 
[\[209a.3\]]mang la gnas bcas pa/_/slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can/_/sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang /_/ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/_/de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par 
[\[209a.4\]]lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin chen po dang /_gnod 
[\[209a.5\]]sbyin gyi sde dpon dang /_dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te 'di lta ste/_dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/ba ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang /_/mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang /_/spobs ldan 
[\[209a.6\]]nor bu nor spyod dang /_/sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang /_/ri mnyam gser can gang po dang /_/seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/
[\[209a.7\]]lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang /_/tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang /_/gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/_/'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/_/'gro gnas ji snyed yod pa yin/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni/_/'jog 
[\[209b.2\]]po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs/_/la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag_/srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags/_/klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni/_/yul 'khor srung dang glang po che/_/'jigs byed che dang sa srung bu/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan 
[\[209b.3\]]pa'i klu yang 'ongs/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal 
[\[209b.4\]]du mngon par zhugs/_/gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len/_/stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya/_/de min 'dab bzang khra bo yang /_/mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs/_/de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin/_/ston pas 
[\[209b.5\]]'dab bzang bde mdzad cing /_/gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog 
[\[209b.6\]]ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing /_/rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams/_/thams cad nor lhas skrag gyur cing /_/
[\[209b.7\]]mtsho la skyabs su 'du shes pa/_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab bkra dang /_/rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang /_/stobs ldan bu ni brgyad po kun/_/rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang /_/stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang /_/dpa' 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]chen khyod kyi dus lags zhes/_/dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/_/go cha bgos te lhags pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang 
[\[210a.2\]]ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/chu lha mo dang bu mo dang /_/zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs/_/mdza' bshes ma dang chu lha can/_/
[\[210a.3\]]lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs/_/sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang /_/mi yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar 
[\[210a.4\]]byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus 
[\[210a.5\]]pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can lha/_/mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur/_/zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar/_/nyi la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/nyi ma 
[\[210a.6\]]nyid kyang mdun bdar cing /_/char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag_/rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lags/_/thams cad bzang po rdo rje can/_/brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog 
[\[210a.7\]]sna tshogs ldan pa dang /_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni/_/me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can/_/zhi ba mo dang dka' zlog ma/_/me tog gos can 
[\[210b.2\]]'ongs gyur cing /_/rgyu ba mo dang mtshan mchings bzang /_/'chi med rnam pa du ma dang /_/gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa/_/'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[210b.3\]]ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags 
[\[210b.4\]]ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang /_/mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang /_/rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du/_/yid 'khrug ma yang 
[\[210b.5\]]'ongs gyur cing /_/phag mo phag mo chen mo dang /_/slong ma des ma lhan cig lhags/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa 
[\[210b.6\]]dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du 
[\[210b.7\]]mngon par zhugs/_/dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang /_/gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing /_/skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang /_/gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur/_/'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang /_/spel ma rnam pa du ma dang /_/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dag pa dang ni 'od can ma/_/lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/
[\[211a.2\]]gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par 
[\[211a.3\]]zhugs/_/bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang /_/nag po btab pa du ma dang /_/lum+pi ni dang lum+pi mchog_/skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang /_/'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du/_/dbang sgyur rnams kyang 
[\[211a.4\]]lhags par gyur/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 
[\[211a.5\]]'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun/_/kha dog 
[\[211a.6\]]sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan 
[\[211a.7\]]zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/_/tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba/_/kun 'gyed gzhon nu skar rgyal de/_/so sor 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang /_/lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan 
[\[211b.2\]]zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo/_/kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang /_/bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/
[\[211b.3\]]de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/
[\[211b.4\]]'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas/_/skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi/_/lha rnams de dag der lhags shing /_/dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so/_/nag pos smras pa'i 
[\[211b.5\]]tshig la ltos/_/'dod chags kyis ni 'di zung la/_/bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs/_/'di dag kun nas yongs bsdus la/_/'di dag gson por ma btang zhes/_/de na nag po sde bo che/_/sde rnams la ni skul byed 
[\[211b.6\]]cing /_/khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas/_/rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te/_/lag pas sa la brdabs nas ni/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra phyung ste/_/ji nas lha yis sprin phreng dang /_/glog dang bcas pa'i char 
[\[211b.7\]]yang phab/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/_/de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/_/nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag_/bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis/_/mngon 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/_/brtson par byed pa de dag gis/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni/_/de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas/_/de dag chags bral yin par rtogs/_/rgyal sras nyan thos 
[\[212a.2\]]de dag ni/_/slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/_/de dag g.yul las rnam rgyal zhing /_/'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/_/bar gyi sdom ni/_bdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin 
[\[212a.3\]]dang /_/kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams/_/de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang /_/klu dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lha min dang /_/chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang /_/tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang /_/dkar mo bde byed dbang 
[\[212a.4\]]phyug dang /_/kun bged gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang /_/dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo /_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas/_de'i tshe tshig 'di 
[\[212a.5\]]dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing /_yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag 
[\[212a.6\]]lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_te dze te dza ba ti/_tsid tre tsid tra ba ti/_la te la ta ba ti/_kha me kha ma ba ti/_k+She me k+She ma ba ti/_b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/_ya she ya sha ba ti/_dU te dU ta ba ti/_tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/_kha tse kha tsa ba ti 
[\[212a.7\]]ti/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na/_de ni 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/gang du klog pa 
[\[212b.2\]]der dge bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/_/ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur/_dgung ser 'bab par 
[\[212b.3\]]yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/_chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/_des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[212b.4\]]'das la tshangs bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di dag lags la/_gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo yang 'di dag lags 
[\[212b.5\]]so/_/'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_b+ha le b+ha la ma le/_du ra du le/_hi me/_phub pi se/_kA tsA k+Shi ku tse sI/_ma mi nI She re tho ra Ni pa ma phi ba ma po Ti ste ke/_ta ra ke/_gu ru 
[\[212b.6\]]ga ro/_gug gu mi Ti tA re/_rak+Sha sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/_'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/_gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur bar 'dzin tam/_
[\[212b.7\]]klog par bgyid na/_de la mi dang mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing /_gdug pa yang mi mchi/_sbrul yang mi mchi/_dug kyang mi mchi la/_de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/_/gang klog par bgyid pa dang /_gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo 
[\[213a.2\]]bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/_de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad 
[\[213a.3\]]kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/_mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_lin+te/_li pe/_lo pe/_pa pe/_pa~M ke ka ma/_kA tse kA tse k+Shi/_
[\[213a.4\]]kA tsa piM ga le/_du me du me du me/_ta Te tad tra Te/_tra trA k+Shi/_ko lA/_ko li/_ki ka ko li ke/_sAd+hU/_sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/_ud gr-ih+Na ya tse ti/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /_mdo 
[\[213a.5\]]sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang /_ma nyams par bzung ste/_srung bar bgyid na de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/ji tsam 
[\[213a.6\]]'tshal ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur/_dgung ser 'babs par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar yang 'gyur lags 
[\[213a.7\]]so/_/dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so/_/chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor ram 'tshal du stsal na/_des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyis la/_'og ma rnams kyis kyang 
[\[213b.2\]]legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_bI re bI ra ba ti/_to Te to Ta ba ti/_b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/_go ne go na ba ti/_me g+he me g+ha ba ti/_dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/_pU te b+hu ta ba ti/_kho ra te kho ra ta ba ti/_i 
[\[213b.3\]]da na sU tra ma nu gr-ih+Na tha/_a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las srung 
[\[213b.4\]]bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/sems can thams cad kyang dga' 
[\[213b.5\]]bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur 
[\[213b.6\]]lags so/_/gang du klog par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad thams 
[\[213b.7\]]cad sel bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/skud pa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na/_bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/_
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lags so/_/rnam thos kyi bus gsol ba/_tad+ya thA/_ku re ku ra NI/_mo re mo ra 
[\[214a.2\]]NI/_kA tse kA tsa nI/_kri mi kri mi NI/_yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/_pu re po re pu ra tI/_ho re ho ra NI/_pra ho re ho ra NI/_'phags skyes pos gsol pa/_ki she ke sha ba ti/_ke sha ni ma ke/_sha The ti The ba ti/_
[\[214a.3\]]mi ri ti/_mig mi bzang gis gsol ba/_tsakre/_tsakri Ni/_tsakra pA gi ni/_b+hi ti ri rmi ni/_shi mi shi mi shA ma ne ti/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang mdo 
[\[214a.4\]]sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang /_ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/de la 'byung po thams cad dang /_bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 
[\[214a.5\]]'gyur lags so/_/gdug pas zin pa dang /_dug thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam/_gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[214a.6\]]lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lhas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_ga le 
[\[214a.7\]]ga ga ga le/_ga le ga ni/_khi ni khi ni/_g+hu Shu/_g+hu Shu g+hu g+hu Shu/_kha ne kha khe ne/_kha na kha ni/_lu pe lu pi/_lu pa lu pe ti/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing ma bkol bar 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lags so/_/de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi 
[\[214b.2\]]lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su gzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras lags na/_bcom ldan 
[\[214b.3\]]'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing /_kun du bzung ba dang /_bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 
[\[214b.4\]]'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis gsang sngags kun du bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/_nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang 
[\[214b.5\]]bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/_de nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo chen 
[\[214b.6\]]po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/_de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis grub pa ni 
[\[214b.7\]]'di yin no/_/tA la tA la/_tA na tA la/_ta to ta le ma ta/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/sa le sa sa li ti/_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/la te la te lo la ti/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/d+hu pu d+hu pu/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ka tsa bi ka tsi ka tsa pi ka tsa ti/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/d+ha me d+hu me/_d+ha se d+ha se/_d+ha so d+ha se/_d+ha re d+ha d+ha re/_d+ha ro 
[\[215a.2\]]d+hid+d+hi ti/_de la srung ba ni 'di yin no/_/ti na ti ri/_tsi rak+Sha/_bi ga la k+Shi rak+Sha/_mtshams gcad pa ni 'di yin no/_/bad+d+ha/_bad+d+ho ti bad+d+ha/_si ri mi ti bad+d+ha/_g+hu She bad+d+ha/_g+hu g+hu she bad+d+ha/_g+hu Sha ga She ya ma bad+d+ha b+hi/_sgrub pa ni 'di yin no/_/
[\[215a.3\]]pi khe sA d+ha ya/_tu tu le sA d+ha ye ti/_zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /_mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/_kha shar phyogs su bltas la srung ba lan brgya brjod par bya 
[\[215a.4\]]zhing /_bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la/_mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing /_lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu 
[\[215a.5\]]gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/_skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams gcad par bya ste/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/_mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 
[\[215a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs nas ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/_de nas mtshams gcad par shes par bya'o/_/des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas 
[\[215a.7\]]te skud pa blangs la/_nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/_bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing /_mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/_skud pa lag tu blangs te rig sngags thams cad 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing /_sgrub pa byas na char ba chen po dang /_rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/_skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/_lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par 
[\[215b.2\]]bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu sprin chen zhes bya ba dang /_sprin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/_de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing grub pa sbyin pa dang /_rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/_sprin 
[\[215b.3\]]ni/_ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o/_/sprin [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]ni 'di yin te/_ka ra ka ra kA ra ra zhes bya'o/_/tshig 'di dag dang /_skud pa lag tu blangs pas mdo sde dang /_gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 
[\[215b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang /_rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu'am/_skud pa la bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/_las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang gzhan 
[\[215b.5\]]dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni 
[\[215b.6\]]lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[215b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]{D1063}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po 
[\[216a.2\]]dga' bo dang nye dga'i gnas na nor bu rin po che'i dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal 
[\[216a.3\]]po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_ma dros pa dang /_gzi can dang /_chu lha dang /_'jog po dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /_sa srung gi bu dang /_mdongs bu dang /_dpal gyi gzi 
[\[216a.4\]]brjid dang /_dpal bzang dang /_glog gi phreng ba dang /_gtsug na rin po che dang /_gtsug na nor bu thogs dang /_snang ldan gtsug phud can dang /_gtsug phud 'ja' can dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dbang po'i mchod sdong dang /_'dzam 
[\[216a.5\]]bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_bkra shis ldan dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po can dang /_lag gis 'gro chen po dang /_skar mdog dang /_zla ba'i gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyi blo gros dang /_zla mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /_shin tu brtan pa dang /_
[\[216a.6\]]mgul na nor bu dang /_sprin byung dang /_char rgyun dang /_rab 'joms dang /_rnam par 'joms dang /_mthu bsgyings dang /_gdengs ka chen po dang /_dbyangs zab dang /_klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /_rnam par sgra 'byin dang /_ut+pal dang /_rtsal chen 
[\[216a.7\]]dang /_gshol mda' 'dzin dang /_sna tshogs sde dang /_zhags pa chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_kun tu snang dang /_rna rtsub dang /_dung dang /_dar dar dang /_klu'i rgyal po u pa dar dar dang /_bde byed dang /_lag 'gro dang /_lag 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'gro chen po dang /_dri ma chen po dang /_'phur lding dang /_sog ma med dang /_'phyang ba dang /_srin bu gnas dang /_nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang /_'dam bu dang /_nye ba'i 'dam bu dang /_dung thogs dang /_'gro lding dang /_rab mdzes dang /_
[\[216b.2\]]glang chen rna dang /_rnon po dang /_ser skya dang /_glog 'bar dang /_glog 'od chen po dang /_stobs lha dang /_chu stobs dang /_klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang /_bdud rtsi can dang /_mu stegs can dang /_baidUr+ya'i 'od can dang /_gser mdog sgra dang /_
[\[216b.3\]]gser 'od dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang /_nyi 'od dang /_'char ba dang /_bal glang mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_gshin rje dang /_dge tshul dang /_sbal pa dang /_ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang /_mu khyud 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_
[\[216b.4\]]mgo stong can dang /_gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang /_sprin chen dang /_sde bzang dang /_sa skyong dang /_mis byin dang /_rnam par dul dang /_dga' ba 'byung dang /_chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang /_dug 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[216b.5\]]rgyur gdug dang /_pad+ma ka dang /_mjug ma dang /_rab 'phyang dang /_'jigs byed dang /_gzi brjid mdzes dang /_mgo lnga po dang /_bal li ra dang /_shing rtas rgyal dang /_klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_mgo bo che dang /_pim pi 
[\[216b.6\]]ka dang /_bi tar dang /_mgyogs 'gro dang /_klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang /_klu sde dang /_gzi chen dang /_'dam bu byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang /_'od 'bar dang /_mgo bdun pa dang /_stong chen dang /_mthong dga' dang /_rab tu cher gtum 
[\[216b.7\]]dang /_dri med gzi brjid dang /_mig bzang dang /_drag po chen po dang /_'od 'phro phung po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang /_khro bo drag shul can dang /_rin chen chu sbyin dang /_chu srin sprin chen po dang /_dbang po'i 'od dang /_rkang pas 'thung dang /_sprin zla dang /_rgya 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]mtsho'i sprin dang /_me tog dri chen dang /_ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang /_klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang /_tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_sprin chen snying po dang /_kha ba can dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_sprin mthu can dang /_mtshan mo 
[\[217a.2\]]'dzin dang /_chu sbyin dang /_chu sbyin chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang /_sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_khro med dang /_sa'i bum pa dang /_klu dpal dang /_chu 'dzin dang /_sprin gdugs dang /_ing gi ra'i gdong dang /_gzi brjid can dang /_
[\[217a.3\]]sprin las mngon byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang /_cha byad mdzes dang /_lus chen dang /_spyad lto dang /_zhi ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_gser ngad can dang /_mchog tu brtson dang /_dug can dang /_dbyangs snyan dang /_klu'i rgyal po bdud 
[\[217a.4\]]rtsi snying po dang /_rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang /_rnam par g.yo dang /_'khrugs sgra dang /_rnga sgra dang /_bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_'brug sgrogs dang /_dpa' sde dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_rgya mtsho'i klong dang /_klu'i rgyal po yon 
[\[217a.5\]]po dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus 
[\[217a.6\]]mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bla ma la gus pa dang /_phu dud chen po byed pas/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[217a.7\]]na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rin po che'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i lda ldi dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]klu'i me tog dang /_mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag_/bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/_lus rgya mtsho'i 
[\[217b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung 
[\[217b.3\]]thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang /_gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_grangs med/_dpag tu med/_
[\[217b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang /_lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/_
[\[217b.5\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/_kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya 
[\[217b.6\]]mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji 
[\[217b.7\]]lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba dang /_me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_phye ma dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[218a.2\]]dang /_sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/_de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/_
[\[218a.3\]]grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa/_ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[218a.4\]]yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar 
[\[218a.5\]]bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i 
[\[218a.6\]]rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 
[\[218a.7\]]'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu 
[\[218b.2\]]khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che dang /_spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang ba brtsegs pa 
[\[218b.3\]]ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma dang /_spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig 
[\[218b.4\]]thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs 
[\[218b.5\]]par byin gyis brlabs nas/_phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho 
[\[218b.6\]]sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs 
[\[218b.7\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/gser dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang /_phreng ba dang /_rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_a nad rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i 
[\[219a.2\]]pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[219a.3\]]a nad rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan gyi pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar bar thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i 
[\[219a.4\]]snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa 
[\[219a.5\]]rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/spos dang /_nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi 
[\[219a.6\]]shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams 
[\[219a.7\]]cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi 
[\[219b.2\]]ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin 
[\[219b.3\]]rnams dang /_kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron 
[\[219b.4\]]ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho 
[\[219b.5\]]sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs ba'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying 
[\[219b.6\]]po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang /_phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang 
[\[219b.7\]]bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/yid 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_a nad rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po 
[\[220a.2\]]che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[220a.3\]]dang /_me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi 
[\[220a.4\]]pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu 
[\[220a.5\]]khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[220a.6\]]kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/_rin po che bcu'i 'od snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[220a.7\]]thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]bu thams cad kyi sdong po yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 
[\[220b.2\]]gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa'i kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/
[\[220b.3\]]ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[220b.4\]]'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo sangs 
[\[220b.5\]]rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_rin po che'i rigs dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sems 
[\[220b.6\]]can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[220b.7\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[221a.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[221a.3\]]rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan 
[\[221a.4\]]pa dang /_me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/
[\[221a.5\]]ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 
[\[221a.6\]]'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba'i 'od 
[\[221a.7\]]'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis 
[\[221b.2\]]mi khyab pa rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad mo'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[221b.3\]]dang /_rin po che dang /_spos dang /_tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor 
[\[221b.4\]]bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti 
[\[221b.5\]]stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/_klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang 
[\[221b.6\]]nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[221b.7\]]mchod pa dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/_/de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan 
[\[222a.2\]]pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po 
[\[222a.3\]]g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad 
[\[222a.4\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad 
[\[222a.5\]]par 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/_'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/_bcud 
[\[222a.6\]]thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/_gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs 
[\[222a.7\]]lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa/_legs so/_/legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste byams pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po byams pa 
[\[222b.2\]]de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi tshig_/mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_chus mi khyer/_dug gis mi tshugs/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/_bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/_bde bar sad par 'gyur/_rang gi bsod nams 
[\[222b.3\]]kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/_bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/_mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/_sdug 
[\[222b.4\]]bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang /_rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan 
[\[222b.5\]]yon ni 'di dag go/_/klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/_des klu 
[\[222b.6\]]thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dang lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la 
[\[222b.7\]]bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/_ut+tA ra Ni/_sam pra tiSh+Thi te/_bi dza ya bar+Na/_sat+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/_dz+nyA na pa ti/_ud de bA da ni pi nA ma ni/_a b+hi She tsa ni/_a b+hi byA hA ra/_shu b+ha ba ti/_a dzi ma tu/_
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]e hi kum ba la ni/_ba ha hA ra klai sha na/_d+hu na pA paM/_sho d+ha ya marga Na/_ni ra ti ka_/d+harma ta shud+d+ha/_lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsas/_duHkha sha ma na sarba bud+d+ha/_a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+Thi te/_bra dz+nyA dz+nyA na b+he swA hA/_klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don 
[\[223a.2\]]thams cad sgrub par byed pa chos kyi sku la 'jug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya brjod par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying 
[\[223a.3\]]po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/_ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang /_rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya 
[\[223a.4\]]yid la bya'o/_/de dag gis klu thams cad dang /_klu'i rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i rus thams cad dang /_klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang /_klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_klu'i bu 
[\[223a.5\]]mo thams cad dang /_klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[223a.6\]]gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 
[\[223a.7\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[223b.2\]]gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[223b.3\]]sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 
[\[223b.4\]]gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang 
[\[223b.5\]]bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[223b.6\]]gshegs pa sprin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[223b.7\]]pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i 
[\[224a.2\]]na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi 
[\[224a.3\]]sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal 
[\[224a.4\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[224a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[224a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma 
[\[224a.7\]]yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char bu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 
[\[224b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 
[\[224b.3\]]'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i 
[\[224b.4\]]sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang /_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_'dzam 
[\[224b.5\]]bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang rtswa dang shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i 
[\[224b.6\]]gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang /_mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_
[\[224b.7\]]gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_yams kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/_gang dag klu thams cad la skul ma 'debs par 
[\[225a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_
[\[225a.3\]]bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang /_rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis char ba'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun 
[\[225a.4\]]legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[225a.5\]]gsol ba 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams 
[\[225a.6\]]cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' 
[\[225a.7\]]ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/_de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/_char ches ba gcod/_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/_klu thams cad skul bar byed/_lha thams cad sim par byed/_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/_sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/_/tad+ya thA/_ma hA dz+nyA na/_a ba b+hA sa ni/_
[\[225b.2\]]shrI to dzo lak+Sh+ma dr-iSh+Ta bi kra ma/_badzra saM ha ta ne/_pa ra ma pi rA dza/_nirma la gu Na ge tu swA r+ya bra b+he/_bi ma lAng+ga yaSh+Ti/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/_du dumU/_ha na ha na/_ma hA pra b+he bid+hU ta ma hA mo ha aM d+ha ka re/_pra dz+nyA gra shud+d+he/_pa ri bU ra Na mai tre/_mai tri 
[\[225b.3\]]bi ra ma na skan+d+ha/_mai trai ma bud+d+ha re/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa lA ma bud+d+ha re/_bo d+h+yad+ga ku su med sha ba le/_tsa tur bai shA ra d+ye/_aSh+Ta da sha a be ni ka bud+d+ha d+harme/_shu b+ha ma ti/_buN+ya rA shi/_shukla d+harma sa ma n+wi ti/_gam+b+hi re/_gam+b+hi re/_bi ra dzaske/_bi ma

[\[229b.3\]{D1064}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA ta maN+Dal sarba nA ga hr-i da yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_

[\[229b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul che zhing dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po yang dag bskul dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog phreng can dang /_klu'i rgyal

[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtong ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po sog ma med dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen 
[\[230a.2\]]sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam lam dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /_klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par

[\[230a.7\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung 'khrug par byed pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de

[\[230b.1\]]dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkha' la di ri rir sgrogs shing rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/_bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/kye klu chen po dang klu dag tshur sheg_/

[\[231a.1\]]sgra cher sgrogs shing lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la mu tig gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_gser skud kyis brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun du khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rin po che sna

[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1065}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta ba swI nA ga rA dzA ba ri pr-its+tshA nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya 
[\[234b.2\]]ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na/_lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs te/_de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi 
[\[234b.3\]]can kha dog shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri 'di 
[\[234b.4\]]na ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tsho na de la bdag gis ji ltar gnas par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i rgyal po legs so legs so 'di lta bur khyod kyi bya ba yin no/_/
[\[234b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i phyir dug dang /_sman chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_baN+Da re/_kar De/_ke yU re/_po d+h+ya d+ga ma te/_bin+du ma he/_a ra Da/_ta ra Da/_ta ru 
[\[234b.6\]]Da/_da ha da ha na/_e ta da ha/_dze le dze la/_pha le/_sha ta sha ta/_ku len ku li/_e kar+Shi ta rad+ha priSh+Ti/_dge slong dag su zhig dug dang sman chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa de'i lus la rims kyis mi tshugs/_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_
[\[234b.7\]]byad dang /_ro langs dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pas mi tshugs de la ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'di dag 'dzin pa de ji srid nga tsho'i bar du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_klu'i rgyal po gzi can yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[235a.2\]{D1066}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ga Nu a la~M ka ra a gra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sdong po rgyan gyi mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bskyab tu gsol/_/byang chub 
[\[235a.3\]]mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa kun gyis bskyab tu gsol/_/rdo rje mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig byed kun gyis bskyab tu gsol/_/gtsang ris lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon po kun gyis bskyab tu gsol/_/bar snang lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[235a.4\]]srid gsum dbang gis bskyab tu gsol/_/khams gsum srid la dbang bsgyur ba'i/_/kun la phyag 'tshal rjes su mchod/_/bdag gi lnga phung yan lag la/_/thugs rjes byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/de yi snying po 'di skad gsungs/_/oM ka ra ka ra 
[\[235a.5\]]swA hA/_ku ru ku ru swA hA/_b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/_b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/_d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/_d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/_tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_bdag gi lnga phung yan lag la/_/lo mi rung dang zla mi rung /_/zhag mi rung dang za mi rung /_/gza' mi rung dang skar 
[\[235a.6\]]mi rung /_/nyin mi rung dang mtshan mi rung /_/nyin mtshan phyed mar mi rung dang /_/snga dro phyi dro mi rung dang /_/phyogs mi rung dang mtshams mi rung /_/'dre lnga sdod dang bdud gcod pa/_/de dag kun las bskyab tu gsol/_/de yi snying po 'di skad gsungs/_/oM 
[\[235a.7\]]pradz+nye pradz+nye pradz+nya a ba lo ki ra d+ha ti ma ni su sid+d+hi Ar+ya dz+wa la nA ma many+dzu ye swA hA/_bdag gi lnga phung yan lag la/_/dmar gyi thun dang phra men dang /_/glo dang nad ngan 'ong ba dang /_/lo skeg zla skeg zhag skeg dang /_/de bzhin za skeg la sogs pa/_/rmi lam ngan dang 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dgra bgegs dang /_/mun pa lta bus dbang byas kyang /_/nyi zla lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/_/mtha' nas rnam par gsal bar gsungs/_/phyogs skyong rnams kyis bsrung du gsol/_/de yi snying po 'di skad gsungs/_/oM ha ku hU~M/_hU~M du hU~M/_hU~M na

[\[235b.3\]]dang bshad nyes dang /_/bsgom nyes pa dang bsgrub nyes dang /_/khrims nyams pa dang sdom nyams dang /_/dam nyams kun las bsrung du gsol/_/de yi snying po 'di skad gsungs/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba d+hu ye duSh+Ta na swA hA/_'phags pa sdong po rgyan gyi mchog 
[\[235b.4\]]ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1067}]@#/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gsal zhing yangs pa snang brgyad ces bya ba'i mdo/_bam po gcig go/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[235b.5\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_rin po che khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs te/_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha ma srin sde brgyad la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas/_tshogs mang po'i 
[\[235b.6\]]nang nas byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams skye shi 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas 'khor na/_sems can shes pa dang ldan pa ni nyung /_
[\[235b.7\]]mi shes pa ni mang /_tshul khrims srung ba ni nyung /_tshul khrims mi srung ba ni mang /_brtson 'grus can ni nyung /_yangs shing g.yeng ba ni mang /_tshe ring ba ni nyung /_tshe thung ba ni mang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa ni nyung /_longs spyod chung ba ni mang /_bde skyid 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa ni nyung /_sdug bsngal ba ni mang /_bla ma'i bcas bka' dang nan tur ni phyir zhing phyung /_'og ma ni sdug bsngal brgyad las thar mi myong /_chos ma yin pa la ni yin zhes zer te/_log par lta ba'i slad du sems can mang po tshe thung zhing ye 'drog

[\[236a.3\]]snying rje'i phyir zhus pa ngas bshad kyis nyon cig_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas mang pos kyang bshad pa yin no/_/da ltar ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig_/ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bshad pa'i rigs so/_/yang sems can gyi nang na mi las btsun pa med
