[\[236a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe 'phel zhing ye 'drog gis mi tshugs par 'gyur te/_yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad na yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi la la zhig legs pa'i chos mi spyod pas nad mang po dang /_ltas ngan sna tshogs 'byung ste/_

[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]khron pa rko ba dang /_thab 'dzugs pa dang /_gtun dang /_rang thag 'cha' ba dang /_rang thag 'cha' ba yang rung /_bang mdzod dang phyugs kyi ra ba brtsig kyang rung /_shar nub lho byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi lha dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar ngan pa dang /_dgra 
[\[236b.2\]]dang /_zhing g.yang dang /_ser po gzig gi mjug ma 'dra ba dang /_sa gnyan rnams dang /_sa sna lnga'i lha dang /_'brug sngon po dang /_stag skya bo dang /_bya dmar mo dang /_ru sbal nag po dang /_gab rtse drug gis bkab cing brjod du mi rung ba'i las

[\[236b.4\]]dang /_nye nag po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_'dre gdon thams cad 'byol zhing 'bros so/_/so nam bya'o cog dang /_lam nye zhing gar 'gro yang rung /_snang brgyad lan gsum bklags na yul byes gnyis su nyes pa med cing myur du 'khor te/_bu tsha pha ma la sri zhu che

[\[236b.7\]]las thar te mtho ris su skye'o/_/snang brgyad kyi yi ge 'di gang na gnas pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang /_tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te mchod do/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]chos kyi mdo 'di bklags shing rgyas par bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yin par blta'o/_/mig gis gzugs sna tshogs 'byed pa'o/_/gzugs nyid stong pa'o/_/stong pa nyid gzugs so/_/rna bas sgra sna tshogs thos pa'o/_/sgra nyid stong pa'o/_/stong

[\[237a.4\]]'chi na shi ba'i 'og tu shing gtor bgyid pa'i tshe dus bzang ngan ma bdams nas shing bgyis na nyes pa mang po 'byung ste/_rabs chad pa dang /_dbul phongs pa dang /_kha mchu mang po 'byung na 'di ci'i slad du 'byung zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems

[\[237b.1\]]mi 'phrog cing /_ye 'drog gis 'chi bar mi byed do/_/dus la bab ste shi bar gyur na yang snang brgyad lan gsum bklags na phyi ma la gnod pa sna gcig kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/_/rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/_/dgra bcom thams cad zag pa zad/_/sangs

[\[238a.1\]]sen mo'i steng du rdul chags pa dang 'dra'o/_/mi dge ba spyod cing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang byol song dang /_sems can dmyal ba mang por skye bar 'gyur ba ni sa gzhi dang 'dra bar mang por 'gyur ro/_/gnyen byed pa'i tshe dang /_bu btsa' ba'i tshe snang brgyad lan gsum

[\[238a.7\]]gzhung snang zhing shes te rnam par shes pa'i rgyu rkyen gcig gis gcig stong pas yi ge dang chos su yod de/_ming snang brgyad kyi yi ge zhes bya'o/_/mig gzugs rnam par shes pa yin/_rna ba sgra rnam par shes pa yin/_sna dri rnam par shes pa yin/_lce ro rnam par shes pa

[\[238b.1\]]yin/_lus reg bya rnam par shes pa yin/_yid bye brag 'byed pa'i rnam par shes pa yin/_snga ma drug shes shing 'brel par shes pa ni tha mi dad de kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang brgyad do/_/rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa ba dang /_dngos po stong zhing zhi ba yin te/_der

[\[238b.5\]]snang brgyad yi ger bris[*] sam/_bklags sam/_kha ton du bton na/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi mdo 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_mi drug khri drug stong 
[\[238b.6\]]gis chos zag pa med pa'i gzungs thob bo/_/sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/grangs med pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_chos kyi mig 
[\[238b.7\]]gtsang ma thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos byed do/_/sems can phal ba brgyad khri chig stong gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis bcom 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa snang brgyad ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1068}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pU dza me g+hanA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_mchod pa'i sprin 
[\[239a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_badzra sA ra pra marda ni/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM badzre badzre/_ma hA badzre/_ma hA te dza badzre/_ma hA bid+yA badzre/_ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badzre/_
[\[239a.3\]]ma hA po d+hi maN+Do ba saM kra ma Na badzra/_sarba karma A bar Na bi sho d+ha na badzre swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_dran pa tsam gyi mod la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 
[\[239a.4\]]'gyur zhing zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thams cad dang /_ba dan dang /_gding ba dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[239a.5\]]spyan gzigs dang /_bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang /_rgyan dang /_lhab lhub thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[239a.6\]]cad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[239a.7\]]dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams phyi bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed par byed do/_/'di nas shi 'phos na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig ngan pa tsam gyis thob par 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/mchod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1069}]@#/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_arta te saM myak+saMbud+d+ha ya/_ta d+ya thA/_oM rat+ne rat+ne mahA rat+he rat+na bi dza ye swA hA/_zhes lan brgyad brjod pas phyag bya'o//[ {D1070}]@#/_/na maHsarba 
[\[239b.2\]]bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sarba tra saM ku su mi tA b+hidz+nyA rA si ni na mo stu te swA hA/_zhes lan brgyad brjod pas bstod pa'o/_/[{D1071}]@#/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta bU dza me g+ha pra sa ra samU he s+pha ra Na i mig gi na kaM hU~M zhes pas mchod pa byin gyis brlab bo//[ {D1072}]@#/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_sarba thA 
[\[239b.3\]]ut+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM sa man+ta swA hA zhes lan brgyad brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin 'byung ngo //[ {D1073}]@#/_/na maHsarba bud+d+ha bod+hi sa twe b+h+yaHsarba bi ta pU ra bU ra/_brtA a b+ha ye swA hA/_zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa dang nye gnas dang zhabs la spyi 
[\[239b.4\]]bos phyag byas par 'gyur ro/_/[{D1074}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM sma ra sma ra/_bi sma na skar ma hA dza pa hU~M zhes brjod cing rin po che bdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams 
[\[239b.5\]]la dbul lo/_/rin po che bdar ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1075}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA 
[\[239b.6\]]ya/_ar+ha te saMmyak+saM pud+d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne rat+na bi dza ye swA hA/_'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1076}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya 
[\[239b.7\]]pra dak+ShA rat+na tra yA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkon mchog gi rten la bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM na mo 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]da sha di ka tri kA la sarba rat+na tra yA ya/_ma ma pra dak+ShA su pra dak+ShA/_sarba bA paM pi sho d+ha ni swA hA/_gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal zhing bskor ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma med pa 
[\[240a.2\]]nas bsags pa'i sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra dang bgegs kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[240a.3\]{]s+ho[,]so[}]/_/[{D1077}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM dz+nyA nyA ba lo ki te sa man+ta s+pha ra Na ra smi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hU~M/_'bab chu 'am/_mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste/_lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs 
[\[240a.4\]]la/_ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/_chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chu'am/_chur gtor na/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang /_btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing 
[\[240a.5\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang kha zas dang /_btung ba yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing /_chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas las thar cing /_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am/_
[\[240a.6\]]bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo'am/_gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sam/_bya 'am/_chu na gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag thams cad sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 
[\[240a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ye shes skar mda'i snying po rdzogs so//[ {D1078}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_surU pa nA mad+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_su rU pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na maHsu rU pA ya ta 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te soMmyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM su ru su ru/_bra su ru pra su ru/_ta ra ta ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/_sma ra sma ra/_san+ta r+pa ya/_san+ta r+pa ya/_sarba pre tA nAM swA hA/_gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongs su bzlas 
[\[240b.2\]]te lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad la dben pa'i sa phyogs su sbyin par bya zhing /_'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/_skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams 
[\[240b.3\]]la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par bgyi'o/_/zhes pa'o/_/zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad la 'bras bre bo che re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dbul por 
[\[240b.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/stobs che ba dang /_mdzes pa dang /_mthong na dga' ba dang /_phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/shi 'phos 
[\[240b.5\]]nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs legs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D1079}]@#/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[240b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_thabs cig tu 
[\[240b.7\]]bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/_nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/_mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/_
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_brten pa'i thabs ci yod/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_kun dga' bo gal te nang bar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba 
[\[241a.2\]]khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang zas dang skom yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te/_bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/_bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/_de lta na khyed kyi tshe yang 
[\[241a.3\]]phyir nur bar 'gyur la/_bdag kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas kun dga' bos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la lus skem pa/_kha nas me lce 'bar ba/_lto dang kha skam pa/_
[\[241a.4\]]ral ba'i phung po g.yengs pa/_spu dang sen mo ring ba mthong ste/_tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas skrag cing dngangs te/_spu zing zhes byed nas/_stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang /_shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[241a.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bdag ni gnangs srog 
[\[241a.6\]]'gum par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/_khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_bdag gis thabs ci mchis zhes smras na/_de'i mchid nas gal te khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba 
[\[241a.7\]]khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas te/_bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/_de lta na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo gang gis khyod [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_bram ze'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyis ma 'jigs shig_/
[\[241b.2\]]kun dga' bo thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgyal chen shugs ldan 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_des byin pa tsam gyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_bram ze'i 
[\[241b.3\]]drang srong re re la zas dang skom yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro/_/de ni nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/_
[\[241b.4\]]des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrang ba mang ba dang /_ches mang bdag ngas zas dang skom gyis tshim par byas te/_de dag thams cad [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la 
[\[241b.5\]]ngo lon gyis shig_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te oM sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hU~M/_kun dga' bo 'dis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas lag pa brkyang ste sgo drung du sbyin par bya'o/_/se gol yang brdab par bya'o/_/de ltar byas 
[\[241b.6\]]nas byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro/_/de dag zos pa tsam gyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 
[\[241b.7\]]'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na bsod 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba 'byung po dang /_sha za la sogs pa dang /_gnod 
[\[242a.2\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i 
[\[242a.3\]]drang srong tshim par byed 'dod pa des ni mchod yon dang /_dbul bar bya ba snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na bram ze'i drang srong gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed 
[\[242a.4\]]dag lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang bo tshim par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed la/_sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs 
[\[242a.5\]]su dag par 'gyur te/_bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu tshangs bar spyod par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dgra 
[\[242a.6\]]thams cad shigs par 'gyur ro/_/me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_zas dang /_skom gyi yo byad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o/_/de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[242a.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/bla mar byas/_rim gror byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang /_lha thams cad kyis kun tu bsrung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[242b.2\]]song la ngo lon yang gyis shig_/sems can thams cad la yang yang dag par ston cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[242b.3\]{D1080}]@#/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na dge 'dun gyi gnas na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chos ston to/_/de'i 
[\[242b.4\]]tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug la/_de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba gzugs byad mi sdug pa/_shin tu rid cing skem pa/_kha nas me 'bar 
[\[242b.5\]]ba/_mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/_skra 'dzings pa/_sen mo dang mche ba ring ba rno ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams 
[\[242b.6\]]su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/dga' bos des smras pa de thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag tshe'i dus byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las 
[\[242b.7\]]yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_de nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]des dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/_bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchis pa phul te/_kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na tshe ring zhing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dga' bos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas 
[\[243a.2\]]me 'bar ba/_lus mi sdug pa dang /_shin tu rid cing skem pa dang /_kha nas me 'bar ba dang /_mgrin pa mo khab tsam la skra 'dzings pa dang /_sen mo dang /_mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la/_yid du mi 'ong mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/_lus 
[\[243a.3\]]skyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te myur bar bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lus 
[\[243a.4\]]'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol/_zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad 
[\[243a.5\]]mchi'o/_/khyod da ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyis na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhes dris na/_nges bdag la khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[243a.6\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/_bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang drang srong la sogs pa de 
[\[243a.7\]]snyed kyi kha zas 'byor bar 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig_/khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang /_bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang /_
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs nga la yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/_
[\[243b.2\]]gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang /_bram ze dang drang srong la sogs te/_mang po'i kha zas dang /_gtor ma mchog dam par 'gyur te/_de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur 
[\[243b.3\]]tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nga yang bram zer gyur ba na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/_de'i dbang 
[\[243b.4\]]gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]tshad med pa snyed dang /_drang srong mang po la kha zas dang gtor ma byin par gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skyes pa de dag sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to/_/dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung shig_/
[\[243b.5\]]bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_oM sam+d+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hU~M/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal 
[\[243b.6\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam/_bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na ni/_rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/_yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang 
[\[243b.7\]]bar chad du 'gyur ba med do/_/snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la/_chan nam/_bye'am/_khur ba la sogs pa cung zad cig btab ste/_lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag la/_gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad kyi skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa'i mi 
[\[244a.2\]]dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa 
[\[244a.3\]]bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byam klas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/_
[\[244a.4\]]sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po'i 'jigs 
[\[244a.5\]]pa thams cad dang bral te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum 
[\[244a.6\]]byas te/_gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/_sa gtsang mar blug par bya'o/_/de ltar gtor ma sbyin par byas na phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal 
[\[244a.7\]]ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/_/kha zas de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis yid bzhin du za ba dang /_chog 'grangs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams spong ba dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gal te dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sbyin pa byin na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par 
[\[244b.2\]]med de/_tshe ring ba dang /_bsod nams dang /_mdangs dang /_stobs skye zhing 'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod 
[\[244b.3\]]par byad mi nus pa dang /_gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste/_gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar 
[\[244b.4\]]gtor na/_de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par 'gyur te/_des na bram ze dang /_drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/_sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams 
[\[244b.5\]]yongs su 'gyur bas/_so so nas mthun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang /_mdangs dang stobs su ldan te bde skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang /_thos pa'i sgo nas yongs 
[\[244b.6\]]su dag cing /_shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/_phas 
[\[244b.7\]]kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/gal te dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/_spos dang /_me 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]tog dang /_zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/_dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i 
[\[245a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/des na bstod pa dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing 
[\[245a.3\]]dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/lha mang pos rtag tu srung zhing skyob pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo khyod kyis 'di'i rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas 
[\[245a.4\]]par ston cig dang bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1081}]@#/_/bod skad du/_
[\[245a.5\]]'jur 'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ser sna las cher lhag pa/_gzhan gyis 'jur 'gegs byas pa'i nyes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste/_'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /_'phags pa maud 
[\[245a.6\]]gal gyi bu gnyis bas mtha' zhig na so sor rtog pa'i shes rab yid la byed cing yod pa las/_nyi ma'i gung la gnyis pos khams seng du mchis pa'i sa na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo lus sngo la skam pa/_khog khog zer ba/_skra 'dzings pa/_mig dmar la g.yon du yo ba/_ma mchu 
[\[245a.7\]]ring la g.yas su yo ba/_ske dang rkang lag shin tu phra la ring ba/_lag pa khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sen mo sngo zang de yod pa/_kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_dgos na zhes bya ba dang /_med na zhes bya ba dang /_ma sbyin cig zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]ster na yang ma che ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de tsam ches kyis phri la byin zhes bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/_skyi zing byed pa cig dang phrad pa las/_der gang zag gnyis po des bsams pa/_dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum 
[\[245b.2\]]dang /_mngar gsum dang /_'bras dang /_nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang du rnyed nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi drung du khyer te phyin nas bstabs pas mi len par gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs shing bros so/_/der gang zag gnyis po des shin tu ma dga' nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[245b.3\]]mo de'i sems su song nas gzhan yid la ma dran te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa can du de ma thag phyin te/_zhabs la phyag btsal bas 'khangs nas thang chad de dri ba ma spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod ci nyes/_
[\[245b.4\]]dri ba yod na dbugs phyung la dris shig ces gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das lags bdag cag ni shin tu ma dga' ste/_nyid la khong yus che nas 'khams pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ci las gyur smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis ni bas mtha' zhig na bcom 
[\[245b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa so sor rtog pa yid la byed pa las rgyang ring por 'chag tu phyin pa las/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo lus po sngo la skam pa/_khog khog zer ba/_skra 'dzings pa/_mig dmar la g.yon du yo ba/_ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/_ske dang 
[\[245b.6\]]rkang lag shin tu phra la ring ba/_lag pas khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sngo zang de ba/_kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa 'di lta ste/_dgos na zhes bya ba dang /_med na zhes bya ba dang /_ma sbyin cig ces bya ba dang /_ster na yang ma che 
[\[245b.7\]]ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de tsam ches kyis phri la byin ces bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/_skyi zing byed pa cig dang phrad nas/_bdag cag gnyis kyis bsams pas dgon pa bas grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te/_bslangs pas dkar gsum 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang /_mngar gsum dang /_'bras dang /_nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang du rnyed nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i drung du khyer nas bstabs pas/_kha nas gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga brjod cing gang byin pa mi len par bros te thal na 'di ci 
[\[246a.2\]]las gyur pa dang /_'di la sman pa'i thabs ci mchis zhu ru mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de ni shin tu yang legs so/_/ngas bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig_/de ci las gyur na lus sngo la skam pa ni rang gis za ma phod pa 
[\[246a.3\]]las gyur to/_/ske phra ba ni gzhan za zhing spyod pa la bdag gis ser sna byas pa las gyur to/_/yan lag phra la sor mos thad kar phug pa ni gzhan la sbyin bdag la ches kyis phri la byin ces byas pa dang /_rang gis kyang spyod mi phod pa las gyur to/_/skra 'dzings pa ni kun 
[\[246a.4\]]gyi yid du mi 'ong ba byas pa las gyur to/_/mig dmar ba ni 'dod chags kyis yongs su rgyas pa las gyur to/_/g.yon du yo ba ni mig mi legs par gzhan la bltas pa las gyur to/_/ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba ni ster na yang ches par 'ong ngo zhes byas pa las gyur 
[\[246a.5\]]to/_/kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa ni byed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste/_sngon brjod pa'i bag chags brtas pa las gyur to/_/de lta bu'i las kyi dbang gis gzhan ci byin yang phan par mi 'gyur te/_chu gcig pu las rang gis sbyin nus pa ma yin te/_gzhan 
[\[246a.6\]]gyi tshul 'jur 'gegs ma byas pas da lta yang chu gtsang ma rtsam pas ma reg pa la sngags lan cig btab ste/_se gol lan cig gtogs te byin na de'i rgyud grol zhing 'dod pa tshim par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di lta ste/_oM dz+wa la mi daM sarba pre ta b+h+yaHswA hA/_gsol pa/_de'i 
[\[246a.7\]]'bru don bshad du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_oM ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te don dam pa'o/_/dz+wa la 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'o/_/mi daM ni mi'i rgyud kyis ser sna dang 'jur 'gegs byas pa'o/_/sarba ni de lta bu'i las las gyur pa thams cad do/_/pre ta ni yi 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]dgas kyi snying po ste las kyi rgyud smin pa'i don to/_/b+h+yaHni las dang sdug bsngal byang bar bya ba'i don to/_/swA hA ni las dang sdug bsngal bkres skom byang bar gyur cig pa'o/_/da myur du song la de ltar gsos cig ces gsungs pas/_de nas gnyis kyis myur du phyin nas/_
[\[246b.2\]]de bzhin du bgyis pas gzod dga' nas longs spyod cing lus bag glan no/_/de nas chos ston la bab nas gnyis po re mos byas te/_shA ri'i bus bshos gsol nas gcig gsol du stsal te/_chab byin pas yang gong bzhin brjod de bros so/_/yang gnyis kyis yid 
[\[246b.3\]]mches nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ru mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das lags/_bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas gso ru btub par gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar bzhin brjod cing bros nas yang zhu ru mchis 
[\[246b.4\]]so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni khyod kyi sen bar du rtsam pa lag pas len pa yin gyis/_lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig_/de'i drung du 'gro mi dgos te 'di nyid kyis btub po zhes gsungs so/_/de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te/_chu sbyin stsal bas yi 
[\[246b.5\]]dgas mo de nyid du 'ongs nas cung zad na mdangs dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta bu'i chu sbyin 'di ni 'dir ma zad de dus thams cad du yang yi dam du gyis la thong cig_/gzhan la yang rgya cher spel cig_/de ci'i 
[\[246b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_'di'i phan yon ni dpag tu med de tshad las 'das so/_/mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste/_de ci ste zhe na/_
[\[246b.7\]]phyug po rnams ni nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan len spro bar byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/_/de ci ste zhe na/_dbul po rnams 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]la ni 'bad du yod/_btsal du yod/_bslang du yod do/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi/_ma bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sbyin pa byas pa bas 'jur 'gegs kyi yi 
[\[247a.2\]]dgas gcig la chu byin na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/_/de ci ste zhe na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag la ni dmigs pas tshim pa dang /_bshams pas tshim pa dang /_bsngos pas tshim pa dang /_reg pas tshim pa dang /_rjes kyis tshim pa dang /_bshal 
[\[247a.3\]]bas tshim pa yang yod de/_las kyi rim pa bzhin no/_/'jur 'gegs ni gzhan bkag pa'i las kyis sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob/_rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas rdzas gzhan mi myong /_gzhan gyi chu gcig 
[\[247a.4\]]bu ma bkag pas chu gtsang rtsam pas ma reg pa las dbang med/_rang gi rgyud zhi bar byed pa'i sngags dang /_phyag rgya se gol gcig min pa gzhan gang gis kyang thob par mi nus so/_/se gol gcig tu gzhag pa ci zhe na gnyis su gyur na gzhan gyi sgrar gyur nas mi 
[\[247a.5\]]thob/_des na rang gi go ba bskyed pa sgra gcig tu nges pa'o/_/'dis ni bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_nad nyung ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'byed par byed pa dang /_mdangs nyams pa rnams 
[\[247a.6\]]gsal bar byed pa dang /_'di gzhan la spel na rgyud grol nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyud chad de mthar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rigs kyi bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'jur 
[\[247a.7\]]'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1082}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/lus kyi zag pa sbyin par btang ba'i gzungs/_mchil ma la/_oM AHsh+leSh+mA ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_lud pa la/_oM AHkhre ra A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_snabs la/_oM AHsiM g+ha na A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_lus kyi dri ma la/_oM AHma la A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_
[\[247b.2\]]dri chen la/_oM AHbi Ta A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_dri chu la/_oM aHmu tra A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/_de rnams so so la de dag za ba rnams kyis thob par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/se gol brdab po/_/de rnams de ltar byin pa'i bsod nams ci bsags pa thams cad sems 
[\[247b.3\]]can thams cad kyi don du byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o/_/'di dag ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdo rgyud nas phyung ste/_ba ri lots+tsha bas bsgyur ba'o//[ {D1083}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_A r+ya sab+ta pe tA Da ka 
[\[247b.4\]]nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod 
[\[247b.5\]]kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[247b.6\]]la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir/_ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to/_/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/_dmigs pa ma rnyed do/_/de dag gis glags ma rnyed/_dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[247b.7\]]dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go/_/reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa tsha ba/_shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]du sems te/_bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa tsha ba/_shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das des ma dgongs so/_/bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[248a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen 
[\[248a.3\]]pos thos so/_/de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad smra'am/_
[\[248a.4\]]de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na sog les mgo bo gshags pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig_/
[\[248a.5\]]bdag cag gis khyod khri'i steng du bzhag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bkur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[248a.6\]]nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa tsha ba'i 
[\[248a.7\]]tshor bas thebs sam/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/_gdul dka' ba/_mthong na 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]gnod pa bdun yod de/_bdun pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_nor bu 'dzin dang /_gtum po dang /_gdol ba dang /_rma bya'i snying dang /_tshe zad dang /_la ba can te/_ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/_gdul dka' 
[\[248b.2\]]ba/_bsnyen par dka' ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba'o/_/kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go/_/steng du bltas nas 'gas par 
[\[248b.3\]]byed do/_/phyogs su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par byed do/_/de dag gis khyod la reg go/_/de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_chos thos pa'i gus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs

[\[248b.5\]]bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha ra/_ma hA gA re/_g+ha sa ra ba ti/_d+ha ra d+ha ri/_d+ha ra Ni/_tsho ra tsho ra/_Ni ka ro ti ti/_kot+ta sa mA d+hi ni/_sa ma ra sa ra Ni/_sa ra na ko ta ma ti/_sam+b+ha be/_b+ha ba na/_nA ga re/_b+ha da nI/_sA dA ni ti swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi

[\[249a.1\]]ma bi tsa ra thA/_sti ri s+thi ra mu le/_ma tha ni rma tha ni/_tsA la ni/_mA ka nI/_dzam+b+ha ni/_bI dA ni/_lha ya swa kr-i ni/_b+ha ga ba ti/_ta thA ga ta/_bi ta the/_ti bi g+ha d+ha re/_bar bra de/_ha re tiSh+Tha/_nI la ba sa ni swA hA/_kun dga' bo ro langs 'di 
[\[249a.2\]]dag ni 'tshog pa/_sdang ba/_gtum por gyur pa/_gsod par gyur pa'o/_/de la rig sngags 'dis ke mo ru ka'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro/_/des na 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[249a.3\]]'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/_'dzem par 'gyur/_zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur/_'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_da ra

[\[249b.1\]]d+ha re Ni/_mu luk+ka/_k+She ni ka kai nI ke/_sa mi sma sha ni/_ki ni/_gi ri Ni/_b+ho gi si ri/_sa sA be hA Da/_ku mA ra ka_/kr-i te swA si/_ki na ni bi bud+d+ha si/_bi bud+h+ya gr-i hAM b+hai/_kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/_bi kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/_ma hA ba ye/_kr-i tA na/_ha ra si/_ki na na mA ra ya si/_

[\[251a\]]

[\[251a.7\]{D1084}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ga Na ba ti hr-i da ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das

[\[251b.1\]]rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung bo'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_

[\[251b.3\]]oM ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_da ra da ra/_bi da ra/_bi da ra/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_staM b+ha staM b+ha/_dzaM b+ha dzaM b+ha/_mo ha mo ha/_de hi de hi/_dA pa ya dA pa ya/_d+hA na d+hA n+ya sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ma hA ru dra ba tsa nI ye swA hA/_oM 
[\[251b.4\]]ku ru ku ru swA hA/_oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/_oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/_oM pA pa shAn+ti ba su puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_ad+gu ta bin+du k+tsa b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA bi dA raHsa mA gats+tsha ti ma hA b+ha ya/_ma hA ba la/_ma hA ba ra kra ma/_ma sA ha sti/_ma hA dak+Shi Ni ya bra cod ya ma swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_oM ku ru 
[\[251b.5\]]ku ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_oM ga ga ga ga ga ga ga gaH/_oM na mo na maHswA hA/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs 
[\[251b.6\]]kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom zhing gsang sngags sgrub pa/_dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro'am/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/_tshogs kyi bdag

[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]par langs nas tshig tu bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

[\[252a.3\]]snying po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1085}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[252a.4\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/_byang chub kyi shing drung la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[252a.5\]]su lha'i sde dpon chen po tshogs kyi bdag po ma hA kA la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba dpal mgon po nag po chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom 
[\[252a.6\]]ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'di 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/_oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha Na g+ha Na Ti swA hA/_na maHshrI ma hA kA la ga Ne gu ti shA ya/_na mo yo gi na NI na/_tad+ya thA/_oM hi le hi le/_ki te ki te ni/_tsi de tsi de ni swA hA/_'di bton pas nad thams cad dang /_
[\[252a.7\]]rims thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_mi ngas thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang /_nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo /_/'og tu ni sems can 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo /_/thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo /_/gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/_dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/_rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing /_rnal 'byor gyi dgra bla/_bdud 'dul 
[\[252b.2\]]rnams kyi dbang phyug_/srin po lang ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o/_/'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i

[\[252b.4\]]chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/_mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa brjod par bya ste/_phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ha na ha na rA dzad+hU te na/_da ha da ha rA dzad+hU te na/_pa tsa pa tsa 
[\[252b.5\]]rA dza d+hU te na/_ba hu shra be/_ba hu pa ri pA ri/_ba hu pa ri sho d+ha ne i maM dzA ra tsaN+Da laM/_ha na ha na/_oM suM b+ha/_ni suM b+ha/_shi ra muny+tsa/_tsak+Shu muny+tsa/_shro tra muny+tsa/_g+h+rA Na muny+tsa/_dzi hwA muny+tsa/_ka Na Tha muny+tsa/_grI ba muny+tsa/_priSh+Tha muny+tsa/_kA Ti kA muny+tsa/_kuk+Sha muny+tsa/_
[\[252b.6\]]U ru muny+tsa/_dza nau muny+tsa/_hasta muny+tsa/_pA dau muny+tsa/_aM gu li muny+tsa/_i ga pra t+yaM ga muny+tsa/_a ba sa ra/_a n+ya si maM gats+tsha/_dz+wa ra mu to si bdag la swA hA/_oM dz+wa la mA aM gu li hU~M/_sarba dz+wa rA na na phaT/_'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad 
[\[252b.7\]]las rnam par thar bar byed pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]{D1087}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_de bI ma hA kA lI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[253a.2\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/_/de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_bdud kyi yum/_gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig 
[\[253a.3\]]tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/_bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[253a.4\]]bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o/_/'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/_/thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ril thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags 
[\[253a.5\]]'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/_tad+ya thA/_oM ru ru bi tiSh+Tha bad+ho h+si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Ta ba d+ho t+si swA hA/_'di bton pas rims dang /_nad dang /_mi ngas dang /_nyes pa thams cad dang /_mdze dang /_phol mig dang g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur 
[\[253a.6\]]ro swA hA/_lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1088}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI de bI kA lI nA ma A Sh+Ta sha ta ka/_bod skad du/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[253a.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]do/_/de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[253b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas 
[\[253b.3\]]dpal lha mo nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/thos bsam bsgom la cher gnas pa'i/_/rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/_/'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags/_/byang chub sems dpa' sprul 
[\[253b.4\]]pa ste/_/sa ltar brten pa'i gzhir gyur pa/_/yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra/_/byang chub smin byed me lta bu/_/dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo/_/shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste/_/khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra/_/'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/_/
[\[253b.5\]]bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i/_/las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas/_/nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba goms/_/shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro/_/khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu/_/dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu/_/kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/
[\[253b.6\]]nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal/_/zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing /_/ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra/_/rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra/_/u dum bA ra ltar khyod dkon yang /_/bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad/_/'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags/_/rang bzhin 
[\[253b.7\]]med pa'i chos kyang ston/_/chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar/_/gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong /_/dam pa rnams dang yang dag gcig_/dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/_/lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo/_/srin mo 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]klu mo sha za mo/_/gdug mo 'byung mo grul bum mo/_/drag mo rngam tshul klog 'gyu ma/_/rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/_/mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul/_/dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang 
[\[254a.2\]]ston/_/rnam pa brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung /_/'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston/_/phung po lnga yang brjod par nus/_/dbang po tshim byed yul lnga'ang ston/_/rten cing 'brel ba'i spyod pa mkhas/_/yul can rnams ni gsod la mkhas/_/de bzhin ngag rnams 
[\[254a.3\]]gsod pa dang /_/lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson/_/sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas/_/'khor ba las ni ring du song /_/de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang /_/'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan ma/_/
[\[254a.4\]]dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams/_/oM AHhU~M/_shrI de bi kA li sa ma ya dzaH/_DA ki nI DA la sa ma ya swA hA/_ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/_/yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang 'thob/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su mi skye 
[\[254a.5\]]zhing /_/byol song skye bas thogs med 'gyur/_/lus 'phags gnas su skyes pa na/_/thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing /_/sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min/_/de bzhin ba lang spyod du yang /_/chu dang rlabs kyis khyer mi nus/_/'dzam bu'i gling du gang skyes pa/_/
[\[254a.6\]]sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang /_/skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur/_/bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su/_/tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gzugs med gnas ni bzhi bor yang /_/don med na ni mi skye ste/_/
[\[254a.7\]]'du shes med par nam yang min/_/'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/_/khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod/_/rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/_/sems la 'dzin par mi byed de/_/nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang /_/de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang /_/
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur/_/bskal ba grangs med mang por yang /_/mi khom brgyad du skye mi 'gyur/_/mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang /_/mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing /_/tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan/_/sdug med bskal pa mang por 
[\[254b.2\]]yang /_/nam yang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing /_/mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/_/nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang /_/rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni/_/rab dga' dri med 'od ces 'phro/_/sbyar dka' mngon gyur 
[\[254b.3\]]ring du song /_/mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin/_/sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med/_/bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te/_/kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/_/nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od/_/rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/_/las kyi 'od dang dpe med 
[\[254b.4\]]sa/_/dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od/_/thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste/_/bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang /_/'di tshe byung na myur du thob/_/sa rnams ma thob bar du yang /_/'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang /_shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing /_/
[\[254b.5\]]chos la dga' ba rnams kyis bsrung /_/dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs/_/rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur/_/dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/_/yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob 
[\[254b.6\]]ste/_/sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang /_/khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes gsungs pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang /_/dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[254b.7\]]rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do/_/dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1089}]@#/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/_/dus 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus/_/sdig smin las grub lha dang lha ma yin/_/dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru/_/sha khrag dmar la rol ba'i lha mo khyod/_/lha yi 
[\[255a.2\]]g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la/_/lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/_/ces bstod do/_/rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1090}]@#/_/nad kyi bdag mo la bstod pa/_til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro 
[\[255a.3\]]nye'i rna chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang /_/rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags las byas pa gcig gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa ste/_/gcer bu bong bu zhon cing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis/_/bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyi gzhan lta khyod kyi 
[\[255a.4\]]spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su zhig shes/_/'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag las khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na/_/lha mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par gyur/_/nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub 
[\[255a.5\]]pa'i spyod yul can te dur khrod dgyes/_/khyod ni g.yo can mnan zhing nad dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs sel zhi la mi bzad dril yang sgrogs/_/khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bo cod pan legs spras g.yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi/_/phreng ba thogs shing gar byed 
[\[255a.6\]]lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa yis/_/ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos gyur pa/_/mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong /_/ko 
[\[255a.7\]]rlon sar pas dril te brgyang ba'i gos kyis snam phyi phyed g.yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris/_/mi yi rgyu ma sar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gram par 'dril/_/lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag mang 'dzag pa'i thig les tshom 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bur bris/_/mi ro'i shal so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig_/drag pa'i drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa snga na ma byung khyod mthong na/_/ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing rtabs la rngam pa 'thon cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud/_/nag 
[\[255b.2\]]mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang /_/nyin gcig bzhin du stod par byed cing gshin rje nyid kyang 'dar bzhin rtag tu 'dud par byed/_/mi rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag mjug brtul bas ni rna ba ya gcig la/_/
[\[255b.3\]]brang gis 'gro ba'i mgo bos gdengs ka stong dang ldan pa khyab gnas rgyan tu byas/_/ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa gzhi non/_/steng nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyis lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag_/rgya 
[\[255b.4\]]mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod/_/chu rnams skems par nus pa ste/_/bud med thams cad zhi mdzad phyir/_/lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhugs/_/rdzongs dang dka' zlog nam mo che/_/lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/_/mi nad gang yin khyod kyis 
[\[255b.5\]]shes/_/de la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_/nad do cog gi bdag mo ste/_/lha mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa/_bram ze mchog sred kyis byas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[255b.6\]{D1091}]@#/_/lha mo nam gru la bstod pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha mo chen mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam gru dag gi cho 'brang dang /_/mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na/_/
[\[255b.7\]]nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus/_rgyab ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/_/khyod kyi gdong ni dngul yin te/_/lto ba'i ngos ni rdo rjes bltam/_/ming po mdzod dang mdzod bdag po/_/khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma/_/khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya/_/skal ldan 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]shing rta khyod kyi rus/_/lha yul dag tu grags pa yin/_/na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/_tsi li tsi li/_/b+hin+di b+hin+di/_/muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa ha ba la ka na swA hA/_badzra bA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_/de ba sa mA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_/r-i Sha yaHsa mAdz+nyA pa ya 
[\[256a.2\]]ti swA hA/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/tabyathA/_/ru ru bi ShiSh+tha bad+hot+si swA hA/_/'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_bdud kyi yum chen mo/_/lha mo chen mo re ma ti'i gzungs rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[256a.3\]{D1092}]@#/_/dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/_lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_/rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/_/mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/_/shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[256a.4\]]phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can la/_/'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes/_/drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/_/de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung /_/sems can don phyir phrin las chen po'i khur/_/spro 
[\[256a.5\]]bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad/_/sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas/_/dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur/_/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/_/thugs rje'i spyan gsal 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa/_/dus ring 
[\[256a.6\]]'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs/_/de la lha dbang tshangs tshogs shin tu 'dud/_/byams shing bsod nams snying rje bskyed pa'i ma/_/lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/_/thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/_/shes rab zab 
[\[256a.7\]]cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang /_/rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag_/'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la/_/sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas/_/mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud/_/yan lag rnam 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa/_/yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/_/rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/_/blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig_/sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/_/mi slu mchog khyod 
[\[256b.2\]]rnam grol sa la bzhugs/_/thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang /_dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs/_/'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/_/sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te/_/phan tshun 
[\[256b.3\]]shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang /_/dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/_/gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/_/dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can/_/lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang /_/
[\[256b.4\]]yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/_/byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos/_/bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/_/lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/_/bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/_/bdag 
[\[256b.5\]]ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang /_/lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/_/rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang /_/bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/_/rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben/_/snyan pa'i rgyal 
[\[256b.6\]]mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod/_/mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar/_/mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_brah+ma ne/_na maHswa ra swa t+yai de bi sid+d+han+tu man+t+ra pA da taM brah+mA nu man+ta swA hA/_
[\[256b.7\]]dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1093}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU traM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]'jug pa'i mdo chen po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings ba'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/_de 
[\[257a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dod do/_/btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[257a.3\]]ldan 'das yul br-i dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/_yangs ba'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs ba'i grong khyer 
[\[257a.4\]]du song la phyin nas/_sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 
[\[257a.5\]]bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden 
[\[257a.6\]]pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_chos kyis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang 
[\[257a.7\]]pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/mu ny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ma 'dug shig_/yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar gyur cig_/ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i lha/_lha'i bla ma gshegs shing /_dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa 
[\[257b.2\]]rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /_lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[257b.3\]]dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/_de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/khyed cag las gang 
[\[257b.4\]]dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_nyes pa mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse

[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka ro tI ti/_ku ri/_sho kang+ka ra/_kang+ka ri shi/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ti ri te phu swA/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu/_nA thA nA nA thA tha/_ri pu ri pu/_nA thA tha/_/
[\[258a.2\]]ni rgats+tsha ta/_ri bu ri bu/_nirga ts+tsha ta/_pa yA tha/_ri bU ri pU/_pa lA ya ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dga' 
[\[258a.3\]]ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rga ts+tsha ta swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang /_chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/tshigs 
[\[258a.4\]]su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/_/rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing /_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar ba'i lam du 'dzud 
[\[258a.5\]]mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa 
[\[258a.6\]]gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa 
[\[258a.7\]]de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/_/gsung gtsor gtsang mar mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/_/phun 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes bas sa rnams ni/_/nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing /_/sems can thams cad rab dga' de/_/khyed la bde

[\[258b.5\]]yin pa/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/
[\[258b.6\]]nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shog_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig_/snying rje'i

[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad rnams med par shog_/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag la gnas 
[\[259a.2\]]pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/de skad bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong 
[\[259a.3\]]khyer du song ste/_sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/

[\[259a.5\]]kyis bsams pa/_chos kyis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin thams
