[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /_lha stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 
[\[259b.2\]]dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/_de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/_nirgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_ni rgats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i 
[\[259b.3\]]sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal 
[\[259b.4\]]pa/_/su mu su mu/_su mu su mu su mu/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_
[\[259b.5\]]mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu rU ri ti/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri/_mi rI ti/_ha si mi mi/_rI 
[\[259b.6\]]ti/_sI si mi/_kang+ka rA/_ka ra ka ta/_ka ra ka ra ka ra/_ka tsa/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka ro tI ti/_ku ri sho/_kang+ka rA/_kang+ka rI/_shi ri ri ri ri ri ri ri rI te/_ri 
[\[259b.7\]]phu swA/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu ri phu/_ri phu/_nA thA/_nA nA thA/_ri pU ri pU/_na thA thA/_nirgats+tsha ta/_ri bu ri pu/_nirgats+tsha ta/_pa la yA tra/_ri bu ri pu/_pa la yA tra/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dgongs pa dang ldan pa byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang /_chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_
[\[260a.2\]]'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/_/rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing /_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/_/khyod la bde legs mdzad par 
[\[260a.3\]]'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'jud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba 
[\[260a.4\]]mnga' mdzad de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun 
[\[260a.5\]]gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/_/gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpal bo chen po gang 
[\[260a.6\]]skyes pa/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/_/nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing /_/sems can thams cad rab dga' de/_/khyed la bde legs 
[\[260a.7\]]mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/_/sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung dang /_/thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/_/thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing /_/tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya 
[\[260b.2\]]byin bcas lha bde legs mdzad/_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_/khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yi/_/khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/rkang 
[\[260b.3\]]gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu 
[\[260b.4\]]bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[260b.5\]]dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad 
[\[260b.6\]]rnams med par shog_/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan 
[\[260b.7\]]du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]{D1094}]@#/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[261a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang 
[\[261a.3\]]ldan pa dgongs su gsol/_'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[261a.4\]]dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad 
[\[261a.5\]]rgyun chad par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las 
[\[261a.6\]]dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_mi dge ba'i chos dang /_bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang 
[\[261a.7\]]phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta 
[\[261b.2\]]zhing dam pa mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_
[\[261b.3\]]bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags 
[\[261b.4\]]pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis par 
[\[261b.5\]]bgyid par gyur cig_/btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas 
[\[261b.6\]]pha rol tu 'chi 'pho ba'i 'jig rten chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig_/bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis 
[\[261b.7\]]ma spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/_sems ma zhum pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho bar 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]gyur cig_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 
[\[262a.2\]]mnyes par bgyid cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig_/ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar ba'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig_/ji 
[\[262a.3\]]ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad 
[\[262a.4\]]yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig_/ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rje'i 
[\[262a.5\]]bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/_dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig_/ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa 
[\[262a.6\]]thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing /_mchod pa bgyis pas/_thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[262a.7\]]par 'byung bar gyur cig_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/_/de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/_/de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing /_/de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/_/ji skad bdag gi ngag skyes par/_/de srid 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing /_/ngag gis sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog_/ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/_/de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/_/de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing /_/yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig_/de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/_/thugs 
[\[262b.2\]]rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/_/lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing /_/yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/_/thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/_/rtag tu sbyor bar bgyid pas na/_/thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan 
[\[262b.3\]]ras gzigs/_/srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/_/yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/_/srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/_bod+hi satwA ya/_ma hA 
[\[262b.4\]]swa twa ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsakra brti/_tsin+tA ma Ni ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha/_dz+wa la A kar+Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//oM pad+me tsin+tA ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/_snying po'o/_/oM b+ha ra da pad+me hU~M/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/
[\[262b.5\]]oM ma Ni badzre Ni hU~M/_gsang ba'i snying po'o/_/sngags snying bzhi 'byung ba dang /_smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1095}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[262b.6\]]Ar+ya b+ha dra tsAr+ya pra Nid+hA na rA dzA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng 
[\[262b.7\]]ge kun/_/bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la/_/lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/_/bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/_/rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du/_/zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/_/rgyal 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag_/de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/_/thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos/_/de dag 
[\[263a.2\]]bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cing /_/bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/_/me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang /_/sil snyan rnams dang byug pa 
[\[263a.3\]]gdugs mchog dang /_/mar me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis/_/rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/_/na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang /_/phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang /_/bkod pa'i khyad par 'phags pa mchog kun gyis/_/
[\[263a.4\]]rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyid/_/mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/_/de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos/_/bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis/_/rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti 
[\[263a.5\]]mug dbang gis na/_/lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang /_/sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/_/rang rgyal rnams dang slob 
[\[263a.6\]]dang mi slob dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang /_/de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang /_/gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag_/byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/_/mgon po de dag bdag gis thams 
[\[263a.7\]]cad la/_/'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul/_/mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la/_/'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/_/bskal ba zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang /_/bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/_/phyag 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang /_/rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yis/_/dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/_/thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten dag na 
[\[263b.2\]]gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/_/gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar/_/bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon/_/phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur/_/byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang /_/
[\[263b.3\]]sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog_/phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar 'gyur/_/'gro ba kun gyi chos kyis don rnams ni/_/mthun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog_/byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag 
[\[263b.4\]]spyod cing /_/'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na/_/rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog_/rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/_/bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing /_/tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs 
[\[263b.5\]]dag par/_/rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog_/lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/_/grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang /_/'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par/_/thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/_/des shing pha rol 
[\[263b.6\]]phyin la rab brtson te/_/byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur/_/sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag_/de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog_/las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/_/grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang /_/ji ltar 
[\[263b.7\]]pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/_/nyi zla nam mkha' thogs pa med ltar spyad/_/zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/_/ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed/_/bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing /_/'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad/_/byang 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing /_/sems can rnams kyi spyod dang mthun par 'jug_/bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing /_/ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur/_/bdag gis spyod dang mthun par gang spyod pa/_/de dag 
[\[264a.2\]]dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang /_/spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/_/bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag_/bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/_/de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog_/
[\[264a.3\]]de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung /_/sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/_/mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta/_/ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/_/de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi dam 
[\[264a.4\]]pa'i chos 'dzin cing /_/byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/_/bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyad pa yang /_/ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/_/srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba na/_/bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed/_/thabs dang shes rab ting 
[\[264a.5\]]'dzin rnam thar dang /_/yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/_/rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/_/zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi/_/
[\[264a.6\]]de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang /_/skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyis/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang /_/bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug_/gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/_/rgyal ba kun dbyangs 
[\[264a.7\]]yan lag rnam dag pa/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs/_/sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/_/dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag_/'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi/_/de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]la/_/blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug_/ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang /_/skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/_/gang yang bskal ba dus gsum tshad de dag_/skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/_/dus 
[\[264b.2\]]gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge gang /_/de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/_/rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/_/sgyu mar gyur ba'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug_/gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa/_/de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon 
[\[264b.3\]]par bsgrub/_/de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/_/rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug_/gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/_/de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/_/mya ngan 'das pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston/_/mgon po 
[\[264b.4\]]kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/_/kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang /_/kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs rnams dang /_/kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang /_/kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/_/kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs 
[\[264b.5\]]rnams dang /_/chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/_/shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/_/byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed/_/las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing /_/nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms 
[\[264b.6\]]par byed/_/bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing /_/bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing /_/sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par 'grol/_/chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing /_/ye shes 
[\[264b.7\]]rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing /_/smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing /_/bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi/_/gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi/_/
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/_/bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa/_/gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya/_/mkhas pa de 
[\[265a.2\]]dang mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir/_/dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing /_/spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang /_/bsngo ba'ang bzang bo mkhas pa ci 'dra bar/_/de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs 
[\[265a.3\]]par shog_/kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir/_/'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad bar bgyi/_/ma 'ongs bskal ba kun tu mi skyo bar/_/de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/_/spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig_/yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med 
[\[265a.4\]]par shog_/spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang /_/de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/_/nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/_/sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te/_/ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/_/bdag gi 
[\[265a.5\]]smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo/_/gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/_/rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul/_/lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang /_/zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas/_/gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 
[\[265a.6\]]'di thos nas/_/byang chub mchog gis rjes su rab mos shing /_/lan cig tsam yang dad pa skyed pa ni/_/bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/_/gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa/_/des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur/_/
[\[265a.7\]]des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin/_/snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong /_/de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/_/mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs/_/kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar/_/de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/_/
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams/_/gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag_/de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na/_/myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/_/ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang /_/rigs dang kha dog rnams 
[\[265b.2\]]dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub/_/'jig rten gsum po kun la'ang mchod par 'gyur/_/byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro/_/song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/_/byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu 
[\[265b.3\]]bskor/_/bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul/_/gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di/_/'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi/_/de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/_/byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig_/'jam dpal 
[\[265b.4\]]ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang /_/kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te/_/de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing /_/dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/_/dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/_/bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa 
[\[265b.5\]]des/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang /_/bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/_/bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na/_/sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te/_/mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/_/bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 
[\[265b.6\]]'gro/_/des song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang /_/thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog_/de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bkang /_/'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/_/
[\[265b.7\]]pad+ma dam pa shin tu mdzes las skyes/_/snang ba mtha' yas rgyal las mngon sum du/_/lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog_/der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/_/sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/_/blo yi stobs kyis phyogs 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]bcu rnams su yang /_/sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/_/bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa yis/_/dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/_/des ni 'gro ba'i dge ba'i smon lam rnams/_/skad cig gcig gis 
[\[266a.2\]]thams cad 'byor bar shog_/bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bsngos pa yis/_/bsod nams dam pa mtha' yas gang thob des/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams/_/'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog_/smon lam rgyal po 'di mchog gtso 
[\[266a.3\]]des ni/_/'gro ba mtha' yas kun la phan byed cing /_/kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub cing /_/ngan song rgyud gsum ma lus stongs par shog_/'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[266a.4\]{D1096}]@#/_/'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/_sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang /_/nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing /_/mtho 
[\[266a.5\]]ris lam ni rab ston la/_/rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/_/byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/_/bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/_/bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi/_/bdag 
[\[266a.6\]]las rnam pa gsum gang gis/_/bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa de/_/bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/_/bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog_/phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/_/sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i yi 
[\[266a.7\]]rang bas/_/de la bdag ni yi rang ngo /_/sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog_/phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/_/sa bcu dag 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog_/'tshang rgya bgyid par skul ma 'debs/_/byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing /_/sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/_/srog chags kun la sman slad du/_/chos kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig_/
[\[266b.2\]]chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni/_/sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig_/'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing /_/srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/_/'ching ba kun gyis 
[\[266b.3\]]bcings bdag la/_/rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol/_/sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni dmod mi mdzad/_/sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/_/srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[266b.4\]]sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang /_/gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa/_/de dag rjes su bdag slob cing /_/byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/_/'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog_/mngon shes drug po mngon 
[\[266b.5\]]bgyis nas/_/bla med byang chub reg gyur cig_/ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang /_/rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/_/rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/_/stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog_/sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar/_/sems 
[\[266b.6\]]can ma mchis srog ma mchis/_/gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/_/bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog_/bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin par ni/_/dngos po kun la mi gnas par/_/sems can kun la bde slad du/_/ser sna ma mchis sbyin 
[\[266b.7\]]gtong shog_/dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas/_/bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog_/dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing /_/tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sa 'am yang na chu 'am me/_/rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing /_/bzod pa 'am khro ba ma mchis par/_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/
[\[267a.2\]]brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing /_/stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang /_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang /_/rdo rje lta 
[\[267a.3\]]bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang /_/rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog_/sangs rgyas kun gyis 
[\[267a.4\]]bsngags pa dang /_/'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis/_/bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig_/de ltar spyad pa spyad byed cing /_/byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis/_/pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/_/
[\[267a.5\]]sa bcu po la rab tu gnas/_/'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1097}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_a gra tsAr+ya pra Ni d+hA na/_bod skad du/_mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam 
[\[267a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud/_/de dag la ni rjed cing mchod par bgyi/_/'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig_/
[\[267a.7\]]byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag rtog_/chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung /_/dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar/_/de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud/_/thugs rje ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i/_/rgyal ba mi 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba/_/mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi/_/rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis/_/sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags/_/de bzhin lus ngag 
[\[267b.2\]]yid kyis bgyis pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/_/shAkya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med/_/de dag gis ni phrin las yongs sbyangs dang /_/'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing rtogs gyur ltar/_/de bzhin bdag 
[\[267b.3\]]gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi/_/thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang /_/byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba dang /_/ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig_/mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog_/sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' 
[\[267b.4\]]bdag dang /_/de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma'i sgron/_/de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar/_/de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang /_/phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang /_/de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang /_/shes 
[\[267b.5\]]rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la/_/byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo /_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang /_/chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la/_/byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo /_/'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg 
[\[267b.6\]]gyur cig_/'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul/_/phyogs bcu dag na byang chub brnyes pa gang /_/de dag tshangs pas ji ltar gsol ba ltar/_/rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig_/rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs 
[\[267b.7\]]par shog_/'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig_/mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa/_/'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang /_/las dge rnams la yi rang gang 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]lags dang /_/sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang /_/rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dag_/bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa/_/lus dang ngag dang sems las byung yang rung /_/bdag gis bgyis 
[\[268a.2\]]dang bgyid dang bgyid 'gyur gang /_/thams cad skye dgu sman slad stsal bar bgyi/_/ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas/_/stsal ba legs par stsal cing legs rgyas pa/_/de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad stsal/_/'gro kun byang chub mchog la 
[\[268a.3\]]reg gyur cig_/bdag gis 'gro la stsal ba gang lags pa'i/_/bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa/_/theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/_/bdag la byang chub 'bras bu grub par shog_/mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams/_/'gro 
[\[268a.4\]]ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog_/'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid cing /_/byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi/_/mi gcig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i/_/tshor ba thams cad bdag gis myong 'gyur bar/_/bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro 
[\[268a.5\]]bar bgyi/_/'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog_/sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang /_/dud 'gro rnams dang mi yi sdug bsngal dang /_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dag_/bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog_/
[\[268a.6\]]rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag dang /_/sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang /_/smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog_/bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig_/bdag ni nam yang skyo 
[\[268a.7\]]bar mi 'gyur shog_/byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du/_/bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog_/mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+m+ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D1098}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten 'di 'am gang dag 'das pa dang /_/mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod 
[\[268b.2\]]pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur ba/_/mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/_/shes pas shAkya thub 
[\[268b.3\]]des rab tu phye/_/bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/_/chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab bstan pa/_/ston pa'i rnal 
[\[268b.4\]]'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/_/rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis la mi mthong ba/_/ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/_/de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing /_/
[\[268b.5\]]gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni/_/drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/_/bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs/_/de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/_/zhing rab gshin la sa bon btab pa bzhin/_/'di ni dge 'dun 
[\[268b.6\]]rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing /_/gau nya ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa/_/de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/_/mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/_/de 
[\[268b.7\]]bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/_/'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang /_/the tshom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag_/cig char spangs te 'phags pa'i bden 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]mthong ba/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang /_/sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing /_/glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/_/de 
[\[269a.2\]]ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/_/de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/_/phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi g.yo ltar/_/'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/_/
[\[269a.3\]]gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/_/'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing /_/lus kyang sbyin par yid la 
[\[269a.4\]]byas pa ni/_/de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/ci ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba/_/lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/_/de ltar kun tu sbyor ba 
[\[269a.5\]]rab btang ba/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/_/des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig_/ston 
[\[269a.6\]]mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig_/zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir 
[\[269a.7\]]dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig_/tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/_/dge 'dun phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog_/sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/_/de dag thams 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]cad deng 'dir bder gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/_/sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog_/'dir ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/_/
[\[269b.2\]]shin tu bden pa gsung zhing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]med pa/_/bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog_/de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang /_/rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang /_/dgra bcom dag gi mthu dag dang /_/gsang 
[\[269b.3\]]sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_/shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang /_/maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang /_/ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/_/'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_/kauN+Di n+ya yi sngar thob dang /_/kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang /_/tshangs 
[\[269b.4\]]ba yi ni byams pa dang /_/brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang /_/dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang /_/sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang /_/'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang /_/de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/_/
[\[269b.5\]]bdag gi dug ni dug med shog_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//[ {D1099}]@#/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal 
[\[269b.6\]]lo/_/rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/_/rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung /_/thams cad skyob pa sA la'i drung na gnas/_/bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung /_/sangs rgyas gser thub u dum bA ra'i drung /_/'od srung 
[\[269b.7\]]n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/_/shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/_/phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/_/sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/_/mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod ba dag_/lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/_/
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/_/sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde 
[\[270a.2\]]legs shog_/mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog_/de dag sdig par ma gyur cig_/nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/_/rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/_/sangs 
[\[270a.3\]]rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/_/dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/_/bden pa'i tshig gis kun tu bde lags shog_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[270a.4\]{D1100}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_de ba pa ri pr-its+tsha maM ga la gA thA/_bod skad du/_lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/_/
[\[270a.5\]]lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la/_/phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to/_/dge ba don du gnyer ba na/_/lha dang mi rnams so so nas/_/bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/_/bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[270a.6\]]dge ba don du gnyer ba na/_/lha dang mi rnams so so nas/_/bkra shis rnams ni rjod byed pa/_/de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/_/yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang /_/sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang /_/sems ni legs par gtad byas pa/_/
[\[270a.7\]]de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/sbyin dang shin tu snyan smra dang /_/yang dag don la rnam nges dang /_/khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/byis pa rnams la mi sten dang /_/mkhas pa rnams la sten pa dang /_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_/zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang /_/'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang /_/dge ba'i 
[\[270b.2\]]las la brten pa dang /_/bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang /_/chog shes mthun pas 'tsho ba dang /_/rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/mi smod de bzhin bzod 
[\[270b.3\]]pa dang /_/'phags pa rnams dang mthun sbyor dang /_/dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/le lo med dang mang thos dang /_/chos la legs par rnam nges dang /_/de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa 
[\[270b.4\]]yin/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad la/_/byams pa'i sems ni rab sgom zhing /_/dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/_/shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs dang /_/tshul 
[\[270b.5\]]khrims nongs par ma gyur pa/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang /_/tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/
[\[270b.6\]]ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang /_/shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang /_/gang gi sems ni mi g.yo dang /_/dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/_/de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/_/
[\[270b.7\]]de dang 'di ni ci rigs par/_/'di la bkra shis de dag ni/_/mkhas pa gang zhig stod byed pa/_/de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/_/lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]{D1101}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_swa sti gA thA/_bod skad du/_bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha gcig nye bar song nas su/_/lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/_/sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che/_/
[\[271a.2\]]ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur/_/des ni tshig 'di gsan gyur nas/_/'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig rtag tu rjod byed pa/_/nga yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon/_/'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na/_/rin chen rgya chen mchog 
[\[271a.3\]]ni gang yod pa/_/des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/_/cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/
[\[271a.4\]]bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang /_/shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa/_/chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/_/de mngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag 
[\[271a.5\]]med de/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/_/de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/_/sbyin gnas 
[\[271a.6\]]de dag sa stengs shin tu dkon/_/de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde 
[\[271a.7\]]legs shog_/dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/_/'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/_/shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog_/mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang /_/mtha' yas bla ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/_/ting 'dzin 
[\[271b.2\]]de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/_/ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs 
[\[271b.3\]]shog_/ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste/_/stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/_/de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/_/'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun 
[\[271b.4\]]rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan/_/kun gyi dam 
[\[271b.5\]]pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/_/bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs 
[\[271b.6\]]shog_/srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/_/skyon med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/_/shin tu 'gog cing gya nom nges par 'byung /_/shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dam pa'i chos kyi 
[\[271b.7\]]rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/_/bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/_/bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/dam pa 
[\[272a.2\]]rnams kyis dam pa don dam mkhyen/_/mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtson/_/gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/_/shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/rdzogs 
[\[272a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/'dun pa bskyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing /_/gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/_/gzhan gyis mi bkri 
[\[272a.4\]]ba dag zhi der reg_/'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/bden 
[\[272a.5\]]pa mthong bas brjed pas brgya lam na/_/gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang /_/de ni de 'chal pa yi 'os min te/_/chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten 
[\[272a.6\]]mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/_/sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/_/lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/_/ston pa ded dpon 
[\[272a.7\]]sman pa rnams kyi mchog_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/so ga'i zla ba dang por thub pa yi/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/_/chos de dang ni lhag pa'am mtshungs pa med/_/'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/_/ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden 
[\[272b.2\]]mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas med la/_/rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/_/rtsa ba 'gags pas srid pa mi skyed pa/_/bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/_/ngo 
[\[272b.3\]]mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/_/dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog_/ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/_/bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog_/bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[272b.4\]{D1102}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_swa s+t+ya ya na gA thA/_/bod skad du/_bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/_/lha zhig nye bar song nas su/_/gang gis rtag tu bde 
[\[272b.5\]]legs pa/_/bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs/_/dam pas de dag gsan pa dang /_/'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/_/gang gis kun tu bde legs su/_/'gyur ba lha khyod legs par nyon/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la/_/
[\[272b.6\]]dad pa mi g.yo legs rab brtan/_/gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang /_/bu dang bu mo bran dag la/_/rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/
[\[272b.7\]]gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/_/legs par rab dad yon 'bul dang /_/lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/_/yid la nyes byas med pa dang /_/gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la/_/tshad med kun tu mi 'khrugs pa/_/byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/_/
[\[273a.2\]]'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/_/bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgom pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi/_/stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing /_/de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 
[\[273a.3\]]'gyur/_/gang gis lus kyi dri med chos/_/mngon sum byas nas rgyu ba dang /_/dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing /_/ye 
[\[273a.4\]]shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/_/mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/_/de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/_/bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs 
[\[273a.5\]]su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//[{D1103}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_maM ga la gA thA/_/bod skad du/_bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[273a.6\]]phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/_/de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo 
[\[273a.7\]]ba/_/'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/_/chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/_/de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/_/dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug_/mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]mchod pa'i gnas/_/tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/_/de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/_/sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po/_/don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/_/tshogs kyi lam 
[\[273b.2\]]dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/_/gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/_/dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra shis 
[\[273b.3\]]gang byung ba/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bI'i tshal/_/lha mang dag gis bstan par mgon po bltams pa na/_/srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/_/bkra shis des 
[\[273b.4\]]ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/_/lhums nas bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/_/myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams 
[\[273b.5\]]la zhi byed shog_/grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/_/rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/_/bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/dgyes 
[\[273b.6\]]shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/_/dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/_/lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/rab tu 'od 'bar gser 
[\[273b.7\]]dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing /_/baiDUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng bzhugs te/_/skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/_/shin 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]tu rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa/_/klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/_/mang po 
[\[274a.2\]]btul te sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/_/bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te/_/nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi 
[\[274a.3\]]po dag rnam btul ba/_/ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/grong khyer pA rA Na sI ra drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis 
[\[274a.4\]]gang /_/lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/_/bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/_/bcom ldan shAkya 
[\[274a.5\]]thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /_/'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag_/[(]nya [,]nye [)]bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin 
[\[274a.6\]]pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/_/tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/_/sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang /_/
[\[274a.7\]]bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/_/man dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/_/lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang /_/bkra 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa/_/mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang /_/bkra shis des ni skye 
[\[274b.2\]]dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te 
[\[274b.3\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D1104}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/_/tshe 
[\[274b.4\]]lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/_/shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/_/tshe 
[\[274b.5\]]lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/_/shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/_/tshe lo drug khri'i dus 
[\[274b.6\]]na grong khyer mnyam med du/_/shing mchog sA lI drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni stobs ldan bram ze'i rigs/_/tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong 
[\[274b.7\]]khyer mdzes ldan du/_/shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs/_/tshe lo yum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]ldan du/_/u dum bA ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/_/tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/_/n+ya 
[\[275a.2\]]gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can/_/tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/_/a sh+bat+tha yi shing 
[\[275a.3\]]drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang /_/phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba/_/chos 
[\[275a.4\]]dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba/_/deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]/_/
[\[275a.5\]{D1105}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pany+tsa ta thA ga ta maM ga la gA thA/_bod skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/_/
[\[275a.6\]]zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa/_/dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/_/mgon po yon tan 
[\[275a.7\]]thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/_/dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing /_/yang dag bden pa'i 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]'byor ba sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/_/rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/_/ye shes pad+ma'i 
[\[275b.2\]]steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing /_/tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing /_/'gro ba kun gyi 
[\[275b.3\]]'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/_/thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog_/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_
[\[275b.4\]{D1106}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tri ku la maM ga la/_bod skad du/_rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam 
[\[275b.5\]]dpal gzhon nu'i sku/_/bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog_/bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang /_/bde 
[\[275b.6\]]gshegs gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/_/bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog_/bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/_/'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/_/bde gshegs thugs kyi bkra shis gang yin 
[\[275b.7\]]pa/_/bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog_/dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]/_/[{D1107}]@#/_/shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing /_/phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des/_/khyod kyi don rnams grub gyur cig_/thams cad myur du mthun par shog_/phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar/_/
[\[276a.2\]]lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog_/g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig_/yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog_/tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing /_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/_/rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing /_/de dag 
[\[276a.3\]]bde ba skyid par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/smin drug dang ni snar ma dang /_/mgo dang lag dang nam so dang /_/rgyal 
[\[276a.4\]]dang skag ces bya ba ste/_/de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyod la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal 
[\[276a.5\]]po ni/_/yul 'khor srung zhes grags pa ste/_/de ni dri za kun gyi bdag_/nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang 
[\[276a.6\]]po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de rnams khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang /_/don grub ma dang mi pham 
[\[276a.7\]]dang /_/dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang /_/dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]yod/_/rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/_/de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams 
[\[276b.2\]]kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni/_/
[\[276b.3\]]me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin/_/sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/_/de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de 
[\[276b.4\]]dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod/_/de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag_/gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang 
[\[276b.5\]]po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de rnams khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/_/grags pa thob dang grags 
[\[276b.6\]]'dzin dang /_/legs par langs dang rab snga dang /_/legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/_/
[\[276b.7\]]rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar/_/rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang /_/brtson 'grus 
[\[277a.2\]]brtan ldan snubs dang ni/_/chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang /_/gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/_/nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po 
[\[277a.3\]]rgyal po ni/_/mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/_/de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag_/chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/
[\[277a.4\]]de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/_/rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/_/pad+ma dkar dang skya reng dang /_/cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang /_/rol dang gnag dang 
[\[277a.5\]]stabs myur srid/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod/_/nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub/_/nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur/_/de yang khyed la nad med 
[\[277a.6\]]cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/_/byang phyogs su ni 'gro 
[\[277a.7\]]ba na/_/gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/_/rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig_/mon gru dang ni mon gre dang /_/khrums stod dang ni khrums smad dang /_/nam gru dang ni tha skar dang /_/bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/_/rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/_/'jig rten skyong 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ba grags ldan pa/_/byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/_/mi la zhon pa lus ngan po/_/gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste/_/nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]lhan cig srung bar shog_/de la bu ni mang 
[\[277b.2\]]yod la/_/mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste/_/dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang /_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/lha mo gzhon nu brgyad 
[\[277b.3\]]yod de/_/rab chags lha mo gtong lha mo/_/sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can/_/rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang /_/re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma/_/de dag khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong bar shog_/byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/_/
[\[277b.4\]]spos ngad ldang ba'i ri bo yod/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas/_/rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug_/de yang khyed la nad med cing /_/shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig_/phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/
[\[277b.5\]]lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/_/nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/_/phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas/_/lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis/_/phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/_/dge sbyong brgyad dang bram 
[\[277b.6\]]ze brgyad/_/yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad/_/dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/_/de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/_/khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur/_/ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog_/gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog_/gnyen gyis lta 
[\[277b.7\]]ba'ang bkra shis shog_/dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang /_/dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas/_/thams cad du ni bkra shis dang /_/bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog_/tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang /_/zag pa med pa rnam par grol 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]rnams dang /_/klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes srungs/_/ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog_/'phags pa rgya cher rol ba'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga go na dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad 
[\[278a.2\]]pa rdzogs so//[ {D1108}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_rat+na tri swa sti gA thA/_bod skad du/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/che ba'i che mchog 
[\[278a.3\]]ston mchog bla na med/_/chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/_/bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/_/rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog_/chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med/_/dam chos bdud rtsi bden 
[\[278a.4\]]ba'i byin brlabs kyis/_/nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba/_/rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog_/dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/_/rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/_/nyon mongs 
[\[278a.5\]]sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/_/rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog_/tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin brlabs kyis/_/phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/_/bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang /_/tshe ring 
[\[278a.6\]]nad med bde skyid ldan par shog_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des ba la gsungs pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen 
[\[278a.7\]]gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o//_//
